faith one baptiſme ſo may one mind one accord putting awaie biting gnawing backbiting ſlandering miſreporting chriſtian brother ſhew ſelues diſciples chriſt profeſſe moſt high charitie humilitie patience ſuffering moſt patientlie ignominie rebuke ſlanders praieng eternall father enimies moſt perfect charitie thing remit father scripture doth witneſſe praied mount godlie example leſſon v followe time ſeaſons well proſperitie aduerſitie haue god committing leauing care greefes abandon policy inuentions moſt vaine fooliſh indeed verie ſhadowes dreames yet ſo carnall fleſhlie run headlong like vnbrideled colt without ſnaffle bridle loue god printed hart would keepe v backe running aſtraie vntill ſuch time pleaſe god ſend v bit hold v ſhall neuer run right waie although wee ſpeake talke neuer ſo much god word true follower chriſts doctrine haue alwaies reſpect eie vocation called miniſterie god word preach teach ſincerelie edifieng others ſhew themſelues liuing follower king prince bearing ſword euen purpoſe puniſh euill dooers child honour father mother knowing god commandement hath thereto annexed promiſe long life ſeruants obeie ſerue maiſters feare reuerence euen huſbands keepe ſilence congregation learne huſbands home alſo weare ſuch apparell becommeth holineſſe comlie vſage ſoberneſſe accuſers detractor giuen much eating delicate meat drinking wine teach honeſt thing make yong woman ſober minded loue huſbands loue child diſcreet chaſte houſwifelie good obedient vnto huſbands word god euill ſpoken uerelie ſorts people would looke owne vocation ordeine ſame according chriſts doctrine ſhould haue ſo many eies eares men fault haue ſo buſie glad find eſpie men dooings forget haue time weigh ponder owne word god ought firſt reforme ſhall better helpe ſtraw eies ala ſo much giuen loue flatter ſelues ſo blinded carnall affection ſee perceiue fault ſelues therfore thing verie requiſite neceſſarie v praie one hart mind god giue v heauenlie light knowledge owne miſeries calamity may ſee acknowledge trulie twelfe chapter concluſion christian exhortation amendement life anie man ſhall offended lamenting fault men world fantaſing themſelues doo either hatred malice anie ſort kind people verelie ſo dooing ſhall doo great wrong thanke god grace hate creature yea would ſaie giue witneſſe conſcience neither life honour rich neither whatſoeuer poſſeſſe appertaineth mine owne priuate commoditie neuer ſo deerlie beloued mee moſt willinglie gladlie would leaue win anie man chriſt degree ſort ſoeuer yet nothing compariſon charitie god hath ſhewed ſending chriſt die charitie angel apoſtles ſhould like ſparke fire compared great heape burning coales god knoweth intent mind haue lamented mine owne ſinnes fault world truſt bodie iudge haue done praiſe thanke anie creature ſince rather might aſhamed reioice rehearſall thereof knewe little eſteeme weigh praiſe world opinion ſoone remooued taken awaie thanke god grace knowe world blind iudge praiſes therof vaine little moment therefore ſeeke praiſes ſame neither ſatiſfie none otherwiſe taught chriſt doo according chriſtian charitie would god would occaſion doth ſerue confeſſe fault world reſpects owne commoditie laid apart ala ſelfeloue doth ſo much reigne among v haue ſaid eſpie owne fault although ſomtime find owne guilt either fauourable interpret ſin elſe aſhamed confeſſe ſelues thereof yea ſore offended greeued heare fault charitablie godlie told v putting difference betweene charitable warning malicious accuſing trulie ſought god glorie ſhould doo thing ſhould aſhamed confeſſe ſelues digreſſe god precept ordinance manifeſt haue done dailie doo praie god owne fault deed condemne v laſt daie euerie man ſhall rewarded according dooings trulie doo redreſſe amend liuing according doctrine goſpell ſhall receiue terrible ſentence chriſt ſonne god ſhall come iudge condemne tranſgreſſours breaker precept commandements reward obedient louing child ſhall haue man lawe make plea v neither haue daie deferred neither iudge corrupted affection bribe reward neither heare anie excuſe delaie neither ſhall saint martyr helpe v neuer ſo holie neither ſhall ignorance ſaue v damnation yet wilfull blindneſſe obſtinate ignorance ſhall receiue greater puniſhment without iuſt cauſe ſhall knowne hath walked darke thing ſhall appeere manifeſt man deed ſhall hidden neither word thought poore ſimple obſeruers god commandements ſhall rewarded euerlaſting life obedient child heauenlie father tranſgreſſors adder diminiſhers lawe god ſhall receiue eternall damnation iuſt reward beſeech god may eſcape fearefull ſentence found ſuch faithfull ſeruants louing child may heare happie comfortable moſt ioifull ſentence ordeined child god come hither ye bleſſed father receiue kingdome heauen prepared beginning world unto father sonne holie ghoſt honour glorie world without end amen ¶ alſo followe godlie praiers meditation wherein mind ſtirred patientlie ſuffer affliction heere ſet naught vaine proſperitie world alwaie long euerlaſting felicitie collected holie work vertuous gratious princeſſe katherine queene england france ireland coloſsians 3 verſe 1 2 ye riſen againe chriſt ſeeke thing aboue chriſt ſitteth right hand god set affection thing aboue thing earth firſt chapter praiers performe god patience moſt benigne lord ieſu grant thy grace may alwaie worke mee perſeuere vnto end grant may euer deſire moſt pleaſant moſt acceptable thee thy followe alwaie thy let alwaie one one deſire thee haue deſire thou wilt lord thou knoweſt thing moſt profitable moſt expedient giue therefore thou wilt much thou wilt thou wilt doo thou wilt ſhall pleaſe thee ſhall moſt thine honour put thou wilt freelie doo thing thy thy creature thy hand leade turne thou wilt lo thy ſeruant readie thing thou commandeſt deſire liue ſelfe thee lord ieſu praie thee grant grace neuer ſet hart thing world worldlie carnall affection may vtterlie die mortified grant aboue thing may reſt thee fullie quiet pacifie hart thee thou lord art verie true peace hart perfect reſt ſoule without thee thing greeuous vnquiet lord ieſu beſeech thee euerie place time let ſpeciall ſolace gladlie thy loue lacke worldlie ſolace thou withdrawe thy comfort time keepe lord deſperation make patientlie abide thy ordinance lord ieſu thy iudgments righteous thy prouidence much better imagine deuiſe wherfore doo thing ſhall pleaſe thee may well thou dooeſt thou wilt light thou bleſſed thou wilt darkneſſe thou alſo bleſſed thou vouchſafe comfort thou highlie bleſſed thou wilt liue trouble without comfort thou like wiſe euer bleſſed lord giue mee grace gladlie ſuffer whatſoeuer thou wilt ſhall fall vpon patientlie take thy hand good bad bitter ſweete ioie ſorrowe thing ſhall befall vnto hartilie thanke thee keepe lord ſinne ſhall neither dread death hell thanks ought giue vnto thee haſt ſuffered greeuous death croſſe deliuer ſinnes obtaine euerlaſting life thou gaueſt v moſt perfect example patience fulfilling obeieng thy father euen vnto death make wretched ſinner obedientlie vſe ſelfe thy althings patientlie beare burden corruptible life though life tedious heauie burden ſoule yet neuertheleſſe thorough thy grace example thee made much eaſie comfortable thine incarnation paſſion thy holie life waie thee following thee walke thee art head sauiour yet except thou hadſt gone ſhewed v waie euerlaſting life would endeuor himſelfe followe thee seeing yet ſo ſlowe dull hauing light thy bleſſed example holie doctrine leade direct v lord ieſu make poſſible grace impoſſible nature thou knoweſt well may litle ſuffer anon caſt downe ouerthrowne little aduerſitie wherfore beſeech thee lord ſtrengthen thy ſpirit may willinglie ſuffer thy ſake maner trouble affliction ſecond chapter confeſsion infirmity deſire reſt god aboue thing lord knowledge vnto thee mine vnrighteouſneſſe confeſſe thee vnſtableneſſe hart oftentimes verie little thing troubleth ſore maketh mee dull ſlowe ſerue thee ſometime purpoſe ſtand ſtronglie little trouble commeth mee great anguiſh greefe right little thing riſeth greeuous temptation mee yea thinke ſelfe bee ſure ſtrong ſeemeth haue vpper hand ſuddenlie feele ſelfe readie fall little blaſt temptation behold therefore good lord weakeneſſe conſider fraileneſſe beſt knowne thee haue mercie deliuer iniquitie ſinne bee intangled therewith oft time greeueth mee ſore maner confoundeth mee ſo vnſtable ſo weake ſo fraile reſiſting ſinfull motion although drawe alwaie conſent yet neuertheleſſe aſſaults bee verie greeuous vnto mee tedious mee liue ſuch battell albeit perceiue ſuch battell vnprofitable vnto mee thereby knowe better ſelfe mine owne infirmity muſt ſeeke helpe onlie thy hand lord god iſrael louer faithfull ſoules vouchſafe behold labour ſorowe mee thy poore creature aſſiſt mee thing thy grace ſo ſtrengthen heauenlie ſtrength neither cruell enimie feend neither wretched fleſh yet ſubiect ſpirit haue victorie dominion ouer mee life may bee called trouble miſerie lacketh euerie place full ſnares mortall enimies one trouble temptation ouerpaſſed another commeth firſt conflict yet new battell ſuddenlie ariſeth wherefore lord ieſu praie thee giue thy grace reſt thee aboue thing quiet mee thee aboue creature aboue glorie honour aboue dignitie power aboue cunning policie aboue health beautie aboue rich treaſure aboue ioie pleaſure aboue fame praiſe aboue mirth conſolation man hart may take feele beſides thee thou lord god art beſt moſt wiſe moſt high moſt mightie moſt ſufficient moſt full goodneſſe moſt ſweet moſt comfortable moſt faire moſt louing moſt noble moſt glorious goodnes moſt perfectlie therefore whatſoeuer haue beſides thee nothing mee hart may reſt ne fullie bee pacified onlie thee lord ieſu moſt louing ſpouſe ſhall giue mee wing perfect loue may flie vp theſe worldlie miſeries reſt thee ſhall aſcend thee feele ſweet thou art ſhall wholie gather ſelfe thee ſo perfectlie ſhall thy loue feele ſelfe thee onlie aboue ſelfe aboue worldlie thing thou maiſt vouchſafe viſit mee ſuch wiſe thou dooeſt viſit thy moſt faithfull louers often mourne complaine miſeries life ſorowe great heauineſſe ſuffer manie thing happen dailie mee oftentimes trouble mee make mee heauie darken mine vnderſtanding hinder mee greatlie put mind thee ſo encumber manie way freelie cleerelie deſire thee ne haue thy ſweet conſolations thy bleſſed saint alwaie preſent beſeech thee lord ieſu ſighings inward deſires hart may moue incline thee heare mee third chapter recounting god benefit praier obtaine free cleane mind hartie wiſdome deliuerance oieſu king euerlaſting glorie ioie comfort chriſtian people wandering pilgrim wildernes world hart crieth thee ſtill deſires ſilence ſpeaketh vnto thee ſaith long tarieth lord god come mee come lord viſit mee without thee haue true ioie without thee ſoule heauie ſad priſon bounden fetter ſorowe till thou lord thy gratious preſence vouchſafe viſit bring againe libertie ioie ſpirit ſhew thy fauourable countenance vnto open hart lord may behold thy lawes teach walke thy commandements make knowe folowe thy haue alwaies remembrance thy manifold benefit may yeeld due thanks thee ſame knowledge confeſſe truth able giue thee condigne thanks leaſt benefit thou haſt giuen lord gift vertues anie man hath bodie ſoule naturall ſupernaturall thy gift come thee ſelues declare great rich thy mercie goodneſſe vnto v though ſome haue mo gift yet proceed thee without thee leaſt cannot lord accompt great benefit haue manie worldlie gift whereby laud praiſe men might blind ſoule deceiue lord knowe man ought aſhamed miſcontent lowe eſtate world lacketh pleaſures life rather glad reioice thereat ſo much thou haſt choſen poore meeke perſons ſuch deſpiſed world thy ſeruants familiar friend witneſſe thy bleſſed apoſtles whome thou madeſt chiefe paſtours ſpirituall gouernours thy flocke departed counſel jewes reioiſing counted worthie ſuffer rebuke thy name euen ſo lord grant thy ſeruant may well content taken leaſt greateſt well pleaſed loweſt place higheſt glad reputation world thy ſake noble famous lord worke perfect man neuer ſequeſter mind thee among manie worldlie care go without care maner idle diſſolute perſon prerogatiue free mind alwaie minding heauenlie thing cleauing inordinate affection anie creature beſeech thee therefore lord ieſu keepe ſuperfluous care world inquieted bodilie neceſſities ne taken voluptuous pleaſures world ne fleſh preſerue thing hinder ſoule health ouerthrowne lord god art ſweetneſſe vnſpeakable turne bitterneſſe worldlie fleſhlie delight might drawe loue eternall thing loue ſhort vile pleaſures let fleſh bloud ouercome ne yet world vaine glorie deceiue feend manifold craft ſupplant giue ghoſtlie ſtrength reſiſting patience ſuffering conſtancie perſeuering end giue worldlie delectation moſt ſweet conſolation thy holie ſpirit fleſhlie loue indue ſoule feruent loue thee make ſtrong inwardlie ſoule caſt thereof vnprofitable care world led vnſtable deſires earthlie thing may repute thing world tranſitorie ſoone vaniſhing awaie ſelfe alſo drawing toward mine end nothing vnder ſunne may long abide vanitie affliction ſpirit giue lord therefore heauenlie wiſdome may learne ſeeke find thee aboue thing loue thee giue grace withdrawe flatter patientlie ſuffer vniuſtlie greeue lord temptation tribulation commeth vouchſafe ſuccour may turne ghoſtlie comfort patientlie ſuffer alwaie ſaie thy name bleſſed lord trouble hand well greatlie vexed preſent affliction moſt glorious father ſhall anguiſh trouble euerie ſide helpe beſeech thee houre thou ſhalt lauded praiſed perfectlie made meeke thee cleerelie deliuered thee may therefore pleaſe thee deliuer may moſt ſinfull wretch whether may go ſuccour thee giue mee patience time trouble helpe lord god ſhall feare ne dread trouble ſo euer fall vpon ſhall ſaie thy done haue deſerued troubled greeued therefore behooueth ſuffer long pleaſeth thee would god might ſuffer gladlie till furious tempeſts ouerpaſſed quietneſſe hart might come againe thy mightie hand lord ſtrong ynough take trouble aſſwage cruell aſſaults thereof thou haſt oftentimes done time cleerelie deliuered thee may gladneſſe ſaie right hand higheſt hath made change fourth chapter deſpiſe thing world yeeld ſelues vp god may redemption time neede lord grant thy ſingular grace may come thither creature ſhall let ne keepe perfect beholding thee long anie tranſitorie thing keepeth backe hath rule may freelie aſcend thee lord without thee nothing may long delight pleaſe anie thing ſhould liking ſauourie muſt helpe thy grace ſeaſoned ſpice thy wiſedome euerlaſting light far paſſing thing ſend downe beames thy brightneſſe aboue purifie lighten inward part hart quicken ſoule power thereof may cleaue faſt ioined thee ioifull gladneſſe ghoſtlie rauiſhings ſhall bleſſed houre come thou ſhalt viſit glad thy bleſſed preſence thou ſhalt uerelie vntill time come perfect ioie ala mine old man carnall affection liue ſtill crucified perfectlie dead yet ſtriueth fleſh againſt ſpirit moueth great battell inwardlie againſt ſuffereth kingdome ſoule liue peace thou good lord haſt lordſhip ouer power ſea aſſwage rage ſurges ſame ariſe helpe deſtroie power mine enimies alwaies make battell againſt ſhew foorth greatneſſe thy goodneſſe let power thy right hand glorified none helpe refuge thee onlie lord god thee honour glorie euerlaſting lord grant may wholie reſigne myſelfe thee thing forſake ſelfe patientlie beare croſſe followe thee lord man thou vouchſafeſt haue mind viſit thou art alwaie one alwaie good alwaie righteous holie iuſtlie bleſſedlie diſpoſing thing thy wiſdome wretch ſelfe alwaie readie prone euill neuer abide one ſtate manie tune doo varie change neuertheleſſe ſhall better ſhall pleaſe thee thou lord onelie art maieſt helpe thou maieſt ſo confirme ſtabliſh hart ſhall changed thee ſurelie fixed finallie reſt quieted thee nothing elſe ſelfe vanitie thee vnconſtant creature feeble therefore whereof may rightfullie glorie ſhould looke magnified ſo pleaſeth himſelfe without thee diſpleaſeth thee delighteth men praiſings looſeth true praiſe thee true praiſe praiſed thee true ioie reioice thee wherefore thy name lord praiſed mine thy work magnified mine thy goodneſſe alwaies lauded bleſſed thou art glorie ioie hart thee ſhall glorie reioice ſelfe anie worldlie honor dignitie thine eternall glorie compared ſhadowe verie vanitie lord liue great darkneſſe ſoone deceiued vanity world ſoone greeued little trouble yet could behold ſelfe well ſhould plainelie ſee trouble ſoeuer haue ſuffered hath iuſtlie come vpon becauſe haue often ſinned greeuouſlie offended thee therefore confuſion deſpite due thee laud honour glorie lord ſend helpe trouble man helpe little woorth often haue beene diſappointed thought ſhould haue found friendſhip often haue found leaſt thought wherefore vaine thing truſt man true truſt helth man onlie thee bleſſed thou lord therefore thing happen vnto v weake vnſtable ſoone deceiued ſoon changed one thing another lord god moſt righteous iudge ſtrong patient knoweſt frailtie malice man thou whole ſtrength comfort neceſſities mine owne conſcience lord ſufficeth wherefore thy mercie doo appeale ſeeing man may iuſtified ne appere righteous thy ſight thou examine thy iuſtice fift chapter euerlasting daie anguish life obleſſed manſion thy heauenlie citie moſt cleareſt daie eternitie night may neuer darken daie alwaie cleare merrie alwaie ſure neuer changing eſtate would god daie might ſhortlie appeare ſhine vpon v theſe worldlie fantaſies end daie ſhineth clearlie thy saint heauen euerlaſting brightneſſe v pilgrim earth ſhineth obſcurelie mirrour glaſſe heauenlie citizen knowe ioious day outlawes child eue weepe waile bitter tediouſnes daie preſent life ſhort euill full ſorowe anguiſh man oftentimes defiled ſinne incumbred affliction inquieted trouble wrapped care buſied vanity blinded error ouercharged labour vexed temptation ouercome vaine delight pleaſures world grieuouſlie tormented penurie neede ſhall end come theſe miſeries ſhall clearelie deliuered bondage ſinne ſhall lord haue onelie mind thee fullie glad merrie thee ſhall free without letting perfect libertie bodie ſoule ſhall haue peace without trouble peace within without euerie ſide ſtedfaſt ſure lord ieſu ſhall ſtand behold thee haue full ſight contemplation thy glorie ſhalt thou ſhall thee thy kingdome thou haſt ordeined thine elect people beginning left poore outlawe land mine enimies dailie battels great miſfortunes comfort mine exile aſſwage ſorowe deſire thee vnpleaſant burden pleaſure ſoeuer world offereth deſire haue inward fruition thee attaine thereto couet cleaue faſt heauenlie thing worldlie affection plucke mind downeward would ſubdue euill affection dailie rebell riſe againſt ſubiect vnto ſpirit thus wretched creature ſigh ſelfe grieuous ſelfe ſpirit deſireth vpward contrarie fleſh draweth downward ſuffer inwardlie go mind heauenly thing ſtreight great rable worldlie thing ruſh ſoule therefore lord long awaie ne depart thou thy wrath send light thy grace deſtroie carnall deſires send foorth hot flame thy loue burne conſume cloudie fantaſies mind gather lord wit power ſoule togither thee make deſpiſe worldlie thing thy grace ſtrongly reſiſt ouercome motion occaſions ſinne helpe thou euerlaſting truth worldlie guile vanitie hereafter haue power deceiue come alſo thou heauenlie ſweetneſſe let bitterneſſe ſinne flie far pardon forgiue oft praier mind ſurelie fixed thee manie time ſtand ſit rather whither thought carie thought cuſtomablie thought loue oftentimes commeth mind cuſtome pleaſeth beſt delighteth moſt thinke vpon accordinglie thou doſt ſay thy goſpell man treaſure hart wherefore loue heauen ſpeake gladlie therof ſuch thing god apperteineth honour glorie holie name loue world loue talke worldlie thing ioie anon worldlie felicitie ſorowe lament ſoone worldlie aduerſitie loue fleſh imagine oftentimes pleaſeth fleſh loue ſoule delight much ſpeake heare thing ſoules health whatſoeuer loue gladlie heare ſpeake beare image ſtill mind bleſſed man loue lord ſetteth pleaſures world learneth trulie ouercome himſelfe feruour ſpirit crucifieth fleſh ſo cleane pure conſcience may offer praiers thee accepted haue companie thy bleſſed angel earthlie thing excluded hart ſixt chapter ſweet praier wherein preſſed downe trouble humblie yeeld ſelues vnder mightie hand god creator lord holie father thou bleſſed euer thou wilt ſo done thou dooeſt alwaie beſt let thine humble vnwoorthie ſeruant ioie onelie thee ſelfe ne anie thing elſe beſides thee thou lord art gladnes hope crowne mine honour hath thy ſeruant ſhe hath thee without hir deſert thing thine thou haſt created made poore haue beene trouble paine euer youth ſoule hath beene great heauineſſe manifold paſſions come world fleſh wherefore lord deſire may haue thee ioie inward peace aſke thee come reſt ordeined thy choſen child fed nouriſhed light heauenlie comfort without thy helpe come thee lord giue peace giue inward ioie ſoule ſhall full heauenlie melodie deuout feruent thy lauds praiſes thou withdrawe thy ſelfe thou haſt ſometime done may thy ſeruant runne waie thy commandements lampe thy ghoſtlie preſence ſhine vpon head defended vnder ſhadowe thy wing peril danger mercifull lord ieſu euer praiſed time come thou wilt prooue thy ſeruant rightfull ſhall ſuffer ſomewhat thee houre come thou haſt knowne beginning thy ſeruant time ſhould outwardlie ſet naught inwardlie leane vnto thee ſhe ſhould deſpiſed ſight world broken affliction ſhe may ariſe thee new light clarified made glorious kingdome heauen holie father thou haſt ordeined ſo done thou haſt commanded thy grace lord thy freend ſuffer hir troubled world thy loue often ſo euer perſon ſo euer maner ſoeuer thou wilt ſuffer fall vnto hir without thy ſufferance thing done vpon earth good lord thou haſt meekened may therby learne knowe thy righteous iudgements put maner preſumption ſtatelineſſe hart verie profitable confuſion hath couered face may learne thereby rather ſeeke thee helpe ſuccour man haue thereby learned dread thy ſecret terrible iudgements ſcourgeſt righteous ſinner without equitie iuſtice lord yeeld thanks thee thou haſt ſpared ſinnes haſt puniſhed ſcourges loue haſt ſent affliction anguiſh within without creature vnder heauen may comfort thou lord god heauenlie leach man ſoule ſtrikeſt healeſt bringeſt man nigh vnto death reſtoreſt life againe may thereby learne knowe owne weakeneſſe imbecillitie fullie truſt lord thy diſcipline laid vpon thy rod correction hath taught vnder rod wholie ſubmit strike backe bone ſhall pleaſe thee make bow crooked thy make meeke humble diſciple thou haſt ſometime done may walke thy thee commit ſelfe corrected better corrected thee heere time come thou knoweſt thing nothing hid thee man conſcience thou knoweſt thing come fall needfull anie man teach thee warne thee anie thing done vpon earth thou knoweſt profitable much tribulation helpe purge awaie ruſt ſinne doo thy pleaſure ſinfull wretch none ſo well knowne thee grant lord knowe neceſſarie knowne loue loued deſire pleaſeth thee regard pretious thy ſight refuſe vile thee suffer iudge thy myſteries mine outward ſenſes ne giue ſentence hearing ignorant true iudgement diſcerne thing ſpirituall aboue thing alwaie ſearch followe thy pleaſure lord ieſu thou art rich haue haue thee lord dare ſpeake thee thy poore creature worme moſt abiect behold lord haue naught ſelfe naught worth thou art onlie god righteous holie thou ordereſt thing thou giueſt thing thou fulfilleſt thing goodneſſe ſinner barren void godlie vertues remember thy mercy fill hart plentie thy grace thou wilt thy work ſhould made vaine may beare miſerie life except thy grace mercie comfort turne thy face deferre viſiting ne withdrawe thy comfort leaſt happilie ſoule made drie earth without water grace teach lord fulfill thy liue meekelie worthilie thee thou art wiſdome cunning thou art knoweſt kneweſt world made borne brought life thee lord honour glorie praiſe euer euer amen ¶ certaine effectuall praier made ladie jane dudley time hir trouble little hir death lord thou god father life heare mee poore deſolate woman flieth vnto thee onelie trouble miſeries thou lord art onlie defender deliuerer thoſe put truſt thee therefore defiled ſinne incumbred affliction vnquieted trouble wrapped care ouerwhelmed miſeries vexed temptation greeuouſlie tormented long impriſonment vile maſſe claie ſinfull bodie bloud come vnto thee mercifull sauiour crauing thy mercie helpe without ſo little hope deliuerance left may vtterlie deſpaire anie libertie albeit expedient ſeeing life ſtandeth vpon trieng ſhould viſited ſometime ſome aduerſitie wherby might tried whether thy flocke alſo knowe thee ſelues better yet thou ſaidſt thou wouldſt ſuffer v tempted aboue power mercifull vnto miſerable wretch beſeech thee salomon crie vnto thee humblie deſiring thee may neither much puffed vp proſperitie neither much preſſed downe aduerſitie leaſt full ſhould denie god lowe brought ſhould deſpaire blaſpheme thee lord sauiour mercifull god conſider miſerie beſt knowne vnto thee thou vnto ſtrong tower defence humblie require thee suffer tempted aboue ſtrength power either thou deliuerer vnto great miſerie either elſe giue grace patientlie beare thy heauie hand ſharpe correction thy right hand god yt deliuered people iſrael hand pharao ſpace four hundred yeares oppreſſe keepe bondage let therefore like wiſe ſeeme good thy fatherlie goodnes deliuer ſorowfull wretch whome thy ſonne chriſt ſhed pretious bloud croſſe miſerable captiuitie bondage wherein long wilt thou abſent euer oh lord haſt thou forgotten gratious haſt thou ſhut vp thy louing kindneſſe diſpleaſure▪ wilt thou intreated thy mercie cleane gone euer thy promiſe come vtterlie end euermore doeſt thou make ſo long tarieng shall deſpaire thy mercie oh god far thy workemanſhip created chriſt ieſu giue grace therefore tarie thy leaſure patientlie beare thy work aſſuredlie knowing thou canſt ſo thou wilt deliuer ſhall pleaſe thee nothing doubting miſtruſting thy goodneſſe towards thou woteſt better good doo therefore doo thing thou wilt plague waie thou wilt onelie meane time arme beſeech thee thine armour yt may ſtand faſt loines girded veritie hauing breſtplate righteouſnes ſhod ſhoes prepared goſpell peace aboue thing taking ſhield faith wherewith may able quench firie dart wicked taking helmet ſaluation ſword ſpirit thy moſt holie word praieng alwaies maner praier ſupplication may referre ſelfe wholie vnto thy abiding thy pleaſure comforting ſelfe thoſe trouble ſhall pleaſe thee ſend ſeeing ſuch trouble profitable ſeeing aſſuredlie perſuaded cannot well thou doeſt heare oh mercifull father ſake whome thou wouldeſt ſhould ſlaine ſacrifice ſinnes thee holie ghoſt honour glorie euer amen exhortation written ladie iane night ſuffered end new testament greeke ſhe ſent hir ſiſter ladie katherine haue ſent good ſiſter katherine booke although outwardlie trimmed gold yet inwardlie worth pretious ſtones booke deere ſiſter lawe lord teſtament laſt bequeathed vnto v wretch ſhall leade path eternall ioie good mind reade earneſt deſire folowe ſhall bring immortall euerlaſting life teach liue learne die ſhall win ſhould haue gained poſſeſſions wofull father land god proſpered ſhould haue inherited vnderſtand lawe lord god liue ſtill die death may obtaine eternall life death enioie life purchaſed chriſtes death truſt tenderneſſe age ſhall lengthen life ſoone god call goeth yong old labour alwaie learne die denie world defie diuell deſpiſe fleſh delight ſelfe onlie lord penitent ſins yet deſpair ſtrong faith yet preſume deſire saint paule diſſolued chriſt whome death life like good ſeruant euen midnight waking leaſt death commeth ſtealeth vpon like theefe night euill ſeruant found ſleeping leaſt lacke oile lampe ye found like fiue fooliſh virgin like wedding garment caſt mariage reioice humbly praie thee helpe haſt made thine owne image thy bloud haſt clenſed art hope heauiuineſſe comfort care truſt trouble although ſweete lord conſcience accuſeth lawe condemneth yet thy pretious death teſtament hath deliuered thee reigne glorie death hath arreſted earth conſumed yet good lord truſt reſnrrection dwell thee eternallie thy promiſe made doo beleeue thee call vpon thy holie name flie heauen may aſhamed lift vp face earth woorthie find place refuge ſuccour thee therefore lord doo run thee doo humble ſelfe ſaieng lord god ſinnes great innumerable yet haue mercie vpon thy great mercie great myſterie god became man wrought little offence thou didſt giue thy ſonne heauenlie father vnto death ſmall ſinnes onlie greateſt ſinnes world ſo ſinner returne vnto thee whole hart doo preſent wherefore haue mercie vpon god whoſe propertie alwaie haue mercie wherefore haue mercie vpon lord thy great mercie craue nothing lord mine owne merit thy name ſake may halowed therby thy deere ſonne ieſus chriſts ſake therefore father heauen halowed c praier ſaid euening moſt mercifull heauenly father thanke thee thy ſonne ieſus chriſt day thou haſt giuen thing needfull ſoule bodie preſeruing hurt perill aſke thee mercie mine offence moſt humblie beſeech thee thou wilt likewiſe night keepe ſinne euill ſo thought word work may pleaſe thee doo commit ſelfe bodie ſoule go thy hand beſeech thee thy holie ſpirit may leaſt deadlie aduerſarie haue anie power ouer amen another euening praier souereigne dreadfull moſt louing lord god neuer ceaſeſt ſhew thy mercie towards ſinners yea offend treſpaſſe againſt thee ſuch thine infinite clemencie loue thou forbeareſt heape thy benefit vpon moſt ſinfull wretched wretch yeeld thee humble thanks thine ineſtimable goodneſſe ſhewed towards creating thine owne likeneſſe making capable thine euerlaſting glorie creation ſo manie creature behoofe ſuſtenance ineſtimable worke redemption whereby thou deliuereſt ſlauerie sathan purchaſeſt mee free entrance thy celeſtiall region hauing ſingled amongſt ſo many millians knowe thee lie drowned ignorance ſuperſtition miſerable errours thy ſeruant true faithfull chriſtian thy bleſſed sacrament eſpeciallie sacrament aboue sacrament wherein thou thy ſelfe art ſpirituallie conteined finallie hauing preſerued ſo manie time hell wherein beene long ſince plunged hadſt thou thine vnſpeakeable goodneſſe ſuſteined deliuered foe theſe thy benefit namelie thoſe thou haſt daie moſt bountifullie beſtowed vpon ſouereigne lord yeeld thee ſuch ſincere dutifull thanks poore hart poſſiblie affoord thee beſeeching thee haue mercie vpon ſupplie want accept mediation thankeſgiuings ieſus chriſt thy onelie ſonne mine onelie sauiour interceſſour mine onlie redeemer sauiour humblie craue light thy grace knowe wherein haue daie anie way offended thee nature ſound diſcuſſion examination conſcience may ſee mine owne ſinnes ſorrowe deteſtation thine ineffable mercie zealous firme purpoſe amendment life thou ſeeſt lord lewdneſſe woteſt miſerie much better ſelfe doo sorie hart ſhould ſtill offend ſo louing lord wiſh god ſorowes greatlie multiplied purpoſed earſt doo better thy grace wanted yet haue tranſgreſſed former treſpaſſes neither yet may deſpaire lord continuallie truſt thy mercy euents purpoſe firmelie doo euerie daie amend life deliuer gratious god mortall ſinne euer giue grace perſecute vice ſorowe life ſatiſfaction theſe former ſinnes alſo thine ineffable benefit beſtowed vpon mankind offer vnto thee merit thy bitter paſſion thoſe moſt pretious drop bloud thou ſheddeſt inflamed charitie wherewith thou wholie reſignedſt thy ſelfe thy torment ſake vnion thine oblation croſſe offer vp ſelfe ſoule bodie haue thine within without thine honour euerlaſting glorie retaine nothing ſelfe giue thee whoſe make thine thine iuſtice giue thy grace god liue better herafter confeſſe ſinnes due time vnto thee giue true humilitie continuall repentance grace knowe thee alſo ſelfe giue puritie hart dooings patience chaſtitie perfect charitie giue good life good death dangerous houre departure aſſiſtance thy bleſſed saint angel may thy mercie another world praiſe glorifie thee euerlaſtinglie amen hymne praier god father bleſſed god father heauen hath ſtrengthned féeble flocke ſtedfaſt faith boldneſſe euen beare croſſe burden yocke theſe laſt day perillous fréelie chriſts goſpell profeſſe come downe lord ſhortlie iudge v take v heauineſſe antheme whoſoeuer ſhall call vpon name lord ſhall ſaued praier god father vſed euening praier mercifull lord louing father without whoſe aid motion able ſtir one member toward heauenlie ſeruice burden ſlowe ſinfull fleſh doth ſo ouercharge weake ſoule according thy fatherlie pitie looke vpon god quicken dull ſpirit thy grace riſe mirie puddle come thy preſence humble repentance crauing thy mercie miſerable ſinnes wickedneſſe releaſed bloud righteouſneſſe ieſus chriſt may ioifullie ſerue honour praiſe thine eternall maieſtie thy deere ſonne mercifull lord redeemer thee holie ghoſt glorie thanks euer amen hymne redemption christ praiſed god excéeding fauour wich hath giuen v ſonne sauiour ſinners vnrighteous fooliſh fleſhlie chriſt mercieſtoole righteouſneſſe wiſdome verelie vncleane holden vnder danger deth ſins exaction chriſt holines life redemption ſatiſfaction glorie thée lord borne vndefiled virgin glorie father holie ghoſt ſoules ſurgin forme priuate euening praier father art heauen c conuert v sauiour turne awaie thy wrath v god make ſpeede ſaue v lord make haſte helpe v glorie father c c praiſe ye lord thanks giuen vnto god firſt pſalme euening praier bow downe thine eare lord requeſts ſuffer exhibit ſupplication vp vnto thee behold night daie trace hunt thee meanes thee onelie earlie late doo ſtill call crie mercie according thou haſt giuen mee commandement call memorie time life euill diſpent quake thinke vpon thee yea ſpirit faileth ſo ſore afraid thy iudgements yet well pondering proceſſe thy grace mercie promiſed chriſt ceaſe deſpaire knowing thou god haſt forgotten thy gift grace thy power haue compaſſion waxen faint thou canſt wilt put backe thy wrath moſt iuſtlie conceiued againſt ſinne full truſt whereof lord come vnto thee beſeeching thee hide life chriſt within thee vnder ſhadowes thy wing defend thy grace couenant may euermore turne thy mercie lord bring downe deſtruction haue deſerued ſhew thy grace fauour vnto may liue exalted thy righteouſneſſe praiſe thy name moſt ioifullie remember corrupt nature lord ſhort life thou madeſt man nothing man deliuer himſelfe death man ſaue owne ſoule hell thou onelie lord muſt namelie ſuch beleeue thee life paſſeth doth dreame graſſe field daie greene morrow drie thou diſpleaſed loſt thou chafe ſhrinke feare ſinnes dead vnto thee whome thouſand yeares one daie yea leaſt minute houre certeſſe lord thou haue reſpect ſins ſhall continue shew therefore manie day life may diſpend wiſelie praiſe thy name leaſt fooliſhlie truſting vpon long life ſuddenlie might periſh come death come lord vnto v comfort v come god hide thy face like vnto thoſe hurled pit perdition night calamitie ouerpaſſed let pleaſant morning comfort luckilie ſhine vpon betimes may heare feele thy goodneſſe thee truſt deliuer night ſnare sathans gard hunt darke plucke thee let ſtand feare nighteuill vnbeleefe thy ſtrait iudgement neither let afraid fleeing arrowe daie time let feare horrible peſtilence creeping darkeneſſe meane let ignorant deteſtable ſins diſſemble qualifie let dread middaie diuell abuſeth thy church vnder title pretence holineſſe neither let sathan though change himſelfe angel light ſtrike anie feare right ſide left well night daie well aduerſitie proſperitie well ſpirituall buſineſſe corporall let thy holie angel diligentlie wait vpon ſtumble ſhall tread vnderfoot hellie dragon yea ſo ſhall dutie bound alwaie couragious ſpirit praiſe hallowe thy name onlie morrowe thing ſhall chance hart deſire aſcribe thy goodneſſe without anie deſeruing behalfe alſo night trouble aduerſitie ſhall call vnto mind thy moſt faithfull truſtie promiſes deſpaire thus praiſe thy meere ſpeciall grace bleſſe thee ſaieng bleſſed art thou lord god father thou art praiſe honour worthie magnified euer bleſſed glorie thy holie name worthie praiſed aboue magnified euer bleſſed art thou father sonne holie ghoſt thou art worthie praiſed aboue magnified euer bleſſed thou firmament heauen thou art praiſeworthie euer giue thanks vnto lord creature kindharted mercifull yea mercie endureth euer oh ſpeake good lord ye work place dominion let euerie thing hath breath praiſe lord giue thanks mercie endureth euer men would therefore praiſe lord goodneſſe declare wonder doth child men praiſe thou lord ſoule forget benefit yea within praiſe holie name louing mercie truth endureth euer world without end amen glorie father c begin c ſecond pſalme god god remember forſake ſuffer loſt ſith night daie crie thee heare lord father truſted thee thou helpedſt whenſoeuer called vpon thee tune thou failedſt waſt alwaies hand aſſiſt come foorth father moſt deerelie beloued hart reſtore sathans kingdome thou dreweſt foorth mother wombe haſt preſerued vnto daie thy benignitie mercie beſeech thee denie neede go awaie anguiſh penſiueneſſe hart drawe nigh vnto yet none helpe thou onlie let eſcape theſe danger thy chriſt ſauiour ſake hath ſuffered ſo ſpitefull bitter paine ſore vexed cruellie ſcourged wounded nailed hanged croſſe let eſcape ſaie bloud ſake ſo largelie ſhed v cauſe v obteine forgiueneſſe ſinnes enioie new euerlaſting couenant made betwixt thee v stand farre lord refuge ſtrength come neere helpe deliuer life ſword ſoule wood dog lion iawes reſtore betweene horne unicornes heare thou ſhall blowe abroade thy name praiſes vnto brother aſſemblie holie perſons ſhall commend thee deſpiſe praiers poore turne awaie thy face heare crie record thy goodneſſe among miſerable painefull troubleſome conſciences thereof may take hart comfort growe hope cleaue feruentlie vnto thee blowe abroade thy moſt glorious name giue thee euerlaſting thanks ſaluation amen glorie father c beginning c third pſalme furtheſt angle earth euerie ſide thou ſhalt mightie voice call men iudgement lord god omnipotent whome nothing hid open eares may heare thy promiſe ſhall god thee conſtantlie beleeue thy foiſon filled prudentlie thou doſt declare teſtifie good ſacrifices thou haſt need doeſt either regard meaſure thine thee lieth make thing poſſeſſe thou onlie requireſt ſacrifices thanke ſgiuing let v therefore diſcloſe bottome hart thee let v knowledge thee god let v halowe thy name thing flowe thy word render thanks weale wo require thy ſuccours ſtraits neceſſities time thou haſt promiſed helpe v ſhall ſo deliuered blaſe thy name lord god moſt iuſt true promiſe deereſt father thee beſeech ſend ſuccours vnto euen thine infinite goodneſſe thy renowmes ſake ieſus chriſts ſake thy beloued ſonne pretious bloud largelie ſhed v croſſe haue mercie vpon ſo purged may come againe fauour thee pitie heare ſtraits ſinfull fleſh wherewith euerie ſide hampered set large againe rid mine enimies ſeeke drawe awaie thy true ſeruice thy comfort let reioice full ſpirituall ioie let euer brute thy name vnmindfull thy benefit releeue moſt pitifull god according thy word truth moſt tender father ſhew thy ioifull health glorie father c begin c fourth pſalme thy clemencie bleſſing moſt mightie god craue require thee full inſtantlie let thy countenance ſhine vpon v haue compaſſion vpon v earth wee may find waie leadeth vnto thee may attaine thy ſaluation among gentils people would confeſſe thee louing hart thy manifold benefit pleaſures haue receiued thy hand doſt iuſtice gouerne men art leader vpon earth powre downe lord thy goodneſſe continuall bleſſings vpon v ſhall earth yeeld vnto thee glorie praiſe v fruit meate thou god father bleſſe v thou god ſonne bleſſe v thou god holie ghoſt ſhould againſt thy may doo thing according thy commandements glorie father c begin c contemplation praier exclaming carefull paſsions ſoule bodie wo carefull carcaſe filthie defiled fleſh conceiued borne ſinne depriued originall iuſtice compared beaſt adam fallen rotten apple liuing tree haue gotten fall darknes care miſerie affliction ſickneſſe paine anguiſh finallie dreadfull death ala ſhall hereafter ſtinking carion woormes meate foode fire duſt claie doong forſaken rotten conſumed blind poore naked troden vnder feete poſteritie forgotten men knowing bodie ſhall vaniſh like ſhadowe life ſhall wither like leafe fade flower holie god body doo increaſe neerer death doth approch clocke conſcience doth ring euerie minute houre death hand death approcheth ſharpe dart bloudie chariot awaie ſaith euerie liuing wight ſhall ſee death come nothing oh vncertaine life moſt aſſured death net caſt ouer fleſh doo reioice lament whole ſickneſſe doth come haue friend forſaken libertie ſoone bondage yoong age drawes neere thus neuer remaine one ſtate made light proud proſperitie deſperate aduerſitie withered old care deſpiſed pouertie flattered health finally vncertaine ſhall die yet moſt humblie praie thee deere father ieſu chriſts ſake ſuffered ſhamefull death ſins haue mercie vpon according thy great mercie take thy holie ghoſt lead temptation deliuer thy hand commend ſoule thou god truth amen hymne ſtate adam posteritie fruit adam hand ſin lockt ſatans band deſtined deth child ire flaming brand infernall fire borne naked bare ſpend time ſorowe care ſhall returne vnto duſt depriued carnall luſt yet thou father didſt ieſus ſend pardon offend laud work might bleſſed ſight ſecond meditation dreadfull daie iudgement feare ſorowe ſhall happen reprobate ſhall ſtand helpeleſſe terrible dreadfull throne god render account thought word work ſaie act fleſh bloud extreame day ſhall come fire creature heauen earth hell ſhall tremble preſence ſhall guiltie conſciences opened euils endleſſe puniſhed iudge corrupted daie doth come daie hand pure hart ſhall accepted bribe vaine gift ſhall preferred iuſtice without mercie vnto vngodlie infernall torment wicked endleſſe care affliction idolater fornicator extortioner perſecutour diſobedient murtherer blaſphemer theefe falſe witneſſe bearer vſurer heretikes witch malefactor veſſels reprobation ſhall heard wailing crieng bodie ſoule ſhall remaine paine long god euerlaſting daie hand elect saint patriarch prophet martyr bleſſed ſhall receiue reward themſelues onlie ieſu bleſſed ſhall kneele caſt crownes giue honour ghoſt three perſons one god mercie defend v damnation vnſpeakeable paine wee ſinne haue deſerued euer puniſhed withall yet ieſus preſerued whome elected redeemed iuſtified brought ſinne death hell laud praiſe world world angel men amen hymne daie iudgement swéet ieſus thy mercie pitifull praiers heare may thy right hand thou ſhalt appeare thou ſhalt come heauenlie power ſit throne none ſhall grace daie ire corrupt element ſhall purgd fire laud thee father c generall praier wherein commend ſelues whole ſtate christ church vnto god god thou father god life ſuffer neither haue proud looke proud thought turne awaie voluptuouſneſſe let intiſements world beguile let concupiſcence eie deceiue let luſts fleſh take hold vpon let rancor malice reigne hart lord god thy ſonne sauiour ieſu chriſts ſake beſeech thee thou wilt giue ouer vnſhamefaſt obſtinate mind unto thee lord almightie king mercie bée euer eternall honour glorie unto thee ſame lord mercie doo commit ſoule bodie moſt humblie beſeeching thee thine abundant mercie ſake take cure haue mercie doo commit alſo vnto thy mercie faithfull friend wellwillers liuing beſeeching thee forgiue v haue mercie vpon v giue v grace liue according thy lawe glorie thy name may doo thou requireſt v pleaſe thee thy mercie ſaue defend v peril bodilie ghoſtlie night euer eſpeciallie thing ſhall turne thy diſpleaſure hart thanke thee moſt mercifull lord great benefit thou haſt beſtowed vpon largelie world afore manie creature woorthie thouſand time moſt gratious lord wot knowledge verelie good gift doo come freelie thee thine abundant mercie wherefore hart thanke thee worſhip praiſes thanks thee none therefore ſaie prophet dauid vnto v lord vnto v vnto thy name giuen honour glorie alſo commit thy mercie mine enimies perſecutors ſlanderers beſeeching thee turne hart giue v grace one forgiue another verie botome hart hencefoorth may liue loue charitie thy glorie increaſe thy kingdome doo commit thy mercie queene elizabeth realme beſeeching thee incline hir hart godlineſſe vertue ſhe may long reigne ouer v peace tranquillitie liue thy feare call vpon thy holie name readie time ſet foorth thy bleſſed lawes commandements thou omnipotent god thy mightie hand ſtretched arme wilt confound idolatrie ſuperſtition ſet vp thy true holie religion thy faithfull ſeruants may triumph reioice thee merie hart ſing vnto thy praiſe mightie hand god hath brought paſſe thy name giue honour glorie whome honour glorie due doo commit vnto thy mercie thoſe tranſitorie life ſorowe ſickneſſe neede tribulation anie aduerſitie ſpeciallie thoſe profeſſion thy goſpell defence ſaine doo put liues vnto edge ſword lord thy mercy ſake forgiue v offence paſt comfort greeuous affliction ſtrengthen weakeneſſe ſend patience tribulation abate pride enimies aſſwage malice confound wicked deuiſes armed thy mightie defence may preſerued euermore peril glorifie thee art onlie giuer victorie ye merit chriſt commit thy mercie thoſe doo faithfullie profeſſe thy holie goſpell beſeeching thee giue v grace liue according thy lawes well dooing may ſtop mouthes vngodlie aduerſaries goſpell thereby win right waie may one hart one mouth glorifie thee lord god daie viſitation whome honour glorie due moſt mercifull lord louing father finallie commit vnto thy mercie wretched ſoule bodie humblie beſeeching thee haue mercie without end amen praier night going bed god angel men founder creature viſible inuiſible whoſe hand life death light darkneſſe motion ſoule bodie without whome good gift perfect quietneſſe conſcience sathan neither mine owne conſcience vexe mine old offence trouble moſt humblie beſeech thee night pardon haue ſore offended thee thought word deede againſt thy diuine maieſtie ſore repenteth saue good ieſu chriſt thy deere ſonne ſaluation thy true holie word inſtruction thy grace holie ſpirit comfort conſolation vnto end end ¶ certaine godlie ſentences written ladie e vſe inuocation god holie name thinke vpon needie daie life come forget iuſt ſute poore prefer chriſt kingdome offend euill set little iudgement man feare iudgement god peace men vſe acquainted godlie helpe pacifie diſpleaſure pleaſures meane heere awaie muſt turne duſt finis ꝙ e praiers made right honourable ladie france aburgauennie committed houre hir death right worſhipfull ladie marie fane hir onlie daughter iewell health ſoule perfect path paradiſe verie profitable uſed euerie faithfull chriſtian man woman fruitfull praier ſaid morning al mightie god moſt mercifull father fountaine felicitie onelie proceedeth good gift moſt humblie beſeech thee thine abundant mercie exceeding kindneſſe ſo direct gouern daie euer thy good guiding spirit thought word deed may onelie occupied thy ſeruice faith feare loue ſo readie prone manfullie fight vnder ſtandard glorious captaine ieſus chriſt againſt world fleſh cruell serpent old leuiathan hunteth continuallie like roring lion ſeeking vtter deſtruction ſoule make conſtant time temptation time rebelling ſinfull fleſh ſhall intiſe luſt pompes vanity wicked world may ſtrong liuelie vnſpeakable faith bitter torment sauiour chriſt ieſus ſuffered faithfullie beleeue call vpon ſo mortifie ſubdue old adam may dead buried ſinne iniquitie new man chriſt ieſus may continuallie dwell reigne whoſe meanes ſhall garniſhed decked mean fruitfull faith immortalitie heauenlie bleſſedneſſe uouchſafe lord beſeech thee according multitude thy mercy looke vpon thy celeſtiall prouidence ſo illuminate eies ſoule may continuallie watch glorious comming thine annointed ſon ieſus chriſt roote lord vile corrupt branch rapine deceit auarice luxurie concupiſcence vngodlineſſe let motion mind altogether depend vpon thee prepare tongue publiſh thy praiſe let lip locked vp ſcurillitie vncomlie talke let mine eares loath abhor heare thy glorious bleſſed name blaſphemed thy truth anie sectarian ill ſpoken ſlandered keepe defend vnder wing thy comfortable protection errours ſchiſmes deteſtable hereſies make without faining firmelie conſtantlie build vpon truth wherein perfectlie ſet forth thy great mercie diuine iuſtice let zeale thy promiſes diſtres chiefeſt ioie conſolation giue grace aboue make boaſt thy mercy louing kindneſſe vertue whereof sauiour chriſt ieſus quickened death life deereſt death pretious bloudſhedding regenerated borne anew water ſpirit faith lord may thine abundant loue ſhewed ward whole poſteritie adam may afraid wilfullie ſet purpoſe tranſgreſſe thy commandements ſo incur therby thy diſpleaſure effect thy iuſtice day thy comming iudgement pronounced againſt vtter deſtruction bodie ſoule make alwaies willing good lord heare thy word power wherof faith increaſed withall plant perfect loue obedience ſo direct footeſteps vale miſerie may tread path leadeth thee ſoule thirſteth reſt euen vehementlie hart longeth water brooke grant mercifull god honour glorie thy name ſake amen fruitfull praier ſaid going bed euerie christian moſt mercifull father moſt wretched vnwoorthie ſinner proſtrate ſelfe throne thy heauenlie grace yeelding vnto thee moſt humble hartie thanks haſt thine exceeding loue fauour preſerued daie perill danger humblie beſeeching thy diuine maieſtie night preſerue loue thine onlie ſonne ſweet sauiour ieſus chriſt mediatour aduocate continuallie pleadeth maketh interceſſion thee reſt thy choſen child preſenting bloudie wound glorious bodie bee ſcourged thy diuine preſence thereby doth mitigate thy wrath indignation iuſtlie conceiued againſt miſerable wretched creature mankind make lord ſtill confeſſe mine vnwoorthineſſe weakneſſe ſuch ſo great ſelfe worthie lift vp mine eies heauen much leſſe called thy ſonne handmaiden ſuch ſo great burden ſinne iniquitie ſo meanes corruption filthineſſe acknowledge ſelfe child death deſtruction yet build ſtill thy promiſes good lord great danger come vnto thee teares ſaieng father haue ſinned againſt heauen againſt thee woorthie called thy child ſelfe haue nothing thee haue althings ſelfe acknowledge haue iuſtlie deſerued heauie ſentence thine ire grace thee mightie emanuel regenerate borne againe death life danger ioie perill peace bondage libertie ſo fine hell damnation bliſſe ſaluation effect thy mercie ſo abundant thy loue towards thoſe contrite hart preſent themſelues vnto thee increaſe faith lord may abound good fruitfull work ſo fortifie neuer ſwarue thy veritie giue thy grace aboue mercifull ieſu may neuer ſhrinke thy ſacred teſtimonies moreouer humilitie reuerence hart mind beſeech thee night thou haſt ordeined man reſt thou wilt gard protect thy good guiding ſpirit albeit ſinfull fleſh ſhall ſleepe ſlumber yet grant good lord ſoule may continually keepe watch ward let enunie find ſlumbering ſleeping careleſſe cradle ſinfull ſecuritie leaſt whileſt vnarmed naked deſtitute thy grace fauour enter breake vp houſe ſinfull bodie make ſuch hauocke ſpoile mine infected leporous ſoule deformed meanes mine iniquitie wounded dangerous dart tranſgreſſion thrown bodie ſinne lake deſtruction wherein continuall wailing gnaſhing teeth make ſtill good lord conſider bed plaine patterne ſimilitude graue continuallie calleth thy creature make vnderſtand laid ſelfe without thy heauenlie prouidence bee able riſe againe make acknowledge ſleepe verie figure death whoſe ſtroke thine appointed pleaſure muſt ſubmit ſelfe indue loue charitie men let lampe lord garniſhed oile whenſoeuer time ſoeuer thy meſſenger death ſhall drawe knocke gate houſe may ſummons daie reſurrection dead readie attend thee thy bride burning lampe ſtedfaſt faith thee ſhall cloathed anew mortall bodie ſhall couered immortalitie corruption ſinfull rebelling fleſh ſhall changed incorruption perfect puritie thy righteouſneſſe ſhall mine thy merit ſhall make perfect holie vertue whereof hell ſhall looſe victorie death ſhall looſe ſting faith hope ſhall haue end reward thy saint continuallie dwell loue charitie thee heauenlie bridegroome chriſt ieſus father holie ghoſt bee aſcribed laud glorie power praiſe dominion euer amen praier remiſſion ſinne obteine vertuous life foraſmuch bountifull lord moſt meet right iuſt fleſh ſhuld praiſe magnifie worſhip thee ſhould without ceaſing giue thanks vnto thee onlie art creator maker thing well viſible inuiſible onlie art treaſure goodneſſe well life onlie god lord whome heauens heauen heauens ſunne moone ſtarres earth ſea moue therin yea heauenlie companie martyr ſoules prophet apoſtles angel archangel togither ſoules iuſt righteous perſons doo laud glorifie moſt requiſite ech mortall creature liuing world ſhould alſo acknowledge thy magnificence wherfore moſt mercifull father hart mouth doo acknowledge thee king lord giuer goodneſſe confeſſe thee omnipotent reuerend merciful long ſuffering god conſolation comfort mercie pitie knowe thine infinite goodneſſe onelie thou diddeſt make man thy ſimilitude likeneſſe placing moſt delectable place paradyſe although tranſgreſſe thy commandement thereby deſerued eternall death damnation yet thou like moſt louing pitifull father diddeſt vtterlie reiect gentlie correct thou hadſt ſent earth commanding increaſe multiplie thou didſt inſtruct poſteritie thy lawe thou didſt teach thy prophet ſenteſt downe thine onlie begotten ſonne take vpon nature ſuffer death ſinnes therby make recompenſe offence man committed againſt thee thou didſt thine exceeding great mercie kindneſſe without anie deſert mankind ſo much anie one praier yet intreatie therevnto incited therefore boldened ſuch ineſtimable benefit ſo freelie giuen beſtowed doo without feare time appere thy diuine maieſtie proſtrating ſlefe ſeate thy mercie humbleneſſe hart mind doo make praier vnto thee deſpiſe lord god defiled ſin iniquitie behold preſent ſelfe thee preſuming vpon mine owne woorthineſſe truſting thy goodneſſe mercifull vnto ſinner light thou dull ſighted eies mind open thou ſtopped eares mine hart may ſee heare perceiue vnderſtand thou teacheſt alwaies doo thou commandeſt make onelie hearer thy heauenlie doctrine alſo perfect folower ſame direct ſanctifie gouerne life thou alwaies preſent readie heare helpe saue defend ſhame reproch thou ſhield buckler againſt temptation clenſe mind thought vncleanneſſe keepe preſerue danger bodie ſoule fraile life nothing elſe continuall warfare world ſinnes moſt like cruell enimies aſſault v euerie ſide againe day number guide therefore thy grace ſo ſpend ſmall ſhort tranſitorie time world verie fountaine welſpring vale miſerie may made member chriſt partaker thine eternall felicitie ſeeing mine owne deſert ſhall neuer able aſpire ſinne trulie ſo aboundeth ech deed act mine onelie infected altogither polluted therwith none remedie haue eaſe ſelfe none ſalue heale ſore onelie take hold promiſe thine wheras thou ſaieſt come vnto ye ye labour ouerladen refreſh holdfaſt mine anchor ſure ſtaie verelie ſweet sauiour looke vpon mine owne frailneſſe behold readie offend thee quake feare almoſt vtter deſpaire ſoone call mind thy great loue kindneſſe thou wilt death ſinner rather ſhould repent liue daie ſoeuer doth hartilie repent call vnto thee thou wilt heare releeued little comforted knowing ſurelie thou wilt performe thou haſt promiſed faithfull aſſurance whereof ſaie vnto thee turne thou god ſhall turned wickedneſſe deliuer heale ſoule wounded ſinne doo acknowledge mine iniquitie hartilie ſorie mine offence correct lord yet thy furie looke vpon weakneſſe thinke vpon thine owne worthineſſe remember thy louing kindneſſe abundance multitude thy mercy wipe cleane awaie pardon forget ſinnes haue either word deede though anie kind way offended thee blot thy remembrance let bloud immaculate lambe ieſus chriſt waſh awaie let mine old offence ſo decaie die neuer commit anie meanes renew thy ſight meane time doo withdrawe thy grace cauſe doo good father remoue thy wrath awaie reſtore vnto thy fauour turne thou thy louing countenance vnto plentifullie powre foorth thy mercie vpon incline hart doo onelie acceptable thy ſight guide thou footeſteps thy path ſuffer time ſtraie thy way let alwaies haue feare thee hart remembrance thy benefit freſh memorie anie time weakeneſſe failtie doo tranſgreſſe thy commandements yet doo therefore reiect caſt thy ſight thou good samaritane powre oile wine mercie forgiueneſſe thoſe wound ſinne ſhall make diſdaine reuolting haue mercie vpon according thy great goodneſſe according multitude thy mercy wipe awaie mine iniquitie hide vnder ſhadowe thy wing protection lighten mee thy holie ſpirit make thy ſeruant ſo indue thy grace may vnfeinedlie hart voice ſerue honour praiſe thee day life amen another praier obteining grace mercie moſt mercifull lord god whoſe maieſtie incomprehenſible power infinite whoſe magnificence exalted aboue heauens vouchſafe beſeech thee frō thy high throne behold worke thy hand haue pitie vnhappie deſolate condition thy creature ſinner conceiued ſinne ſelfe haue good thing wherefore lord cleaue altar thy mercie thou art anchor hope refuge ſtaie therefore lord haue mercie vpon fleſh iuſtified thy ſight thou knoweſt frailtie weakeneſſe men taught fall peter doo nothing without thee graunt v therefore good lord thy grace without world like waues temptation ſwallowed gulph whirlepoole ſinne drowned ſhip without anchor pilote euerie tempeſt runne rocke periſh guide v therefore thy grace good lord flouds carefull world may reſt euer pleaſant port happie hauen euerlaſting ioie thine elected bleſſed sauiour ieſus chriſt whome thee holie ghoſt honour glorie world amen confeſſion ſaid penitent perſon moſt mercifull lord god haue offended againſt throne thy maieſtie ſinnes euer mine eies worthie liue enioie fruit wherewith thou haſt bleſſed earth mine owne conſcience tormenter bringing teſtimonie witneſſe againſt sunne doth hide light againſt place woorſſe wherein become lord ſhall doo shall deſpaire thou art mercifull readie forgiue aſke confeſſe ſinnes thee wearie ſinfull life ſorie ſoule mine offence wherefore good lord thou dooeſt eaſe laden refreſh trauell thou haſt promiſed mercie penitent looke thy ſeruant thy cheerefull countenance behold thoſe pitifull eies thou didſt marie magdalen woman taken adulterie thou haſt ſhed thy bloud ou altar croſſe offering thy moſt pretious bodie eternall ſacrifice ſinnes deſpiſe thou haſt redeemed thou cammeſt world call ſinners repentance ſaue loſt ſheepe iſrael haue mercie vpon leade thy grace fold amóng thy ſheepe go ſweet paſture danger wolues thou art ſhepheard keepeſt good accompt euerie one though haue gone aſtraie wandring thy flocke borne mark world yet good lord diſclaime thy right beſeech thee take vnto thee may ſafe vnder ſhadowe thy wing may ſleepe ſoundlie whome thou dooeſt keepe thou art watchman iſrael honour glorie vnto thee euer amen another godlie confeſſion meditation penitent altogether vnhappie comfortleſſe haue greeuouſlie offended lord god ſhall whether ſhall go hide ſight oft haue treſpaſſed againſt oft haue deſerued diſpleaſure yet ſeldome hath puniſhed oft hath beene good mercifull vnto oft haue promiſed vowed amendment little ſeldome haue performed wofull caſe haue pitie dare lift vp mine eies towards heauen becauſe haue ſinned againſt earth looke refuge becauſe haue beene ſlander ſhame vnto deſpaire god mercifull good sauiour doth viſit liue darknes cheerfull light ſit ſhadowe death willeth v forgiue brother though offend ſeuentie tune yea infinitelie god mercifull anie man muſt onlie refuge comfort deſpiſe creature image himſelfe returne thee therefore ſoule vnto thy lord god praie humblie thy knee grace continue bewaile thy ſinnes paſt becauſe loueth thee prouoketh thee dailie gratious gift bleſſings loue leaue thee vntill haue made perfect worke begunne brought mercie full effect thee naturall cauſe beginneth worke leaueth halfe waie imperfect vertue ſeed ſowne doth ceaſe till fruit brought perfection yet nature worketh firſt prepareth matter diſpoſeth make fit receiue ſhape perfection end thereof naturall order right courſe thing proceede increaſe little little leſſe euen ſo doth god firſt diſpoſe v mercie increaſing goodneſſe dailie beſtoweth v end treaſure grace inheritance euerlaſting ioies bird forſaketh hir yong till able liue themſelues yet auaile paine commeth uerie loue worketh naturall cauſes bring foorth affect perfection ſo creature creator doo loue ſelfe infinite goodneſſe withdrawe thee thy ſinnes make thee cleane pure finallie bleſſe thee eternall life hath prepared thee lord come thee ſad mourning ſit thy feete humblie waiting thy mercie thou art hope helper according thy great mercy haue mercie vpon amen praier purged ſinne vncleanneſſe take awaie lord burden corruption continuall exerciſe ſinne wickedneſſe hath wounded ſoule wofullie dangerous dart tranſgreſſion ſo feele putrifaction abounding feſtered conſcience ouerladen vncleanneſſe ſo haue meane remedie proſtrate ſelfe throne thy glorious maieſtie beſeeching thee intirelie thy gratious goodneſſe ſalue ſores comfortable oile thy mercie thou onlie ieſu art ſweete phyſition ſoule ſprinkle vpon hyſope ſhall made whiter ſnowe thou thine exceeding bountie fauour good lord wilt vouchſafe waſh awaie ſpots ſinne wickedneſſe heapeth thine indignation furie againſt ſhall excell gold hath beene purified fornace ſeuen fold let therefore good lord mercifull father ſeeme pleaſant vnto thy diuine maieſtie touch corrupted vncleane hart heauenlie finger thy grace may bring foorth fruit true repentance acceptable thy glorious diuine preſence offering calues bullockes ſheepe goates anie burnt offering ſacrifice peace contrite ſorowfull ſoule thing thou doeſt moſt delight humble lowlie ſpirit oblation thou dooeſt deſire cleane pure hart lord god knowe thou dooeſt loue fauour wherefore beſeech thee purge ſinne inquitie thy great mercie let bitter deploration mine offence hartie contrition thy glorious merit painefull paſſion ieſu onlie meane waie ſet free power hell death damnation ſith thy goodnes begotten borne anew ſtrengthen good lord neuer ſlide fall thee may continuallie beare remembrance ſtate wherevnto called thee thine aboundant loue kindneſſe wipe awaie good lord ſins thy remembrance cleanſe bloud thy ſpotleſſe lambe ieſus chriſt ſhall made cleane pure ſafe graunt moſt mercifull god honour glorie thy name ſake bitter death thy ſonne ieſus chriſt onlie mediatour aduocate whome thee holie ghoſt giuen laud glorie power praiſe euer euer amen another praier penitent mercie lord ſinner ſinnes heauie vpon burden intollerable refreſh thy grace waſh awaie mine offence ſhall whiter ſnowe let cheerefull beames thy countenance ſhine vpon giue light darkeneſſe life looke nothing deſerued puniſhment due offence wherefore good lord according thy iuſtice multitude thy mercy deale thy ſeruant remember ſinnes forefather thinke milde meanour youth paſſed haue pitie thy creature according likeneſſe thy ſelfe thou haſt made ſhaped earth long wilt thou turne thy face awaie forſake god renew thy holie ſpirit plucke awaie withdraweth thee graffe hart thy grace may loue thee feare thee ſo finallie reioice thy goodneſſe elected praiſe thee thy woonderous work euer graunt moſt mightie god sauiour ieſus chriſt ſake whome thee holie ghoſt honor glorie euer euer amen another praier ſaid ſinfull ſoule ſinfull life increaſing ſinnes ſtill abounding good lord whome ſhall flee whome ſhall reſort ſuccour offending thee ceaſe neither daie night ſinnes heauie vpon preſſing downe euen hell ſuch weight thereof moreouer prepare ſelfe amendment life thinke ſtedfaſtlie ſerue pleaſe thee euen ſoone doth corrupt infected nature offend diſpleaſe thy diuine maieſtie ſo prone readie run headlong kind wickedneſſe ſin ſuch ſtrength ſuch force rather weakeneſſe perfourming thoſe thing thou requireſt hand good lord readie vtterlie deſpaire forſake thee vnleſſe thou thy great mercie pitie ſend thine aide aboue powre thy moſt healthfull grace may make haſt flee vnto thee moſt bitter teares ſorrowfull hart bowing knee lamenting ſinfull life greeuous offence committed againſt thee truſting moſt aſſuredlie faithfullie merit sauiour ieſus chriſt moſt bitter death bloudſhedding far greater force vertue effect preſeruing ſinnes offence condemning caſting awaie whoſe ſake moſt aſſuredlie beleeue ſinnes offence cleerelie forgiuen ſhall neuer laid charge ſhall enter thee laſt daie thine euerlaſting kingdome thee euermore whome honour praiſe glorie euer euer amen praier god father almightie god father lord ieſus chriſt whome deſert merit worthineſſe thine owne great clemencie mercie pitie cauſed ſend downe thine onlie begotten ſonne world beare burden ſinnes moſt miſerable ſinners ouerladen ſhould ſuffer moſt cruell torment yea alſo moſt bitter ſhamefull death ſanctifie reprochfull name croſſe renting bleſſed bodie ſhedding moſt pretious bloud thereon thereby make attonement betweene thee v thereby paie raunſome ſoules thereby conſummate finiſh perfection redemption ſaluation thing thy good ſhould doo onelie aſſwage thy wrath indignation alſo bring v againe thy grace fauour deliuered bondage ſinne hell might ſerue thee righteouſneſſe holineſſe day life free gift benefite death paſſion made partaker reſurrection thine endleſſe vnſpeakable glorie wherefore god maker lord king ſeeing thou haſt ſo aboundantlie beſtowed thy heauenlie gift vpon mankind haſt ſo plentifullie powred thy grace fauour v ſakes thou wouldeſt ſpare thine owne ſonne ſhall eſcape thine indignation care kindneſſe thine moſt careleſſe vnkind among waie ſhall poore creature turne ſhall haue beene moſt vnthankefull thy benefit moſt vnmindfull ſo bold lift vp hart hand vnto heauens call vpon thee thou thy ſingular goodneſſe didſt ſo prouide wickedneſſe old adam ſhould purged waſhed awaie bloud ieſus chriſt haue wilfullie fallen ſinne againe thou madeſt child light haue made ſelfe inheritour darkeneſſe thou madeſt thine creation haue made ſelfe child perdition ſhall therefore shall doubt anie mercie forgiueneſſe ſweete lord ſo great thy mercie ſurmounteth thy workes ſo large thy promiſes ſo ſure performance ſuch take hold thereof ſo deere thy ſight merit thy ſonne ieſus ſo acceptable vnto thee hartie repentance ſinner remembrance thereof prouoked crie vnto thee ſaieng father haue ſinned againſt heauen againſt thee worthie called thy child neuertheleſſe behold thou greeuous offender thy creature haue reſpect mine offence behold repentance thinke vpon wickedneſſe vpon wound sauiour ieſus looke vpon falſe hart hath wauered thy lawes behold bleeding hart thy ſonne ieſus chriſt pierced releaſe ſet free ſinnes caſt vpon thy backe beſeeching thee merit may beare thy mercie pardon heare lord god heare knowe earneſtlie ſeeke deſire thine aide readier thou art ſtretch foorth thine hand helpe heare therefore lord bow downe incline thine eare vnto praier inſpire ſo thy holie ſpirit may loue thee aboue thing neuer faile put hope truſt ſaluation whome thou wouldeſt redeemer ſauiour make forſaking wickedneſſe ſo riſe falling ſinne may obtaine true ſeruing thee innocencie pureneſſe life graunt lord ieſus chriſts ſake whome thee holie ghoſt honour glorie amen praier vnto god ſonne moſt ſweet ſauiour moſt mercifull redeemer bountifull ieſu ſonne god although thou art high yet thou art moſt humble although thou art omnipotent thou art alſo moſt meeke thou art moſt mightie ſo art thou moſt mercifull thee chriſt guide felicitie father heauen hath giuen power heauen earth thou art true paſtor ſoules thou art meſſias thou caſteſt none ſue vnto thee thou haſt taken awaie handwriting againſt v haſt faſtened thy croſſe ſo art thou readie impart merit thy paſſion vnto ſuch true repentance ſins call vpon thee faithfullie wherefore ſweet ieſus moſt faithfullie vnfeinedlie acknowledge benefit thou haſt beſtowed vpon ſtedfaſtlie beleeue thou immaculate lambe whoſe mouth neuer found guile didſt ſuffer moſt cruell torment hand ſinners loue v moſt wretched ſinners cauſe moſt hartilie beſeech thee moſt humblie praie thee accept number thou wilt make coinheritours thy bitter paine although ſelfe moſt vnworthie thereof yet thy merit make woorthie flie crauing may ſo armed defended may ſubdue world fleſh diuell euen thou haſt gloriouſlie conquered ſinne death hell thou ſeeſt ſauiour dailie hourlie beſet theſe three enimies ſo hardlie beſeeged without thy helpe meanes eſcape muſt need praie vnto one strengthen therefore lord neither one carnall luſts neither delectable pleaſures sathan himſelfe craftie ſubtile deuiſes get dominion ouer thou haſt bought thou haſt paid take thou ſaue keepe defend alwaies readie voice crieng powre thy grace patientlie abide thy diuine pleaſure thing make preſent day life haue mind profoundlie roote hart myſteries thy painefull paſſion ſo filled remembrance thereof ſin may enter sathan mine old enimie may well perceiue hath neither part fellowſhip bodie ſoule altogether thine whome praiſes world without end amen praier vnto god holie ghoſt holie ghoſt bleſſed holie ſpirit comforter afflicted thou proceeding father sonne art true inſtructor teacher diuine heauenlie veritie wherefore humilitie praie thee renew make cleane hart graffe right ſpirit guide gouerne may thinke nothing ſpeake nothing doo nothing onlie ſhall pleaſe thee whereas haue ceaſed offend lord god maker moſt greeuouſlie tranſgreſſe againſt ieſus redeemer ſauiour praie thee may haue inward ſorowe repentance ſhame thereof euer hereafter may performe dutie ought doo ſo bring foorth fruit repentance paſſion ieſus chriſt may defend ſinne wickedneſſe bring ioies paradiſe godlie praier true worſhipping god may vſed church common praier stabliſh hart mind moſt gratious god true woorſhipping thy diuine maieſtie make v beleeue thy holie ſacred goſpell wherein dailie hourelie inſtructed loue feare honour obeie thee hate ſinne iniquitie renounce ſuperſtitious ceremony whereby thy worſhip defaced thy glorie prophaned thine honour greatlie diminiſhed giue v grace hate ſinne iniquitie renounce forſake vanity wanton pleaſures wicked ſinfull world arme v beſeech thee mortifie bring vnder rebellious appetite ſtraieng luſts fleſh finallie giue v power aboue withſtand sathan prince darkneſſe damnable miniſters diuers temptation prouoke allure v godlie puritie perfect integritie paſſeth onlie chriſt ieſus vnto v fulneſſe perfection holineſſe kind euill impietie vncleanneſſe meanes whereof thy worſhip greatlie prophaned ſet purpoſe contemned make v conſtant ſkirmiſh againſt world ſinne death hell power fruitefull faith giue v grace reſiſt bridle concupiſcence fleſh ſuch ſort ſoules may triumph victorie continue conſtant woorſhipping thee paſſeth fulneſſe ioie prepare hart mind good lord euer ſpread foorth glorie thy name kéepe tongue filthie talke vncomelie geſture leaſt exerciſe ſuch ſinne contemne thy worſhip prouoke thee diſpleaſure indignation set thou watch gate mouth lip thy grace may alwaies made open ſound foorth thy praiſe euerlaſting glorie mercifull offence thinke thou vnrighteouſneſſe vpon thy clemencie forgiue freelie pardon gratiouſlie ſinnes make v faithfull chriſt ieſus shorten dangerous day iniquitie increaſe number thy choſen peculiar saincts haſten thy comming ſauiour chriſt felowſhip saint heauenlie angel bleſſed companie martyr may celebrate thy praiſe worſhip thee thy glorious kingdome father god holie ghoſt whome praiſe euer amen another praier may liue ſo vprightlie life last may dwell euerlasting tabernacle lord ſeeing righteous ſhall dwell thy tabernacle graunt beſeech thee pure vndefiled ſoule ſhape earth wherein god enimies haue abiding compariſon woonderfull beautie heauen wherein righteouſneſſe doth dwell compariſon place wherein angel archangel good men yea god himſelfe abiding pleaſures world wealth honour companie parent friend wherein pleaſure ſweeteneſſe mixed ſowreneſſe ſorowe wherein euerie perfection hath imperfection▪ vnſpeakeable ioie kingdome god companie friend heere compariſon companie abraham iſaac iacob patriarch prophet saint god oh felicitie euerlaſting life without diſcommodities perpetuall without perill moleſtation oh glorious maieſtie ſingular mirth paſſing ioies life come eie hath ſeene hart man able conceiue anie part happie eſtate bleſſed ſoules heauen oh amiable thy tabernacle ſoule hath deſire enter court lord hart ſoule reioice liuing god bleſſed dwell thy houſe may alwaies praiſing thee one daie thy court better thouſand elſewhere rather dorekeeper houſe god dwell tent vngodlineſſe lord god light defence ſoule athirſt god euen liuing god ſhall come preſence god fleſh longeth thee barren drie land water good lord remember graunt may weare white garment innocencie thine elected thine euerlaſting kingdome amen praier againſt felowſhip vngodlie protect poiſon adder lieth hidden vnder lip fine thine enimies blaſpheme thy holie bleſſed name contemne thy teſtimonies lord giue thy grace conuerſant good godlie men ſuch fauour thy glorious goſpell doo indeuour practiſe thy precept glorie thy holie bleſſed name make example exerciſe ſelfe heauenlie veritie thereby may inſtructed liuelie knowledge thy commandements obtaine ſuch wiſdome aboue faith may cleaue thee felowſhip thoſe feare thy holie name ſo auoide companie wicked vngodlie worldling haue laid ſnares intrap mee graunt moſt mercifull father thy ſonne ieſus chriſts ſake euer liueth reigneth thee holie ghoſt whome laude glorie power praiſe euer euer amen praier ſaid sermon moſt mightie god thy word haſt made thing whoſe voice flouds hils doo knowe whoſe heaſt quicke dead heauen hell obey whoſe diſpleaſure diuels hell doo tremble let thy word ſo lighten hart good work may teſtifie profeſſion ſeeing tree beareth fruit ſhall cut downe throwne fire grant may onelie hearer alſo dooer thy holie word ſo finallie may partaker thine euerlaſting ioie bliſſe lord grant wiſdome knowe thee grace followe thee true humilitie thou didſt ſuffer ſpitted ſmitten thine enimies ſo may beare diſpleaſures world rage enimies patience thou haſt bleſſed little one reuealed vnto thing hidden wiſe thou wilt haue mercie pleaſeth thee ſet thy feare alwaies mine eies make vnderſtand wiſdome ſecretlie graffe thy faith ſo hart may knowe thee loue thee glorifie thy holie name euer amen praier faith bleſſed sauiour ieſus ſonne euerliuing god vnſpeakeable ioie thy ſeruants moſt preſent cōfort ſinners cameſt world ſaue offender ſo louedſt world thou ſparedſt thy moſt pretious bloud redeeme loſſe firſt father adam make v coheires forfeited inheritance thy ſelfe beleeue thee might ſaued good lord haſt promiſed knocke ſhall opened ſeeke ſhall find grant beſeech thee may ſearch thy holie lawes find truth thy holie word may alwaies conſtantlie confeſſe ſhew thee thy goodneſſe well word liuing inſpire thy holie ſpirit may knowe thee ſtedfaſtlie truſt thee ſerue thee praiers welldooing time life moſt mercifull lord sauiour world glorie thy name ſake beſeech thee heare praiers ſoule reioice god ſauing health hee hath good thee hath kept thee ſnare hunter bleſſed thee lord mercifull god let earth feare let mouth men ſound praiſes vnto god good lord dailie increaſeth good gift ſeruants lord increaſe faith ſhall ſaued praier ſaid receiuing lord supper omnipotent god father euerlaſting whoſe mercie infinite whoſe kingdom hath none end vouchſafe beſeech thee thine plentifullie ſuch pure knowledge may thinke ſaie anie groſſe forme carnall maner feede vpon eate thy fleſh reallie carnallie make v alwaies conſtantlie beleeue thy glorious bodie aſcended vp heauen humblie beſeech thee ſo confirme v truth thy bleſſed teſtament may confeſſe thy diuine nature equall father holie ghoſt beleeue thy power power particular power generall ſuch doth ſhall gouerne heauen banket wherin ye mouth carnall body foſtered fed bread wine ſo lord confirme faith thee mouth ſoules may feed ſpirituallie vpon thy ſweeteſt fleſh drinke thy deereſt blood ſo nouriſhed euerlaſting offence found vnmeet gheſts come thy holie banket ſo eate drinke vtter confuſion ſoules body giue v grace therefore good lord conuert v wholie vnto thee ſhall turned ſinne iniquitie giue v grace reſt onlie vpon thee ſhall made ſafe giue v thine aid aboue beſeech thee faith ſtriue man ſinne ſo vanquiſh may die v may liue thee art giuer life grant moſt gratious god ieſus chriſt ſake thee holie ghoſt foreſight much care doeſt thou take v thy child good lord thou feedeſt bird aire cloatheſt lillie feeld take care wherefore good lord ſo prouide neceſſitie ſickneſſe beſeech thee caſting care vpon thee may cheeflie ſtudie pleaſe thee ſerue thee liueſt reigneſt king king euer amen praier againſt lieng euill imagination lord cleanſe hart beſeech thee vnpure wicked cogitation thought giue cleere
