quia ipſe est dominus tuus ipſum adorabis omnis gloria filiae regis intùs est 1582 right godlie pſalmes fruitfull praiers comfortable meditation ſaid moſt vertuous deere souereigne ladie queene elizabeth time hir grace pleaſure ſo eſpeciallie vpon 17 daie nouember memorable daie hir maiesties moſt ioifull deliuerance trouble happie entrie hir bleſſed reigne 18 pſalme david made firſt beginning gratulation thankeſgiuing vnto god entring kingdome maruelous mercy victory grace god towards paraphraſticallie explaned opened godlie learned man theodore beza doo loue thee lord ſtrength doo loue thee euen bottome hart lord rocke fortreſſe deliuerer god mount refuge ſheeld horne wherwith driue awaie enimie high tower defence haue praiſed lord called vpon hath deliuered mine enimies band death compaſſed round bound moſt wicked men like moſt raging flouds made afraid enuironing round lie wrapped winding ſheete euen ſnarled ſnares death called vpon lord theſe extremity called vpon god ſaie heard voice high palace receiued eares crie made vnto priſon began earth quake tremble verie foundation mountaines ſhake ſhudder breathed ſmoke noſtrels ſpitting foorth fire mouth yea caſting foorth euen coales fire bowed heauens came downe darkeneſſe ſpred abrode vnder feete ride vpon wing angel caried wing wind blacke darkneſſe enuironed tabernacle round caried moſt darke thicke cloud untill gliſtering brightneſſe breake thoſe cloud flame fire flaſh euerie ſide length thundered heauen filled place mightie ſounding voice haileſtones lightening ſhot foorth fierie dart increaſing lightening terrified mine enimies deſtroied deepe bottom water appeared foundation world diſcouered thy rebuke lord bluſtering wind thy wrath hath ſtretching right hand heauen taken drawne bottome deepe water mightie enimie ſaie enimies whoſe power oppreſſed verelie almoſt caſt downe deſtroied ſudden ſtaffe ſtaied mee hath drawne theſe ſtreights placed open large place bicauſe ſo pleaſed without deſeruing fauour regard indeed ſo oppreſſed theſe men without cauſe granted theſe thing guiltleſſe haue followed waie lord hath appointed howſoeuer theſe men vexed neither could drawne anie iniuries ſhould fall god wicked vſe lawes mine eies neither put ſtatutes foorth ſight behaued ſelfe without hypocriſie neither followe mine affection elſe would eaſilie haue caried foorth waie therefore lord regard oppreſſed without anie cauſe fauoured mee innocent partie thou lord wilt ſhew thy ſelfe good vpright deale vprightlie thou ſheweſt thy ſelfe ſincere deale ſincerelie ſo craftie men ſhall perceiue thee cunning although manie time thy ſeruants ſore vexed yet dooeſt thou preſerue dooeſt caſt downe thoſe behaue themſelues ſo proudlie hence haue light whereby thou cauſeſt ſhine driueſt awaie darkneſſe thou haſt made ouercome theſe danger eaſilie leape ouer wals let waie waie whereby god leadeth v plaine word god moſt pure lord doth defend truſt ſhield god lord mightie god onelie hath girded power hath made waie ſafe hath made ſwift hind hath placed moſt high ſafe place hath taught mine hand fight hath giuen ſo great ſtrength able breake bowe braſſe theſe mine armes thou haſt preſerued protection thy ſhield thou haſt ſtaied thy right hand readie fall thy great mercie thou haſt cauſed go ſafelie without danger thou haſt ſtaied ſliding ſteps therefore haue purſued mine enimies taken haue turned back till haue deſtroied haue ſo beaten downe troden vnder foote able raiſe themſelues againe thou verelie haſt giuen ſuch ſtrength haue riſen againſt haue fallen hedlong feete thou haſt giuen power ſtrike head might deſtroie purſued yet lord grant cried vnto thee thou haſt deliuered neither wouldeſt heare crie therefore beate ſmall like duſt wind ſcattereth abroad beate like mire tempered vnder foote walke ſtreets yea alſo thou haſt deliuered domeſticall inward trouble thou haſt giuen dominion ouer nation neuer knewe unknowne people ſaie obey commandements ſtrangers compelled feare ſubmit themſelues vnto heart ſtrangers haue failed ſo fall downe feare ſtrongeſt fort let lord liue let defence knowledged worſhipped worthilie deſerueth let god deliuerer bee praiſed eueriewhere euen god ſaie mine aduenger hath ſubdued ſo manie people vnder thou haſt ſaued mine enimies thou haſt deliuered roſe vp againſt eſpeciallie cruell curſſing man therefore praiſe thee euen amongſt prophane nation ſing vnto thy maieſtie verelie thou haſt maruellouſlie preſerued thy queene onlie elizabeth hir ſelfe thou haſt annointed queene alſo thou haſt ſhewed ſingular fauour hir poſteritie ſhall remaine euer amen glorie therefore vnto thee ô father sonne holie ghoſt beginning preſent euer shall age world world without end amen amen 118 pſalme made david obteined kingdome death saule oh acknowledge declare yee openlie lord good bountious goodneſſe euer let iſrael confeſſe thing bountious goodnes mercie endureth euer let ſtocke aaron confeſſe louing kindneſſe perpetuall let ſincere woorſhippers lord confeſſe louing kindneſſe perpetuall doubtleſſe notable example vnſpeakable bountie haue ceaſed yee knowe call vpon greateſt extremity ſelues ſee hauing heard hath exalted moſt large roome wherefore hauing experience lord worketh ſo neere hand vnto god forbid ſhould feare power threat anie man lord himſelfe chiefe leader thoſe helpe ſo doubt ſhall ſee mine eies thoſe enimies remaine iuſtlie puniſhed oh far better truſt lord men far better truſt lord anie men excellent ſoeuer behold manie nation compas calling vpon ye lord ſhal moſt vndoubtedlie deſtroy compaſſe ſaie beſet round calling vpon lord ſhall moſt vndoubtedlie deſtroie mine enimies great multitude compaſſe like ſwarmes bee ſhall forthwith ſtiffle though caſt fire calling vpon lord ſhall moſt vndoubtedlie deſtroie deede moſt cruell enimie ſo ſore thruſt ſeemed euen readie fall falling lord ſupported therefore accompt mine onlie ſtrength acknowledge sauiour praiſe ſong heereof come thoſe voice thoſe ſing reioice together tabernacle doubtleſſe lord hath aduanced power moſt ſtrong right hand lord hath exalted right hand lord hath ſhewed foorth power moſt ſtrong right hand behold yet aliue ſet foorth work god though hath ſtriken verie ſore yet hath ſpared life praie thee therefore let gate length open vnto onlie louers righteouſneſſe muſt go vnto entred thither may praiſe lord conſecrate vnto lord therefore open iuſt alone heere praiſe thee lord becauſe thou giuing eare haſt deliuered ſtone verie chiefe builder haue ſo ſtubbornelie yet reiected nothing fit onlie counted building euen principall vpholdeth whole weight verie building uerelie worke god indeede maketh beholder thereof amazed go ſeeing lord hath commanded moſt ioifull daie ſhine vnto v let v paſſe wholie mirth becomming saincts ſaie beſeech thee lord preſerue queene giuen v heauen praie thee ſaie praie thee lord giue queene elizabeth proſperitie let hir haue proſperitie bliſſe commeth gouerne v name commandement god wiſh proſperitie alſo neerer inhabitant houſe lord iehoua onlie god ſhineth vnto v binde lambe cord brought horne altar thou art god praiſe thee thou art god ſing thy praiſes moſt lowd confeſſe lord exceeding good bountious goodneſſe euerlaſting glorie therefore vnto thee ô bleſſed trinitie father sonne holie ghoſt alwaies hath bin continuallie euer shall world without ending praier almightie god moſt gratious lord heauenlie father behold thine handmaid proſtrate throne thy diuine maieſtie meeklie confeſſe thee bee mercifull god higheſt king euerlaſting sauiour humblie acknowledge thee souereigne lord aboue lord higheſt king king onelie omnipotent creator wiſe preſeruer woonderfull ruler thy creature heauen earth high lowe viſible inuiſible ſelfe alſo worke thine hand ſheepe thy paſture ſubiect ſeruant thy moſt high ſacred maieſtie child depending alone wholie vpon thy diuine fatherlie prouidence thing bicauſe knowe vnthankfulneſſe doth greatlie diſpleaſe thee root ſpirituall euill onelie thing dammeth vp fountaine thy godlie mercie euer giue thanks vnto thee lord leaſt vnthankfull thee god deliuerer sauiour yeeld thee moſt humble hartie thanks hath pleaſed thee thy ſingular mercie giue mee eſpeciall honour firſt ſuffer thy glorious truth much extreme miſerie feare care impriſōment perill bodie trouble mind hazard life danger death ſickneſſe fire conſpiracie ſword afterward bleſſedlie protecting preſeruing ſo manifold danger miraculouſlie deliuering hand mine enimies call excellent ſtate roiall dignitie prince daie cloath garment honour ſet crowne gladneſſe diademe dignitie vpon mine head put ſcepter righteouſneſſe globe glorie ſword thy power mine hand annoint conſecrate thine handmaid qveene realme might bee principall member chiefe inſtrument ſame aduance thy glorie thy goſpell ſuffered yea thy people ioſeph moſes ioſua dauid ioſias samuel salomon finallie deborah iael heſter iudith elizabeth reſt ſtaie ſtaffe maieſtie ſhepheard ringleader waie vertue holineſſe zeale ſincere religion maruellous worke thine oh gratious god thy name ſake giue grace onlie daie day time life remember ſolemnize woorthie thanksgiuing queene saba may continuallie bleſſe thee ſaie bleſſed thou lord god thus haſt loued thy people ſet thy throne qveene eſtabliſh euer making gouernour ouer thy ſteed execute thy iudgement iuſtice neither forget thankfullie alſo call remembrance thy great mercy mercifull god ſhewed towards ſince comming vnto crowne namelie often thy mightie maruellous mercie thou haſt deliuered vnto mee counſell wicked attempt malignant deuiſes miſcheeuous practiſes wrought conceiued common craftie cruell enimies sathan miniſters exalt themſelues rob mee thy people kingdome peace religion euen verie malice deadlie hatred haue diuelliſh meanes raged blaſphemed conſpired againſt thee god thy truth like hypocrite againſt mee crowne like traitours againſt commonwealth countrie like ſpoilers offence mine themward lord thou knoweſt onelie cruell ſpite beare mee bicauſe truth profeſſe thy chriſtian religion ſeeke eſtabliſhing ſame good godlie lawes ſerue thee zealouſlie ſincerelie purelie according rule veritie thine eternall word thy great benefit well conſider togither mine vnwoorthineſſe thereof euen forced father david giue humble thanks bleſſe thee congregation ſaie bleſſed thou lord god iſrael father euer euer thine lord greatneſſe power glorie victorie praiſe heauen earth thine thine kingdome lord thou excelleſt head ouer rich honour come thee thou reigneſt ouer thine hand power ſtrength thine hand ſaie mightie god make great giue ſtrength vnto therefore thanke thee praiſe thy glorious name euer lord god people thou haſt brought mee honour thus redeemed deliuered mee thy people thrall vnto thy ſelfe art beecome god dooth apperteine man lord commeth rather thy free mercie anie woorthineſſe elizabeth ſaie vnto thee thou lord god knoweſt thy ſeruant euen thy word ſake according thine owne hart haſt thou made fountaine become floud light ſhine ſunne done theſe great thing make knowne vnto thy ſeruant therefore thy gratious fauour ſo long reſtraint ſo great danger ouerpaſſed ſuch bluſterous ſtorms ouerblowne ſo many iniuries digeſted wrong ſuſteined thy mightie protection mercifull god ſmall comfort thy people commoditie exalting erecting bringing thrall libertie darkneſſe light danger peace quietneſſe dread dignitie miſerie maieſtie mourning ruling breeflie priſoner make prince place roiall throne ſit queene full 24 yeeres admirable reſt bleſſed quietneſſe long peace enioie thy diuine wiſdome heauenlie father vnfolding reuealing fruſtrating proud platformes peeuiſh practiſes achitophels mine enimes thy meere mercie deere chriſt ſpacing people ſo long frō bloudie hand ſpoilers oppreſſors traitor vſurpers thy heauenlie prouidence holie ghoſt preuenting diueliſh purpoſes ſo gratiouſly protecting preſeruing defending wel queene ſince ſo extreme miſeries manifold danger alſo frō hand violence al mine enimies viſible inuiſible domeſticall foraine finallie theſe thy great grace ſingular bleſſings meſtimable benefit principall vertues ſpirituall corporall glorious trinitie mercie merit ſweet sauior ieſus chriſt thou hertofore frō birth haſt preſentlie dooeſt hereafter vnto death ſhalt bountifullie beſtowe vpon people moſt hartilie laud entirelie magnifie inceſſantlie extoll thy moſt high holie renowmed name ſacred princelie maieſtie meeklie euen dutie bottome hart render vnto thee god king condigne honour woorthie praiſe poſſible thanks togither vnfeined reſignation empire kingdome power rule dominion maieſtie glorie heauen earth thee onlie moſt iuſtlie belongeth ſo moſt humblie hartilie beſeech thy diuine maieſtie excellent father moſt mercifull god haue mercie vpon thine humble handmaid ſinfull ſeruant prouoked good lord ſinnes ſinnes parent people giue v ouer luſt enimies make v reproch vnto fooliſh let aduerſaries ouerthrowe triumph againſt v ſaieng god thy rich mercie woonted compaſſion chriſt ieſu forgiue ſinnes old new ſecret open paſt preſent come yea mine owne others fault god beſeech thee deliuer caſt mine offence bottomleſſe depth thy remembrance ſight euer making croſſe paſſion death reſurrection thy moſt deere onlie ſonne ſweete sauiour onlie redeemer ieſus chriſt righteous immaculate lambe moſt effectuall mee vertue godlineſſe life pietie beſt becommeth thy daughter thy virgin thine annointed elect veſſell honour thy good grace bountifull benefit alredie ſhewed towards thine accuſtomed goodneſſe beſeech thee confirme finiſh worke mee thou haſt gratiouſlie begun continue towards mee end according thy good pleaſure ſuch increaſe thereof time time beſt ſhall ſerue ſetting foorth thy glorie benefit thy church poſteritie mine eternall peace chriſt ieſus prince peace grant ſaie lord alſo may added namelie hath pleaſed thee thy ſecret wiſdome quicken tanquam ouis euen ſeelie ſheepe lambe led ſlaine raiſe vp duſt mire perſecution lift vp pit dungeon ſet chiefe prince land make mee meete inherīt ſeate glorie yea build chiefe head piller thy church england france ireland wherevpon whole bodie thy saint therein doo ſtaie themſelues thy bleſſed peace vnitie ſaie thy good deſerts exalt horne thine annointed appoint fraile woman thy lieutenant earth giue power vnto thy qveene iudge end thy dominion execute thine office amongſt thy people ſpace regall ſeate iuſtice mercie ſo vouchſafe thou gratious god louing father like mercie powre downe continuallie vpon thoſe thy ſpeciall good gift princelie vertues heauenlie grace fit ſo high calling plentiouſlie indued therewith bright ſhining beames thereof glittering star firmament glorious sunne orient ariſing ſetting foorth thy moſt glorious inuiſible eternall maieſtie fraile earthlie viſible maieſtie may cleerelie ſhine appeare benefit thy church farre neere remembring whoſe miniſter may firſt aboue thing perfect zeale thy houſe loue thy people euer ſeeke thy honour glorie ſtudie continuallie preſerue thy people committed charge wealth peace godlineſſe deere father ſo bleſſe mee ſo loue mee ſo ſpirit counſell prudence knowledge fortitude ſanctifie ſtrengthen direct perfect faith feare loue thy ſight may walke vprightlie without offence giuing obedience thy holie word fulfilling thy bleſſed commandements day life may true follower king souereigne ouer holie hill zion whoſe ſeate kingdome endureth euer giue mee grace thankfullie acknowledge thy manifold great benefit beſtowed vpon mee alſo faithfullie diligentlie diſcharge dutie towards thee thy people executing thy iudgements indifferentlie without parcialitie aduancement thy kingdome eſtabliſhment throne vniuerſall comfort commoditie thy people make good lord entire affection perfect hart towards thee humble gentle ſpirit towards vnder gouernement example chriſt eternall king fulfill thy god vouchſafe take fleſh virgin marie became man man man might become god vnto men alſo verie much abaſe humble himſelfe ſeruant euen vnto death croſſe redeeme prince people thrall bondage ſinne sathan death hell let naturall affection diſpoſition ſaie lord continue foe terrible ſubiects amiable mine offender mercifull vertuous bountifull men indifferent parciall none guided thee gouerne thy people iuſtlie godlie peace quietneſſe may able good conſcience witneſſe mine integritie thee world thy faithfull ſeruants moſes samuel nehemias ſomtimes boldlie trulie ſaie behold beare record lord annointed whoſe oxe whoſe aſſe haue forceablie taken awaie haue done anie wrong haue iniured hurt whoſe hand haue receiued anie bribe blind mine eies therewith reſtore people ſeeing well perceiuing motherlie affection faithfull gouernement carefull diligence diligent watchfulneſſe ouer meanes doo good poſſiblie may thee may woorthilie witneſſe rightlie anſwere iuſtlie confeſſe ſaie thy glorie perpetuall praiſe iſraelites heretofore ſaid samuel haue grieued troubled land oppreſſion iniurie haue hurt taken ought anie man hand anie meanes either ſelfe others willinglie abuſed power dealt vniuſtlie people oh kindle hart beſeech thee moſt holie father pure zele aboue thing promote thy glorie vigilant care onelie ſerue thee ſelfe ſincerelie alſo haue thee diligentlie ſerued familie people end vouchſafe praie thee adorne thy heauenlie gift alſo bleſſe whole familie court houſhold thy grace vertues theſe high lowe one placed therein vnder may vertuous life true faith right religion towards thee god loiall hart conſcionable obedience towards prince miſtres entire affection charitie one towards another brother laſtlie hartie loue naturall goodwill beare commonwelth countrie example patterne true godlineſſe puritie religion life whole realme countrie yea whole world beſides followe head fountaine light moreouer bleſſed god hitherto thy mightie protection thou haſt preſerued thy great mercie maugre head mine enimies miraculouſlie haſt deliuered eſtabliſhed kingdome thus long admirable peace bleſſed quietneſſe glorie praiſe rendered vnto thy glorious name therfore ſo beſeech thy gratious goodneſſe lord like mercie bleſſe preſerue maintaine keepe defend realme ſtill forreine domeſticall conſpiracies treaſons deceit violence enimies danger peril imminent come bodilie ghoſtlie publike priuate may ſtill gouerne bleſſedlie ouer bleſſed people realme people thy defence protection continue truth thy goſpell happie enioieng perfect peace quietneſſe outward inward thou lord hoſts haſt ordeined gouernour ouer thy people made people thy people thou lord art become god yea great mightie god beſides wee haue none god knowe alſo god thou trieſt hart haſt pleaſure righteouſneſſe behold therefore offer vow dedicate ſelfe willinglie entirelie vprightneſſe hart ſerue worſhip thee onelie euer ioie therfore thine handmaid bold praie praier vnto thee beſeeching thee euer keepe helpe good purpoſe holie ſeruing worſhipping thee haue hitherto done nothing ſpeake direct thou continuallie thought mind prepare hart euermore vnto thee giue vnto thine handmaid perfect hart keepe thy commandements thy teſtimonies thy ſtatutes cauſe vſe power lawfullie reforming thy houſe eſtates according preſcript rule thy written word reuealed ſo may pleaſe thee lord god confirme euer thy mercifull promiſes made vnto father david bleſſe throne houſe thy ſeruant thy bleſſing may continue eſtabliſhed thee euer may better come paſſe glorie thy name benefit thy church wealth realme hartilie wiſh deſire remoue far thy church far excellent father thoſe fall thee infidelitie obſtinate wilfulneſſe traiterous rebel thy ſacred lawe ſincere religion profeſſe let backbiter together ſuch proud thoſe dare ſhameleſlie preſume anie thing vtterlie rooted contrariwiſe let ſpace eſpeciallie ſuch verie zealous truth onlie may conuerſant thee cauſe feede ſingular faith innocencie miniſter thing diligentlie vnto finallie let enimies thy goſpell beſeech thee gratious mightie god thus deſpiſe thy grace offered vnto repentance thoſe conuerted conuert turne god ſpeedilie thy make thou saule length become paule let perſecutor perſiſt errours let rather accompt thy long ſuffering peaceable vnbloudie gouernement occaſion ſaluation ſoules vnfeigned loue thy church otherwiſe needes remaine ſtill diſobedient thy truth diſloiall vnto dangerous ſtate enimies countrie commonwealth god ſaluation ariſe helpe wound head thine enimies hearie ſcalpe ſuch go ſtill wickedneſſe let thy right hand find euerie daie prouoke thee reuenge thy ſelfe thoſe blaſphemous hypocrite thus proudlie contemne thee thy face thou haſt diſcouered peeuiſh practiſes againſt thee thine annointed ſo diſcouer ſtill thou haſt preuented diueliſh purpoſes execrable intent ſo preuent ſtill yea let firie eies waxe wearie looking bloudie hart hand faint waiting golden daie commeth yet neither let come lord beſeech thee thy good time according thy bleſſed healthfull reigne vnto ſelfe much ioie comfort ſubiects long peace zion euermore laſtlie moſt mightie god looke remaineth yet happie building enlarging finiſhing thy church eſtabliſhing planting thy religion perfectlie therein according preſcript rule thy bleſſed word full diſcharge dutie ſhall called render accompt iudgement ſeate chriſt becauſe without thee nothing neither poſſible pleaſe thee thou father light whome good gift doo come proceede vouchſafe powre downe plentifullie thy principall ſpirit vpon ſo rauiſh hart flame loue thee thy people earneſt zeale thy houſe ioſeph may carefullie faithfullie prouide thy people moſes painefullie leade deſerts errour oppreſſion ioſhua bring thy people land promiſe debora fight thy battels iahel knocke siſera roome temple vſurped headſhip iudith cut head proud holophernes hezekias ioſias roote deſtroie ſuperſtition relikes idolatrie dauid salomon finiſh conſecrate eternitie thy glorious temple among thy people moſt earneſtlie continuallie praie vnto thee ſaluation heere earth time vertuous example dooing good thy ſight reigning bleſſedlie ruling prudentlie like louing mother tender nurſſe giuing foſtermilke foode thy word goſpell aboundantlie place dominion endeuouring ſelfe faithfullie diſcharge great truſt committed vnto thy ſonne whome onlie ſea windes creature ſubiect ſhall come king king require accompt charge committed vnto may found faithfull faile finallie heauen pureneſſe virginitie holineſſe mine innocencie preſented lambe ſouereigne lord onlie god heauenlie bridegroome ſpirituall ſpouſe euerlaſting king deere chriſt onlie ſweet sauiour ieſus ſee saincts sainct holie patriarch iudges king queenes yea archangel angel saint martyr confeſſors uirgins whole companie thy celeſtiall bleſſed ſpirits reigne ouer ſpirituall power principality euer ſing ſugred ſongs weddingdaie perpetuall ioie thine eternall praiſe moſt glorious trinitie father son holie ghoſt one inuiſible god almightie bleſſed euer euer amen amen another praier ſaid queenes maiestie bleſſed art thou lord god sabbaoth vnto thee apperteineth magnificence power glorie thee belongeth honour authoritie whatſoeuer either heauens aboue earth beneath thine thine lord kingdome thou art aboue prince king rich thine glorie thine thou art lord ouer thee remaineth vertue power greatneſſe gouernement god father lord mercie haſt made thing thy word thy wiſdome appointed man rule creature thou haſt made gouerne world equitie iuſtice praiſe thee extoll thy glorious name appointing thy ſeruant rule gouerne thy people committed vnto charge therefore gratious lord fauourablie behold may treade path truth righteouſneſſe ſinceritie hart thy ſight let abuſe mine authoritie gouerne lenitie gentleneſſe people vnder liuing godlie honeſt life mankind may enioie deſired peace giue therefore vnto thy ſeruant hart deſirous inſtructions may iudge people diſcerne betweene good euill neither declining right hand left ſtoutelie valiantlie mainteine cauſe righteous grant counſell aſſiſtance doo ſuch thing gratefull vnto thee good thy church profitable people commonweale giue thy wiſdome reiect thy child thy ſeruant handmaiden fraile woman ſhort time full weake vnderſtanding iudgements lawes thou haſt choſen gouernour thy people iudge thy ſonnes daughter ſend mee therefore wiſdome thy ſacred heauens ſeate thy magnificence may labour whereby may perceiue acceptable thine eies learne haue power ſelfe thee art almightie reigneſt ouer kingdomes men giuing thy pleaſure graunt neuer conceiue proudlie ſelfe may receiue patience diſcipline thy lawe make wiſe circumſpect neither offer iniurie anie man neither ſuffer anie iniuried ſo equitie may mainteined iuſtice among men preſerued let time vnder ſhew colour equitie vphold countenance wicked cauſe neither yet without ſufficient examination triall party giue ſentence againſt anie allow ſuch counſellers gouernours ouerſeers courage fearing god dealing vprightlie hating couetouſneſſe burthen charge care ſuſteine may ſomewhat lightened endue thine holie ſpirit earneſt ſtudie watchfull mind may diſcerne betweene matter man negligence haue ouerthrowe righteous cauſe ſentence rightlie pronounced betweene man brother ſtranger without reſpect anie perſon iudgement let v heare well little great feare man becauſe iudgement thine ſtandeſt companie iudges among god thou plaieſt iudge iudgement man lord whatſoeuer ſhall iudge come vpon v wherefore let thy feare v may doo thing care circumſpection prooue child vnderſtanding neither giue ſelues luſts pleaſures eate meate due ſeaſon ſtrength dronkennes thou wilt make earneſt diligent inquirie work ſearch cogitation becauſe thy ſeruants deputy gouerne men verie ſhort life daie king morowe may dead mortall ſubiect one ſame corruption beſides horrible iudgement nigh ſuch walke thee god moſt lowe ſhall finde mercie mightie ſhall mightilie tormented thou art lord ouer regardeſt perſon anie neither doeſt thou feare greatneſſe mightie becauſe well great ſmall workemanſhip thine hand thy care equall ouer thou giueſt godlie enterpriſes ſeeking thy glorie furtherance thy bleſſed goſpell weale thy ſubiects may thou ſhalt render euerie one according deedes found blameleſſe thy ſight ieſus chriſt lord amen another oalmightie god lord heauen earth haſt appointed thy ſeruant bee gouernour thy people ruler ouer men moſt humblie beſeech thee ſend thy wiſdome aboue whereby may vprightlie iudge thy people rightlie diſcerne betweene good euill conſtantlie continue dooing dutie without reſpect perſons giue power wiſdome gratefull thy ſight profitable ſubiects good continuance peace let alwaies remember haue power ſelfe thee iudgement man thee god ſtandeſt among iudges plaieſt iudge among god giue grace likewiſe conſider one daie ſoone knowe thou wilt bring reckning make diligent inquirie haue behaued ſelfe place office thy ſeruant haue ſhort race run ſuch ſtate v daie king morrowe may dead foraſmuch horrible iudgement ſhall giuen vpon ſuch rule vprightlie walke thy mightie men ſhall mightiſie tormented thou lord ouer wilt ſpare perſon feare anie greatneſſe thou haſt made ſmall great careſt alike beſeech thee gratious eternall god giue mee grace learne thy deale wiſelie infer none iniurie vnto anie ſuffer anie iniured countenance none euill cauſe ſlide path iuſtice thy ſeruant fraile perſon ſhort time full weake vnderſtanding iudgments lawes send therefore wiſdome throne thy maieſtie ſhe may labour may knowe acceptable thy ſight led hir dooings preſerued hir power ſo ſhall work acceptable ſhall gouerne thy people righteouſlie chriſt lord sauiour amen another heare mee lord thou high mightie god whoſe maieſtie may bee comprehended whoſe worde true whoſe commandement ſtrong thou rideſt vpon cherubins flieſt wing wind thou god mercie moſt woorthie ſought whome hoſts heauen ſtand trembling whoſe ordinance dreadfull whoſe lookes drie vp depth whoſe hand rule ſtarrie firmament whoſe goodneſſe onelie giueth fruit earth whoſe wrath maketh mountaines melt conſumeth wicked whoſe truth beareth dririe death paſſion drowne danger ſinful deſerts haſt carefull captaine cheriſhed bodie comfortable gift vnto preſent daie continue god ſuch goodneſſe towards vnwoorthie doo contrite hart bowed knee mercie men thy great mercie incomprehenſible vnmeaſurable paſſeth ſinnes without compariſon according therefore vnto thy great mercie thou haſt ſo loued world thou gaueſt thy ſonne thou haſt taken awaie ſinnes croſſe thou haſt lightened men alſo thou haſt reſtored thing heauen earth waſh ſaie lord waſh bloud reſtore reſurrection iuſtifie thy grace fauour redemption chriſt amen l lord looke thou ſinnes according multitude thy compaſſions wipe awaie mine iniquity pſal 51 verſe 1 thy mercie lord abundance pitie thy compaſſions work proceſſe thy mercie one thou lookeſt gentlie poore wretched thou forgiueſt multitude ſinnes ſweet mercifull sauiour ieſus chriſt ſorowfull penitent ſinner marie magdalen came proſtrate thy foot ſhe waſhed hir bitter teares ſhe wiped heares hir head thou forgaueſt hir ſinnes ſenteſt hir awaie peace good lord one thy compaſſions peter thriſe denied thee forſooke thee oth thou mercifullie lookedſt beholding thee bitterlie wept thou lord forgaueſt another thy compaſſions theefe croſſe ſaued one word paule furious madneſſe perſecution called filled holie ghoſt theſe lord thy pitifull compaſſions sith therefore thou art ſame god whome alteration neither ſhadowe change ſith one mediatour attonement betweene god man chriſt ieſus endureth euer dooſt thou powre thy plentious compaſſions vpon v well thou didſt vpon forefather ſtandeſt thou ſo far lord hideſt thy face needfull tune trouble haſt thou forſaken v thy mercy ſpent none left lord god hartilie beſeech thee moſt humblie praie thee thou wilt according multitude thy compaſſions wipe awaie mine iniquity thou haſt drawne receiued innumerable ſinners vnto thee haſt made righteous thy ſight euen ſo thou wilt vouchſafe drawe take alſo make mee righteous thy grace ſo clenſe purifie hart mine iniquity vncleanneſſe put may cleane table thy finger god may write lawe thy loue charitie amen daie trouble call thee ô lord pſa 120 verſ 1 becauſe thou haſt ſaid houre ſo euer ſinner doth repent ſinnes remember iniquity ezech 18 verſe 27 behold good lord day ſorowe day calamitie time wherein muſt call thee feele mine old cankered feſtered ſores ſinne readie breake foorth vtter confuſion behold good lord deſires lamentable ſorowfull ſighes powre thee crieng ſaieng lord cleanſe ſinnes vncleane filthie thee increaſe therefore thy light may veſſell thy grace kindle hart thy loue put feare perfect loue expelleth feare let loue world loue fleſh loue vaineglorie loue ſelfe vtterlie depart may thy mercie cleanſed mine iniquity haue offended thee cleanſe therefore lord water thy gratious fauour water drinketh ſhall thirſt ſhall made fountaine liuing water running flowing eternall life cleanſe mee ſaie lord water thy weeping teares cleanſe comfortable water thy ſacred scripture may numbred among vnto whome thou ſaiedſt yee cleane word haue ſpoken amen z zache perfect man thou lord ſaiedſt vnto figtree zache come downe daie come thy houſe came downe ioifullie receiued thee luke 19 verſe 5 mercifull god manie ſinnes haue thy ſight would wiſe haue done mortall men feared men thee becauſe blind loued blindneſſe onlie eies fleſh therfore onlie feare looke men fleſh god behold ſtand thy face might finde mercie ſtand thy goodneſſe benignitie looking thy fauorable anſwere haue mercie therefore thou ſaiedſt zache daie abide thy houſe ioifullie receiuing thee ſaid lord halfe good giue poore haue done anie man wrong reſtore fourefold lord ieſu part halfe haue bequeath ſelfe wholie vnto thee reſeruing nothing thee promiſing ſerue thee euer cleane pure hart ſweet lord ieſus ſaweſt thou zache euen thine owne image caſt image diuell put thine image thou didſt ſee zache putting image diuell drawe thee houſe take ſweet ieſus ſinnes wickedneſſe praie thee none may remaine may keepe thee may put zache euill thou maiſt ſee thou ſaweſt zache thou ſhalt call figtree miſerable world thou maiſt ſaie vnto come downe daie abide thee amen pure heart create ô god right ſpirit renew within pſalme 51 verſe 10 ala lord sauiour hart hath forſaken thee turned thee gone aſtraie wandered ſtrange country enſueth vanity hir eies vttermoſt part world loſt gone ſold vnder ſinne ſtonie yea harder flint adamant ſtone relented yeelded thy ſonnes death lord ſhall ſaie pure hart create fleſhie hart mollified ſoft hart humble hart penitent hart mercifull hart deuout hart religious zealous hart yea ſuch hart loue thee aboue thing create therefore good lord ſuch hart may ſuch efficacie thy grace nature able make giue alſo right ſpirit may loue worſhip thee art chiefe principall ſpirit thou art ſpirit wilt worſhipped ſpirit veritie ſoule good lord alſo ſpirit ſo made thee ſelfe right hir owne nature ſhe loueth thee aboue hir ſelfe deſireth thing thy glorie ſo hir owne naturall loue right becauſe commeth thee make ſtedfaſt therefore lord thy gratious fauour ſpirit may according owne nature leade keepe waie thy commandements heart may ſo inflamed heauenlie loue may cauſe ſigh vnto thee embrace thee continuallie neuer forſake thee alwaies firme conſtant thee giue therefore vpright ſpirit ſeeking hir owne glorie thy glorie renew praie thee good lord renew ſaie ſins haue quenched firſt thou gaueſt amen b behold lord againſt thee onlie haue ſinned done euill thy ſight thou maiſt iuſtified thy word maiſt ouercome thou art iudged pſalme 51 verſe 4 thee onlie lord proper forgiue mercifull mercie forgiueneſſe thou dooeſt declare thine almightineſſe graunt therefore lord confeſſe againſt thee onlie haue offended haue done euill thy ſight haue mercie therefore lord haue mercie expreſſe ſhewe foorth thine omnipotencie thou maiſt iuſtified thy word written thou cameſt call righteous ſinners repentance graunt therefore good lord true repentant hart iuſtifie according thy word call receiue giue thy grace ſo thereby may work repentance thou ſaiedſt lifted vp earth drawe vnto ſelfe uerifie lord word drawe thee let run thee ſweeteneſſe thine ointment againe thou ſaiedſt come vnto yee labour loden eaſe behold lord god ſinner come vnto thee loden ſinnes daie night labouring ſorowe hart thy grace mercie refreſh eaſe therefore good lord thou maiſt iuſtified proued thou art iudged manie ſaie helpe god ouercome lord theſe perſons thou art thus iudged forſake anie time giue thy creature thy mercie pardon vanquiſhed ſaie helpe god amen e establish ô lord free principall ſpirit reſtore vnto mee ioie thy ſauing health pſalme 51 verſe 12 great thing heauenlie father deſire thee ſeeing thou art great lord king aboue god doth thee iniurie aſketh thee ſmall thing aſketh thee bodilie thing aſketh vaine trifle therefore deſireth ſpirituall thing deſireth great thing deſireth thy ioie ſauing health deſireth greateſt thing thou haſt giue thy ſauing health ieſus chriſt thy onlie ſonne verie god euerlaſting life forſomuch thou haſt bin ſo louing liberall father giue vnto death croſſe offer ſhould aſhamed aſke thee whome thou haſt giuen giue therefore thy principall ſpirit may reioice thy ſauing health forſomuch thy holie word thou biddeſt aſke knocke euen till ſee importunate aſke ſhould wholeſome thou ſhouldeſt make reioice thy ſonne ſauing health therfore continuallie crie thee ſaieng make againe reioice thy ſauing helth reſtore againe thing ſinnes haue loſt reſtore fault periſhed reſtore beſeech thee mercy ſake euer ſitteth thy right hand maketh interceſſion gratious fauour may laſt end enioie fruitfull benefite thy ſauing health amen thov euer ô lord haſt loued truth vnknowne thing thy wiſdome haſt thou reuealed vnto mee pſalme 51 verſe 6 meaneth ſaie thou loueſt truth thy gratious mercie thou makeſt v promiſes fulfilleſt thy truth ſake thou didſt promiſe vnto abraham ſonne aged thou fulfilledſt thy promiſe old barren sara becauſe thou loueſt truth thou madeſt promiſe vnto dauid thy ſeruant ſaieng fruit thy bodie ſet vpon regall throne came paſſe becauſe thou loueſt truth thou haſt promiſed vnto ſinners come vnto thee forgiueneſſe fauour thou haſt neuer defrauded anie man thou loueſt truth innumerable promiſes thou haſt euer bene faithfull becauſe thou loueſt truth loue therefore father mercy truth repentant hart turneth thee behold therefore thy creature whome thou maiſt keepe whome thou maiſt forgiue manie ſinnes spare good lord ſpare thy ſeruant command number babe vnknowne thing thy wiſdome thou haſt opened vnto may lead vnto fountaine wiſdome high thou maiſt praiſed work thy mercie thou dooeſt exerciſe towards thy ſeruant lord neuer forſakeſt truſt thee amen h haddeſt thou ô lord deſired ſacrifice would haue giuen thee thou delighteſt burnt offering pſalme 51 verſe 16 mouth lord ſhall ſhew foorth thy glorious fame knowe moſt acceptable thee ſeeing thou haſt declared mouth prophet ſaieng ſacrifice praiſe ſhall glorifie meane ſaith lord ſhall entiſed ſhew ſauing health pſal 48 therefore offer praiſe vnto thee ſinnes euen praiſe infant ſucklings ſhall offer praiſe ſinnes rather ſacrifice bicauſe thou delighteſt burnt ſacrifice thou hadſt deſired ſacrifice ſurelie offered thou delighteſt againe thou ſaiedſt require mercie ſacrifice oſe 6 therefore mouth ſhall ſhew foorth thy praiſe bicauſe thereby doo ſhew foorth thy honour ſheweth thy grace waie ſauing health lord thou madeſt bodie ſpirit therfore ſeekeſt thou ſpirituall thing bodilie thing thou ſaieſt ſonne giue thy hart vnto prou 23 ſacrifice pleaſeth thee let therefore offer vnto thee lord hart repenting ſorrowing ſinnes inflame deſired loue heauenlie thing wilt thou deſire ſuch ſacrifices wilt thou lord pleaſed amen regina r rebuke ô lord thine anger neither chaſten thou mee thy heauie diſpleaſure haue thou mercie weake miſerie pſalme 6 verſe 1 ſinnes lord ſo manie burden hath weakened bone ſo bruiſed ſinewes ſo ſhrunken ſtrength ſo faileth rod thy diſpleaſure hath ſo chaſtened feele helpe ſelfe appeale therfore lord thy mercie crieng prodigall vnthriftie ſonne ſaieng father haue ſinned againſt heauen thee haue mercie therefore haue mercie bicauſe haue deſerued thy mercie bicauſe thou art mercifull sith therefore thou art mercifull art thou euen verie mercie ſelfe verie miſerie behold therefore god art mercie behold miſerie thee ſhalt thou doo mercie trulie thy work canſt thou go backe thy nature thy nature uerelie take awaie miſerie haue mercie therefore mee god god art mercie take awaie miſerie depth miſerie requireth depth mercie depth ſinne requireth depth grace fauour greater depth mercie depth miſerie let therfore good lord one depth ſwallowe vp let bottomleſſe depth mercie ſwallowe vp depth miſerie amen e except lord praier thy ſeruant thou diddeſt praier cornelius caſt confuſed thy preſence act 10 verſe 6 sweet ieſus euer came thee pure ſtedfaſt faith went awaie confuſed euer deſired thy fauour went without surelie thou paſſeſt thine abundant pitie deſeruings alſo deſires praie vnto thee thou giueſt man deſire woman canaan followed thee ſhe cried made pitious noiſe ſhe mooued thy diſciples compaſſion worſhipped thee ſaid lord helpe yet wouldeſt thou anſwere yet ſhee truſting thy mercie praied againe ſaieng lord helpe unto whoſe importunitie thou diddeſt anſwere ſaieng good take childrens bread caſt vnto dog lord would haue beene confounded haue gotten awaie theſe thy word yet woman continue ſtill praier ſaid truth lord thou ſaieſt meete caſt childrens bread vnto dog yet lord dog doo eate crums fall childrens table thou lord reioicing hir great conſtancie didſt ſaie woman great thy faith vnto thee thou deſireſt therefore ſweet mercifull lord ieſu thou diddeſt vouchſafe accept heare praier cornelius woman canaan ſo hartilie beſeech thee heare humble praiers make daie night thee onelie thou ſhouldeſt deliuer bodilie oppreſſions alſo ſpirituall power diuell mortall life may come thy bleſſed preſence euerlaſting kingdome thou reigneſt god father holie ghoſt amen g giue eare ô lord let ſorrowfull complaint go foorth vnfeined lip come thee mouth may shew foorth woorthie praiſe thy name pſalme 17 verſe 1 thy praiſe great thing lord proceedeth fountaine whereof ſinners drinke glorious praiſe mouth ſinner deliuer therefore lord waie ſinners tongue ſhall magnifie thy righteouſneſſe lip mouth ſhall ſhew foorth thy praiſe thou haſt key dauid ſhutteſt man openeth openeſt man ſhutteth therefore open thou lip thou haſt opened mouth infant whoſe mouth thou haſt eſtabliſhed thy praiſe trulie prophet apoſtles thy saint praiſed thee deſpiſed themſelues ſucklings extoll thy fame glorie knowe thy heauenlie celeſtiall grace thy friend ſpreading thy glorie haue conuerted innumerable ſoules ſinne vnto vertue true felicitie thy beloued haue openlie preached thy bountious gentleneſſe mercifull fauour thou ſheweſt thy deere ſonne vnto world therefore mercifull god giue true humilitie thou maiſt ſtabliſh thy praiſe mouth make one infant ſucklings may euer hang pap thy wiſdome thy pap lord better wine thy wiſdome better rich make one thy friend beloued may conſtantlie abide thee mouth voice may among ſucklings extoll ſet foorth thy praiſe ſaieng ſinging ozanna higheſt amen filthie vncleane thee ô lord thou therefore ſprinkle iſope shall cleane thou wash shall whiter ſnowe pſalme 51 verſe 7 sope lord lowe herbe hot good ſauour ſignifieth nothing elſe thine onlie ſonne ieſus chriſt humbled himſelfe vnto death euen vnto death croſſe heate feruent loue loued v waſhed v ſinnes bloud alſo redolent ſweet ſauor beneuolence righteouſneſſe hath repleniſhed world therefore iſope ſhalt thou holie father ſprinkle thou ſhalt powre vpon vertue bloud thy deere ſonne chriſt faith ſhall dwell loue ioined ſhall imitate followe humilitie paſſion ſhall cleanſed mine vncleanneſſe ſhalt thou waſh mine owne teares flowe loue thy ſonne chriſt ſhall ſigh till wearie ſhall water bed euerie night teares ſo ſhall ſwimme lord ſhalt thou waſh ſhall whiter ſnowe amen n euerie one ſaith lord lord shall enter kingdome heauen doth father heauen matth 7 verſe 21 thy heauenlie father beleeue thy beloued ſonne whome thou haſt ſent thy beleeue whome thou haſt ſent come fleſh thy imitate keepe ſaieng thy alſo ſhould heare thou ſpakeſt heauen ſaieng welbeloued sonne whome delight heare giue therefore heauenlie father ſtedfaſt faith ſtrong faith yea ſuch faith tribulation vexation perſecution may cauſe denie thy son thou haſt ſent may pure conſtant faith confeſſe come fleſh redemption world may imitate folowe may keepe ſaieng deliuered ſinnes raiſed againe iuſtification giue alſo holie father perfect hearing corrupt hearing may teaching holie ghoſt heare thee prophet apoſtles pen euangeliſts mouth thy spouſe catholike church whome thou ſaiedſt ſend comforter euen ſpirit ſhall leade truth grant lord ſpirit none ſaie ieſus lord thy holie ſpirit amen sacrifice god troubled ſpirit contrite humble hart ô god shalt thou deſpiſe pſalme 51 verſe 17 broken troubled ſpirit broken troubled fleſh pleaſeth thee lord fleſh broken vexed becauſe hath carnall thing deſireth elſe feeleth ſelfe thing hateth ſpirit broken vnquieted fault becauſe hath offended againſt god loueth ſoroweth hath ſinned againſt maker redeemer hath regarded ſuch good louing father broken ſorowing ſpirit vnto thee lord ſacrifice moſt ſweet ſauour notwithſtanding hath confection moſt bitter ſpices euen remembrance ſinnes ſinnes gathered together morter hart beaten peſtle compunction made powder moiſtened water teares therof made ointment ſacrifice moſt ſweet offered thee lord thou wilt deſpiſe marie magdalen great ſinner made ſuch ointment put alablaſter boxe hir hart feared enter phariſes houſe humbling hir ſelfe thy feete ſweet lord waſhed hir teares wiped hir heare annointed moſt pretious ointment ceaſſed kiſſe surelie lord hir ſacrifice right acceptable pleaſed thee ſo thou preferredſt aboue phariſie owne ſight righteous lord great thy power great thy might declareth ſelfe moſt chieflie ſparing hauing compaſſion ſinners ſhewing v contrite humble hart thou wilt deſpiſe accept therefore ſweete lord ieſu ſacrifice praiſe proceeding broken ſorowfull hart vnperfect amend thou fault mercifull lord onlie art power doo may holie acceptable ſacrifice inflamed feruent heate thy bountious charitie may acceptable vnto thee leaſt thou deſpiſe knowe well ſhall find fauour thy ſight heereafter none thy saincts either heauen earth ſhall deſpiſe accompliſh therefore euen lord ſo oft craue thee thou wilt haue compaſſion according thy great mercie alſo thou wilt receiue ſacrifice righteouſneſſe holie oblation burnt ſacrifice good liuing calfe offered vpon thine altar croſſe may paſſe vale miſerie vnto ioie thou prepareſt loue thee amen another elizabeth e engraue thy lawes depth heart lord inſtructed thy commandements may ſerue thee feare reioice thee trembling take hold vpon thy diſcipline thing leaſt anie time thou become angrie periſh right waie amen l lord giue helpe trouble vaine helpe man thee haue ſtrength thou bringeſt vnto nothing thoſe thing trouble let ſoule ſubiect vnto thee thee proceedeth patience thou art god sauiour helper depart thee thee helth glorie thou art god helpe helpe thee amen haue broken thy fold wandered long loſt ſheepe let returne lord bicauſe haue forgotten thy commandements miſdeeds ignorance tender yeers remember lord according thy mercie haue mind thy goodneſſe lord keepe ſoule deliuer let aſhamed bicauſe haue truſted thee turne heauineſſe ioie cut ſacke ſorowes gird gladnes glorie may ſigne vnto thee ſhall greeued z zorobabel king iuda depth thy diſpleaſure taſted thy mercie receiued mouth aggeus thy prophet ſweete comfort knowledge thy fauour grace yea thy determination deſtroie whole kingdome heathen thy right hand preſerue thine incomparable mercie chooſe ſeale thy ſelfe lord happie king thy goodneſſe earthlie creature could haue righteouſneſſe himſelfe moue ſuch thy compaſſion proceeded multitude thy mercy ſurmount iniquity whole world thou didſt onlie vouchſafe behold image thy ſelfe bow downe thine eies lord behold ſelfeſame certifie conſcience remiſſion ſinnes ſorowfull ſoule may reſt within send downe thy holie ſpirit remaine may become good king thy choſen ſeale ſeruant ſo graunt thy people may neuer deſerue taſt thy rod fauorable correction labour ſtudies may euer bend performance thy holie diſcharge dutie amen ariſe illuminate mind moſt benigne sauiour ſleepe anie time death leaſt mine enimies ſaie haue preuailed againſt trouble glad caſt downe haue fixed hope thy mercie enter iudgement thy ſeruant liuing creature ſhall iuſtified thy ſight euer looke vpon lord ſhalbe right hand mooued hart glad tongue reioiceth yea moreouer fleſh ſhall reſt hope amen b thou vnto lord daie time defendour night ſeaſon place refuge thou maiſt ſaue thou art ſtrength vnto thee flie lord god deliuer hand ſinners lawebreaker wicked dooer thou lord art patience thou art hope euen youth thee confirmed euen mother wombe thou art protector thee ſhall ſong euer euer amen e euer tongue ſhall telling thy rich mercie woonderous work lord thou haſt cauſed paſſe fire water led freſh place thou haſt giuen ſoule life haſt ſuffered feete fall according multitude ſorowes thy comfort haue made ſoule merrie ſoule like sparowe taken fowler ſnare thou haſt deliuered life death hand bloud may pleaſe thee lord light liuing amen thou art iuſt lord thy commandements true thy way mercie truth iudgement lord mindfull take reuengement ſinnes remember mine offence neither offence father becauſe haue obeied thy precept giue hart vnderſtanding ſet thy feare alwaies mine eies may obedient word deed thought thy lord giue vnto power thy holie ſpirit rule gouerne thy people committed charge godlie feare knowledge thy word may vnto example godlineſſe vertue praiſe thy holie name amen h heale lord ſhall healed ſaue ſhall ſaued life cleaueth vnto earth quicken according thy word according thy mercie releeue keepe teſtimonies thy lip helpe lord ſo ſhall ſafe hencefoorth ſtudie thy righteouſneſſe thy mercy manie lord according thy word reſtore health amen regina r regard praiers thou god life leaue thought euill deliuer wicked man let foote pride come vpon vaineglorie giue take ſinfull luſts let deſire vncleanneſſe take hold vpon giue ouer vnſhamefaſt obſtinate mind correct thy mercie thy hand commit amen e enter thy iudgements table hart deſtroie mine affection thy loue ſend thy wiſdome holie heauens ſeate thy maieſtie ſhe may labour may knowe thing acceptable thee may iudge people righteouſlie diſcerne betweene good euill g gratious lord thou art moſt high god aboue earth longſuffering much mercie ſorowing ſinnes man thy great goodneſſe haſt promiſed penitent remiſſion ſinnes lord haue ſinned mine iniquitie multiplied aboue ſands ſea hope life becauſe haue ſtirred thee anger multiplieng offence thee lord truſting thy mercie bow knee hart beſeeching thee thy goodneſſe deſtroie togither mine iniquitie dead whoſe ſoules body neither praiſe thanke thee ſorowfull hart thirſtie ſoule aſcribe praiſe vnto thee lord powre praiers thee require mercie thy ſight ſaue vnwoorthie reſerue eternall puniſhment mee thine owne ſake aſke praiſe thee day life amen illuminate hart lord light thy word leade lord thy waie ſhall enter thy truth print thy feare hart may reioice thee let thy word lanterne vnto foot lampe light vnto path ſo ſhall erre right waie walke like pure wiſe virgin vpright hart chaſte mind cleane conſcience ſingle eie thee daie euermore amen n neuer ceaſe call vpon thee moſt mightie god hoſts ſitteſt vpon cherubins haſt dominion ouer kingdom earth thou madeſt heauens thing comprehended bow downe thine eare heare open thine eies behold ſaue mee hand mine aduerſaries ſuffer euill happen vnto people may knowe thou alone art god amen asſiſt mee lord god thy heauenlie grace renew mee right ſpirit may receiue ſtrength ableneſſe doo thy righteous ſtand againſt aſſaults wilie satan may haue place mee old man beare bodie may crucified dailie die deſire ſinne errour worldlie vanity may vtterlie deſtroied may euermore renewed ſpirit mind life sauiour chriſt may alwaies appeare whome father holie ghoſt honour triumph glorie euer euer amen verſicle euen euer vouchſafe lord thy deere ſonnes ſake heare humble petition anſwere receiue praiers ſaie god thy truth mercie pardon mine offence grant mee thy grace collect emanuel lord god ieſus chriſt ſonne pure virgin marie thou art onelie ſweete ſpouſe ſoule god father moſt meeke mediatour full mercie truth waſh awaie ſinnes moſt pretious bloud thy holie paſſion make rich thy mercie faith ſo ſtrong thee aſſiſted thy grace holie ſpirit duty work life towards thee may enioie afterwards glorie thy bleſſed kingdome thy holie saint pure uirgins euerlaſting honour triumph amen praier roote ieſſe lord sauiour ieſus chriſt haſt redeemed mankind ſinne death hell thou haſt ſaid waie truth life waie doctrine commandements example truth promiſes life reward praie thee thine ineffable loue wherewith thou haſt vouchſafed wholie beſtowe thy ſelfe ſecuritie thou wilt ſuffer euer ſtraie thee bicauſe thou art waie anie time diſtruſt thy promſes art truth performeſt whatſoeuer thou promiſeſt neither let reſt anie thing bicauſe thou art eternall life without nothing ought deſired neither heauen earth thee learne ſure expedient paſſage vnto true helth wander longer laberinth world thou haſt exactlie taught beleeue doo hope ought reſt thee wee learne wee firſt adam vnfortunatelie borne thee aſſured hope health faith thee thou art onlie brightneſſe giueſt light men trauelling darke deſarts world nothing profound dimneſſe wherby neither ſee calamity frō whence ought ſeeke remedie euill thou vouchſafedſt deſcend earth diſdainedſt take nature vpon thee thy doctrine thou mighteſt ſhake dimneſſe ignorance thy commandements mighteſt direct feete waie truth peace example thy life thou haſt ſhewed v waie immortalitie thy ſteps haſt reſtored v plaine eaſie profitable waie vneeuen rough waie thou art made vnto v waie knoweth error leaſt ſhould wearie thou haſt vouchſafed vphold v thy benignitie great ſure promiſes wearie accounting himſelfe redie thy ſteps enter thy heauenlie heritage therefore whileſt iournie thou wouldeſt ſure hope vnto v ſteed ſtaffe vnto v wherewith ſuſtained neither thy goodnes content knowing weakneſſe fleſh meane comfort thy ſpirit dooeſt ſo refreſh ſtrength whereby run cheerefullie thou made vnto v waie dooeſt driue awaie errour ſo truth dooeſt thou take awaie diſtruſt finallie made life vnto v dooeſt reuiue dead ſinne liue thy ſpirit releeuing thing vntill reſurrection mortalitie vtterlie aboliſhed may alwaies liue thee thee chriſt ſhall v eternall life knowe father sonne holie ghoſt one true god thorough faith behold onlie glaſſe riddle ſeeing felowlie glorie lord wee ſhall tranſformed ſame image therefore beſeech thee moſt mercifull sauiour thou wouldeſt nouriſh faith thy ſeruant may neuer wauer thy heauenlie doctrine increaſe obedience neuer turne thy precept fortifie conſtancie entring thy ſteps pulled backe terrour intiſements satan ouerthrowne may perſeuere thee art true waie vnto death build ſure truſt accuſtomed thy promiſes neuer waxe old exerciſe vertue forgetting thoſe thing paſt may cōtinuallie ſtriue com perfecter accept contrite hart woonted ſacrifice thy delight oblation theſe petition granting ſumme requeſts blot mine offence thine owne ſake increaſe thy grace may thing carrie vpright ſwaie equall iudgement gouerne thy people light thy word feare thy lawes dailie die ſelfe liue led thy ſpirit fearing nothing thee nothing greater mightier louing nothing beſide thee nothing beloued glorieng nothing thee art glorie saint requiring nothing beſide thee art beſt deſiring nothing thee art full perfect felicitie father holie ghoſt aboue ſtarrie firmament whome praiſe euer amen king heaſt god familiar ſpeech qveene collected holie pſalmes good king david learnedlie expounded theodore beza wherein almightie god diuine ſort ſpeaking vnto hir maieſtie ſometimes vnto dauid though ſo myſticall maner doth firſt declare 1 mercifull prouidence preſeruing hir gratious goodneſſe exalting hir crowne exhorting hir therewithall humblie acknowledge ſouereigntie ouer earthlie power worſhip secondlie 2 deſcribeth vnto hir grace woorthie property required bee euerie godlie prince wiſe gouernour maintenance glorie eſtates thirdlie exhorteth hir maieſtie 3 faithfull diſcharge hir office dutie feare ſeruice increaſe vertue ſuppreſsing vice ſo ſhewing commodity inſue thereby hir hir people fourthlie promiſeth 4 onelie hir continuall defender againſt hir enimies alſo bleſſe hir hir realme manie large ſweet comfortable benefit corporall celeſtiall make hir partaker ancient mercy promiſed long ſince hir father dauid namelie vpon condition finallie ſhe perſeuere 5 perfect loue due obedience hir ſpirituall ſpouſe chriſt ieſus ¶ firſt chapter heast elizabeth thou uirgin mine king daughter faireſt among woman moſt full beautie maieſtie attend litle heaſt marke ſhall ſay thou art daughter deede daie haue begotten thee eſpouſed thee thy king christ sonne crowned thee gift appointed thee qveene reigne vpon holie mount zion behold onlie lord full right authoritie men doo ſelfe gouerne empire kingdom greateſt king moſt mightie monarch whole world euen moſt high god celeſtiall father haue elected thee choſen veſſell high honour price houſe end haue mightilie preſerued thee miraculouſlie deliuered thee ſo manie ſo great danger laſt haue brought thy ſubiection people ouer whome thou haſt authoritie none haue conſecrated thee vnto ſelfe annointed thee holie oile queene mother nurſſe people iſrael onlie haue giuen thee moſt excellent goodlie heritage thou poſſeſſeſt peace thee ſaie daughter elizabeth haue raiſed vp choſen pure perfect virgin reſt whole people becauſe loued thee moſt deerelie aboue ſo thou maieſt worthilie reioice glorie thy dignitie honour yet ſingular power benefit none cauſe hath pleaſed thy god exalt thee aboue others embrace receiue thee ſpeciall grace fauour therefore intent might alwaies vſe thy diligent ſeruice faithfull miniſterie dutifull endeuour great buſineſſe high office queene kinglie gouernour thy power receiued people may defended cheriſhed behold haue ordeined lampe thee mine annointed powred foorth vpon thee bountie none able compared vnto thee yea haue adorned thee moſt bountifullie beautifullie gift grace incomparable ſhall neuer taken thee deere daughter conſider diligentlie thy ſelfe awhile maner huſband thou art coupled conioined vnto learne alone thy ſpouſe chriſt mine onlie son meane daie married thee requireth thee namelie thou ſhouldeſt forget thine owne nation thy father houſe worldlie thing thou art come vnder authoritie familie ſpirituall ſocietie thy heauenlie bridegroome therefore ſaie bee wiſe qveene bee learned thou iudge earth emperours king potentats world thou maiſt giue place vnto lord reſigne vp vnto honour glorie power giue ſaie vnto god god king king euen verie god glorie maieſtie dominion due vnto name fall downe worſhip doo vnto poſſible reuerence giueth power people bleſſeth prince ſubiect continuall benefit reioice feare trembling kiſſe ſonne chriſt thy ſpouſe betimes leaſt angrie thou ſuddenly periſh wrath ſhall flame foorth worſhip lord ſaie due worſhip truſt alone ſhe wholie dependeth vpon mercie fauour protection ſo ſhalt thou bleſſed thy throne ſhall neuer ſhaken confeſſe hath ſet thee ſo high place far aboue men thy ſubiects remember alſo moſt high god preſent thee thine aſſemblie state senatours haue debarred ſelfe mine authoritie ouer neither preſent idle beholder iudge alſo knowe aſſuredlie honoured deed name god whereby mine authoritie ouer men declared albeit haue embraced ſpeciall fauour father child yet thinke haue exempted power authoritie though prince magiſtrates yet knowe mortall euen men yea remember ſhall die ſhall ſtand iudgementſeate euen euerie moſt vile poore man render giue accompt ſtewardſhip thing done fleſh cap ii beware therefore yee abuſe authoritie giuen vnto vnder certaine lawes condition see directlie followe way haue appointed walke take heed drawne awaie right hand left error wicked forſake lawes ordinance fall god haue exalted ſure haue placed ſeate vpon condition giuen vnto plaine charge commandement ſhould decree iuſt lawes execute iudgement right equitie without fauour parcialitie regard anie partie ſhould deuiſe manner godlineſſe ſhew ſelues openlie freends vertue foe vice weigh nothing equitie iuſtice balance verie lawe nature doth require ſhould releeue ſpoiled violence defend fatherleſſe mainteine poore againſt iniuries rich deliuer miſerable hand wicked ſee diligentlie wringing worldling cruell extortioner exerciſe tyrannie oppreſſions continuallie ouer godlie feeble people moreouer ſhould make diligent inquiſition bloudſhead murther reuenge carefullie ſearch wickedneſſe abhomination condemne execute traytor murtherer theefe pull praie teeth ſpoiler breake downe power wicked mightie one deſtroie worker iniquitie vtterlie roote ſinne vngodlineſſe earth euen ſuch conſpire againſt ſoules righteous abuſing iuſtice colour lawe gather themſelues together ſit condemne innocent bloud trouble heritage finallie diſordered ſtate world ſeemed vtterlie void iuſtice haue ſet thee daughter people laſt reſtore ſame ancient moſt right godlie order iuſtice religion faith thou ſhouldeſt defence fortreſſe among people followe thy god great cheerefulneſſe haue thy delight fullie fixed lawes ſtatutes daie night well exerciſed therein behooueth thou maiſt able knowe ſift trie way men iudge betwixt right wrong cap iii harken therefore vnto daughter take heed thou haue nothing ſtoole wickedneſſe throne iniquitie tyrannicall domination forgeth wrong lawe adioineth authoritie moſt wicked decree haue fellowſhip agreeable thee bicauſe wicked doo wander euerie ſide woorſt men exalted higheſt place honour office commonweale therfore aduiſe counſell thee betimes expell thruſt thy court houſe vnwoorthie vngodlie men flatterer paraſites ieſters atheiſts reuengers bloud place woorthie godlie roomes may ſit among prince people aſſiſtant vnto thee make much feare lord let thy delight vpon saint earth carefull alwaie preſerue vertuous exalt beſt moſt woorthie perſons call ſuch thy ſtates dignitie senatours counſellers iudges magiſtrates vnder thee graue wiſe learned godlie zealous truth gelous thy renowme aduance ſuch men ſaie honour office vnder thee good conſcience ſound religion vpright life ſuch painfull watchman diligent ſtewards make iuſt decree execute good lawes euen ſuch care nothing knowe dutie therefore moſt willing doo dutie hating vnfeinedlie maner vice louing intirelie maner vertue come foorth ſaie deere daughter come foorth thou moſt beautifull woman fairer child men thou ô qveene uirgin ſaie incomparable eloquence grace ſpeech come foorth thus ſhew thy beautie ſo full maieſtie grace thy gouernement paſtorſhip may want neither integritie vprightneſſe taking counſell neither wiſdome performing thine interpriſes doo thing prudentlie proſperouſlie caried vpon triumphant chariot euen word god wiſe vertuous gouernour directing let truth mercie iuſtice equitie drawe round thy dominion thus ſhalt thou declare thy ſelfe bountifull daughter prince woorthie gouernour vſing thy power neither weakelie idlelie thou gouerne people moderate equitie puniſh mine enimies thine ſeueritie iudgement ſhee alſo ſitting vpon thy throne maieſtie two pillers mercie truth ſeene ſtand ſupport thee cap iiii ô qveene ſurelie performe couenant begun thy father david choſen man vnto thee alſo daughter indue alſo eternitie make thy kingdome perpetuall heauen continuallie defend thee certaine ſpeciall power together people land haue choſen giuen vnto thee hand ſaie ſhall eſtabliſh thee mine arme ſtrengthen thee ſo enimie ſhall ouercome thee ſubtiltie anie wicked man oppreſſe thee force yea though thou ſhalt want manie thoſe moſt mightie enimies domeſticall forreine ſhall reſiſt thee ſacred qveene thy godlie proceeding yet aſſure thee enterpriſes ſhall vaine fruſtrate thou thoſe miſeries moſt greeuous battell wherewith thou maiſt ſeeme vexed ſhalt ſuffer detriment contrariwiſe ſame meanes plaine experience thou louing righteouſnes hating whatſoeuer againſt armed ſharpe arrowes ſword word ſhalt onlie therwith wound heart thine enimies caſt downe ground tread vnder thy feete alſo bring maruellous thing paſſe name thy mightie power lord iehova reuenger roiall dignitie defender david ſeruants poſteritie deſtroie would oppreſſe thee thy face ſlaie thine enimies fill ſhame confuſion mercie ſhall neuer faile thee truth ſhall neuer forſake thee thou truſting fauour ſhalt lift vp thine head moſt high crowned euerlaſting glorie cauſe thee haue one hand vpon ſea another vpon flouds thou ſhalt call mee thy father thy god thy ſafe tower place thee firſt begotten daughter ſacred familie king whole world euen throne moſt high aboue others yea thou pure uirgin borne kindred ſhalt ſo highlie exalted iehova hath decreed eternitie thou ſhalt ſit glorious qveene ouer mightie people ſhalt haue rule dominiō ouer thy ſubiects without exception euen mightie iehova giue vnto thee zion kingdome ſtabilitie ouer end earth kingdome thy power ſhall ſo great enimies thou haſt excellent euident ſhall thy fame renowme nation people ſhall willinglie obedientlie offer themſelues gouerned thee infinite victory thou ſhalt haue ouer enimies vexe thee daie ſhall come thou haſt ouercome thine enimies thou ſhalt muſter thine army appeare thee make triumph alſo garment triumph ſhall holie moſt pure moſt ſhining ſaie ô qveene thou ſhalt behold multitude thy moſt choſen yoong men beautifull virgin morning moſt heauenlie light ſhall bring foorth vnto thee powring downe hir moſt plentifull deaw vpon earth yea arme thee double edged ſword thy hand wherewith thou maiſt puniſh prophane gentile auenge crueltie proud people alſo maiſt drawe king noble bound chaines iron fetter execute iudgement appointed commanded thy lord god vpon verelie dignitie honour renowme giue thee daughter whome haue receiued fauour euen bring ſubiection vnto thy kingdome people far wide ſauing thine owne nation make horrible ſlaughter rebel traitor eueriewhere go ouerthrowe monarch ruleth ſhall rule far neere defend thee ſaie deere daughter euerlaſting mercie couenant made thy father david ſhall eſtabliſhed euer generation thy throne ſhall sunne ſhall continue moone age ſtable heauen ſelfe holie one haue ſworne mine owne ſelfe neither breake promiſe violate couenant change anie thoſe thing haue ſpoken david thy father theſe thing haue promiſed old ſaie vndoubtedlie bring paſſe thou daughter keepe commandements violate ordinance haue commanded thee order thy ſelfe thy people rule lawes haue preſcribed vnto ſhall thing good order nothing confounded yea verie foundation earth alſo ſhall firme remaine ſtable peace righteouſneſſe iudgement good thing elſe ſhall remaine ſafe ſure amongſt men neither ſuffer thy dangerous iournie perillous pilgrimage thou ſhouldeſt ſo ſtumble thou ſhouldeſt fall compelled go backe though manie doo lie wait thy deſtruction yet preuenting danger bee thy watchfull keeper ſeeing haue taken hand freelie mine owne good call thee excellent eſtate prince haue hitherto bene verie carefull defend thee people iſrael ſlumber much leſſe ſo deepe ſleepe ſuffer thee oppreſſed therefore let thing certainlie determined vnto thee bee thou comforted confirmed onlie hope diſtreſſe lord thy keeper ſhadowe thee againſt ſtormes preſent thee neuer faile thee preſent old thou returnedſt egypt bondage ſpirituall pharao ſo alſo preſent thee againſt ye heate sunne daietime againſt noiſome humor moone vſeth raiſe night ſeaſon like citie ieruſalem compaſſed round maſſie mountaines ſo lord ſtand round thee thy people truſting euerie ſide neuer forſake haue done hitherto ſo ſurelie continue defend loue vertue bind thee vnto new benefit bring paſſe thou ſhalt enioie ſtable peace ſure tranquillitie thou ſhalt ſee ieruſalem flouriſhing ſo long thou doeſt liue yea lord ſo bleſſe thee heauen moſt plentifull bleſſings power maieſtie thy counſelles enterpriſes ſhall proſper haue good ſucceſſe continuallie preſerue thee ſafe againſt diſcommodities defend thy life violence yea waie ſoeuer thou ſhalt go ride euen thy mightie maker god thee thou goeſt foorth commeſt place place onlie temporall voiage iournie euer gouerne guide thee thou ſhalt neuer laid open reproch men thy crowne ſhall neuer caſt ground thy ſelfe reiected thy fortreſſes city ſhall ſtand vnaſſaulted thy fort ſtrong caſtels hold ſhall battered laid open breach ſpoile paſſengers edge thy ſword ſhall neuer waxe blunt thy ſcepter neuer broken thy crowne caſt downe duſt thy power ſtained miniſter continuall power cauſe ioie vnto thee ô qveene take awaie courage force thine enimies ſo ſhall able ariſe ſtand againſt thy mightie power finallie league haue made thee ſhall neuer abrogated come downe sanctuarie helpe thee euen frō mount zion ſtrengthen thee danger thou calleſt vpon praier heare thy petition grant vnto thee thy hart deſireth accompliſh thy purpoſes ſo thou doubtleſſe ſhalt bee preſerued deliuered waie haue annointed thee qveene cap v thus ſaie deere daughter thou carefullie behaue thy ſelfe walke way haue commanded thou ſhalt woorthilie honored indeed name wherby mine authoritie ouer men declared thy god heauenlie father imbrace thee ſpeciall fauour deerelie beloued dooue obedient child yea ſo ſhall king haue pleaſure thy fairenes loue thy goodlie perſonage ſhall come paſſe thou ſhalt bee high fauour thy ſpirituall ſpouſe chriſt ſonne onlie meete thou ſhouldſt ſubiect thy ſouereigne lord king head vnder whoſe gouernement thou ſhalt remaine moſt honourable admirable ſingular vnſpeakeable gift grace maner people ſtrangers others euen moſt mightie moſt rich ſhall deſire ſee thee linked friendſhip thee ſhalt thou come foorth thy princelie yuorie palace ſtatelie roiall throne moſt gloriouſlie adorned gorgious garment roiall robe ſmell moſt fragrantlie yeeld ſweete ſauours odoriferous odour moſt pleaſantlie ſpred ouer thoſe men people declare ioie goodwils towards thee ſhall run preſſe togither thouſands ſee praiſe extoll thy renowmed name maieſtie crieng alowd ſaieng god ſaue qveene conclude houſe church thou ſhalt ſee thy child offſpring publiſhing promoting goſpell thou haſt borne maner vnto thy huſband chriſt flouriſhing ſpred abroad home nothing inferiour vnto thoſe thy moſt noble elder reigning ouer prouinces whole world home chieflie euen heauen mee thy father thy huſband chriſt thou ſhalt ſit right hand beautified gift moſt richlie beedecked ouer glorious garment broidered gold hauing crowne moſt pure gold vpon thy head euen thus roiallie ſaie ſhalt thou uirgin ô qveene deerlie beloued daughter ſet king thy huſband ſuch ſo pretious apparell uirgins thy companion waiting vpon thee going thee vnto moſt glorious king king whileſt altogither moſt great triumph mirth ioie reioicing ſhall enter higheſt manſion heauenlie paradiſe moſt holie palace enioie moſt certaine vnchangeable euerlaſting kingdome glorie dignitie bliſſe felicitie ſing praiſes vnto name holie trinitie together king queenes saint uirgins elect people world euer ſhall bee world without end queenes vow ſelfetalke god collected pſalmes princelie prophet king david paraphrasticallie expounded godlie learned man theodore beza wherein queenes maieſtie moſt chriſtian maner euen dauids ſpirit ſweet word diuine ſentences firſt inciteth prepareth hir hart mind 1 deuotion secondlie acknowledgeth omnipotent power god ouer king kingdom creature 2 true rehearſall manifold benefit beſtowed vpon hir hir birth acknowledgement hir ſouereigntie come onelie lord ſhe thirdlie confeſſeth hir vnwoorthineſſe reioiceth 3 greatlie protection mercie towards hir ſince hir comming crowne fourthlie hauing wonderous work benefit done hir preſeruation 4 great admiration ſhee onelie yeeldeth condigne thanks ſame exhorteth creature heauen earth praiſe god together hir ſo laſtlie ſhe bindeth hir ſelfe ſolemne oth vow promiſe conſecrate hir life wholie true 5 worſhip ſincere ſeruice god holie obedience lawes glorie god full diſcharge hir dutie hir court realme firſt part vow rabboni hart ſo voileth within mee muſt needes burſt foorth hath conceiued euen magnifical uow qveene conſecrated king heauen himſelfe ſuch zeale feruencie penne may ſeeme able attaine vnto voice ſpeaker therefore god prepared whole hart whole hart mind ſaie haue great deſire ſpeake vnto thee preſent moſt happie eſtate call remembrance thy woonderfull work wrought brought paſſe thine almightie power conception euen vntill houre neither doo lord mouth onlie hypocrite vſe doo vnfeinedlie teſtifie thee god mine onlie maker redeemer preſeruer sauiour praiſe ſhall proceed euen deepe bottome hart go tongue go mouth ſaie bee thou longer dumbe open thy ſelfe wide ſpeake moſt excellent praiſes god make thy hartie uowes ſaie followeth ſecond part conteining foure chapter cap heauenlie father almightie maker greateſt king mine onlie god ſouereigne sauiour thou art king glorie moſt glorious king lord hoſts ſtrong valiant mightie whoſe ſeate higheſt heauens thy dominion ſtretched foorth ouer thing without exception humblie acknowledge thee verie god angel men moſt ſacred emperour moſt mightie ſpirits holie companie heauenlie army celebrate thy truth praiſe perpetuallie region aboue v yea greateſt god higheſt lord moſt magnificall king far aboue emperours king lord prince great ſoeuer euen god abraham iſaac iacob father dauid poſteritie king queenes predeceſſors art higher heauens mightie monarch whole world hauing nothing made heauen earth thing therein thine almightie power guiding preſeruing ruling ſame ſtate kingdom creature people dwell world reſeruing thy power authoritie lord lowe ſecret part earth deepe bottom sea high top mountaines reigning euer full maieſtie power authoritie moſt gloriouſlie triumphantlie eternall euerlaſting kingdome whereas kingdom trulie tranſitorie ſubiect deſtruction thy kingdome onlie god confeſſe limited anie bound ſubiect anie tearme yeares time alwaies endureth one vnchangeable eternitie eternitie whoſe throne euer euer haſt raiſed kingdome thy ſelfe among thine angel people heauen earth old continue alwaie moſt ſtable firme vnmoueable thou lord onlie maiſt iuſtlie challenge vnto thy ſelfe authoritie kingdome deede ouer nation vpon earth art moſt gelous dreadfull iehova vnto whome emperours king gouernours world ſhall bow ſubmit themſelues doo homage diuine ſeruice ſcepters crownes caſt vnder thy feete dooeſt declare thy ſelfe verie terrible potentate power world cutteſt courage ſtrength glorie throwing duſt euen gardener doth twiſt proine uine cap ii therefore moſt worthilie aſcribing reſigning vp honour glorie empire kingdome rule power dominion vnto holie ſecret maruellous renoumed name thy moſt high ſacred maieſtie art father light ancient day ſauiour beleeuers onlie redeemer ſtrength glorie hope iſrael end earth euen alpha omega firſt without beginning laſt without ending ſhalt come iudge quicke dead god bleſſed euer amen according meete verie bounden dutie doo meekelie confeſſe proteſt thy perpetuall praiſe thou moſt mercifull god none beginning laie rude lumpe without ſhape ſhut vp ſecret place mother wombe didſt forme faſhion nouriſh time appointed ſet downe thy booke didſt drawe foorth darke caue wherein faſhioned broughtſt foorth bowel mother midwife verie bowel within thine owne good right authoritie becauſe thou ioining ſinewes bone togither haſt made mortall woman couered within mother wombe king queene anie beginning birth men haue one entrance life one going like manner worke thine ſurelie behold ſelfe ſo wonderfull lord ſhould vtterlie ſhew ſelfe moſt ſenſeleſſe vnthankefull vnleſſe praiſe thee ſame confeſſe thy work exceeding maruellous deede ſeeing doo perceiue thing ſo manifeſtlie ſoone alſo thy workemanſhip came foorth reaſonable creature world receiued like aire men committed vnto thee creator time thou didſt declare thy ſelfe god cauſedſt looke vp vnto thee hang yet mother breaſts euen verie cradle ſwadling clout god thou hadſt ſpeciall care regard ouer tookeſt hand fatherlie foſter gouerne ſo manie yeares ago leade guide tender yeares vnto daie euer ſince borne ſaie thou god haſt defended danger ſtrong floure youth neither haſt thou forſaken middle age wilt truſt graieheaded mine inlightener thou haſt taught inſtructed knowledge thee childhood hitherto therefore haue depended wholie vpon thee alone vpon thee ſaie excellent father haue ſet hope euen mine infancie doo ſo ſtill euen vnto mine old age cap iii neither hath thy prouidence mercie towards ceaſed anie tune ſurelie thou haſt made ſingular euerlaſting example thy fauour mercie men thou beholding alwaies thy pleaſant countenance obſeruing continuallie thine heauenlie eie iniurie ſoeuer offered haſt onelie woonderfullie comforted preſerued trouble alſo oftentimes moſt miraculouſlie ſaued deliuered mee moſt great manifold miſeries imminent peril multitude mightie enimies wherewith haue beene aſſaulted enuironed vexed afflicted perſecuted turmoiled tender age yea ſo tenderlie god haſt thou loued mee thou haſt ſuffered intrapped thouſands aduerſaries roſe vp againſt ſaieng hart hir god helpe hir iudge mine innocencie glorie ſhield valiant champion thou haſt thy ſelfe ſmitten downe mine enimies brought ſafelie diſtreſſe lift vp head aboue mine aduerſaries thou haſt deliuered life ſaie foorth preſent doores death ſtaied teares mine eies eſtabliſhed feete fall temptation ſo walked ſafe ſound thee among liuing praiſed thee liue praiſe thee may onlie thanke thee deliuerer haſt cauſed thus taſte feele enioie moſt comfortable ſweetneſſe thy goodneſſe mercie fauour though forſaken men moſt mightie together neereſt friend mee contempt though ſuperſtitious aduerſaries ſaie heaued vehementlie againſt great violence ſought caſt downe laie mine honor duſt yet haſt thou god thine owne hand repulſed driuen thoſe mine irreligious foe ſo wickedlie reſiſted thy purpoſe confuſion face haſt exalted higheſt degree dignitie wherefore great cauſe continuall ioie hartie reioicing haſt thou lord giuen vnto thine handmaid acknowledge ſelfe mightilie miraculouſlie preſerued thy power doubtleſſe thou haſt woonderfullie deliuered deed thy qveene annointed thee haſt heard higheſt sanctuarie granted vnto requeſted praiers put truſt neither chariot horſes men munition onelie remembred thy name called vpon thee trouble lo thou ô king heauen haſt heard neceſſities giuen hart deſire accompliſhing purpoſes required thing onlie thee might eſcape aliue ſafe perſecution thou haſt onelie ſtrengthened comforted zion placed thy dominion empire ſafetie alſo haſt granted vnto life ſhall neuer faile bicauſe onelie ſet hope ſtill thee power remaineth oftentimes good experience haue prooued yea thou moſt excellent father haſt done notable worke woorthie bee ſet foorth writing poſteritie limmed gold euerlaſting memorie bicauſe lord thou haſt deſpiſed praiers teares thy moſt miſerable people thy holie throne haſt looked downe vpon heare mourning priſoners thy perſecuted member looſe foorth bond fetter whoſe life vtterlie deſpaired zion againe thy name lord thy praiſes ſaie ieruſalem might publiſhed miniſterie daie manie nation people running together worſhip thee haſt ſhewed thy ſelfe much glorious therein anie time therefore god art indeed gouernor lord ouer people heauen earth thou art god peculiar right mine onlie honor ſo great glorie haue attained thy defence ſaluation ſo bright glittering honour wherewith thou haſt crowned may woorthilie triumph thee thus preſerued deliuered thee alſo condignelie celebrate daie wholie thee banner diſplaied haſt ſo gratiouſlie granted petition thine handmaid namelie thou lord euer mindfull thy promiſe word force euer prouiding thine owne onlie glorie didſt ſo mercifullie miraculouſlie preſerue danger rebuking euen king prince ſake ſo pretious deere bloud thy ſight none ſhould touch thine annointed doo anie harme time appointed thee thou allowing iuſtifieng commending innocent others maliciouſlie condemne guiltie wickedneſſe didſt moſt faithfullie freelie performe thy promiſes towards changing miſerable eſtate bliſſe didſt bring foorth glad ioifull thou hadſt appointed thine elect handmaid choſen ſeruant gouerne thy people affaire kingdome cap iiii wherefore humblie acknowledge thou almightie god raiſeſt vp abiects exalteſt miſerable dunghill place among prince people ſomtime laiedſt helpe vpon one mightie didſt exalt one choſen people father david thy ſeruant meane thou tookeſt ſheepfold thy holie oile didſt annoint broughteſt feed thy people inheritance iſrael euen thou god ſaie ſelfeſame good god confeſſe haſt alſo conſecrated elizabeth thy ſelfe gouerne thy people ouer whome thou dooeſt chieflie rule haſt vouchſafed like fauour great mercie call priſon palace appoint prince paſtor feede poſteritie iacob moſt deere people iſrael ſpirituall food thine eternall word preferment lord promotion knowe come neither eaſt weſt ſouth north neither haue well perceiued mine owne power exalt ſelfe mount vp ſo great miſerie ſo high dignitie thou king god euen thou moſt iuſt gouernour thing bringeſt paſſe mightie thing farre paſſing condition mankind ruleſt ſtate kingdom alone belongeth whoſe power authoritie caſt downe thou wilt exalt pleaſeth thee haſt exalted mee thine handmaid giuen vnto thine abſolute authoritie ouer great prince people england ſhould gouerne verie magiſtrates common thereof direction thy word wiſdome counſell yea take thee record lord againſt ſlanders men neuer deſired honour though deſerued neither laboured ſhould brought vnto dignitie proud promoted thee thervnto doo ſo much thinke reioice brought kinglie office bloud birth mine owne endeuour power alwaies haue ſtill confeſſe humblie acknowledge thy glorie thou onlie lord redeemer
