sauiour vpon whome earneſtlie call ſet mine eies time pleaſed thee heare didſt vouchſafe embrace thy ſpeciall grace fauour beſtowe ſo great benefit vpon firſt chooſe take onelie reſt people exalt aboue others conſecrate mee thy ſelfe annoint thy holie oile qveene realme anie deſert mine ſaie onlie bicauſe ſo pleaſed thee vſe ſeruice endeuour ſo weightie buſineſſe defend thy people power receiued thee finallie thou heauenlie king fauouring thine handmaid deſerued didſt richlie apparell mee roiall robe ouer cloathedſt beedeckedſt ſtatelie garment brodered gold pretious ſtones vpon daie ſettedſt regall throne cauſedſt moſt gloriouſlie come foorth yuorie palace coronation accompanied manie noble prince goodlie uirgins bearing diademe crowne pure gold vpon mine head time alſo thou madeſt moſt fragrant odour ſweet garment ſo ſpread ſelfe nothing pleaſant vnto beholder vpon happie daie ſo continuallie euer ſince doo runne together preſſe great multitude vnto ſee declare thankefull hart thee good willes beare toward thee euermore crie lowd voice ioifull hart vttering foorth praiſe thy name great comfort theſe ſuch like hartie praiers vnto thy maieſtie mee ſaieng god ſaue qveene god ſaue queene elizabeth may iuſtlie ſaie moſt excellent father daie deede wherein thou haſt chieflie ſhewed thy mercie vnto daie thou didſt beget deere daughter vnto thy ſelfe vpon daie thou didſt ſo gratiouſlie annoint thy miniſter queene deliuer thine afflicted church reigne vpon thy holie mount zion declare nation woonderfull work thou haſt done thy people iſrael doo preſent go therefore ſoule returne thy reſt take thine eaſe ſeeing ſo notable change thine eſtate happilie wrought lord hath well deſerued thereby euerlaſting praiſe mercie third part conteining three chapter cap lord god thy ſinfull ſeruant thou haſt thus mindfull haue deſerued others haue leaſt deſerued thy moſt vnworthie handmaid thou ſhouldeſt thus regard exalt ſo high dignitie manie others thou haſt annointed oile gladneſſe fellowes ſet moſt pretious diademe vpon head thou makeſt ſit higheſt place dignitie eſtate far aboue men ſubiects yea thou god art lord whole earth haſt brought ſubiection people lie neere vnto ouer whome haue authoritie haſt honoured deede heauenlie name whereby thine authoritie ouer men declared thou haſt crowned ſaie great glorie honour cauſing renowme fame ſpread far neere yea thou haſt made nothing inferiour potentate world ordeined mee lord ouer work thine hand ſouereigne wiſe ſo thou cauſeſt ſerue dutifullie thou king god haſt powred foorth vpon confeſſe thy bountie grace none able compared vnto mee thou haſt cauſed king queenes come far bring preſents rich gift vnto thou haſt made honourable euen ſtrange people whome euen moſt mightie rich honouring haue doo deſire greatlie friendſhip fauour thou haſt preuented thy bleſſings without anie aſking giuen people inheritance end earth poſſeſſion surelie moſt pleaſant place moſt beautifull portion inheritance fallen vnto thee lord art portion reward alone allſufficient thou art haſt giuen moſt large excellent heritage planted moſt fat wealthie place whoſe power may worthilie glorie dignitie honour thy ſingular benefit none cauſe onlie hath pleaſed thee receiue thy ſpeciall fauour ſurelie cauſe ſhould aſcribe atteining kingdome mine owne worthineſſe although called oft vpon thy name ſhould imagine haue reſiſted ſo manie ſo mightie people mine owne power ſtrength neither truſting mine owne bowe ſword haue obteined ſo manie victory driuen awaie mine enimies thou thy ſelfe lord haſt done ſtrength thine owne arme onlie becauſe ſo pleaſed thee ſaie thine owne meere mercie goodneſſe preſerue deliuer people cap ii neither hath thy mercie ceaſſed heere god hath failed euer ſince comming crowne gouerne afterward thy wiſdome grace miraculouſlie preſerue defend thy princelie power mine enimies viſible inuiſible domeſticall foraigne hitherto haſt thou bene vnto moſt ſafe refuge moſt ſure tower againſt power satan oh great maruellous thing ſee thou god haſt brought paſſe thine vnworthy ſeruant thy mightie power wanted ſuch rebelled againſt reſiſted thy power ordinance yet doo ſee ſelfe ſufficientlie armed thee continuallie ſharpe arrowes wherewith wound verie hart mine enimies ſo caſt downe moreouer long often haue ſonnes men laboured greatlie diſtaine mine honour reioicing perſiſting vanitie ſuperſtition ſecret wicked counſell haue taken bring vngodlie thing effect againſt thou lord well knoweſt haue prooued ſhe againſt ſuperſtitious enimies haue intended theſe euils ſhe againſt haue inuented dailie doo inuent wickedneſſe ſhall neuer able bring paſſe thou lord haſt mercie vpon made fruſtrate deuiſes deſires craftie cruell enimies eſtabliſhed throne according office authoritie thou haſt giuen might iuſtlie puniſh infidelitie thou haſt ſcattered people delight war cauſed runnagates turne back vnto directing owne ſwords light vpon owne neck owne dart againſt face thy wrath lord thou haſt caſt vngodlie flaming fire vtterlie deſtroied conſumed poſteritie heate thy furie proudlie roſe vp againſt thee thine annointed yea thou haſt cauſed reuenged heathen breake mine enimies aſunder iron rod cruſh peeces like potſhards earth mine hand ſaie hath taken mine enimies god thy power thou wilt bring paſſe right hand ſhall apprehend hate without cauſe vndoubtedlie knowe thou dooſt hate loue tenderlie euen thou haſt ſuffered mine enimies triumph ouer verelie hoped haſt made ſtand faſt ſure thy defence whereby knowe thou wilt alwaies care god god ſhall ſaie uerelie doo greatlie reioice thou haſt ſo great fauour embraced euer preuenting praiers giuing helpe vnto hir called vpon thee mind free euill imagination elſe thou wouldeſt haue heard reſtored life good loſt thou haſt done calling hartilie vpon thy name chieflie mine aduerſities thou haſt deliuered trouble fright feares defended waſt refuge extreme danger thy mercie haſt brought paſſe onelie dailie behold traitrous enimies haue condigne puniſhments alſo people thou haſt appointed gouerned conſider thy iudgement extended vpon thoſe guiltie rebel ſuperſtitious aduerſaries prophane men ſo wilfullie reſiſt thine ordinance authoritie ſufficientlie taught example deſtruction remember feare dread reuerence due vnto thee god prince cap iii moreouer lord greatly reioice bethinke tower ſtrength ſafe hauen vnaſſaultable habitation thou haſt euer beene onlie vnto alſo vnto predeceſſours forefather king prince land ſucceeding one another order thou haſt beene honour alſo ſtrength haſt time time certaine ſpeciall power defended little iſland thou haſt choſen thy peculiar heritage giuen firſt vnto vnto poſſeſſion yea alteration change thing time ſoeuer haue fallen yet haſt thou moſt mightie gouernour whoſe kingdome euer hath beene alwaie ſhall moſt ſure ſtable permanent vnchangable vnmooueable lift vp head thine handmaid unicorne annointed thee freſh oile laden new benefit continuallie thou art ſaie whoſe power conſiſteth whatſoeuer high world euen thy might eſtabliſheth kingdom policy whereby mankind preſerued ſo alſo theſe teſtimonies thy moſt mightie power inhabitant earth conuinced doo tremble keepe ſilence peace reſtored dominion thou cauſeſt people againe doo leade liues daie night comfortable peace godlie tranquillitie wherefore thou haſt giuen great cauſe new ioie reioice thee lord god haſt thus mercifullie dealt thine handmaid eſpeciallie bicauſe thou haſt granted vnto ouercome mine enimies manie mightie ſoeuer compoſe ſet kingdome peaceable order place iuda throne iudgement iuſtice directed thy word god haue whereof glorie ſtill glorie conclude doo reioice bicauſe thou lord art louing ſhepheard feedeſt greene paſtures ſweet medowes thy word ioie ſolace making ſometime barren woman without comfort ioifull glad foſter mother manie ſpirituall child thee yea euen verie ſight mine enimies dooeſt thou moſt bountifull father prepare deintie table reaching vnto full cup thou giueſt drinke thy pleaſant ſprings cauſeſt thy goodneſſe mercie thy bountie liberalitie followe whereſoeuer become bleſſing people thy bleſſings continuallie finallie thou lord onlie thy ſingular goodneſſe haſt aſſuredlie fortified hill woonderfullie honour health peace ſecuritie dooeſt preſentlie keepe ſafetie cauſeſt quietlie lie downe take reſt thee thou dooſt ward gate city bar mightilie multiplie cheriſh thy familie citizen thou bringeſt amitie neighbor feedeſt fineſt flower wheate theſe thing verelie doo teſtifie moſt plainlie thine infinite goodneſſe power yet ſurelie nothing compariſon benefit doctrine ſaluation holie word thou haſt beſtowed vpon thy people deliuered vnto v rule lead liues godlie honeſtlie neither anie nation vnder heauen thou haſt ſo dealt v herein therfore hauing ſuch experience thy ſupport comfort ſelfe thee ſtrength ſhield hart doth reſt neither thine annointed truſt anie onelie thee giueſt power vnto prince euen bleſſe praiſe thee lord thus haſt bleſſed people thy continuall bleſſings preſent bleſſed ſtate ceaſe magnifie thee lord deliuerer declare ſet foorth people maruellous work thou god haſt done whereof ſelfe beginning life vnto houre haue good proofe experience fourth part vow conteining fiue chapter cap oh lord god excellent thy name ouer earth aduancing mee thus glorie far aboue deſerts one nothing able compaſſe ſuch great mercy euen aſtoniſhed admiration thine excellent liberalitie fatherlie prouidence ouer greatlie doo theſe ſo manie ſo great benefit binde vnto thee ſhall giue againe vnto thee thy bountie thou haſt beſtowed vpon uerelie paie onlie able namelie take hand lampe thou haſt ordeined thine annointed therein continuallie magnifie thy mercie take hand ſaie cup thankefull ſacrifice calling vpon thee name lord teſtifie openlie knowledge deliuerance honour onelie thee thoſe thing vowed vnto thee lord danger paie preſence people thou art whoſe benefit remaine aliue thou art defence tower ſauiour ſheeld refuge finallie thou art onelie haſt ſubdued people vnto therefore well deſerueſt renowme praiſe theſe victory moſt worthie right wherefore good right lord declare thy praiſes euen ſounding voice bicauſe becommeth men woman haue receiued benefit thee whome thou granteſt vſe life deliuered ſo manie danger death doo thing diligentlie continuallie labour commit memoriall thy benefit vnto others exhort accompanie dutie thankefulneſſe earneſtlie ſaie cap ii yee holie ſpirits apparitors lord maieſtie diuided innumerable garriſons go yee others praiſe ſound foorth euen moſt high heauen yee citizen zion reioice yee lord king gouernour ſet foorth praiſe far wide onlie priuatelie alſo publikelie praiſe lord ſaie infinite goodneſſe euerlaſting mercie deſerueth ſame innumerable multitude whome god hath deliuered manifold danger foorth hand enimies perſecutors praiſe lord infinite goodneſſe euerlaſting mercie deſerueth ſame acknowledge thing manie hath gathered beginning world ſcattered eaſt weſt north south ocean ſea manie wandering wretch waſte wilderneſſe ſeeking citie commodious dwell halfe dead killed famine thirſt crieng vnto thee god extreame miſeries haſt thou heard drawing foorth diſtreſſe haſt brought right waie led commodious city refuge dwell peace let theſe men therefore ſet foorth thy great mercie thee lord thy ſelfe ſhew foorth thy maruellous work men haſt thus refreſhed panting thirſt fed ſo mercifullie hungerſtarued manie alſo ſhut vp darke priſons euen darkeneſſe death chained mind ſorow body moſt ſtrictlie iron fetter worthilie confeſſe becauſe obeie thy commandements oh god engrauen mind men rather followed owne luſts wholeſome counſelles thee god notwithſtanding thou god thereby well hadſt tamed fierceneſſe hadſt brought point could find help anie thou gratiouſlie heardſt crieng vnto thee diſtreſſe deliueredſt miſerie broughtſt dongeons priſons darkeneſſe death breaking iron fetter ſunder praiſe yee therefore ſo great mercie lord declare woonderfull actes mortall men hath broken braſen gate hath daſhed peeces iron barres manie alſo driuen awaie perſecution vnto prophane babylon euen auoiding ſo much laie ſight wicked enimies confeſſe moſt dolefull ſilence euen abundance teares ſinnes ſorowes flouds euphrates mindfull zion though caried harp euen comfort ſo great calamitie yet outragiouſlie mocked derided miſerie enimie draue awaie moſt miſerable captiuitie faine hang vp vpon ſallowe tree make noiſe ſight perſecutors ſawe cauſe rather mourne ſing time place notwithſtanding lord forget euer ſeeing crueltie perſecutors good time turned awaie captiuitie mourning reſtored libertie ioie againe ſo liue ſee daie wherein babylon deſtroied hir child daſhed againſt ſtones lord hath giuen hir proſperitie vnto v deale againe haue dealt v yea lord hath armed people double edged ſwords hand wherewith may puniſh prophane gentile auenge crueltie oppreſſed alſo may drawe king noble bound chaines iron fetter euen execute iudgements appointed commanded thee lord verelie dignitie honour whome god hath receiued fauour wherefore ye glorious people vpon whome lord hath beſtowed ſo manie benefit ſee yee great quietneſſe reſt ſing triumph praiſe lord deede iſrael delight thy ſelfe ſetting foorth praiſe continuallie whoſe worke thou art newlie formed deliuered ſo manie danger death ſhall ſpeake lord furthermore owne fooliſhneſſe going waie wickedneſſe oppreſſed manifold plague diſeaſes doo dailie ſuffer reward madneſſe loathing manner meate death dore notwithſtanding thou lord diddeſt heare crieng vnto thee miſerie thou deliueredſt diſtreſſe yea thou ſpeaking one word diddeſt take awaie cauſe deadlie diſeaſe reſtoredſt health let theſe men alſo ſaie praiſe thy ſo great mercy lord publiſh thy maruellous work mortall men let offer ſacrifices praiſe vnto thee god middle multitude people ſtanding let rehearſe great ioie hath done aſſemblie cheefeſt go therefore yee people praiſe lord god together wee oppreſſed pharaos tyrannie mindfull v ſtrong force deliuered iſrael ſlauerie egypt hath giuen dominion poſſeſſed elizabeth handmaid mercie endureth euer cap iii yee people ſaie tribe kindred inhabitant earth noble ſimple rich poore clap hand praiſe moſt holie god moſt ioifull voice giue vnto lord praiſe power worſhip glorie giue honour due vnto name maieſtie lo come gouerne earth lord himſelfe reigneth amongſt gouerneth whole world iuſt righteous gouernement ruleth altogether ſcepter iuſtice truth go therefore yee yong ſtriplings old men yong child maiden matrones alſo loue feare god come praie praiſe ye name ye lord euen moſt mightie iehova together mee alone deſerueth moſt high praiſe deepe verie earth high heauens far aboue power potentate world go alſo ye damſels virgin ſtir vp ioie daie ſongs praiſe vpon timbrell lute voide wantonneſſe ſo ioie may tend glorie god onlie ſtrength celebrate daie deliuerance feſtiuail lord deliuerer ye uirgins damſels vnmaried reioice ſaie ſing vnto lord triumphant ſong praiſe lord alſo ye bride marriage ſongs glorie maieſtie ye liue ſee day flower youth conſumed flame god furie time deſolate vnmarried remaine penſife without marriage ſongs liued ſolitarie ſitting home among ſoote pot woman durſt come houſes come foorth glittering like gold ſhining like dooues white ſnowe boldlie diuide ſpoile enimie go therefore ye damſels iuda multitude uirgins ſeeing ye haue ſo great cauſe reioice ſhew ſelues vnthankfull anie wiſe praiſe lord together hymnes celebrate name ſpirituall ſongs victory goodneſſe mercie towards v come foorth yee daughter zion ſaie breake gladneſſe reioice iuſt iudgements god vpon enimies yea compaſſe zion round account hir tower conſider diligentlie hir wals bulworks ſet foorth praiſes hir peace palace ſo yee may ſpread foorth memorie thereof euen poſteritie doo let men vnderſtand god euen owne god euer hath forſaken v neither leaue v laſt minute life go therefore beſeech let v altogether praiſe lord bounden let whole companie v uirgins plaie vpon timbrel euerie ſide corner citie zion one exhorting anſwering another courſe new excellent ſongs praiſe glorie god let v magnitie mightie eternal name holie let v continuallie come lord worſhip holie ſhould rather doo giue hartie continuall thanks poſſible meanes vnto god beſides god therefore hath bound men vnto himſelfe good right hath beſtowed vpon v ſo manie peculiar benefit againe ioifull deſired ſuch teſtimonie fatherlie loue hath deliuered v ſo manie onlie danger death alſo cap iiii go alſo ye king prince gouernours iudges earth hold vp hand humblie vnto god eternall king acknowledge power ſitteth vpon moſt high heauens eternitie vpon chariot maketh terrible moſt mightie ſound cloud yee mightie monarch potentate world worſhip praiſe ye lord god together doo poſſible reuerence reioice vnto feare trembling doo ye king ye power giue place vnto lord giue vnto lord ſaie honour glorie power giue vnto lord maieſtie glorie due vnto name fall downe footeſtoole worſhip moſt holie temple holie ſeeke glorie carefullie doo chieflie becommeth prince doo god vnſpeakable fauour hath conſecrated vnto himſelfe brought moſt high ſtate dignitie aboue others ſpeciallie becommeth reioice ſet foorth thy praiſes god moſt exquiſite maner thy moſt excellent maieſtie doth ſo gloriouſlie ſhine haue receiued ſo manie rare ſingular benefit thee conception houre go deere ſoule mine inward bowel giue thanks vnto god power praiſe lord ſoule declare thy ſelfe thou art mindfull benefit honour lord woorthie vnſpeakable mercie compaſſion hath forgiuen thee thy ſinnes healed deadlie wound thereof cured thy diſeaſes borne thine infirmity redeemed thy life death preſerued thee miſerie renewed thy youth like egle liueth moſt long adorned thee ſo richlie benefit teſtimonies ſingular goodnes fatherlie mercie towards thee go therefore mightie ſpirits apparitours diligent executioner ſo ſoone ye heare ſpeake celebrate yee praiſes lord yee mightie army moſt obedient ſouldiours praiſe lord ſaie ye euen verie angel worſhip lord king praiſe ye lord work place ſoeuer dominion whatſoeuer hath breath let ſound ſet foorth glorie finallie thou deere ſoule ſet thou foorth praiſe god cap v god king euen thy handmaid annointed thankefull remembrance worthie memoriall thy woonderfull work benefit wrought ſhewed vnto continuallie doo againe meete render vnto thee acceptable ſacrifice praiſe thankeſgiuing paie vowes vnto thee haue promiſed ſecretlie among faithfull openlie whole aſſemblie thy people court thy houſe lord mideſt citie ieruſalem wherein thy power benefit thus flouriſh praiſe thee whole hart magnifie thy name euer becauſe haue experience thine infinite goodneſſe ſelfe deliuered ſo manifold danger death deſtruction neither aſhamed ſing foorth thy praiſes alſo ſongs aſſemblie mightie verie angel ſtand thine arke together angel spirit ſoules king queenes virgin creature heauen earth inceſſantlie magnifie thee palace conſecrated thy maieſtie ſing thy mercie truth becauſe thou haſt gotten vnto thee length moſt great honour thou haſt ſo maruellouſlie aboue expectation ſurelie performed vnto thou didſt promiſe thy word reſidue people dominion mother hir daughter virgin virgin cauſe repleniſhed incredible ioie comforted thy iudgments lord reioice thee ſeeing nothing ſhould ſo moue thee haſt neuertheleſſe embraced ſo great fauour mightilie alſo defended iuſt magnifie holie remembrance thee ſo great king continuallie ſitting vpon thy moſt holie throne ruleſt whole earth exalteſt thy ſelfe far aboue aloft anie end chieflie thou lord haſt conſecrated ſet ouer ſhould diligentlie exerciſe rite thy diuine worſhip among therefore delight ſelfe ſetting foorth thy praiſes teſtifie ſelfe whole life deſirous thy honour glorie whome honour glorie right belongeth god king highlie extoll thee celebrate thy name euer euer conſecrate day life ſet foorth thy glorie amplifie thy name ſongs neuer ſhall haue end thou art great lord praiſe ſufficient thee neither anie man attaine thy greatneſſe thy woonderfull work endure one generation age alone one age ſucceedeth another ſo likewiſe muſt ſome men commit memoriall vnto others vnleſſe negligent dooing dutie wherefore trulie far thy handmaid anie thing ſhould greater authoritie ſhould carefullie thinke brightneſſe thy maieſtie ſhineth vnto v verie dailie vſe thing thy deed peopleward greater comprehended admiration capacitie mortall men woman doubtleſſe lord though verie manie moſt blockiſh woonderfull thankeleſſe yet neuer wanting ſome ſhall euen againſt willes confeſſe leaſt thy terrible power euen ouer prince people world admit others ſilent vnthankefull yet neuer ceaſe declare thy greatneſſe nation moſt far ſhall heare publiſhing thy praiſes ſinging vnto thee deliuering ſauing thy power whome thou haſt choſen loued god forbid alone ſhould labour doo dutie verelie alwaies ſome aſſemblie meanes teſtifie remembrance thy peculiar goodneſſe thy moſt vndoubted promiſes namelie thou art moſt mercifull moſt readie exceeding mercie whome man may almoſt doubt whether thou ſlowe wrath prone pardon anie thing lord void thy goodneſſe naie whole world anie doth teſtifie thy clemencie euen ſelfe ſet foorth thy glorie point thou dooeſt ſuffer ſo manie generation age paſſe ſucceede world defiled ſo manie fundrie way thou dooeſt cauſe thy choſen people knowe declare experience thy dominion power ſaie publiſhers thy praiſe valiant act committing glorie thy kingdome poſteritie wherefore good right lord giue vnto thee due conuenient praiſe declare thy woonderous work euen ſounding voice may heare becommeth men thou granteſt vſe life doo diligentlie continuallie ſtill call mind multitude thy miracle woonderous work wrought conſume life day praiſing thee therefore ſo long ſhall remaine aliue ſhall ſpeciall care publiſh thy renowne ſongs praiſe would god ſongs might ſo pleſant acceptable vnto thee glad hart cheerefull mind celebrate thy ſo manie ſo great benefit beſtowed vpon far awaie god forbid ſoule euer ſhould forget lord god let rather right hand forget hir cunning plaieng inſtruments let tongue euerie one v rather cleaue roofe mouthes ſhould vnmindfull anie time abandon due deſerued praiſes belonging moſt holy glorious mightie eternall name maieſtie ye creature heauen earth agree yee vnto ſaie herevnto one hart mouth amen praiſe ye lord praiſe thou thy god ſoule amen amen fift laſt part vow diuided alſo fiue chapter cap lord god king thine handmaid appointed qveene thee ſuch maner bountifulneſſe neuer heard doo conſecrate ſong vnto thee mercie iudgement wherevnto doo vow bind ſelfe thee daie performe gouernment kingdome thou fatherlie requireſt gratiouſlie haſt commanded firſt endeuour ſelfe wholie pietie godlineſſe labour diligentlie preſerue amplifie thy church thy pure worſhip may continuallie exerciſed therein great care deuotion holineſſe poſſible go ſaie thy ſanctified houſe lord euen holie habitation thy moſt true wiſdome enter may learne thy iudgements vnderſtand thy reuealed doo vttermoſt power whatſoeuer thou requireſt commandeſt king doo doo teſtifie thee deſire nothing viſite behold thy glorious maieſtie thy sanctuarie therefore haſten ſpeedilie ſtand porch thereof taſte ſee thoſe viſible ſignes thy power maieſtie ſhewed commonlie therein doubtleſſe thy goodneſſe offereth ſelfe handled felt ſweet far life ſelfe cauſeth ſoule ſo much inflamed earneſt deſire ſeeke thy face ſee thy glorie ſet foorth thy praiſes power eſpeciallie people holie vnto thee god might aſſemble together tribe thouſands maner apointed thee powre foorth praiſes praiers celebrate thy holie name ſafetie preſeruation family nation loue fauour thy truth poſteritie yea euen ſelfe god father david gladlie go foorth multitude lead thy people woont thy holie houſe god voice ioifull praiſings thankſgiuings thoſe obſerue thy ſabaoths feſtiuall day moſt glorious vnto thee face people preſent ſelfe often thine altar onlie hand waſhed water rather purified wickednes may openlie ſtabliſh thy praiſe celebrate thy woonderfull work ſound foorth thy renowme lowd voice hart ſatiſfied fatneſſe marowe thy moſt holie delicates lead life therein ſaie god ſetting forth thy magnificence lift vp mine innocent hart hand others openlie amids whole multitude call vpon thy name wherein ſafegard nothing loue deerlie temple wherein thou haſt ſet thy ſeate glorie euen houſe thy maieſtie holie citie wherein tribunall ſeate father david left poſteritie miniſter iuſtice indifferentlie euerie one firmelie placed ſhould doo ſo ſhould ſoule ſaie thus inflamed zeale thine houſe euen conſume mee feruent deſire hartie longing ſeeke thy face iacob seeing haue experience ſo oft thy gratious goodneſſe miraculous helpe ſeeing thou lord god haſt ſet thy houſe ieruſalem thy true worſhip might diligence holilie exerciſed therein therefore god euen thine handmaid thou haſt appointed kingdome reioice praiſe thee thy ſacred sanctuarie ioine ſelfe companion thoſe doo worſhip thee trulie deuoutlie therein neither far long thence lord ſhall full ſore againſt ſome vrgent neceſſitie calling office life though abſent bodie anie time thy houſe manie time commeth paſſe reaſon change place ſo often yet make vow doo able wit wherſoeuer become cleaue vnto thee hart wholie ceaſe thinke thee meditate thy manifold benefit powred vpon yea lord thou knoweſt accuſtomed riſe midnight doo ſoundlie ſleepe ſetting aſide care ſhe euer mindfull thy ſtatutes doo watchfullie thinke may pleaſe thee keepe thy commandements woont preuent twylight morning lowd praiers yea ſo farre following example wicked lie ſnorting ſin ſecuritie contrariwiſe beholding excellent iudgements thy iuſtice crowning thy gift righteous ſeuen time daie doo celebrate thy praiſes neither doo watchman doubtleſſe ſo carefullie keepe watch diligent meditating thy heaſt commandements cap ii bicauſe lord though man increaſed neuer ſo high dignitie rich honour yet want thy wiſedome hee ſhall counted differ little nothing life brute beaſts wholie periſh doth long remaine worldlie pompe glorie power ſhall vaniſh flowe awaie like water ſpilt ground brought naught therefore number day haue time ſo may betimes applie hart vnto thy wiſedome endeuour ſelfe learne thy ſtatutes thine inſtruction taught true knowledge ioined ſuch iudgement whereby may diſcerne thing aright taſting ſauourie thing bicauſe deſire depend thy commandements fulfill thy heaſt uerelie lord meditate thy commandements continuallie applie whole mind obſerue thy way delight mind ſaie thy ſtatutes neither anie time forget thy word neither haſt thou lord heauenlie father commanded mee anie thing vnaduiſedlie thy heaſt neither thing ſhuld onlie vnderſtand lightlie conſider thou haſt wiſelie ſpoken commanded vnto ſhould obſerued kept diligence would god maners ſtate might ſo ordered thy gouernement might ſincerelie ſeeke pleaſe thee holilie walke rule doctrine preſcribed thee might moſt conſtantlie perſeuere keeping moſt carefullie thy ſtatutes verelie ſhould leade vpright blameleſſe life hart eaſe quiet mind thing ſhould go well yea meanes ſhall onelie worſhip thee rightlie purelie without following maner worſhip preſcribed thy lawe alowed thy word therefore fullie purpoſed keepe thy ſtatutes firmelie end hold waie preſcribed thy word haue choſen true waie doo prefer thing lord endeuour ſelfe ſaie pure hart cleaue faſt vnto thoſe thing approoued thy teſtimonies good purpoſe grant beſeech thee doo neuer repent direct well entred waie theſe thy precept inflame wholie great deſire true knowledge ioined iudgement wherby may diſcerne thing aright alſo keepe thy lawes well proſperitie aduerſitie vnto end life may finiſh whole courſe reigne direction thy precept mine onelie counſellers thy mercie thy truth two keeper aſſiſtants wherevpon alſo onlie truſt neither lord number haue regard whither walke right wrong waie thee haue ſearched carefullie good aduiſe waie ſhould keepe haue faſtened ſteps thoſe path thou haſt teſtified doo pleaſe thee neither haue ſtaied knowe matter ſo ſtraightwaies bent ſelfe obſerue thy commandements beene moſt willing readie accompliſh thy thing might aduance thy glorie oh loue thy doctrine surelie thou knowſt lord woont conſume whole day night meditating thy lawes doo find experience haue done vaine haue proued much wiſer thy precept mine aduerſaries labour power deſtroie great dignitie authoritie ſoeuer haue obteined thy gift wiſdome neuer forſake yea thou haſt made better learned teacher maiſters euen becauſe haue giuen ſelfe wholie man inuentions meditate thoſe thing onlie thou haſt giuen vnto v ſound learning finallie ſkilfull anie ancient becauſe bent onelie knowe thy commandements alſo keepe deede held backe feete ſhould go waie leadeth vnto euill ſhould alwaies rather hold waie thou haſt taught v thy mouth thy precept lord haue bene ſhall like burning lampe hand light ſhining ſhew waie ſhall go yea haue taught true wiſdome therefore abhor guids rule order life wicked falſe ſee moſt abſolute perfect work come end yea decree lawes man wiſdome doth ſet downe ſubiect vnto change length euen come naught onlie thy precept moſt true moſt ſtable prolonged without meaſure without 〈1 page duplicate〉 〈1 page duplicate〉 anie end wherefore wholie conſumed inflamed loue thee becauſe ſee thy word deſpiſed mine aduerſaries surelie feele thy word pleaſant ſweet mouth taſted honie yea thy precept pretious vnto anie gold iewels neuer ſo high price eſtimation doo ſtill affirme thy commandements moſt certaine perfect rule thy iuſtice truth direct equitie godlineſſe therefore vtterlie abhor thing appointed deceiue v whatſoeuer leadeth v neither anie time forſake thee turne thy lawes reſt vpon thee teacher ghoſtlie inſtructer lord thou knoweſt hate abhorre deceit ſaie embrace thy doctrine yea neuer conceiued greefe anie thing perceiue thoſe men thine mine enimies deſpiſe thy word ſo ſtubbornelie impudentlie mine eies verelie doo ſwimme teares behold generall contempt thy doctrine bold prophanation thy holie heaſts lawes thing neither would could diſſemble euen ſo oft perceiued thy glorie diminiſhed burnt ſorowe accompted ſelfe wounded reproches caſt againſt thee uerelie nothing pure thy word wherefore euen thy ſeruant doo embrace incredible loue deſire yea haue bound whole heart euer euen laſt gaſpe obſerue thy ſtatutes cap iii iam determined lord imbrace moſt great loue thoſe thing thou haſt teſtified vnto keepe thy heaſts moſt diligentlie yea ſo behaue ſelfe gouernement none ſhall worthilie complaine haue committed anie thing againſt contrarie right equitie doo beare thy heaſt hand lampe ordeined thee lighten thy perfect path waie laie vp thy word hart pretious treaſure leaſt offend thee anie leaſt thing ſincerelie doo without hypocriſie applie ſelfe fulfill thy commandements accompliſh doo vttermoſt power thing thou haſt teſtified vnto beſt knowne vnto thee witneſſe priuie thought doings doo whatſoeuer doo lord vnto whome appeale whome deceiue though would throughly knowne manifeſt vnto thee ſaie part life vnknowne vnto thee whether ſit riſe yea thou doeſt euen vnderſtand thought far thou obſerueſt narrowlie walking lieng downe neither anie thoſe thing hidden thee go thou knoweſt euen word lord tongue pronounce ſubmit ſelfe god thing therefore thy triall doo prefer conſideration thy woonderfull work word benefit others ſo great verelie able accompt ſumme reach height depth length bredth thy great mercy towards find mo ſands ſea heares head wherefore onlie refer ſelfe thee god ſaie thou maieſt throughlie prooue thine handmaid ſee hart altogether fixed vpon thee vtterlie ſearch thought write downe thy booke conſciences finallie conſider lord praie thee whether haue prouoked vngodlie giuing anie offence thou knoweſt innocent ſo preſerue thou gouerne courſe life thy counſels yea thou knoweſt lord haue neuer bent mine eies high thing entangled ſelfe willinglie great matter whereby might win ſelfe opinion excellencie aboue neither yet haue reached vnto ſuch thing aboue capacitie contrarilie vnleſſe haue bene content ſtate howſoeuer haue ſtaid mind depend wholie thee teach weaned child forget nurſſe regard mother alone vnleſſe ſaie haue ſo behaued ſelfe hitherto weaned infant let deede refuſed thee therefore according mine innocencie lord aſſiſtance thy grace proceed yea ſurelie lord according power haue begon thee ſo endeuour ſelfe end thee walke thee vprightlie ſetting confidence thee alone fullie minded continue end life without wauering faith right chriſtian feare loue thee ſtand vpright waie thy truth doo attribute onlie vnto thee lord god therefore magnifie thy name publike congregation doubt thou lord thine owne ſelfe wilt ſullie performe worke haue enterpriſed thine authoritie thine euerlaſting mercie teſtified thy word neither wilt thou knowe leaue worke vnperfect thou haſt begun ſurelie mine eies ſtill alwaies bent vpon thy goodneſſe haue appointed thy truth guide leader life yea vnfeinedlie vow make ſolemne promiſe thee thy holie angel giue poſſible diligence may throughlie knowe right waie appointed thee alſo may obſerue ſame purelie houſe realme neuer ſet doo anie wicked thing endeuour ſelfe godlines keepe hand pure iniurie wrong may ſo liue true life ſpend whole courſe peregrination ſetting foorth thy glorie cap iiii hence therefore ye wicked one may keepe precept god ſo much purelie abhor wauering wandering fro religion count thy word doctrine moſt deere pretious forſake corrupt maners neither take ſuch vnto put far author euill counſels neither embrace anie time thing knowe euill yea lord thou knoweſt carefullie haue auoided companie theſe moſt vaine men haue fled awaie theſe deceitfull dealer run another god vtterlie deteſt drinkeoffrings bloudie ſacrifice afraid euen name offer ſuch abhomination ſoule doth vtterlie abhor thou knoweſt loue righteouſneſſe holineſſe hate whatſoeuer againſt bicauſe hate thee lord art righteouſneſſe ſelfe therefore doo againe hate doo euen abhor bicauſe perceiue riſe vp againſt thee hate ſuperſtitious crue vngodlie ſaie vtterlie count greateſt enimies much leſſe ioine ſelfe vnto abide winke wickedneſſe rebellion yea fullie determine exerciſe thy power giuen vnto deſtroie wicked prophane vtterlie thy church may well purged free theſe cruell bloudthirſtie hypocrite theſe men ſaie ſpeake blaſphemie againſt thee ſo great ſo proud crueltie thoſe mine enimies ſo much thine abuſe thy holie name maieſtie thoſe ſuperſtitious men ſaie lord beare thy name hypocriſie ſhall haue mouthes ſtopped put ſilence congregation bicauſe deadlie enimies thy word holie goſpell profeſſe therefore bicauſe reſiſt thee god thy ſelfe therefore thou ſhalt carie thy hand cup full troubled wine full dreg thou ſhalt giue wicked ſucke vp drinke euen verie dreg thereof yea edge ſword cut horn wicked rebellious execute iudgement appointed commanded thee god vpon till conſumed honor dignitie thy saint may flouriſh iſrael pietie peace thoſe wicked men ſee heare doo abuſe authoritie vnder againſt good godlie caſt downe againe increaſe iuſt honour ſubtill man thruſt houſe neither ſuffer thoſe ſcoffers ſpeake deceiptfullie tarrie ſight extortioner cruell man doo ſpeedilie put execution wicked deuiſes whoſe hand full bribe thoſe vtterlie deſtroie earth bridle proud diſſolute perſons terrifie wicked ſhall lift vp horne ſo high blaſphemous word againſt thee thine annointed finallie deſtroie ſlanderer falſe accuſer ſuffer proud ambitious diſhonor thee yea painefullie without anie delaie worthilie puniſh whomſoeuer ſhall vnderſtand wicked purge holie citie lord wicked perſons contrariwiſe ſearching euerie ſide men loue truth take familiar companion counſellers vſe dooing mine affaire anie ſuch truſtie faithfull god prince doo knowe anie feareth thee keepeth thy ſtatutes ioine fellowſhip thoſe ſaie whome ſee doo worſhip thee trulie deuoutlie ioine ſelfe companion yea delight lord ſhall vpon saincts earth comfort promote ſuch excell vertue godlineſſe otherwiſe able doo little nothing profit thee neither ſuffer anie violence bee done vnto godlie anie man rebuke euen mightie prince ſakes none ſhall touch thine annointed prieſts man ſuffer hurt anie thy prophet cap v conclude ſurelie care nothing ſo much ſet peaceablie ouer kingdome haue people thy goodneſſe committed vnto inſtitute holie righteous gouernement thou granting grace caſe ſo ſtandeth bond lawes broken kingdome anie thing diſordered confounded carefullie compoſe ſet ſame againe good order eſtabliſh pillers foundation thereof place remoued doo direction thy reuealed thing may remaine ſafe among people difference right wrong preſerued mainteined may followe thee god great cheerefulneſſe whoſoeuer delight righteouſneſſe ſee diſordered ſtate realme reſtored laſt ancient moſt right order diſcipline iuſtice preſcribed thy word thus grace aſſiſtance thy holie ſpirit beſeech thee plentifullie powre downe vpon doo thy ſeruant determine ſelfe vnfeinedlie ſerue worſhip thy dreadfull maieſtie god feare trembling labour preſerue amplifie thy church great care poſſible thy pure worſhip may continuallie poſteritie exerciſed therein ſo haue ſworne euen oth make ſolemne uowes doo keepe thy moſt ſacred heaſts iuſt lawes inuiolable thing performe deede neither ſuffer ſelfe anie time drawne awaie thy iudgements depart one ynch thy holie commandements god waie ſoeuer thou leadeſt truſting onelie vnto thee whoſe power conduct haue gotten empire regiment ſo manie large prouinces ſtrong city goodlie townes ſet kingdome good order place throne iudgement therein euen tribunall ſeate father david iudgement iuſtice may miniſtred indifferentlie therein euerie one ſafetie welfare people loue thee fauour thy truth procured maintained end god haſt thou giuen kingdome poſſeſſion ſo manie goodlie country ſundrie ſorts people cauſed obteine ſo great facilitie eaſe thus peaceablie placed therein ſhould loue ieruſalem hart ſhould root inhabitant therein prophane land filthie ſuperſtition euill life cauſe diligentlie obſerue thy ſtatutes lawes giuen thee ſo make uow lord ſaie according ſimplicitie hart prouide faithfullie thy people alſo guide good counſell continuallie defend preſerue power thou thy heaſt haſt commanded may better perfourme theſe uowes vnto thee thoroughlie diſcharge dutie glorie thine eternall maieſtie beſeech thee ſhew thy glorie god let thine honour beautifie adorne king gouerne thou counſels endeuours heauen yea enterpriſes counſels guide gouerne thou higheſt heauens thy glorie lord thy glorie may ſhine foorth thine humble haudmaid poſterities fame thereof fill whole world perpetuallie praiſed al thy creature heauen earth viſible inuiſible euer euer euen ſo ſhall god euen ſo let amen amen lord beſeech thee let uowes free ſoule glorie god firſt ſoone ye awake morning meditate thus ſaie awake thy heauie ſleepe ſlumber ſoule ſhake deathfull ſlouth earthlie trunke ſaie ſinfull ſoule watch lord hand prepared iudgement ariſe get thee lord grace mercie lowlineſſe repentance ceaſe praie forgiueneſſe thy ſinnes labour perſeuerantlie thy dutie ſhalt thou find mercie righteouſneſſe made woorthie enter faithfull virgin beautifull gheſt ioifull bridegroome feaſt eternall mirth delicacie dwell ioies euer amen awake thou ſleepeſt ariſe dead chriſt ſhall ſhew light vnto thee epheſ 5 verſe 14 well wakened ariſe praie thus eies hart hand lifted vp bleſſed god glorious trinitie moſt entirelie thanke thee thy bountifull benefit beſtowed vpon mankind eſpeciallie hath pleaſed thee mercie awake bodie inlighten mine eies quicken ſenſes reuiue renew whole againe death ſleepe ſame ſpirit raiſed ieſus dead thanke thee thou haſt couered ſpirit ſlumber ſhut vp mine eies obſcure darknes cauſe ſleepe perpetuall ſleepe neuer awake againe riſe euils wherein laie ſinnes haue iuſtlie deſerued good father grant alſo beſeech thee thou haſt awaked body ſleepe made mine eies preuent morning light ſo vouchſafe like mercie thoroughlie awaken quicken lighten deliuer ſoule drowſineſſe ſleepe ſinne ſecuritie darkneſſe world hencefoorth neuer become emptie faint dead irkſome longing vanity brittle life liuelie quicke readie ſerue glorifie thee together bodie good work true chriſtianitie oh deere god ſleepe thee death v hartilie beſeech thee therefore death reſtore life awaked ſleepe meane make bodie ſuch miniſter godlineſſe ſoule preſent life laſt beſſed reſurrection ſhall awaked vp thy likeneſſe long ſleepe death called appeare thee holie angel may ioifullie ariſe partaker ſame euerlaſting happineſſe life glorious true whence light daie dooth ſpring light lighteſt euerie man commeth world without whome moſt horrible darkeneſſe light giuen miſerie life wretch hath heauie hart looked light behold haue found wiſhed daie lo ſtarres twylight doo appeere ſee thanke thee dawning daie darkeneſſe dooth longer poſſeſſe night ſhadowe death ſtaine daie blacke mantell gone thicke cloud diſpearſed ſo light might iudg 5 31 meditation remember thy maker knew thée thou waſt knowe eies lord tenne thouſand time brighter sunne though nothing cléere yet ſhall faile god liueth euer beholdeth way men bottomleſſe depth looking euen men hart neuer ſo darke ſecret corner therefore whereſoeuer thou art whatſoeuer thou dooeſt feare thou eies god eies men alſo light ſwéet pleaſant thing ſée sunne remember day darkneſſe followe manie looke béetimes sunne ſet light moone ſtarres darkened thou feare god vſe light walking therein child light knowing maketh sunne ſhine ariſe vpon good bad call thée account thy work done darkneſſe light putting neereſt garment praie thus moſt gratious mercifull sauiour ieſus chriſt thou knoweſt borne cloathed clogged greeuous heauie burden firſt woman eue fell awaie vnto fleſhlineſſe diſobedience vouchſafe therefore beſeech thee ſtrip old corrupt eue ſoked ſinne tranſformeth hir ſelfe incombrances diſeaſes mind may lead v awaie thee rid alſo quite cleane hir tempter deceitfull ſerpent turneth v awaie obedience father haue put cloathes ſhall put cantic 5 3 beholding nakedneſſe praie thus lord wretched miſerable poore blind naked naked lord yea euen ſtarke naked thou ſeeſt bloud corruption open mine eies alſo beſeech thee may ſee nakedneſſe feele miſerie confeſſe wretchednes thou verie pitie compaſſion maiſt cloath thine innocencie holie vertues ſo couer filthineſſe mine enimies neuer behold ſame reproch finallie giue grace perfect charitie doo work faith acceptable thee eſpeciallie ſo cloath naked power releeue needie ſhall depart hence naked bare euer borne ſhall carie awaie nothing labour yet thy ſight generall iudgement daie may appeere naked good work void marriage garment faith gift grace ieſus chriſt lord amen naked came mother wombe naked ſhall returne thither bleſſed name lord iob 1 21 putting neereſt garment praie thus put vpon lord pure garment innocencie holines chriſt sauior couer thou nakedneſſe ſhame fine linnen robe righteouſneſſe vertue ſo ſhall filthineſſe diſcouered vnto mine enimies gaze laugh curſed cham nakedneſſe father noah yea make thou linnen cloaths white ſnowe ſhining like light maie number thoſe haue beene called beginning world ſhall ſanctified haue departed ſhadowe world ſhall receiue glorious garment euen thoſe holie one ſaie haue put mortall cloathing haue put immortall haue confeſſed thee god thy chriſt alreadie crowned glorie haue receiued palmes victorie hand triumphing ouer enimies policy world bleſſed watcheth keepeth garment cleane white leaſt walke naked men ſee filthineſſe reuel 16 hitherto done nothing confeſsion praier father heauen ſonne god redeemer world holie ghoſt three perſons one god haue mercie vpon moſt wretched caitife miſerable ſinner haue offended heauen earth tongue expreſſe ſins aboue men number greatneſſe haue committed whither may go whither ſhould flee heauen may aſhamed lift vp face earth find place refuge ſuccour thee therefore lord doo runne thee doo humble ſelfe ſaieng lord god ſinnes great innumerable yet haue mercie vpon thy great mercie great myſterie god became man wrought little offence thou didſt giue thy ſonne heauenlie father vnto death ſmall ſinnes onlie greateſt ſinnes world ſo ſinner returne vnto thee whole hart doo heere preſent wherefore haue mercie god whoſe propertie alwaie haue mercie wherefore haue mercie lord thy great mercie craue nothing lord mine owne merit thy name ſake may halowed thereby thy deere ſonne ieſus chriſtes ſake therefore father heauen halowed thy name c another confeſſion praier oh almightie euerlaſting god moſt gratious deere louing father beſeech thee ieſus chriſtes ſake thy moſt deere onlie ſonne haue mercie pitie compaſſion vpon moſt vile wretched miſerable ſinner whoſe innumerable offenſes old new moſt horrible heinous great haue iuſtlie deſerued thy greeuous wrath euerlaſting damnation good lord heere appeale thy great mercie onlie far ſurmounteth thy work thou haſt promiſed ſame thy holie infallible word thou haſt ſaid yea ſworne trulie thou liueſt thou wilt death ſinner rather ſhould conuert liue ah deere lord confeſſe great greeuous ſinner yet thy grace good working thy holie ſpirit ſomething turned vnto thee oh let liue die euerlaſting death ſoule ſo deepelie haue deſerued make veſſell thy great mercie may liue praiſe thy name among thy choſen child euer oh let horrible ſinnes ſeparate ſweet ſight thy maieſtie let thy great power mercie magnified dauid peter magdalen notable theefe crucified chriſt thy deere ſonne whoſe moſt pretious death bloudſhedding onlie lord put whole truſt confidence onelie hath taken awaie ſinnes world came condemne world ſaue none trulie beleeue ſhould periſh haue life euerlaſting ſaith came call righteous ſinners repentance oh gratious god giue true earneſt hartie vnfeigned repentance may verie bottome hart continuallie lament manifold ſinnes wickedneſſe great ingratitude vnthankefulneſſe towards thee thy mercifull benefit ſo aboundantlie powred vpon ieſus chriſt wouldeſt vouchſafe thine owne deere darling whome thy whole pleaſure delight giue verie death croſſe yea thine vtter enimie mercie ineſtimable loue incomprehenſible euer ſawe ſuch thing god became man crucified death might liue ala euer ſhould become ſo wicked wretch vnkind creature diſpleaſe ſo louing kind mercifull god father oh forgiue forgiue thy great mercie ſake thy truth promiſe ſake neuer treſpaſſe againe againſt thy diuine maieſtie anie gladlie ſerue thee true holineſſe righteouſneſſe day life grace aſſiſtance thy good holie ſpirit beſeech thee giue alſo may gouerne guide hart thy true faith feare loue deed word thought may glorifie thy holie name liueſt reigneſt ſonne holie ghoſt three perſons one god whome honour glorie praiſe thanks power rule dominion euer euer amen another confeſsion ſinnes proper sabaoth daie oh moſt mercifull father father mercy god conſolation comfort god father moſt wretched ſinner confeſſe acknowledge ſelfe vnfeinedlie hart mind mouth thee haue moſt greenouſhe offended thy high maieſtie goodneſſe recogniſe acknowledge ſelfe full ſinne full vnfaithfulneſſe ſeruant vnprofitable thy holie commandements haue tranſgreſſed broken firſt haue ſet whole beleefe confidence truſt hope thee haue loued honoured thee hart ſoule mind power ſoule secondlie haue diuided thine honour worſhip thee giuen thy creature dead thing imagined mine owne fond fantaſie meane adoring worſhipping image thirdlie haue abuſed thy moſt holie name falſe deceitfull ſwearing hinderance neighbour idlelie vainlie haue vſed thy holie name haue ſaid done neither thought thing thy glorie fourthlie saboth daie haue giuen ſelfe hearing reading learning holie scripture neither haue giuen meate hungrie drinke thirſtie lodged harbourleſſe clothed naked viſited ſicke comforted releeued poore men priſon haue expended great weight theſe word thy ſonne sauiour chriſt neither beleeued ſaieng much ye haue done theſe thing vnto one leaſt theſe brother ye haue done vnto matth 25 haue beſtowed ſpent gold ſiluer lewd luſt concupiſcence exceſſe meat drinke gorgeous apparell bodie child ſeruants houſe c ſhould haue beſtowed elſe ſo largelie delicatelie nicelie exceſſiuelie haue beſtowed haue regarding meane time ſuffer deere beloued brother ieſu chriſt go naked periſh cold hunger haue ſaie ceaſed mine owne ſinfull luſts praieng time thy mine fulfilled furthermore haue honoured father mother haue ſo much ſet eſteemed ſuch reuerence thou commandeſt obeied neither comforted releened helped haue ſlaine haue broken wedlocke haue ſtolne haue ſold falſe weight meaſures borne falſe witneſſe finallie haue coueted neighbour houſe haue deſired wife ſeruant cattell good vnlawfullie thus moſt greeuouſlie haue ſinned infinit way lord omitting leauing thy commandements oh father fulfill deſire fleſh world diuell wherefore crie thee mercie god moſt mercifull father moſt humblie deſire beſeech thee loue thou beareſt thy deer ſonne mine onelie whole entire sauiour ieſu chriſt haue mercie forgiue moſt miſerable ſinner euen bloud pretious death ſake went ſeeke thee truſt vnto thee doo anie thing thy glorie yet would luſt concupiſcence contagious originall poiſon fleſhlie dregges drawne father adam ſuffer perfectlie doo would haue done naturall concupiſcence ſtriue fight dailie againſt holie ghoſt vnlawfull luſt deſire knowledge greeuous ſinne againſt thy highnes thou ſhouldeſt iudge ſtraitlie thy lawe without concupiſcence cannot wherefore wretched yea moſt abhominable wretched ſinner ſelfe cleerelie deſtitute righteouſneſſe godlineſſe holineſſe deſeruings come faith thee vnto chriſt mercie ſeate righteouſneſſe vnto goodneſſe deſeruings ſatiſfactions deſiring thee moſt mercifull father death ſake righteouſneſſe wiſedome holineſſe goodneſſe merit ſatiſfactions may mine ſerue forgiueneſſe ſaluation like thou gaueſt die ſinnes euen ſo beleeue thou haſt giuen mine ſerue ſaluation wherefore glorie honor worſhip empire rule thee oh father ſonne holie ghoſt euer world without end another confeſsion ſinnes sunday vſed forenoone afternoone moſt mercifull lord god tender deere father vouchſafe hartilie beſeech thee looke downe thy fatherlie eies pitie vpon moſt vile wretched ſinner lie heere proſtrate heart feete thy bottomleſſe mercie haue ſinned againſt throne thy glorie thee moſt deere father inſomuch worthie called thy daughter yet neuertheleſſe foraſmuch thou art god father mercie comfort againe deſireſt death ſinner like true samaritan takeſt thought ſillie wounded ſoule make praie thee infunding thy pretious oile comfort wound ioifullie run loſt ſonne lap thine euerlaſting pitie lo thou art hope truſt onlie repoſe ſelfe hauing thee full confidence faith ſo ſaie verie faithfull hart truſting thy mercie beleeue thee god father thee god sonne thee god holie ghoſt three perſons one true verie god beſides acknowledge none god heauen aboue earth beneath yea poore ſinner doo accuſe ſelfe vnto thee deere father haue ſore greeuouſlie offended thine almightie goodneſſe diuine maieſtie committing mine exceeding greeuous manifold ſinnes wickedneſſe haue kept leaſt thy moſt bleſſed commandements like thy righteouſneſſe may require demand ſame haue ſaie honoured thee like god dreaded thee like lord loued thee like father truſted thee like sauiour creator thy holie dreadfull name vnto honour glorie belongeth haue vſed vaine haue ſanctified saboth holie day work acceptable vnto thee inſtructed neighbour vertue accordinglie haue honoured father mother beene obedient vnto inſtrument thou haſt wrought comming world high power ruler take authoritie thee haue beene willinglie obedient vnto haue kept hart pure cleane manſlaughter yea thy mercie grace defended better ſhould haue committed verie deed alſo likewiſe pure theft adulterie falſewitneſſebearing haue hart mind wiſhed deſired neighbour good thing haue folowed great prince world satan hath beene lier beginning concupiſcence fleſh pride liuing lieng deceitfulneſſe lecherie hatred enuie backbiting deſpaire alſo miſbeleefe fiue wit alſo haue fowlie miſvſed ſpent hearing ſeeing ſmelling taſting alſo feeling thou haſt giuen vſe thy honour glorie alſo edification profit neighbour maner ſoeuer haue offended ſinned againſt thine eternall maieſtie man knoweth throughlie ſinnes prophet witneſſeth whether hath beene daie elſe night yea euen childhood vnto daie work word deed thought ſecretlie openlie mercifull god ſorie euen bottome hart yea ſoule mourneth ſorrowe moſt mercifull father thouſand time ſorier howbeit token great repentance though hart knowne well inough thee doo knocke ſtrike breaſt ſaie bitterneſſe hart ſoule lord god father haue mercie lord god sonne haue mercie lord god holie ghoſt haue mercie spare thine infinite goodneſſe mercie good lord day life hereafter let haue part thine abundant grace ſo maie change ſinfull life put old man concupiſcences alſo maie die vnto world world may croſſe vnto ſo go foorth new life strengthen lord true humble hart perfect loue hope truſt thee giue ſoule grace deſire thee onlie thee onlie reioice repoſe ſelfe may vtterlie renounce forſake vaine affiance world ſo thou maiſt find readie good ſeruant wiſe virgin midnight death ſhall ſuddenlie ſteale vpon like theefe ere aware thou vnto time need lord tower ſtrength place refuge defenſible god namelie againſt face feend like roring lion ſhall moſt readie deuoure againſt deſperation ſhall buſie greeue let thy comfort cleane faſt vnto thy mercie keepe thy grace guide fetch againe lord god father thy puiſſant might hath ſhapen fetch againe lord god sonne thou haſt ſo wiſelie gouerned bought thy pretious bloud take againe lord god holie ghoſt thou haſt kept preſerued ſo louinglie region ſinne vale miſerie three perſons one true alſo verie god laud praiſe euer euer amen another confeſsion ſinnes praier mercie grace commonlie called conditor coeli oh maker heauen earth king king lord lord nothing didſt make thine image likeneſſe diddeſt redeeme thy pretious bloud ſinner woorthie name thinke neither call vpon moſt humblie deſire thee meekelie praie thee gentlie thou behold thy wicked ſeruant haue mercie vpon hadſt mercy woman canaan marie magdalen didſt forgiue publican theefe hanging croſſe unto thee confeſſe ſinnes moſt holie father would cannot hide thee haue mercie chriſt wretch haue ſore offended thee idolatrie ſuperſtition blaſphemie prophaning thy saboths diſobedience gouernours pride couetouſneſſe gluttonie lecherie vaine glorie hatred enuie murder adulterie theft lieng backbiting falſewitneſſebearing ſporting dalliance diſſolute wanton laughing idle word vncleane thought hearing taſting touching thinking ſleeping working finallie way fraile woman moſt wretched ſinner might ſinne default moſt greeuous default therefore moſt humblie praie beſeech thy gentleneſſe helpe didſt deſcend heauen didſt hold vp dauid ſhould fall ſinne haue mercie vpon chriſt didſt forgiue peter thine apoſtle forſweare forſake thee thou art creator helper maker redeemer gouernour father lord god king ſpouſe thou art hope truſt ſtrength defenſe redemption ſanctification life helth reſurrection thou art ſtedfaſtneſſe refuge ſuccour light onlie hope therfore moſt hartilie humblie deſire thee helpe defend make ſtrong comfort make ſtedfaſt make merie giue mee light viſit reuiue againe dead thy making thy worke oh lord deſpiſe thy ſeruant thy bondwoman although euill although moſt vnworthie deteſtable ſinner whatſoeuer whether good bad alwaies thine therfore ſhall flee except flee vnto thee thou caſt ſhall receiue thou deſpiſe turne thy face ſhall looke vpon recogniſe knowledge lord thine although vnworthie comming thee although bee vile vncleane vile vncleane confeſſe ſelfe deede thou canſt make mee cleane ſicke thou canſt heale dead buried thou canſt reuiue thy mercie much mine iniquitie thou canſt forgiue offend therefore lord doo conſider haue reſpect number ſinnes according greatneſſe thy mercie forgiue haue mercie moſt wretched ſinner saie vnto ſoule thy health ſaiedſt death ſinner rather liue conuerted turne thee lord bee angrie beſeech thee thy great mercie ſake forgiue pardon miſdeeds bring bliſſe neuer ſhall ceaſe amen another forme confeſsion praier vſed maiſter miſtreſſe family priuate houſes euerie morning almightie god moſt mercifull father doo preſent ſelues heere thy maieſtie truſting owne merit woorthineſſe thy manifold mercy haſt promiſed heare praiers graunt requeſts ſhall make thee name thy beloued sonne ieſus chriſt lord hath alſo commanded v aſſemble ſelues together name full aſſurance onelie amongſt v alſo mediator aduocate towards thy maieſtie may obtaine thing ſhall ſeeme expedient thy bleſſed neceſſities therefore beſeech thee moſt mercifull father turne thy louing countenance towards v impute vnto v manifold ſinnes offence whereby wee iuſtlie deſerue thy wrath ſharpe puniſhment rather receiue v thy mercie ieſus chriſtes ſake accepting death paſſion iuſt recompenſe offence onlie thou art pleaſed whome thou canſt offended v ſeeing thy great mercy haue quietlie paſſed night grant heauenlie father may beſtowe daie wholie thy ſeruice ſo thought word deedes may redound glorie thy name good example men ſeeing good work may glorifie thee heauenlie father foraſmuch thy meere fauour loue thou haſt onlie created v thine owne ſimilitude likeneſſe alſo haſt choſen v heires thy deere ſonne ieſus chriſt immortall kingdome thou preparedſt v beginning world beſeech thee increaſe faith knowledge lighten hart thy holie ſpirit may meane time liue godlie conuerſation integritie life knowing idolater adulterer couetous men contentious perſons drunkard glutton ſuch like ſhall inherit kingdome god becauſe thou haſt commanded v praie one another doo onlie make requeſt lord ſelues thou haſt alreadie called true vnderſtanding thy heauenlie people nation world know thy wonderfull work thou art god ouer ſo may inſtructed thy holie ſpirit beleeue thee onlie sauiour redeemer foraſmuch beleeue except heare cannot heare preaching none preach except ſent therefore lord raiſe vp faithful diſtributers thy myſteries ſetting apart worldlie reſpects may life doctrine onelie ſeeke thy glorie contrariwiſe confound sathan antichriſt hireling whome thou haſt alreadie caſt reprobate ſenſe may ſects ſchiſmes hereſies error diſquiet thy little flocke becauſe lord fallen latter day dangerous time wherein ignorance hath gotten vpper hand sathan miniſters ſeeke meanes quench light thy goſpell beſeech thee mainteine thy cauſe againſt thoſe rauening woolues ſtrengthen thy ſeruants keepe priſon bondage let thy longſuffering occaſion either increaſe tyrannie diſcourage thy child neither yet let ſinnes wickedneſſe hinderance thy mercy ſpeede lord conſider theſe great miſeries thy people iſrael manie time ſinnes prouoked thine anger thou puniſhedſt thy iuſt iudgement yet though ſinnes neuer ſo greeuous returned iniquitie thou receiuedſt mercie therfore moſt wretched ſinners bewaile manifold ſiunes earneſtlie repent v former wickedneſſe vngodlie behauiour towards thee whereas cannot ſelues purchaſe thy pardon yet humblie beſeech thee ieſus chriſtes ſake ſhew thy mercie vpon v receiue v againe thy fauour graunt v deere father theſe requeſts thing neceſſarie v thy whole church queene realme according thy promiſe ieſus chriſt lord whoſe name beſeech thee hath taught v ſaieng father c almightie euerlaſting god vouchſafe beſeech thee graunt v perfect continuance thy liuelie faith augmenting increaſing ſame v dailie vntill growe full meaſure perfection chriſt whereof make confeſſion ſaieng beleeue god father almightie c almightie god haſt promiſed heare petition aſke thy sonnes name wee beſeech thee mercifullie incline thine eares v haue made praiers ſupplications vnto thee graunt thoſe thing wee haue faithfullie aſked according thy may effectuallie obteined releefe neceſſitie ſetting foorth thy glorie ieſus chriſt lord amen lord bleſſe v ſaue v lord make face ſhine vpon hartilie thanke thee ſweet ſleepe comfortable reſt thou haſt giuen night innumerable benefit hitherto powred vpon ſoule bodie thou haſt vouchſafed preſerue night paſt ſudden death euill miſchiefe ſpirituall corporall anie perſon man woman hath beene ſtriken withall thy permiſſion ſufferance knowing ſuretie ſelfeſame ſuch like worthilie light head alſo haddeſt thou defended preſerued giuen time amend life ſo might liue henceforth thou wilt ſeeing thou almightie god moſt mercifull father table commandements deliuered hand thy ſeruant moſes vpon mount sina among precept diddeſt giue charge vnto thy choſen child iſrael ſixe day ſhould doo ſuch work aaffaires doo reſt labour ſeuenth daie graunt beſeech thee bleſſed father ſiuce haue thy mercie happilie paſſed ouer whole weeke vnder thy gratious protection may onelie reſt daie dailie trauels may abſtaine alſo work ſinne iniquitie ſanctifie daie wholie vnto thee praiers thankesgiuing abounding work loue charitie thou haſt commanded thy holie word may found pure without ſpot blemiſh daie thy sonne ieſus chriſt ſhall come iudge world righteouſneſſe equitie foraſmuch thou haſt ordeined daie among reſt wherein ſhould meete together brotherlie loue affection yeeld thee praiſes innnumerable benefit haue receiued thy hand acknowledge thy fatherlie loue pitie towards v time time giue thee thanks generall vniuerſall thy benefit hitherto beſtowed vpon v beſeech thee grant thy holie ſpirit may zealouſlie inflamed ſerue thee true holineſſe integritie life operation ſpirit may kill carnall luſts vnlawfull pleaſures concupiſcence ſpots vncleanneſſe whereby may made thy child adoption grace bodie temple holie ghoſt throughlie purged purified dreg iniquitie abhomination giue grace moſt mercifull father ſpend daie thy pleaſure good work ſpirit charitie proceeding vndefiled faith chriſt ieſu fall anie kind danger dooings may ordered thy gouernance doo alwaies righteous thy ſight ieſus chriſt lord amen another morning praier lord daie almightie mercifull god eternall father sonne holie ghoſt three perſons one ſubſtance god verie deede euerlaſting extoll thy ſacred maieſtie praiſe thine vnſpeakeable mercie thy diuine truth exceedingly commend thy fatherlie woonderfull goodneſſe thou haſt protected night vnder ſhadowe thy wing yea thou alſo haſt made quietlie take reſt notwithſtanding dangerous ſnares deadlie enimie diuell thou art god exalteſt v gate ſhadowe death power darkneſſe thou deliuereſt v therefore acknowledge thee thy goodnes woonderfull thing thou dooeſt among ſonnes men magnifie thee great congregation among much people praiſe thee hart readie god hart readie praiſe thee lord among people ſing thee among nation thy mercie aboue heauens thy truth vnto cloud hide thy mercie truth great congregation bicauſe good thing praiſe lord ſing thee thou moſt high declare thy louing kindneſſe morning thy truth night bleſſe lord ſoule within praiſe holie name forgiueth thine iniquity healeth thine infirmity redeemeth thy life deſtruction crowneth thee mercie compaſſion ſatiſfieth thy longing good thing protecteth thee thy youth alſo hath kept bone night one broken king euerlaſting immortall inuiſible onlie wiſe god honor glorie euer euer amen vnto thee lord doo lift vp ſoule god earlie ſeeke thee ſoule thirſteth thee fleſh luſteth thee barren drie land water ſee thy ſtrength glorie eternall god haſt brought beginning daie defend thy mightie power daie fall ſinne run anie kind danger let cogitation word work tend ſetting foorth thy righteouſneſſe lighten mind morning ſhining clearneſſe thy wiſdome hart true daieſtar may riſe ſhine candle darke place giue ſpirit wiſdome reuelation knowledge thee lighten eies mine vnderſtanding may knowe hope great glorie mine inheritance excellent greatneſſe thy power towards fill thy mercie morning ſo ſhall glad reioice life long mercifull god endue thine holie ſpirit may neither thinke ſpeake doo anie thing daie may pleaſe thee tend aduancement thy glorie health ſoule gouerne thou mine vnderſtanding ſo direct cogitation hart may wholie thine ſauour nothing beſides thee god redeemer teach mee waie thy commandements lord keepe vnto end giue vnderſtanding keepe thy lawes loue thee lord god hart ſoule ſtrength let thy teſtimonies delight counſellers comfort ſoule thy ſeruant vnto thee lord haue lifted vp ſoule thou lord art good gentle great kindneſſe manie call vpon thee behold god earlie morning doo offer ſelfe morning ſacrifice vnto thee troubled ſpirit broken humble hart lord thou wilt deſpiſe make fit may likewiſe dailie offer vp bodie liuing ſacrifice holie acceptable vnto thee reaſonable ſeruice gratefull obedience euerie daie lord commend ſoule bodie thy hand thou haſt redeemed god truth compaſſe watch thine angel miniſtring ſpirits ſent defence child ſaluation may pitch tent incounter satan dragon defend euill giue thine holie angel charge protect way leaſt happilie hurt feete againſt ſtone ſo praiſe thee magnifie thy name liueſt reigneſt true eternall god world without end amen another praier verie effectuall vſed vpon lord sundaie holie feſtiuall day seing verie ſolemne time feſtiuall holiday doo vndoubtedlie greatlie renew reioicing godlie yea certaine heape man would ſaie doo maruelouſlie augment increaſe ſpirituall ioie thee moſt holie lord god saboth make greater kept continue ſtir v vp vnto remembrance recounting thy woonderfull act thing miracle wrought done thine almightie maieſtie conſeruation ſaluation mankind occaſion doo exceedinglie cheere vp fill hart godlie ſpirituall ioies thee moreouer bicauſe good exerciſes renewed often eſpeciallie vpon sundaie holie day though time departing life going euerlaſting holie day ſpirituall reſt continuall ioie therefore ought time eſpeciallie prepare ſelues carefulnes ſhew ſelues godlie doo thy cōmandements ſtraightlie yt ſhall receiue reward trauels thy hand ere long behold thy ſillie creature deſirous keepe godlie reſt new saboth better hitherto haue done default crie thee hartilie mercie doo therefore moſt humblie beſeech thee holie father powre plentiouſlie vpon thy bleſſed ſpirit whoſe diuine power vertue grace may daie throughlie ſanctified clenſed dedicated prepared bodilie ghoſtlie perfectlie ſerue worſhip thee according thy holie god haſt commanded v ſanctifie ſelues holie thou art grant grace iohn ſpirit sundaie daie holie holie altogither giuen ſerue pleaſe thee ſpirit truth becommeth true worſhippers thee make thou daie refraine ſelfe dooing anie bodilie labour ſeruile worke vtterlie forbeare maner vngodlineſſe diſpleaſant vnto thee namelie abuſe miſpend holie daie pranking packing priinting pointing friſling vaine attiring ſelfe gorgious gaie prance pride neither yet vnlawfull play idle ſports game ethnicall paſtimes feaſting banketting belliecheere gluttonie riot exceſſe chambering wantonnes niceneſſe contention pride couetouſneſſe anie fleſhlie filthineſſe vaine pleaſures tranſitorie world contrariwiſe occupie giue ſelfe obedientlie vnto vertuous work holie exerciſes thy diuine precept namelie vnto expending ſpirituall reſt euerlaſting repoſe chriſtian ſoules heauen vnto meditation thy woonderfull work vnſpeakable benefit thou god continuallie beſtoweſt vpon thy church bee thankefull ſame ſtudie scripture heare reade thy ſacred word followe ſame call vpon thee ardent praier hartie thankeſgiuing thy mercy exerciſe thy holie sacrament comfort giue almes gladlie according mine abilitie releefe poore comfort needie make ſaie lord holie dauid moſt willing glad daie go foorth whole familie multitude thy houſe temple voice praiſe thankesgiuing among ſuch keepe holiedaie vnto thee ſeaſons common order appointed diligentlie frequent populous reſort chriſtian aſſemblie congregation church preſent thy people often moſt ſacred place earth moſt holie alwaies thee god moſt acceptable ſacrifice praiſe inuocation diuine worſhip giuing thanks ſinging hymnes hearing thy word vſing thy holie sacrament praiers interceſſions ſupplications comming together whole congregation vſed ordinarilie made vnto thee church verie great ceremonie reuerence thus free trauels drudgerie world thy grace cleanſed mine owne carnall affection wholie giuen ouer ſerue ſanctifie thee true reſt ſpirituall eaſe alſo beſtowe conſecrate hallowe thy ſacred sabboth sundaie feſtiuall holie day moſt glorious vnto thee holie ſpirituall exerciſes faithfull obedient chriſtian according thy may euen heere vale teares amidſt miſeries thereby occaſioned cheerefull hart outwardlie inwardlie exceedinglie reioice truſt thee moſt mercifull god louing ſauiour tranſitorie life ended worthie happilie enter thy holie mountaine tabernacle thine elect kingdome euerlaſting bleſſedneſſe ſoules holie folke doo reſt partaker perfect holineſſe vnſpeakable benefit wiſhed wealefull reſt eternall endleſſe ioie ioies paradiſe god ſee loue praiſe thee moſt ioifullie happie mirth euer euer ieſus chriſt lord whome thee father holie ghoſt immortall glorie infinite power euerlaſting kingdome perpetuall praiſe continual thanksgiuing creature age world world without end amen see call mind alſo promiſes touching ſame ſaith thou turne awaie thy foote sabboth dooing thy sabboth daie call sabboth delight conſecrate glorious vnto lord ſhalt honor dooing thine owne way ſeeking thine owne ſpeaking vaine word ſhalt thou delight lord cauſe thee mount vpon high place earth feede thee heritage iacob thy father mouth lord hath ſpoken eſaie 58 verſes 13 14 yea bleſſed keepeth sabboth polluteth keepeth hand anie euill eſaie 56 verſe 2 threatenings ſaith yee ſhall therefore keepe sabboth holie vnto defileth ſhall die death therefore whoſoeuer worketh therein ſame perſon ſhall euen cut among people exod 31 verſe 14 going church end may ſpéedilier addreſſe ſelfe frequent church often alone whole familie ought firſt call diligentlie mind ſome theſe ſentences holie scripture following ¶ eſaie 66 verſe 23 ſhall come paſſe moone moone sabboth sabboth fleſh ſhall come worſhip ſaith lord ¶ eſaie 2 verſes 2 3 ſhall come paſſe latter day hill lord houſe ſhall prepared height mountaines ſhall higher hilles nation ſhall preaſe vnto multitude people ſhall go ſpeaking thus one another come let v aſcend hill lord c ¶ agge 1 verſes 4 5 6 c zach 14 thus ſaith lord hoſtes conſider owne way hart ô yee people get yee vp mountaine fetch wood build houſe take pleaſure glorified ſaith lord time ſelues dwell ſeeled houſes houſe lie waſte ye haue ſowne much ye bring little ye eate ye haue ynough ye drinke ye filled ye cloath ye warme earneth wage putteth broken bagge ye looke much lo came little ye brought home blowe vpon ſaith lord hoſts becauſe houſe waſte run euerie one owne houſe therfore vpon heauens ſtaied deaw earth ſtaied yeelding increaſe haue called drought vpon land vpon mountaines vpon corne vpon wine vpon oile vpon earth bringeth foorth vpon men vpon cattell vpon labour thy hand c thus hauing well peruſed weied theſe holie ſentences ſtir vp ſelfe exhort child ſeruants ſtrangers neighbour chéerefull mind willinglie diligentlie reſort church eſpeciallie euerie sundaie holiedaie ſaieng vnto followeth exhortation vſed maisters dame euerie sundaie morning come let v aſcend hill lord houſe god iacob inſtruct v way teach v walke path zion ſhall come lawe word lord ieruſalem hee ſhall giue ſentence among heathen ſhall reforme multitude people come therfore ſaie let v cheerfullie aſcend go vp ieruſalem hill houſe lord let v go way gate thanksgiuing court praiſe may preſent ſelues daie holie lord ſerue gladneſſe ¶ going towards church better expell idle thought noifull cogitation prepare hart deuotion euen waie ye go meditate ſaie ſelfe ſome theſe pſalmes praiers following alſo readineſſe would learned hart ſaid without booke praiers vſed going church pſalme glad ſaid vnto go houſe lord feete ſhall ſtand thy gate ieruſalem ieruſalem builded citie vnitie ſelfe thither tribe go vp euen tribe lord teſtifie vnto iſrael giue thanks vnto name lord ſeate iudgement euen ſeate houſe dauid ſoule praie peace ieruſalem ſhall proſper loue glorie father c c another pſalme lord haue loued habitation thy houſe place thine honour dwelleth yea zeale thine houſe hath euen eaten therefore waſh hand innocencie lord ſo go thine altar may ſhew voice thankesgiuing tell thy woonderous work great congregation behold go multitude motion ſpirit brought forth thy houſe god euen vpon multitude thy mercy thy feare among ſuch keepe holiedaie worſhip towards thy holy temple make haſte vnto thy tabernacle vnderſtand thy worthie wais diuine wil vnto thee god heareſt praiers vnto thee ſhall fleſh come worſhip thee zion praier ſhall made euer vnto thee dailie ſhalt thou praiſed ieruſalem therefore let congregation thy people come thee god may ſhew thy praiſes within porte daughter zion reioice thy ſaluation remember alſo beſeech thee good lord according fauour thou beareſt vnto thy people viſit thy ſaluation may ſee felicitie thy choſen child reioice gladneſſe thy people giue thee thanks thine inheritance make one houſhold faith congregation ſeeke thee euen ſeeke thy face iacob ſaieng lo come fulfill thy god ſend light thy truth may leade bring vnto thy holie hill thy dwelling may go vnto altar god euen vnto thee god ioie gladneſſe ioie gladneſſe ſaie cauſe thou brought thy manſion houſe enter king palace may aſcend vnto hill lord riſe vp holilie holie place may receiue bleſſing lord righteouſneſſe god health ſaluation another verie godlie praier vſed going church either morning euening praier iam entred voiage ſaluation conduct lord luckilie vnto port deliuered thee verie death may eſcape danger come verie life behold lord hart hunteth thee would god might dailie trace thee yea haue great ſore longed ſo godlie affection could celebrate thee frequented aſſemblies godlie trulie doo accordinglie grace aſſiſtance thy holie ſpirit moſt readie ioifull mind behooueth mine enterpriſe beginning may proceede good ſucceſſe amendment maners imbettering life doo thou finiſh thing god thou haſt begun make continuallie increaſe faith faith yea ſo renew ſhape againe innocencie righteouſneſſe grations lord beſeech thee perſon new borne thee may inſearch thee againe againe dawning daie morning noone euening night lead forooard lord beſeech thee thy righteouſneſſe let thy louing ſpirit direct feete make thy way plaine face bicauſe mortall inuiſible enimies doo thou vouchſafe luckilie conduct bodie daie vnto thy materiall temple bring ſoule laſt vnto thy holie hill bleſſed mountaine thou haſt purchaſed thy right hand may reſt bodie ſoule heauen remaine thee foreuer amen praie thus god word art light light made art waie truth life darknes ouerſight vanitie death ſhine foorth lord light mine inlightening welfare reuerence lord honour father loue iudge feare bridegroome cleaue vnto keepe ſelfe vndefiled ſpouſe shine foorth euerlaſting light ſhine foorth ſaie lighten lampe virginitie oile thy diuine grace mercie blind ſoule mine yet ſitteth darkneſſe ſhadowe death may ſee light eſchew darkneſſe ſee waie eſchew ſtraieng ſee truth eſchew leaſing ſee life eſchew death guide thou feete vnto waie peace thy mercifull protection may ſee light walke light neuer ſtumble vpon ſnares sathan may paſſe thereby palace thy woonderfull tabernacle able climbe vp euen vnto holie houſe temple voice gladneſſe confeſſion abide receiue thy hand mercie righteouſneſſe health bleſſing euerlaſting ſaluation fellowecitizens thy saint houſhold menie amen another godlie praier ſaid either going towards church looke earneſt feruent deſire ſoeuer old father moſt mightie god come vnto place wherein thou hadſt appointed tabernacle thy ſelfe time euen like kindled withall beholding repairing thy ſacred church ſee therin great companie godlie men woman lawfullie aſſembled together aduancement thy glorie hearing thy holie doctrine dulie receiuing thy bleſſed sacrament accordinglie wherefore humblie beſeech thee art god king may daie reioice felicitie ſoeuer may attained vnto fraile life doubt light vpon ſacred companie godlie aſſembled giue eare therefore excellent father vnto mine earneſt praiers grant make none account thy bleſſed houſe thy pleaſure ſhould doo bleſſed thing haue one day meeting abode therein abide neuer ſo great time continuance congregation vngodlie ſuch one lawfullie aſſembled aduantage ouerplus pleaſures tranſitorie world seeing therefore thou art moſt ſplendent light ſtrong defence cauſe aſſemblies earth god ſo redound thine vnſpeakable glorie aſſured hope comming end vnto thee euerlaſting tabernacle heauens may augmented verie much increaſed ieſus chriſt lord amen vvhen enter church meditate thus ſelfe ſaie lord ſhall aſcend thy high hill ſhall riſe vp thy holie place euen hath cleane hand pure hart hath lift vp mind vnto vanitie ſworne deceiue neighbour ſhall receiue bleſſing lord righteouſneſſe god ſaluation generation ſeeke euen ſeeke thy face iacob lift vp head ye gate ye lift vp ye euerlaſting doores king glorie ſhall come euen lord hoſts moſt mightie ſtrong open gate righteouſneſſe lord righteous nation keepe thy truth may go giue thanks vnto thee gate lord righteous ſhall enter yea bleſſed doo thy commandements god power ſhall tree life ſhall enter gate holie citie new ieruſalem without ſhall dog inchanters whooremongers murderer idolater yea ſhall enter none vncleane thing neither whatſoeuer worketh abhomination maketh lie onlie written lambes booke life amen thus lord ſhall enter thy ſanctuarie conſider thy mightie power except thou open vnto ſhall open thou ſhut trulie lord god ſillie worme claie able enter thine euerlaſtingneſſe vnleſſe thou haſt made thing nothing doo lead yea knowe lord knowe confeſſe vnwoorthie enter vnder thy roofe yet beſeech thee let bleſſed entrance houſe eternall felicitie whither haue dailie feruent deſire come ſet open made free paſſage vnto god giue mee leaue praie thee though dog vnwoorthie wretch euen thine owne honour ſake enter thy holie houſe approch thy ſacred preſence confound thy ſeruant ſeeketh thee putteth hir truſt confidence thy mercie oh ſuffer ſaie good lord knit vp finiſh laſt day malefactor wicked perſons grant long dailie trauell tranſitorie world may end length permitted thy mercie enter court thy diuine preſence thine elect choſen ſeruants euer inhabit hauen eternall felicitie ieſus chriſt lord amen ſaie thus enter church amiable thy dwelling thou lord hoſts ſoule hath deſire longing enter court lord hart fleſh reioice liuing god ſhall enter behold thy face ſhall come appeare thy preſence god one daie thy court better thouſand elſe rather doorekeeper houſe god dwell tent vngodlie yea like hart deſireth water brooke ſo longeth ſoule thee god ſoule thirſt god yea euen liuing god therfore come thy houſe lord euen vpon multitude thy mercy thy feare doo enter thy tabernacle worſhip thee god grant according thy amen paſſe people church vnto pue ſalute congregation ſaie peace within thy wals ieruſalem plentiouſneſſe within thy palace brother companion ſakes praie thy peace wiſh thee proſperitie yea bicauſe houſe lord god ſeeke doo thee good ſaie bleſſed commeth name lord lord proſper wiſh good lucke name lord placed pue call mind thing raſhlie god god heauen thou vpon earth therefore let thy word eccl 5 verſe 1 meditation wherein shewed ought verie intentiue pſalmes praiers church thou entreſt temple pray ſing pſalmes leaue repenting omiſſion time paſt ſorowing able attaine preſentlie thou god hath beene liberall grace inclined ſacred eares towards thee hartie praiers ſighs teares beſeech moſt humblie pardon thee thy
