conuerſion repentance let v haſte fulfill ioies ouer v wo vnto thee loueſt returne thy vomit impuritie dooeſt thou thinke haue thoſe witneſſe thee iudgement thou haſt bereaued ſo great long hopedfor ioie reioiced ouer v gaue name firſt chriſt ſeene v pulled hell gate doo ſhall ſee thoſe turned backe gate paradiſe alreadie almoſt one foote heauen wherefore though body earth let v ſet hart higheſt heauens let v run thither bodilie member ſpirituall affection deſires longing angel onlie creator angel doth long looke v god father looketh v owne ſonnes heires commit rule treaſure vnto v god ſonne looketh v deere german brother coparteners may preſent god father fruite natiuitie price owne bloud holie ghoſt alſo looketh v verelie bountie benignitie wherein euerlaſting predeſtinate ſaluation doubt wiſheth predeſtination accompliſhed seeing whole court heauen doth ſo earneſtlie looke wiſh v let v zealous affection ſeeke great ſhame large cōfuſion ſhall come thither lead cold lukewarme deſire whoſoeuer ſtrength continuall praier dailie meditation alwaie conuerſant ſhall hence depart ſecuritie receiued triumphing ioie therefore whereſoeuer thou ſtill praie within thy ſelfe thou chance far thy cloſet ſeeke place thou thy ſelfe art place thou thy bed praie praie often temple proſtrating thy bodie lift vp thy mind god time wherein doo vſe enioie goodneſſe mercie god ſo ought moment wherein almightineſſe ought poſſeſſe memorie thou wilt ſaie praie continuallie yet ſee fruit praier come vnto ſo depart none anſwereth ſpeaketh vnto nothing giuen labour ſeemeth vaine ſpeech humane follie obſeruing truth ſelfe promiſeth ſaieng uerelie ſaie vnto whatſoeuer ye aſke praier faith yee ſhall receiue ſhall performed vnto eſteeme lightlie therfore praier whome thou praieſt hath price proceed thy mouth commandeth regiſtred owne booke one theſe two may vndoubtedlie hope either giue v requeſts better thinke god highlie thou art able yet beleeue thou canſt thinke time wherein thou thinkeſt vpon god eſteeme loſt thing foraigne vnto v time onlie owne attend therefore vpon god whereſoeuer thou art impart giue vp thy ſelfe worldlie affaire whereſoeuer thou art caſt thy thought vpon god place vnfit meditation therefore cheerefulneſſe gather vp thy ſpirits dwell libertie thy ſelfe largeneſſe thy heart meaſure lodging thy lord chriſt wiſe man mind alwaie god ought alwaies ſight whome haue life knowledge author teacher vnderſtanding treaſure ſpirituall ioifull happineſſe heerein may acknowledge diuine image heauenlie trinitie hath excellencie wiſdome goodneſſe ſo according creation haue ſubſiſtence endued alſo reaſon delight knowledge ſignature impreſſion diuine maieſtie eſteeme therefore thy ſelfe temple god ſeeing pleaſed impart likeneſſe thee high renowne adore imitate god thou dooeſt imitate thou holie holie holie mind temple god ſincere hart moſt acceptable aultar thou dooeſt adore god thou mercifull euen mercifull pleaſing ſacrifice god gratifie cauſe god doo thing ſonne god thou bee vnworthie hath vouchſafed thy father knowe thy action god witneſſe beware therefore fixe thine eie ſettle thy thought anie vnlawfull delight neither ſpeake doo anie ill though thou maiſt offend god neither deede purpoſe almightineſſe diſcouereth thy deed thou haſt neede great watch diſcharging action face iudge yet liue thou maiſt without ſecuritie thou behaue thy ſelfe ſo vouchſafe thee preſence abide thee fauour come vnto thee reuenge come reuenge wo vnto thee nay rather wo come god moſt angrie whoſe ſinne leaueth vnpuniſhed damnation prepared whome god reformeth fatherlie chaſticement another meditation ſame effect good lord bee mercifull vnto mee offend worſt ought moſt mind reformation fault praieng temple oftentimes heed ſpeak praie abſence wandering mind made fruitleſſe bodie enter thy temple hart ſtandeth without therefore praier vaniſheth awaie outward ſound voice without inward ſymphonie hart auaileth nothing great follie naie madneſſe praier preſuming ſpeake preſence mightie god doo brutiſhlie wander vaine thought arreſt mind vpon verie trifle heinous offence alſo woorthie greeuous puniſhment vile duſt ſhould vouchſafe audience creator whole world ſpeaking vnto woorthineſſe thy heauenlie bountie vnſpeakable euerie daie regardeth v ſtanding wretchedneſſe miſerie turning aſide eares hardening hart yet crieth vnto v ſaieng returne waie yee tranſgreſſours attend ſee god god ſpeaketh pſalme vnto yet repeating ſame regard whoſe heerein offer god great wrong deſiring harken vnto praier ſelfe making doo heare requeſt attend neither intend ſelfe worſſe doo violate ſacred preſence vnpure vnprofitable thought haue mercie vpon pardon mine offence renew mee thy holie spirit praiers pſalmes song hymnes may ſaie ſing honor glorie thy name amen ¶ heere time conuenientlie ſerue common praier begin make priuate petition vnto almightie god ſaie ſalutation god father first forme praier yee kneele downe church haile father god almightie full grace mercie comfort thy sonne ieſus chriſt verie god man thee heauen bleſſed thy name father heauen aboue earth amongſt nation thine onlie ſonne lord amen another first forme praier church morning praier moſt high bleſſed trinitie verie father sonne holie ghoſt three glorious vnſeparable perſons trinitie one god deitie vncreate incomprehenſible eternall inuiſible almightie one power wiſdome goodneſſe lord coequall coeternall vndefiled maieſtie world world world euerlaſting dooeſt liue dwelleſt alone vnapprochable light verie hart mouth doo beeing leaſt member thy church fall downe lowe knee heere thy footeſtoole confeſſe praiſe bleſſe worſhip thee glorious trinitie euer angel creature elder heauen earth crie ſaie holie holie holie lord god hoſtes dreadfull ſtrong righteous mercifull maruellous praiſeworthie beloued heauen earth full thy glorie glorie thee god euer amen praier god would vouchſafe heare praiers congregation afflicted graunt request oh lord god moſt high moſt holie holie holie lord god sabaoth moſt bleſſed glorious trinitie father sonne holie ghoſt three glorious perſons coequall conſubſtantiall maieſtie one almightie incomprehenſible god deitie alwais meanes creature aboue thing woorſhipped unitie glorified deitie looke downe thy kinglie court princelie pallace thou art placed higheſt coaſts heauen heauens ſitteſt celeſtiall throne eternall glorie betweene cherubins seraphins looke downe ſaie moſt mightie iehoua haue reſpect beſeech thee vnto thy ſacred sanctuarie holie houſe praier let thine eies ſaie lord euer open towards thy bleſſed tabernacle night daie euen towards thy church thy temple moſt ſacred place earth thine honor dwelleth whereof thou haſt ſaid houſe ſhall houſe praier people nation name ſhall called vpon therein thou maiſt harken daie vnto praiers thy poore creature moſt vnwoorthie ſeruants make thee place heare thou therefore god euen heauen place thy glorious habitation ſupplications thy ſeruants alſo praiers ſupplications ſoeuer ſhall made vnto thee anie particular man woman people giue good eare ſaie lord vnto cry praiers petition thy people heere aſſembled ſhall gathered together thy name rent hart bowed knee ſtretched hand returne vnto thee preſent themſelues daie confeſſe thee call vpon thy holie name place thou heareſt pardon ſinnes thy ſeruants mercifull vnto offence iniquity thy people wherewith haue ſinned tranſgreſſed ſhall offend againſt thy maieſtie heare v ſaie lord holie lord god heare v praie thee mercifull vnto thine inheritance doo giue euerie one v according vnto euerie thing call praie vnto thee daie thy holie houſe according thy thorough ieſus chriſt lord amen amen pſalme preparation praier morning giue thanks vnto lord whole hart ſecretlie among faithfull congregation ſaie god hart readie hart readie thy holie houſe paie thee vowes promiſed lip ſpake mouth trouble voice ſhalt thou heare beetimes lord earlie morning direct praiers vnto thee looke vp ſelfe awake right earlie ſing giue praiſe vnto thee beſt member haue unto thee god lift vp hand hart thy holie habitation towards mercieſeat thy holie temple voice praiſe thankesgiuing among ſuch keepe holie daie daie thou lord haſt made reioice glad daie thy power offer freewill offering holie worſhip magnifie thee congregation people ground hart morning noone daie praie inſtantlie ſhall heare voice hart fixed redie god hart fixed redie praiſe thee thy faithfulneſſe yet beſt member haue euen hart thanke thee praiſe thy name euermore lip faine ſing vnto thee ſo ſoule thou haſt deliuered yea ſoule ſhall ſatiſfied marowe fatneſſe mouth praiſeth thee ioifull lip good thing giue thanks vnto lord ſing praiſes vnto thy name moſt high tell thy louing kindneſſe earlie morning thy truth euening night ſeaſon yea ioifull pleaſant thing thankfull vnto thee god alwaie therefore ſing ſeuen time daie praiſe thy mercie late euening bicauſe thy ſinne iniquitie may hallowe thy name euening euermore thing flowe thy word render ſacrifice praiſe thankesgiuing vnto thee worſhip thee onelie ſpirit truth god moſt mightie heauen earth righteous maker worker goodneſſe ſuch beleeue thee cleane hart god make thou reſtore willing right ſpirit denie holie ghoſt ſelfe performe nothing good bleſſe therefore benigne lord indue plentifullie thy grace goodneſſe end may continuallie praiſe thy maieſtie daie night myſticall pſalmes ſpirituall ſongs thou euermore working thy holie ſpirit preſentlie keepeth godlie reſt new saboth ſuch thing allowed pleaſant vnto thee leaſt anie time cleauing ſuperſtition hypocriſie doo worſhip thee amiſſe fill hart grace ſtuffe ſweetneſſe ſpirit euen bodie ſtuffed abundance meat lord rid mine vngodlineſſe plucke mine ignorance thee baniſh ſlothfulneſſe inſearching thee compell fleſh thy ſpirit bounden dutie obedience bring paſſe may alwaies applie ſelfe wholie without wearineſſe drineſſe mind vnto right alſo beſtoweſt excellent gift benefit vpon theſe men whoſoeuer excell ſincere faith pure godlineſſe haue exceeding deſire often bleſſed congregation ſo much nothing couet deſire appeare diuers time deliuer v wee humblie beſeech thee heinous fault enorme ſinnes lewd corruption wherewith haue greatlie defiled ſelues let weake feeble hart ſtrengthned thy bleſſed waie withered power mind dried vp watered holie ghoſt altogither repaired wholie renewed may continuallie celebrate praiſe thee haue great deſire direct praiers vnto thy mercieſeate moſt holie intent chriſtians ought doo cauſe v ſpirit ſo ſame thy rich mercie infinite goodnes grant ſame may become thy holie habitation ſacred ſeate euerlaſting glorie ſo purified cleanſed throughlie ſanctified made cleane thy diuine inſpiration gratious preſence heapes ſoile dreg duſt remnant filth found priuie ſecret corner thy ſpiritual temple offend ye celeſtiall eies thy diuine maieſtie ſo ſhall thy holie hall clenſed ſoule reuerence deuotion godlie worſhip daie euer reſound church place thy dominion thy perpetuall praiſes thine eternall glorie amen another praier ſerue god ſincerelie church lord god celeſtiall father whoſe gratious god haſt choſen houſe thy name might called vpon therein ſhould houſe praier petition thy people mercifullie promiſing therewithall whereſoeuer two three gathered together thy name thou wouldeſt middeſt whatſoeuer beleeuing aſked thee ſhould done vnto behold therefore whome thy grace thou haſt elected thy people heritage whome thou haſt made eternall couenant promiſe helpe heare aſſiſt confirme goodneſſe righteouſneſſe holineſſe doo heere preſent motion thy good ſpirit aſſemble gather ſelues together thy name one accord make common ſupplications vnto thee according bounden dutie one mind mouth ſpirit truth laud magnifie thy holie name maieſtie humblie beſeeching thee lord haue mercie vpon v miſerable ſinners purge v iuſtifie v faith offence old new inflame lighten lamp hart oile ſanctification thy holie ſpirit ſo therethrough ſanctifie ſoules prepare hart diſpoſe member wholie true pietie godlineſſe deuotion may woorthie continuallie lift vp holie place thy glorious preſence diuine habitation pure hart innocent hand moſt feruent praiers vnto thee heauen grant alſo gratious god one hart voice holineſſe godlineſſe trembling dread chriſtian reuerence humble obedience ſpirituall worſhip diuine ſeruice may inceſſantlie giue honour glorie vnto thee euer celebrate thy moſt holie name maieſtie thy holie temple apperteineth euen offering vp dutifullie vnto thy diuine maieſtie moſt ſweet acceptable ſacrifice broken contrite hart zealous true repentance humble vnfeined confeſſion pure inceſſant praier moſt woorthie condigne lauds praiſes ſo wee may continue bleſſed thy holie mountaine euer end according thy faithfull promiſe obtaine euerlaſting life ieſus chriſt lord amen ſoule rightlie worship praiſe lord place god true ſouereigne life thing doo liue whatſoeuer thing doo liue trulie happie ſtate god euen goodneſſe goodlineſſe good goodlie thing art good goodlie god whoſe faith quickeneth hope erecteth loue linketh v god haſt commanded v praie vnto thee makeſt thy ſelfe found openeſt knocketh god none ſeeketh admoniſhed man findeth purged god knowe life ſerue reigne loue ſaluation ioie ſoule thee lip mine hart ſtrength doo praiſe bleſſe worſhip sonne praie sonne father praie holie spirit father sonne wickedneſſe may ſet far awaie holie vertues may implanted within infinite god thing made viſible inuiſible incloſeſt thine outward work filleſt thine inward gouerneſt aboue beareſt belowe keepe worke thine hand truſt thee hope onlie thy mercie keepe beſeech thee eueriewhere alwaie within without behind aboue beneath round ſo place ſnares enimie againſt thou art god almightie keeper protector truſt thee without none ſafetie man free danger thou art god beſide thee none either heauen aboue earth belowe dooſt great thing vnſearchable maruellous thing without number meete therefore thou praiſed thou honored thou magnified commendation thee whole troupe angel thee heauens power doo ſing continuallie yeeld praiſes creature creator ſeruants lord ſouldiers king euerie creature doth extoll euerie ſoule doth glorifie thee holie vndefiled trinitie thee holie humble men hart thee ſpirits ſoules righteous thee doo ſupernall citizen together order bleſſed ſpirits yeeld humble praiſe glorie exalt thee aboue thing euer lord gloriouſlie honourablie doo thoſe heauenlie citizen adorne thee praiſes man alſo moſt excellent among thy creature doth magnifie thee yea miſerable ſinner doo exceedinglie deſire praiſe thee greatlie doo loue loue thee aboue thing god life ſtrength praiſe giue grace praiſe thee put thy light hart thy word almightie ſanctifier make worthie ſound foorth thy praiſe receiue good part hand hart loue mind receiue praie thee ſacrifice lip let acceptable thy ſight aſcend vp vnto thee like ſweete ſmelling adore power doo reuerence cherubins seraphins continuallie doo crie holie holie holie ioine therefore voice voice holie angel according abilitie let v praiſe god haue whoſe eies euermore fixed vpon lord behold glaſſe darklie face vnto face doo moſt purelie without ceaſing praiſe lord lord immortall people thine angel doo praiſe thee celeſtiall power doo magnifie thy name haue need either read ſcripture ſeeke knowledge thee holie glorious trinitie alwaies behold thy face read without ſyllables time thine eternall pleaſure read chooſe loue yea alwaies read read forget chooſing louing read conſtancie thy counſell booke ſhall time ſhut folded bicauſe thy ſelfe art wilt euerlaſtinglie much bleſſed thoſe heauenlie power religiouſlie purelie exceeding delight vnſpeakable ioie magnifie thee praiſes thence praiſe whence reioice forſomuch alwaies behold offereth continuall occaſion praiſe reioice preſſed downe weight fleſh placed far awaie thy countenance exile diſtracted variety world ala able woorthilie praiſe thee faith praiſe thee perfect knowledge theſe angelicall ſpirits praiſe thee knowledge faith fleſh cauſe praiſe thee otherwiſe doo notwithſtanding albeit ſing praiſes thee diuers ſorts yet thou art one god creator thing offered ſacrifice praiſe heauen earth one daie ſhall come vnto companie alwaies ſhall ſee thee praiſe thee without ceaſing lord grant while doo liue fraile bodie mine hart tongue bone may glorifie thee ſaie lord like vnto thee let thine holie memorie thy bleſſed ſweetneſſe poſſeſſe whole ſoule rauiſh deſire inuiſible thing let ſoule beſeech thee paſſe viſible vnto inuiſible terreſtriall vnto heauenlie tranſitorie thing vnto eternall let paſſe ſaie ſee thy woonderfull viſion thou art god almightie three perſons yet one ſubſtance godhead ſerue worſhip namelie father vnbegotten sonne onlie begotten father holie spirit proceeding remaining holie glorious trinitie one god almightie didſt mightilie make v thorough owne default loſt mercifullie maruellouſlie hadſt deliuered v oh ſuffer v prooue either vngratefull ſo great benefit vnwoorthie ſo manifold mercy unto thee doo praie ſue beſeech increaſe faith increaſe hope yea increaſe loue alſo ſame thy goodneſſe make v euermore ſtable faith fruitfull good work right faith work agreeable vnto faith may come thy mercie vnto euerlaſting life ſeeing thy perfect full glorie euen may worſhip thy maieſtie made woorthie behold thy glorie may ſing glorie father hath made v glorie sonne hath redeemed v glorie holie ghoſt hath ſanctified v glorie ſouereigne bleſſed trinitie whoſe work vnſeparable whoſe kingdome hath none end unto thee belongeth praiſe commendation honour bleſſing loue glorie power might vnto thee god euermore amen another praier verie forceable mooue mind vnto praiſes god ieſus art redemption loue deſire god god helpe thy ſeruant upon thee doo call vnto thee doo crie verie bottome mine hart thee doo call ſoule enter thereinto ioine thee thou maiſt poſſeſſe ſame without ſpot wrinkle moſt cleane lord muſt haue cleane habitation ſanctifie thy veſſell thou haſt made purge wickedneſſe fill thy grace repleniſhed keepe ſo may meete temple thy dwelling foreuer moſt good moſt gratious louing deere mightie deſired pretious amiable glorious god thou art ſweeter honie whiter milke ſnowe pleaſant nectar pretious gold iewels deerer wealth promotion world doo ſaie god mine onlie hope ſo infinite mercie doo ſaie happie quiet ſweetneſſe doo ſaie ſaie theſe thing ſaie able ſaie ſhould would god could ſaie melodious quiers angel doo ſaie willinglie would powre ſelfe wholie thy praiſes deuoutlie without ceaſing would ſing foorth thoſe pſalmes heauenlie muſicke vnto laud praiſe thy name middeſt congregation notwithſtanding becauſe cannot doo ſo ſhall ſtill wo talke thee openeſt mouth dumbe makeſt tongue babe eloquent wo talke thee babble much dumbe ſing thy praiſes praiſe thee woorthilie ynough vnutterable power wiſedome father albeit cannot find word wherewithall maie ſufficientlie expreſſe almightie allſkilfull word yet vntill thou call vnto thee may praiſe thee ſhould ought ſaie able wherefore mine humble requeſt thou wouldeſt reſpect doo ſaie deſire ſaie indeed doo mightilie deſire ſpeake thee ought becommeth bicauſe thee praiſe thee pſalmes thee honor glorie due complaint moued pricked contemplation praiers like angel tremble ſight god pardon mee lord pardon mee mercifullie forgiue mee haue mercie vpon mee ſpare mine ignorance great vnperfectneſſe doo reprooue raſh woman bicauſe dare ſo bold thy ſeruant would god either good ſeruant none vnprofitable euill ſeruant therefore euill woman becauſe praiſe bleſſe worſhip thee ought doo art god almightie terrible verie much feared worſhip thee ſaie without contrition hart without well teares ſo angel worſhip praiſe thee doo tremble beeing fulfilled maruellous gladneſſe ſinner while ſtand thee ſaieng praiſes offering ſacrifice affraid hart pale countenance doo lip quake tremble bodie afraid doo mourne bewaile thee ſuch ſort teares might ſpring mine eies would faine able bicauſe cannot doo deſire doo maketh mee trulie woonderfullie maruell mooued ſee eies faith thee art ſo fearefull doo anie thing without helpe thy grace except thou make ſtonie hart relent ſelues able mollifie helth dependeth vpon thy great mercie wretch ſoule made without anie feeling perceiuerance afraid ouermuch feare while ſtandeth god ſingeth owne praiſes ala hart ſo hardned mine eies doo guſh great flouds teares without ceaſſing ſeruant bondwoman doo commune talke lord maiſters preſence yea woman god creature creator made ſlime earth doo ſpeake made thing nothing put thee lord whatſoeuer perceiue ſelfe ſecrets hart doo keepe cloſe thy gratious eares thou art rich mercie liberall reward giue thy good may ſerue thee nothing elſe ſerue pleaſe thee thine owne gift thou haſt vouchſafed beſtowe vpon v faſten beſeech thee thy feare fleſh let hart reioice glad feare thy name would god ſinfull ſoule feared thee ſo much holie man ſaid alwaies feared god though great ſwelling flouds ſhould come tumble vpon god giuer good thing giue among thy praiſes well teares pureneſſe hart reioicing mind louing thee perfectlie worthilie praiſing thee may feele taſte fauour palate hart ſweete pleaſant thou art lord written doo ye taſte ſee ſweet delectable lord bleſſed man putteth truſt bleſſed people knoweth glad ioifull praiſing bleſſed man whoſe ſtrength thee whoſe hart thy way going vale miſerie vſeth well bleſſed cleane hart bicauſe ſhall ſee god bleſſed dwell houſe lord ſhall praiſe thee world without end amen verie deuout praier grace praiſe god thankfull benefit lord ieſus chriſt art word father cameſt world ſaue ſinners beſeech thee moſt louing bowel thy mercy amend repaire life make better deed take thou ordering manner take mee noieth hurteth diſpleaſeth thee giue thou knoweſt pleaſe thee profit make cleane conceiued vncleane ſeed thou alone thou art god almightie infinite pietie dooeſt iuſtifie make righteous euen thoſe wicked men raiſeſt againe life dead ſinne thou changeſt ſinners liue deadlie damnable ſinners take awaie therefore whatſoeuer pleaſeth thee thine eies doo ſee much vnperfectneſſe laie hand beſeech thee thy pitie whatſoeuer offendeth eies thy pietie remoue thy ſight health diſeaſe one beſeech thee preſerue cure doo thou heale lord ſhall healed thou make ſafe ſhall ſaued thou meane dooeſt make whole diſeaſed dooeſt preſerue cured onlie becke dooeſt reſtore repaire thing decaied fallen ruine thou wilt vouchſafe ſowe anie good ſeed feeld hart neceſſitie thou muſt plucke vp firſt hand thy pittie thornes vice moſt gratious moſt gentle moſt louing deſired amiable louelie others powre hart beſeech thee ſo great plentie delectation thee may deſire earthlie carnall thing yet thinke vpon may loue thee alone may haue thee onlie hart mouth write thy finger breſt delectable remembrance thy ſweet name ſo may blotted anie forgetfulneſſe write thy table mine hart alſo thy iuſtifications may alwaies euerie place haue thee lord mine eies ſight inflame mind fire thou diddeſt ſend earth willedſt kindled might offer vnto thee dailie teares ſacrifice troubled ſpirit repentant hart ſweet chriſt good ieſu euen according vnto deſire euen hartilie require thee whole mind giue thy holie chaſt loue may repleniſh keepe alſo fullie poſſeſſe giue euident ſigne token thy loue euen flowing well teares continuallie runne thoſe teares may ſomewhat teſtifie thy loue may ſhew foorth declare much ſoule loueth thee while great delectation hath ſweetnes thy loue may refraine ſhedding teares good lord call remembrance ſometimes vertuous woman hanna came tabernacle praie god would ſend hir ſonne ſcripture maketh mention hir countenance hir teares praiers againe changed altered thinke vpon ſo great vertue conſtancie ſtedfaſtneſſe woman doo bluſh vexed ſorrowe confounded ſhame bicauſe wretch doo perceiue ſelfe fallen ouermuch thee good woman weepe ſuch ſort continued ſo weeping ſearch nothing elſe ſonne ought ſinfull ſoule mourne perſiſt abide weeping ſeeketh looueth god hath deſire come vnto ought ſuch ſoule mourne weepe ſeeketh god daie night loue nothing chriſt teares trulie ſhould made meate vnto daie night looke vpon therefore lord take pittie bicauſe dolour ſorrowes hart manie number giue thy heauenlie conſolation doo deſpiſe caſt awaie ſinfull ſoule thou didſt die giue inward teares beſeech thee bottome hart may waſh awaie ſpots ſinnes repleniſh ſoule alwaies heauenlie delectation myrth may obteine ſome little portion part thy kingdome although amongſt perfect men whoſe ſteps cannot followe yet leaſt among religious woman inferiour ſort heere maruellous deuotion another woman called marie magdalen commeth mind vertuous loue godlie affection ſeeke thee lieng ſepulchre thy diſciples went awaie departed thee remaine thee hir ſelfe ſate ſad ſorowfull weeping long verie much ſhe ariſe ſhe ſearched diligent eie manie teares corner ſepulchre left emptie ſhe might eſpie thee anie place ſhe feruent deſire ſought yea moreouer ſhe went againe againe ſepulchre inough vnto hir neither ſatiſfie hir deſire grace good worke perſeuere continue ſame bicauſe ſhe loue louing ſhe wept weeping ſhe ſearched ſearching ſhe continued therfore thy pleaſure ſhe ſhould firſt find thee ſee thee talke thee onelie alſo ſhee tidingsbearer thy glorious reſurrection vnto thy diſciples thou didſt command bid hir ſaieng go tell brother go vnto galilie ſhall ſee c seeing therfore deuout woman weepe ſuch ſort continued weeping ſeeke thee waſt aliue among dead touched thee hand hir faith ought ſoule mourne continue mourning beleeueth thee hir mouth doth acknowledge thee hir redeemer ſitteſt heauen reigneſt euerie much therefore ought ſuch ſoule mourne weepe loueth thee hir hart hir whole deſire dooth couet ſee thee oh onlie refuge onlie hope wretch vnto man woman needeth anie time praie without hope mercie grant vnto grace thy ſake thy holie name ſake oft thinke vpon thee oft ſpeake thee write thee read thee confer thee oft euer remember thee ſtand thee offer vp praiſes praiers ſacrifice vnto thee ſo oft may weepe abundantlie teares thy ſight ſo teares may ſtead bread daie night thou trulie king glorie maiſter vertues haſt taught v thy word thine example mourne weepe whereas thou ſaieſt bleſſed mourne ſhall comforted thou didſt weepe thy frend lazarus dead didſt let teares fall downe plentiouſlie citie ſhould periſh beſeech thee good ieſu thoſe moſt pretious teares thy mercy pity wherewith thou didſt vouchſafe maruellouſlie helpe ſuccour v loſt giue grace weepe earneſtlie repentant ſinnes grace ſoule deſireth coueteth verie much except come thy gift cannot haue holie ghoſt dooth mollifie hard hart ſinners prouoketh weeping giue grace teares like thou gaueſt forefather mother whoſe example wee ought followe may bewaile ſelfe life like bewaile themſelues daie night giue deaw thy grace aboue alſo deaw teares beeneth teares may vnto ſtead bread daie night may made thy ſight lord god fire thy prouocation fat acceptable ſacrifice make mortified killed vpon altar mine hart may receiued thee fat ſweet ſmelling ſacrifice giue vnto good lord plentifull flowing cleere well teares may waſh continuallie fowle ſpotted ſacrifice although haue offered vp ſelfe wholie vnto thee helpe thy grace yet neuertheleſſe manie thing offend thee dailie bicauſe great fragilitie weakeneſſe giue therefore grace teares continuall repentance bleſſed god moſt eſpeciallie great ſweetneſſe thy loue remembrance thy mercy prepare table thy ſeruant thy ſight giue power oft liſt may ſatiſfied grant vnto thy goodneſſe pittie thy cup repleniſhed filled full may ſatiſfie thriſt ſpirit may couet thee mind may burne thy loue forgetting vanitie miſerie heare god heare light mine eies thou art ſtirrer vp quickener dull eares heare deſire aſke giue grace aſke thou heareſt pittifull lord art woont eaſilie intreated hard intreated bicauſe ſinnes thy goodneſſe receiue praiers thy ſeruant grant effect petition deſire amen godlie diuine meditation ioies celeſtiall para diſe vſed conuenient time church either publike ſeruice men preſent ought attentiue ſoule let v returne heauenlie citie wherin regiſtred made free citizen like fellowecitizens saint houſholdmeanie god like heires god coheires chriſt ſo let v little conſider happie roialtie citie ſo far foorth poſſible v conſider let v ſaie prophet glorious thing ſpoken thee thou citie god thou art dwelling place reioice ioie whole earth founded vpon thee thee anie age miſerie age thee anie maimed perſon anie lame man anie crooke backe anie miſhapen bodie growne vp perfect men full meaſure age chriſt bleſſeder thing ſuch life feare pouertie weakeneſſe diſeaſes man harmed man diſpleaſed man enuieth burning couetouſneſſe deſire meate ambitious ſuing honour authoritie dread diuell ſnares feends feare hell fire death euer euer ſhall neuer haue ſeene ynough ſoule let v thinke vpon ſaie diligent mind let v long whole hart let v ſigh hartilie deſire earneſtlie wiſh continuallie may ſoone come vnto vnto citie aboue whereof ſo glorious thing ſpoken wherein habitation reioice amen another diuine meditation happineſſe ſoules god eſpeciallie vſed haue ſung pſalme funerall sermon happie ſoule let looſe earthlie priſon flieth vp freelie heauen beholdeth thee hir moſt ſweete lord face face diſquieted anie feare death reioiceth euerlaſtingneſſe incorruptible glorie ſafe perill hencefoorth feareth neither enimie death poſſeſſeth thee hir mercifull lord ſhe hath long ſought euer loued accompanieng hir ſelfe quiers pſalmeſingers ſhe ſingeth continuallie ſugred ſongs euerlaſting mirth glorie thee king chriſt gratious ieſu ſhe made drunken bountifulneſſe thy houſe thou makeſt hir drinke ſtreame thy pleaſures happie fellowſhip heauenlie citizen glorious ſolemnitie returne ſorrowfull trauell pilgrimage pleaſantnes beautie beautie brightneſſe flower excellencie thy citizen behold thee continuallie lord nothing may trouble mind offered eare ſongs inſtruments carol melodie muſicke ſoundeth without end ſound alwaies moſt pleaſant tune hymnes pſalmes moſt ſweet melodie angel moſt woonderfull ditty ſongs ſung thy glorie celeſtiall inhabitant heauenlie harmonie harſhneſſe gallie bitterneſſe iangling diſcords haue anie roome within thy realme neither naughtie perſon naughtineſſe none aduerſarie impugner neither inticement ſinne needineſſe ſhame bralling miſvſage excuſing feare vnquietneſſe penaltie doubtfulneſſe violence diſcord contention perfect peace full loue continuall reioicing praiſing god careleſſe reſt without end euerlaſting gladneſſe holie ghoſt luckie ſhould ſillie wretch lord ieſus chriſt another longing ioies heauenlie zion lightſome glorions houſe god haue loued thy goodlineſſe place glorie lord god enioieth hath created thee doth dwell mine exile ſigh thee night daie mine hart longeth mind coueteth ſoule deſireth come vnto ſocietie happineſſe praier vnto made would poſſeſſe thee bicauſe hath made deſire holie fellowſhip woonderfull glorie anie merit mine owne truſt attaine therevnto price bloud namelie ieſus chriſt whereby redeemed confeſſe haue gone aſtraie like loſt ſheepe haue long dwelled natiue ſoile far awaie caſt face lord god blindneſſe baniſhment driuen ioies paradiſe bewaile ſelfe dailie miſerie captiuitie ſing wofull ſong great lamentation remember thee mother ieruſalem feete doo ſtand thy court ſacred comlie zion able plainlie looke thine inner place notwithſtanding haue good hope vpon ſhoulders good ſhepheard thy creator brought back vnto thee may triumph againe vnſpeakable ioie withall cheered dwell thee god maieſtie sauiour chriſt hath abrogated fleſh hatred pacified thing heauen earth bloud peace made one ioining two contrarie wals together hath promiſed giue euerlaſting felicitie happineſſe himſelfe like maner meaſure ſaid ſhall like angel god heauen another longing deſire ſoule ſupernall ieruſalem mother ieruſalem holie citie god deerly beloued ſpouſe chriſt thee dooth mine hart couet ſoule exceedingly loue thy beautie oh comlie glorious honourable art thou thou art faire ſpot thee triumph reioice beautifull daughter prince king hath pleaſure thy faireneſſe loueth thy goodlie perſonage thou fairer child men beloued thou faireſt among woman welbeloued welbeloued white ruddie chiefe ten thouſand like apple tree foreſt ſo welbeloued among ſonnes men ſhadowe delight lo ſit fruit ſweet vnto mouth welbeloued put hand hole doore mine hart affectioned towards bed night ſought ſoule loued ſought found hold let go vntill bring mother houſe chamber hir conceiued thou wilt giue mee thy teates moſt abundantlie perfectlie wilt ſatiſfie mine hart maruelous ſatietie ſo ſhall neither hunger thirſt anie oh happie ſhall ſoule yea happie alwaies happie ſhall could get behold thy glorie thine happineſſe thy beautie thy gate thy wals thy ſtreets thy manifold manſions thy noble citizen thy mightie king maieſtie thy wals pretious ſtones thy gate richeſt pearl thy ſtreets pure gold wherein ſoong ioifull halleluiah without intermiſſion thy manifold building founded vpon ſquared ſtones builded vpon saphyres incloſed golden wals whereinto none ſhall enter cleane neither ſhall anie vncleane perſon inhabit beautifull art thou become mother ieruſalem ſweete thy comfort ſuch thing thee ſuffer world behold wretched life neither darknes night anie change time thee ſhineth thee either light lampe brightneſſe moone glittering ſtarres god god light light euen ſunne righteouſneſſe euermore doth enlighten thee white vnſpotted lambe thy pure cleare light thy ſunne cleereneſſe euerlaſting contemplation moſt glorious king thine happineſſe king king middeſt thee miniſters ſinging quire angel company ſupernall citizen ſolemnitie haue returned wofull peregrination vnto thy ioies prudent prophet twelue apoſtles victorious hoſt infinite martyr ſacred conuent holie confeſſors vpright men holie virgin haue ouercome pleaſures world weakeneſſe ſexe thoſe yoong men maiden old men matron haue ſpent time godlie conuerſation ſheepe lamb haue eſcaped ſnares world triumph ſeuerall manſions glorie particular man differeth common ioie full perfect charitie doth reigne god whome doo alwaies behold beholding continuallie burne loue towards loue praiſe praiſe loue worke praiſe god without ending without fainting without toiling happie yea euermore happie ſhall reſolution mortall bodie may heare thoſe celeſtiall ſongs melodie ſung vnto praiſe eternall king thoſe citizen ſupernall countrie company bleſſed ſpirits happie yea much happie ſhould might counted woorthie ſing thoſe ſugred ſongs wait king god captaine behold glorie according hath promiſed ſaieng father whome thou haſt giuen euen may behold glorie thee foundation world another place anie man ſerue let followe ſhall alſo ſeruant againe loueth ſhall loued father loue ſhew mine owne ſelfe vnto another godlie christian praier church congregation preſentlie aſſembled although holie scripture doo teach v euerie heauen moſt good mercifull god thy dwelling place yet ſame doth ſuch wiſe ſet thine infinite goodneſſe church called alſo deede thy ſanctified houſe wherein thou moſt frequenteſt wherein alſo thy bleſſed name lifted vp high praiſes faithfull inſtructed thy ſacred word holie sacrament dulie receiued therefore godlie hauing eſpeciall regard honour thy glorious name moſt earneſtlie feruent mind vehement affection doo continuallie ſtir vp one another make holie aſſemblies woonderfull exhortation intent pure worſhipping holie inuocating thy bleſſed name might onlie therein practiſed therefore time ſo euer ſhall come together holie congregation earneſt requeſt wee may cheerefull verie deſirous mind thou trulie haſt exceeding liberalitie adorned thy holie church moſt flouriſhing right excellent gift neither anie thing pretermitted apperteineth hir garniſhing may either belong ſpirituall decking beautifieng thereof plentious enriching abundance heauenlie good thing ſeeing haue proceeded moſt fullie thee onlie remaineth thou wouldeſt preſent v aſſembled together name ieſus chriſt ſo condeſcend vnto feruent praiers thereby doo call vpon thee member thereof may annexed together perpetuall concord cauſe meeting ſaie good father ſuch ſort may render due honour vnto thee let ſacred scripture heere purelie ſincerelie interpreted let thy glorious kingdome daie daie inlarged making theſe thing eſtabliſhed thy ioious peace tranquillitie thy holie ſpirit yea ſo long praie quietneſſe felicitie heereof let v procure ſubſtantiall perfect good thing neighbour alſo vnto thy bleſſed houſe holie ſanctified church cauſe thoſe citizen doo credit ſacred doctrine thy holie church may thy excellent benefit become frends faithfull brother one another end beeing quite deliuered thrall bring thou paſſe one daie may altogether repoſe ſelues true moſt holie ieruſalem ieſus chriſt lord amen another praier increaſe church church vnto thee moſt good mercifull god moſt roiall queene eſpouſed intent ſhe may bring foorth vnto thee moſt plentifull holie ſeede wherefore foraſmuch thou haſt coupled hir vnto thee thy wife faith ſhe reputed vngodlie barren woman becauſe ſhee ſeemeth haue left childbearing grant hir made vnto thee thy ſacred word holie ſpirit afruitfull ioifull mother manie holie vertuous child whome thy glorious name may exalted perpetuall praiſes thine holie houſe euen becommeth let hir glad perfect ſubſtantiall ioy great number hir moſt faithfull religious ſonnes daughter multiplie increaſe iſſue thy ſacred church ſaie god plentifull innumerable iſſue let hir ingender godlie child vnto thee dailie euen ſuch worthie ſuch father mother partaker thy bleſſed ſpirit grant may altogether aſpire vnto loue thee moſt delectable bridegroome throughour labour laid together ſtead forefather alreadie gathered vnto thee manie mo faithfull religious holie child may begotten vnto thee anew may alwaies poſterities ſet celebrate thy famous honour moſt noble praiſes shine thou downe zion god euen thine exceeding high vnapprochable light vpon virgin thy bleſſed church preſerue hir number peril ſhe cōtinuall danger let hir fall ruine lampe deſpiſed opinion rich welthie men world let thy mountaines gliſter giue light lamp fire yea let righteouſnes ſaluation breake forth zion ſhining light burning lamp men may ſee glorifie thee let lamp hir loue ſaie god coales fire verie vehement flame lord dazell ouercome conſume hir enimies woonderfull miraculous manner cauſe ſeuen lampes uirgins euen thy ſpirituall gift grace god saincts burne bright cleere without anie quenching thy throne euer let thy church flouriſhing uine ſpreading ſelfe far abroade ſo antichriſt craft induſtrie may force cut hew downe euen thou lord haſt euerie maruellouſlie repleniſhed earth thine ineſtimable goodneſſe ſo like manner ſo good let number thy true faithfull ſuppliants bee dailie greatlie enlarged let bee continuall labouring thy beloued church doctrine example nurture bleſſed child ſo work may ſingular ornament thereof thy glorie increaſe manner vertue let hir ſaie made dailie like vnto moſt fruitefull woman may compared ranke oliues exceeding fertile uines grant continuall ofſpring thy deere child may multiplied thy bleſſed church become notable peace praiſes puritie life doctrine renowmed honour thy glorious name ieſus chriſt lord amen another praier preſeruation church celeſtiall god father infinite mercie compaſſion onelie gathereſt thy ſelfe holie church world mankind operation holie ghoſt preaching thy word alſo preſerueſt ſame gathered adorneſt kind temporall thing eternall bliſſe humblie beſeech thee gratious lord thy goodneſſe thou wouldeſt vouchſafe euermore mainteine thy little flocke embracing preaching profeſſing thy word thine eſpeciall grace continue thy fauour toward ſame keepe ſound doctrine conſtant confeſſing lawfull vſe thy holie sacrament pureneſſe life neither gate hell rage sathan yet rigorouſneſſe tyrannie world oppreſſe ſame protect keepe thy boate little barke toſſed among manie perillous tempeſts miſerable ſurges raging ſea trouble ſome world periſh ouerwhelmed uphold thy church builded vpon ſure rocke dependeth vpon chriſt ſound vnmoueable foundation lord hoſtes returne looke downe heauen behold viſit thy uine make perfect thy right hand hath planted thou haſt choſen thy ſelfe hedge ſame thy ſtrong defence branch thereof ſpread pruned may bring foorth aboundance fruite raiſe vp thy power come god ſaue v conuert v ſhewe foorth thy countenance ſhall ſaued encreaſe thy ſheepe within thy hardels ſo ſhall quiet inuaſion ſcatterings neither anie drawe v force thy hand defend v ſuch ſeeke vtter ouerthrowe pure religion place thereof labour bring ſhamefull inſtauration blaſphemous idolatrie suffer thy word moſt cleere vnchangeable light corrupted put meanes gather thy ſelfe ſound goſpell ſuch church may harken vnto thee honour ſanctifie thy name well word honeſt conuerſation ſo thou maiſt haue righteous holie generation celebrating thy goodneſſe euermore ioine v vnto companie doth worſhip thee continuallie may citizen thy kingdome among thy saincts grant erre frō foundation wholſome doctrine anſwering rule ſacred scripture offend againſt conſcience ſeparate v companie vngodlie one damned crue reprobate let v ſo much take name mouth powre heapes blaſphemies thy great diſhonour defacing thy truth vnto thy ſonne deſtruction ſtone offence deſpiſe baſe eſtate fooliſh preaching thy goſpell deformed ſhew church placed midſt kind miſeries loath abhor preferring vncertaine rich lordlie authoritie vaine pleaſures tranſitorie world profeſſion truth ſo making warre thy ſonne doo purchaſe euerlaſting deſtruction vnto themſelues keepe v euermore wee may abide church trulie catholike conſiſting member manie nation linked vnto thee one ſame confeſſion sanctifie v thine holie ſpirit ſinnes forgiuen v wee may take another trade life acknowledging thee onlie true god ieſus chriſt thou haſt ſent giue vnto thy church reſting place neſts may ſound thy ſacred goſpell purelie without corruption suppreſſe diuell ſpredeth blaſphemies againſt thy doctrine ſo neither feined god may erected ſuperſtitious inuocations confirmed thy glorie defaced weaken power thine enimies boile hatred againſt thy truth conſpire death thine elect ſo neither ſhall ſtables woolues made dennes theeues eſtabliſhed lord returne quicken v ſo ſhall thy people reioice thee let ſuch truſt thee reioice triumph euer dwell thou let thoſe loue thy name reioice thee lord remember offence thou waſt ſomtime mercifull forgaueſt wickedneſſe thy people hidſt ſinnes withdrawedſt thine anger turnedſt fierceneſſe thine indignation mindfull thy woonted mercie receiue v thy fauour depend vpon thee alone deſtitute worldlie aid truſt wholie thee confidence reſteth thy ſtretchedout arme lord couer v thy grace ſhield ſo may bleſſed abiding houſe thy congregation may acknowledge call vpon thee according thy word reuealed praiſe thee euermore lord ieſus chriſt amen praier vnitie faith religion eternall god moſt mercifull father haſt called v vnitie true catholike faith gathered v thy word lap chriſtian congregation wee may v one bodie one ſpirit euen wee called one hope calling one lord one faith one baptiſme one god father aboue v euen thou father art thy ſonne thee ſo ſhould alſo one thee god therefore crie vnto thee almightie father eternall god teach v thy way may walke thy truth knit hart vnto thee may feare thy name grant faithfull may like affected one mind thou art thinking vnderſtanding right knowledge thy ſacred scripture without ſtrife contention may ſpeake one thing let diſſentions ſchiſmes among v let nothing done contention vaine glorie let v one bodie indued one mind iudgment according thy word reuealed vntill attaine vnitie faith knowledge thy ſonne perfect man according meaſure age fulneſſe chriſt head whole bodie coupled knit together euerie ioint furniture thereof according effectuall power meaſure euerie part receiueth increaſe bodie vnto edifieng ſelfe loue moſt holie father keepe v thy name wee may one thee among v beleeuers may one hart auoid fooliſh vnlearned queſtions knowing engender ſtrife contention ſerue nothing ſubuerting hearer ingraffing error deſire ſtrife certainlie god dwelleth raiſe tumult nothing diſquiet thy flocke nouriſh chriſtian concord among v wee glued together louing hart may one mind thee ſo ſhall thy pure doctrine zealouſlie mainteined falſe interpretation ſcripture obſtinatelie defended bring home thy infirmity glorie thy name ſake turne v thoſe euils moſt worthilie haue deſerued grant trouble may put whole truſt confidence thy mercie euermore ſerue thee holineſſe pureneſſe life thy honour glorie curate almightie euerlaſting god onlie workeſt great maruels ſend downe vpon biſhops curate congregation committed charge healthfull ſpirit thy grace may trulie pleaſe thee powre vpon continuall dewe thy bleſſing grant lord honour aduocate mediatour ieſu chriſt amen praier chryſostome almightie god haſt giuen v grace time one accord make common ſupplications vnto thee dooeſt promiſe two three gathered together thy name thou wilt grant requeſts fulfill lord deſires petition thy ſeruants may moſt expedient granting v world knowledge thy truth world come life euerlaſting amen 2 corinth 13 verſe 13 grace lord ieſus chriſt loue god fellowſhip holie ghoſt bee v euermore amen ¶ godlie collect praiers vſed letanie occaſion ſerueth firſt time drought raine god heauenlie father thy ſonne comfort thy honor ieſus chriſt lord amen another almightie god mercifull father thy holie word haſt promiſed heare praiers thy people ſhall make place thy holie temple behold thou haſt ſhut vp heauen raine giuen vnto earth drought doth vtterlie deſtroie fruites earth ſinnes iniquity come vnto thee confeſſe ſinnes wherewith haue prouoked thee thus anger againſt v thy creature ſakes ſaie whome thou dooeſt iuſtlie thus afflict drought barrenneſſe earth returne vnto thee hart faſting weeping mourning beſeeching thee hartie earneſt praier haue mercie vpon v deale v haue righteouſlie deſerued heare thou heauen pardon ſinnes thy ſeruants giue raine vnto land thou haſt giuen people inhabit heare lord ſaie crie man beaſt open treaſures heauens giue vnto v moderate ſhowres water earth cattell may bee ſatiſfied drought ceaſſe oh lord haſt thou vtterlie reiected v doth thy ſoule abhorre thy people euer thou haſt ſo long plagued v drought want water iniquity deede teſtifie againſt v rebellion numbred haue ſinned againſt heauen againſt thee haue beene verie noiſome earth thy creature therin lord thou hope iſrael thou comfort helpe ſauiour trouble haue mercie vpon v haue mercie vpon v doo abhorre v caſt v euer lord anie among god gentile ſend raine heauens themſelues giue ſhowres earth onlie thou lord god haſt made heauen earth dooeſt thing thy mightie power muſt doo ſaue people therefore call vpon thee let daie come wherein thou wilt vouchſafe heare v lord ſaie thou wilt heare heauens heauens may heare earth earth heare corne wine oile heare one another thou heare iſrael thou maiſt haue mercie vpon v cauſe come downe v raine euen firſt raine latter raine firſt ſecond moneths due ſeaſons vpon earth barn may full wheate preſſes abound wine oile cattell ſerue labour thy bleſſing man beaſt may ceaſe mourning haue cauſe reioice thy mercie graunt v father ieſus chriſts ſake onlie mediator aduocate whome thee holie ghoſt honor glorie euer amen another praier fruit earth lord god almightie king heauen earth thine abundant goodneſſe dooſt adorne repleniſh earth kind fruit graine whereby life man beaſt ſuſteined beſeech thee euen thy free mercie thou wouldeſt vouchſafe bleſſe feelds ground make proſperouſlie yeeld corne increaſe without thy bleſſing fauour neither earth ſelfe bring foorth anie whit paine make ſame proſper wherefore grant thing ſpringing earth meet temperature aire luckilie may take increaſe keepe fruit vpon face earth infection aire thunder haile vntimelie ſhowers great drineſſe ouermuch heate woormes hurtfull beaſts deuouring prime corruption land thine anger deſolate denie v fruit enioieng hir wofull sabboth shut vp heauens thine indignation ſinnes iron earth braſſe wherby tilled ploughed ſowne ſo come verie plaine vtter wilderneſſe thy goodneſſe giue v earlie latter raine may haue abundance fruit ioifull harueſt plentifull vintage god ſend gratious raine vpon thine inheritance giue thy bleſſing ground may bring foorth hir fruit cauſe thy raine powre downe due ſeaſon may raine bleſſing whereby tree may giue fruit ground yeeld foorth hir graine grant alſo aire pure infection body free ſickneſſe whole realme peace quietneſſe ſafelie without trouble may enioie thy gift driue awaie repell v malediction deſtroier giue v ſtead raine duſt aſhes open thy good treaſures viſit land thy bleſſing make drunken enrich abundantlie thy riuer lord full water prepare corne diſpoſe earth proſper water abundantlie furrowes ſame cauſe raine deſcend vallies thereof make ſame ſoft ſhowers bleſſe bud crowne yeere thy goodneſſe let thy cloud drop fatneſſe let drop vpon paſtures wilderneſſe make little hils reioice euerie ſide let plaines repleniſhed ſheepe vallies corne inhabitant earth may reioice merie lord thou cauſeſt graſſe growe cattell herb ye vſe man thou bringeſt foorth bread earth wine make glad hart man oile make countenance cheerfull bread ſtrengthen hart haue therefore care heauenlie father ſeed thing ſpringing earth keepe cold raine ice ſnowe beating wind iniurie weather preſerue extreame heat drineſſe moiſtneſſe ſuch like periſh afore time roote deſtroier neither blaſting mildew graſhopper neither caterpiller hurting fruit earth keepe v lord time dearth periſh hunger confounded perilous time thou art god creator ſatiſfieſt thirſtie ſoule filleſt hungrie goodneſſe haſt ſaid faile neither forſake thee whereby faithfull may ſaie lord v therefore feare man doo vnto v behold miſerable great ſinners doo confeſſe wickednes groning griefe hart crieng vnto thee art heauen heare praiers thy dwelling place mercifull thy people haue ſinned againſt thee forgiue v iniquity wherein haue tranſgreſſed againſt thee ſinnes wee haue brought theſe miſeries hang ouer head blot offence god thy manifold mercy take awaie v curſe ground people may praiſe thee god yea people may praiſe thee earth bring foorth hir increaſe lord ieſus chriſt thine onelie ſonne liueth reigneth thee vnitie holie ſpirit god euermore amen faire weather lord god ſinne man didſt drowne world except eight perſons afterward thy great mercie didſt promiſe neuer deſtroie ſo againe humblie beſeech thee although oure iniquity haue woorthilie deſerued plague raine water yet vpon true repentance thou wilt ſend v ſuch weather whereby may receiue fruit earth due ſeaſon learne thy puniſhment amend liues thy clemencie giue thee praiſe glorie ieſus chriſt lord amen praier time vnſeaſonable ſhowers faire weather god mercifull father wee acknowledge manifold ſinnes haue deſerued ſharpelie rebuked corrected thee thou ſhouldeſt deale v ſinnes able abide thy wrath heauie hand wherfore deale mercifullie v lord greatneſſe thy goodneſſe multitude thy mercy wee rather may reioice thankfull vnto thee abundance thy great mercie louing kindneſſe caſt downe diſcouraged heauie weight thy hand thy hand lord heauen earth ſo gouerne therefore beſeech thee thy name ſake may haue ſeaſonable weather receiue fruit earth staie unmoderate plentie raine vnſeaſonable weather powre rather vpon v plentifull dew thy ſpirit may dailie growe perfection chriſtian men woman take awaie v ſtonie hart giue vnto v ſtead hart fleſh may ceaſe length thus prouoke thy wrath bring vpon v either ſo great plague loſſe fruit earth either elſe plague thy iuſt iudgments grant may ſo repent v former euils hereafter woorthie fruit true repentance may continuallie appeare therein ſo paſſe ouer end mortall liues laſt may attaine vnto bleſſed reſurrection life euerlaſting ieſus chriſt lord amen time thunder lightening raging tempeſts vnſeaſonable weather praie thus moſt wiſe mightie god thou art glorious king world thy woonderfull maieſtie doth ſhine knowne alſo raine thundering lightening meteor ingendred aire thy throne among cloud thou haſt made darkeneſſe thy ſecrete place thy pauilion thee euen darkneſſe water cloud aire brightneſſe thy preſence cloud doo paſſe awaie ſo doo haileſtones firie coales thou dooeſt thunder heauens giueſt thy voice haileſtones coales fire thou ſendeſt thine arrowes ſcattereſt thou increaſeſt lightening deſtroieſt ſo great god thou god thou art god dooeſt woonders declareſt thy power among nation thou redeemeſt thy people thine arme water ſawe thee afraid depth trembled cloud powred water aire thundered thine arrowes went abroad voice thy thunder heard round world earth trembled ſhooke foundation earth ſhooke diſcouered thy rebuking lord blaſting breath thy noſtrels therefore ſhall verie heauens extoll thy woonderous work saint ſet foorth thy truth congregation equall thee heauen like thee among ſonnes god thou art verie terrible aſſemblie ſaints reuerenced aboue thee lord god hoſts like vnto thee art mightie lord thy truth thee thou ruleſt raging ſea thou ſtilleſt waues thereof doo ariſe thou onlie art power reſolue vapour drop ſea heat ſunne thou takeſt ſame vp turned airie ſubſtance againe turneſt meere water makeſt come powring downe vpon face earth whatſoeuer thou wilt thou dooeſt heauen earrh ſea deepe place thy power thou madeſt earth thy wiſdome thou haſt eſtabliſhed world thy diſcretion ſtretcheſt heauens ſoone thou letteſt thy voice heard water aire waxe fierce thou draweſt vp cloud end earth thou turneſt lightening raine bringeſt foorth wind thy treaſures thou couereſt heauens cloud prepareſt raine earth thou makeſt graſſe growe vpon mountaines prouideſt herb vſe man thou giueſt beaſts food yoong rauens crie behold ſo great art thou thou paſſeſt knowledge neither number thy yeeres ſearched thou reſtraineſt drop water raine powreth downe vapour thereof falleth abundantlie vpon man thou bringeſt foorth wind thy treaſures thy ſecret place thou diddeſt hide great abundance might readie thy commandement come foorth thou thinkeſt good thou makeſt cloud labour giue water earth ſcattereſt cloud thy light thou turneſt thy gouernement may doo whatſoeuer thou commandeſt vpon whole world god mine hart troubled verie ſore behold immoderate ſhowers heare terrible thunder yea forſaketh place heare noiſe thy voice ſpeech proceeding thy mouth god ruleſt heauen earth moſt humblie beſeech thee mercifullie driue awaie atleaſt mitigate theſe mightie ſtreames moſt raging tempeſts reſtraine thunderbolt thy firie dart hurt v keepe v neſts periſh lightening deſtroied thy thunderclap protect houſes v neither conſumed thy firie meteor drowned thy ſudden floud mercifull god raine beſeech thee haileſtones vpon face earth neither ſtrike ſuch field man beaſt strike thou therewith herbes feeld neither breake thou gratious lord tree land deſtroie corne haileſtones haileſtones ſmite thou cattell deliuer flock thunderbolt caſt feerceneſſe thy wrath anger diſpleaſure vpon v giue v haileſtones raine neither flame fire land thy mercie conuert thunder gentle raine whereby may bring fruit aboundantlie send among v either vntimelie vntemperate ſhowres either noiſome fruit bring mildew deſtroie corne reſtraine like ſort wind violent tempeſts bring none hurt neither v good euen chriſtes ſake lord sauiour amen time dearth famine god heauenlie father whoſe gift raine doth fall earth fruitfull beaſts increaſe fiſhes doo multiplie behold beſeech thee affliction thy people graunt ſcarſitie dearth doo moſt iuſtlie ſuffer iniquitie may thy goodneſſe mercifullie turned cheapeneſſe plentie loue ieſu chriſt lord whome thee holie ghoſt bee praiſe euer amen another praier time anie plague ſickneſſe warre penurie orſcarſeneſſe c eternall euerliuing god moſt mercifull father thy great long ſuffering patience haſt hitherto ſuffered borne v moſt miſerable offender haue ſo long ſtraied thy waie broken thy lawes commandements haue neither thy manifold benefit beſtowed vpon v vnworthie vnthankefull ſinners voice thy ſeruants preacher continuall threatnings thy holie word hitherto bin moued child loue returne vnto thee moſt gratious father either feare thy iudgements humble lowlie ſeruants turne wickedneſſe therefore moſt righteous iudge thy patience ouercome laſt obſtinate repentance thou haſt moſt iuſtlie executed thoſe thy terrible threat partlie vpon v plaguing v ſo moſt dreadfull deadlie ſickneſſe trouble warres penurie ſcarſeneſſe foode victuall whereby great multitude v dailie afflicted conſumed beſeech thee moſt mercifull father thy wrath thou wilt remember thine old great mercy correct v thy iudgements thy iuſt anger leaſt conſumed brought naught looke ſo much vpon deſeruings moſt righteous iudge take iuſt vengeance ſinnes rather remember thine infinit mercy moſt mercifull father promiſed v thy deerelie beloued ſonne sauiour ieſus chriſt whoſe ſake whoſe name doo earneſtlie humblie craue mercie forgiueneſſe ſinnes deliuerance horrible ſickneſſe war dearth c thy iuſt puniſhment plague ſame thy holie word doth teſtifie thy people age iuſtlie plagued ſinnes yet diſtreſſe vnfeinedlie turning vnto thee ſuing thy mercie obteined ſame ſo likewiſe moſt worthilie afflicted greeuous dreadfull plague iniquity praie thee moſt mercifull father grant v thy heauenlie grace may likewiſe trulie vnfeinedlie repent obtaine thy mercie deliuerance ſame beſeech thee father mercy god conſolation grant v ſame ieſus chriſts ſake onlie ſauiour mediator aduocate amen time anie common plague ſickneſſe almightie god thy wrath time king dauid diddeſt ſlea plague peſtilence threeſcore tenne thouſand yet remembring thy mercie didſt ſaue reſt haue pitie vpon v miſerable ſinners viſited great ſickneſſe mortalitie like thou didſt command thine angel ceaſe puniſhing ſo may pleaſe thee withdrawe v plague greeuous ſickneſſe ieſus chriſt lord amen forme meditation praier verie meete vſed dailie honſholders houſes eſpeciallie dangerous contagious time plague maiſter miſtres kneeling familie ſome conuenient place houſe well perfumed frankincenſe ſome wholeſome thing iuniper roſemarie roſewater vineger c ſhall feruent hart ſaie cauſe ſaid followeth ſeruants familie euerie petition ſhall ſaie amen maister mistreſſe reade thy holie word lord bleſſings thou haſt thy mercie promiſed liue obedientlie according thy bleſſed commandements wee reade alſo curſſes thy inſtice hath pronounced againſt ſuch deſpiſe thy word negligentlie paſſe liue thereafter among reſt thy heauie curſſes thou threateneſt name plague peſtilence noiſome moſt painfull diſeaſes ſuch forſaking thee worſhip ſtrange god followe owne vaine fantaſies ſtead thy ſacred ordinance find alſo extreamelie thine owne people iewes haue oftentimes fealt performance theſe thy bitter threatenings ſundrie diuers offence bicauſe loathed manna contented thy miraculous prouiſion would haue qualies daintie victual content luxurious appetite thou ſleweſt ſo manie ſudden mightie plague place buriall named thereof called graues luſt alſo murmuring againſt miniſters thy word moſes aaron thou deſtroiedſt ſudden plague xiiij thouſand beſides thoſe traitor earth ſwallowed rebellion aaron intreated gone betweene quicke dead thou wouldeſt haue conſumed thou waſt minded haue done deſpiſed plentifull land thou hadſt promiſed moſes ſtaied thy wrath thou ſaiedſt ſtrike peſtilence vtterlie deſtroie furthermore loſt thine ark owne ſinnes ſinnes prieſts keeper therof philiſtines forced thy plaguing hand religiouſly ſend home againe thou ſtrookeſt plague fiftie thouſand bethſamites thy people raſhlie preſuming looke ſame hauing thy warrant ſo doo time king dauid thou deſtroiedſt three ſcore ten thouſand thy people three day thy waſting plague peſtilence mooued thereto tranſgreſſion dauid king ſinnes people thou ſufferedſt tempted ſubdued vaine curioſitie number people alſo ſhortlie death immaculate lambe sauiour thou ſufferedſt plague reigne among member bodie church corinthian worthilie preparing themſelues miſvſing sacrament bodie bloud sauiour ieſus chriſt manie died thereof thine holie apoſtle saint paule hath taught v since time lord monument thy church chronicle doo declare thou haſt time time ſo plagued peſtilence onelie city alſo whole country theſe like cauſes may iuſtlie looke comming sauiour ſo manie ſo horrible peſtilences haue beene among v alreadie cauſes lord thou haſt ſo afflicted thy people malice satan wilfull conſenting vnto growne ſo ripe v exceeding greatnes thy mercie compaſſion ſhould preſentlie periſh woorthilie ſo horrible outragious iniquity loath onelie plentifull prouiſion wholeſome victual apparell thou haſt giuen v body abundantlie manie nation trauelling meanes get wherewith pamper fleſh wine ſpices ſilks vaine coſtlie delighting thing pretious manna ſoules thy holie word sacrament awaie ſo full glutted therewith ſo little eſteeme heauenlie kingdome sauiour hath ſo deerlie prepared kindlie promiſed v abhor readie ſtone thoſe commend exhort v owne good trauell thitherward better liking crediting thoſe falſe prophet epicure atheiſts lie diſcourage v therefrom murmuring grudging make againſt miniſters thy word thou thine eſpeciall goodneſſe haſt mercie giuen v deſpiſe wee biſhops preacher miniſters thy holie sacrament thou haſt commanded v reuerence honour wicked liues wretchedlie leeſe arke thy holie word true miniſtration sacrament manie yeeres agone popiſh philiſtines tooke v thou thy plague laid vpon haſt miraculouſlie ſent againe ſee hold bethſamites vnreuerentlie receiue manie make gazingſtocke ſerue eies tongue rather lawe obeie followe liues yea knowledge thy truth goodneſſe mercie breedeth manie v careleſſe ſecuritie contempt thy holie ordinance preſume vpon thy mercie promiſes regarding condition anie thy commandements baptiſme vowed obſerue yea make thy goſpell cloke couetouſneſſe vnder colour whereof ſeeke owne lucre hide wicked filthie practiſes corinthian deſerued plagued abuſing thy holie sacrament much wee woorthie fierce wrath onelie abuſe alſo abhor contemne bicauſe miniſtred ought thou knoweſt lord ſort bewitched diuell pope doctrine doo vtterlie abhor chriſts holie communion ſauing feare lawe would neuer come ſort theſe receiue prepared vnknowne vnto thee raſhlie alſo vnaduiſedlie vnprepared common multitude doo frequent partlie appeareth manie neuer forgiue old offence reconcile themſelues anie thing doo amend old ſinnes vice seeing lord common ſort multitude doo thus abound kind wickedneſſe thou thy iuſtice muſt ſuffer magiſtrates offend alſo ſomewhat end thou maiſt iuſtlie take vengeance ſinnes theſe manifold heapes ſinnes wickedneſſes lord thou haſt iuſtlie preſent ſent dangerous peſtilence among v thou haſt often long time threatened mouthes thy faithfull preacher continuallie haue called vpon v ſtaie thy wrath earneſt repentance amendement life haue alwaies beene deafer deafer delight ſinnes onlie ſtopped eares alſo hardened hart againſt hartie friendlie admonition lord doo begin feele acknowledge ſinnes commeth thy rigour plaguing v anie good inclination ſelues mollifie therefore lord flintie hart ſuppling moiſture thy holie ſpirit make v reuerence thee child loue thy mercy dread thee like ſlaues feare puniſhment seruants amen maiſter maiſtres deere father reclaime v thy loſt child mercifull sauiour pitie v thy putrified member holie ghoſt repaire v thy decaied temple holie glorious trinitie haue mercie vpon v miſerable ſinners seruants amen maiſter grant v lord ſuch true repentance may bloud sauiour blot ſtaines heinous iniquity forgiue v ſinnes lord forgiue v ſinnes thine infinite mercy ſake seruants amen maiſter forgiue v blaſphemies idolatry periuries forget vaine outragious oths thou haſt thy rigour plague forced v acknowledge thee iuſt righteous lord ſo let v thy mercie forgiueneſſe feele thee mild louing father giue v grace euer hereafter reuerence thy glorious name seru amen maiſter take v god care worldlie vanity make v content neceſſaries plucke awaie hart delighting honour treaſures pleaſures life ingender v deſire thee thine eternall kingdome giue v lord ſuch taſte feeling thine vnſpeake able ioies heauen may alwaie long therfore ſaieng thine elect haſten thy kingdome lord take v thee seru amen maiſter make v lord obedient thy reuealed thy holie word make v diligent walke thy commandements forgiue v contempt murmuring againſt magiſtrates miniſters thou haſt thy mercie appointed make v obedient vnto godlie lawes doctrine saue preſerue lord thine annointed qveene elizabeth ſhe thy grace feare may long reigne amongſt v giue peace chriſtian nation mooue v thy ſpirit loue one another member bodie may doo thy earth heauen seru amen maiſter dig v lord venemous root couetouſneſſe concupiſcence elſe ſo repreſſe thy grace may contented thy prouiſion neceſſaries labour doo toile ſtrength guile wrong oppreſſion pamper ſelues vaine ſuperfluities feed ſoules lord dailie true manna thy heauenlie word grace thy holie sacrament giue v grace continuallie read heare meditate thy purpoſes iudgments promiſes precept end may curiouſlie argue therof arrogantlie preſume thervpon frame liues according thy keeping thy couenants may ſure thy promiſes ſo make election vocation certaine conſtant faith vertuous godlie liuing seru amen maiſter confirme v lord image sauiour lighten lamp hart fire burning flame thy loue enuie rancor hatred malice doo remaine v quench may gladlie forgiue whatſoeuer wrong ſhall either maliciouſlie ignorantlie done ſaid againſt v lord thy preſence thy maieſtie euerie forgiue whatſoeuer hath beene anie man woman practiſed againſt v beſeeching thèe thy goodneſſe likewiſe forgiue thy mercy ſake sauiour ieſus chriſts ſake beſeech thee deere father forgiue v theſe horrible damnable ſinnes haue committed againſt thy maieſtie thou haſt iuſtlie brought peſtilence plague vpon v let ceaſing thereof beſeech thee certifie v thy mercie remiſſion seru amen maiſter knowe lord weakeneſſe ſelues readie fall thee suffer therfore satan ſhew power malice vpon v able withſtand aſſalts arme v lord alwaies thy grace aſſiſt v thy holie ſpirit kind temptation seruants amen maiſter deliuer v deere father euils bodilie ghoſtlie deliuer lord trouble conſcience ſnarled ſins deliuer lord feare perſecution tyrannie brother ſiſters vnder croſſe profeſſion thy word deliuer mercifull father thoſe ſinnes offence alreadie tormented rage peſtilence recouer thoſe lord alreadie ſtriken ſaue reſt houſhold elſewhere greeuous infection seruants amen maiſter finallie lord god innumerable ſinnes dooeſt heere fatherlie correct v end ſhould feele rigour thy ſeueare iudgement eternall condemnation humblie ſubmit ſelues vnto thy grace pitie beſeeching thee lord ieſus chriſtes ſake although haue iuſtlie deſerued plague laid vpon v yet may pleaſe thee multitude thy mercy withdrawe thy rod v grant lord true repentance ſinnes good king ezekias may deliuer v plague laid vpon v cauſe thoſe ſicke heere houſe otherwhere recouer thou haue determined take number v miſeries preſent euill world giue v comfort thy holie ſpirit may make v glad willing come vnto thee giue v grace lord ſo prepare ſelues may readie wiſe virgin enter life ſauiour chriſt whenſoeuer ſhall pleaſe thee call v seruants amen maiſter grant deere father ieſus chriſtes ſake onlie mediator aduocate lord redeemer sauiour whome thee holie ghoſt honor glorie world without end whoſe name altogether one hart voice crie furthermore praie vnto thee holie word hath taught v ſaieng maiſter ſeruants altogether father c pſalmes praiers ſaid time anie common plague ſickneſſe croſſe viſitation god maiſter miſtreſſe familie come let v humble ſelues fall downe lord reuerence feare lord god people paſture ſheepe hand come therefore let v turne againe vnto lord hath ſmitten v ſhall heale v let v repent turne wickedneſſe ſinnes ſhall forgiuen v let v turne lord turne heauie wrath pardon v ſhall periſh knowledge fault ſinnes euer v haue ſore prouoked thine anger lord thy wrath waxed hot thy heauie diſpleaſure ſore kindled againſt v thou haſt made v heare noiſe warres haſt troubled v vexation enimies thou haſt thine indignation ſtriken v greeuous ſicknes haue fallen leaues beaten downe vehement wind indeede acknowledge puniſhments leſſe deſeruings yet thy mercie lord correct v amendment plague v deſtruction thy hand ſhortened thou canſt helpe neither thy goodneſſe abated thou wilt heare thou haſt promiſed afore crie thou wilt heare v whileſt yet ſpeake thou wilt haue mercie vpon v none truſt thee ſhall confounded neither anie call vpon thee ſhall deſpiſed thou art onlie lord woundeſt dooeſt heale againe killeſt reuiueſt bringeſt euen hell bringeſt barke againe father hoped thee truſted thee thou didſt deliuer called vpon thee helped put truſt thee confounded lord rebuke v thine indignation neither chaſten v thy heauie diſpleaſure oh remember ſinnes offence youth according thy mercie thinke vpon v lord thy goodneſſe haue mercie vpon v lord weake lord heale v bone vexed vexation ſpirits anguiſh ſoules remember thee crie vnto thee heare lord haue mercie thine owne ſake thy holie name ſake incline thine eare heare mercifull lord doo powre praiers thy face truſting owne righteouſneſſe thy great manifold mercy waſh v throughlie wickedneſſe cleanſe v ſinnes turne thy face ſinnes put miſdeeds make v cleane hart god renew right ſpirit within v helpe v god ſaluation glorie thy name deliuer v mercifull vnto ſinnes thy name ſake thy people ſheepe thy paſture ſhall giue thee thanks euer alwaies bee ſhewing foorth thy praiſe generation generation glorie father c c another praier ſaid time plague ſickneſſe mortalitie lord god great fearefull art thou keeping couenant mercie loue thee keepe thy commandements haue ſinned lord haue committed iniquitie haue wickedlie yea wee haue rebelled haue departed thy iudgements haue obeied thy ſeruants prophet ſpake thy name king prince forefather people land lord righteouſneſſe belongeth vnto thee vnto v open ſhame confuſion come paſſe daie plague ſickneſſe reigning among v among dweller land becauſe ſins haue done againſt thee unto thee lord god pertaineth compaſſion forgiueneſſe though haue rebelled againſt thee haue obeied thy voice walke lawes thou haſt laid v haue hitherto deſpiſed thy diuine word yea haue loathed preaching haue loaſed bridle beaſtlineſſe deſires therefore curſſe oth written lawe moſes thy ſeruant powred vpon v plague corrupt aire burning feauers greeuous ſickneſſe lamentablie conſumed euerie daie yea knee leg ſmitten moſt lothſome botch thoſe incurable ſole foote vnto top head becauſe repent neither obſerue word written thy lawe feare thy glorious dreadfull name thou doeſt according thy threatnings aforetold increaſe plague plague ſeed thou ſendeſt great plague long continuance euill ſickneſſe long durance thou bringeſt vpon v vncurable diſeaſes maner ſickneſſe kind plague beſides thoſe written booke lawe theſe plague according thy word come vpon v yet haue praied vnto thee lord might euerie one turne vngodlie way therefore haſt thou bin wrathfull puniſhing v bringing theſe euils vpon v thou art righteous lord true thy iudgement god father lord ieſus chriſt thou haſt got thee glorious name may appeare daie lord god haue ſinned haue done wickedlie haue behaued ſelues vngodlie thine ordinance turne thy wrath away v beſeech thee left place lord god haſt promiſed either peſtilence among v aire infected anie plague ſickneſſe hot thou wilt heare praiers grant requeſts anie man woman among people praieng bottome hart acknowledging ſinnes vnfeinedlie lifting vp hand vnto thee thorough ieſus chriſt throne grace thou mercifull giue vnto euerie man according petition thou alone knoweſt hart child men heare thou praiers petition deliuer v contagious deadlie peſtilence command thine angel ſtriketh v put vp ſwoord ſheath ſtrike finall vtter deſtruction proceede thy wrath ſpare v death bring end plague let heauens mild dwelling place healthfull leaſt aire infected powre downe contagion thereof vpon v deſtruction lord turne awaie thine hand ſufficient let thine hand ceaſe earth may knowe thou lord art god doo call vpon thy name lord looke downe thine holie houſe vpon v incline thine eare heare open thine eies behold affliction mortalitie thy people dead whoſe ſpirits taken awaie giue vnto thee neither praiſe righteouſnes ſoule vexed multitude hir ſins goeth heauilie weaklie whoſe eies begin faile yea hungrie ſoule aſcribeth due praiſe righteouſneſſe vnto thee lord powre praiers thee require mercie thy ſight lord god anie woorthineſſe either owne father name thy ſonne ieſus chriſt whome thou art well pleaſed beſeech thee mercifull vnto v helpe v neceſſitie turne thee againe lord laſt mercifull vnto thy ſeruants poiſoned infection maie taken v notwithſtanding thy pleaſure viſit offence rod thy bleſſed done giue v grace beare thy fatherlie correction laid vpon v patientlie remembring alwaies chaſtined thee lord world condemned reprobate world come amen fruitfull praier verie neceſsarie hartilie ſaid appearing monſters anie earthquake plague god would turne awaie vengeance hanging ouer v ſinnes oh lord god ſtrong mightie great dreadfull dwelleſt heauens workeſt great woonders thy miſerable child proſtrate vpon earth doo moſt humblie beſeech thee mercifull vnto v pardon offence forgiue v ſinnes lord enter iudgement thy ſeruants thou doo ſhall fleſh ſaued thy ſight confeſſe acknowledge lord ſinnes haue mooued thee wrath ſhew ſuch fearefull token thy diſpleaſure towards v theſe day firſt fire heauen betokening thy hot burning indignation wrathfull diſpleaſure ſinne aboundeth daie ſuch horrible monſtrous ſhapes againſt nature neuer ſeene day anie time v betoken v none thing thy plague come vpon v degenerate monſtrous life conuerſation late ſtrange terrible earthquake ſhooke rather euen vomited v fearfull trembling hart amazed ſpirits houſes ſo ſhamefully haue polluted defiled vile ſinnes wickedneſſe laſt long great mortalitie plague peſtilence thou dooſt haſt terribly threatened v fatherlie warned v mercifullie called v repentance axe ſet roote tree rotten member without ſenſe feeling may perceiue fearefull deſtruction deſolation hand vnleſſe ſpeedilie repent turne thee bicauſe haue beene ſo long taught thy moſt holie ſacred word yet fruit true repentance chriſtian life appeare wo ala theſe day neither preaching word moſt comfortable preaching monſters moſt ouglie preaching fire moſt ſtrange preaching earthquake moſt terrible neither yet plague peſtilence moſt horrible ſtirre vp ſtonie hart awake v ſinnes feare oh lord turk reſt vnbeleeuing condemne v laſt daie beene ſo long inſtructed comfortable preaching thy word ſweete promiſes thy goſpell thy woonders heauen earth haue ſeene doubt righteouſnes would haue ſhined day great ſhame confuſion thou haſt leſſe warned v oh lord thy fearefull diſpleaſure heauie plague hand great wickedneſſe thou didſt iſraelits horrible deſtruction came vpon thou firſt mercie didſt call repentance preaching thy word warning would ſerue thou didſt ſend monſtrous fearfull ſignes token declare thy viſitation farre like vnto v daie alwaies interpret theſe thing imagination vaine hart promiſing themſelues peace deſtruction ouer head thing doo call mind much written learning example warning maketh v tremble quake feare thy iuſt iudgments thou haſt thus dealt thine owne deere choſen child token thy great wrath againſt ſinne ſhall looke doo leſſe deſerue thy fearfull ſcourge mercie thou dooeſt thus long forbeare v liue though god reuenged vpon ſinnes maketh v feare crie unwardlie ſoules come lord ieſu holie true thy dooings ſhorten day bring pilgrimage end ſuffer v heape ſinne vpon ſinne vnto daie vengeance leaſt caught vp amongſt number wicked reprobate ſhall neuer ſee thy louing countenance maketh v crie thee lord let thy kingdome come end ſinfull life wherein doo nothing prouoke thee wrath correct v lord thine indignation neither chaſten v thine heauie diſpleaſure though v belongeth nothing ſhame confuſion though offence haue deſerued viſited rod ſinnes ſcourges yet mercie lord fatherlie correction chaſten v thy louing kindneſſe take awaie v thee flie ſuccour vnder wing thy mercie ſhall refuge vntill thou turne thy wrathfull countenance v knowe thy mercie aboue thy work euen great thy ſelfe therefore ſaie holie iob though thou kill v yet put truſt thee thou cameſt comfort plucke dungeon hell ſuch wretch thou art good samaritane cameſt heale deadlie wound thou art good phyſician cameſt cure mortall infirmity thou art good ſhepheard cameſt ſeeke v wandering loſt ſheepe bring v thy fold againe thou art brother fleſh fleſh bone bone haſt taſted infirmity felt temptation borne burden ſinnes therefore thy hand looke mercie againſt daie vengeance though thou puniſh v yet hope euer ſhall thy rod ſhall touch v ſhall make thy glorie commoditie ſtrengthening increaſe faith let thy preaching ſundrie way lord ſufficient warning grant may ſpeedilie bottome hart repent endeuour doo thy righteous bleſſed reuealed thy word frame liues according ſame may liue thy feare day life ſinfull courſe ended may dwell thee thy bleſſed kingdome death merit ieſus chriſt onelie redeemer amen pſalme thankesgiuing deliuerance plague anie kind ſickneſſe trouble affliction lord thou art become gratious vnto thy land thou haſt turned awaie affliction thy ſeruants thou haſt taken awaie thy diſpleaſure turned thy ſelfe thy wrathfull indignation thou lord hadſt helped v failed ſoules beene put ſilence ſaid feete haue ſlipped thy mercie lord helped v vp multitude ſorowes hart thy comfort haue refreſhed ſoules ſoules waited ſtill vpon lord ſoules hanged vpon helpe hope alwaies lord word reioice god word comfort ſelues lord ſaid call vpon time trouble heare thee thou ſhalt praiſe poore needie ſicklie heauineſſe lord cared v helpe ſauiour according word aduerſitie diſtreſſe hath lifted vp head ſaued v vtter deſtruction hath deliuered ſoules death hath fed v time dearth hath ſaued v noiſome peſtilence therefore offer holie temple oblation thankesgiuing great gladneſſe wee ſing ſpeake praiſes vnto lord sauiour giue thanks vnto lord gratious mercie endureth euer lord full compaſſion mercie long ſuffering plentious goodneſſe pitie mercie greater heauens gratious goodneſſe reacheth vnto cloud like father pitieth owne child euen ſo lord mercifull vnto feare therefore praiſe thee thy mercy god vnto thee ſing thou holie one iſrael ſing new ſong vnto thee god praiſe lord pſalmes thankes giuing ſing praiſes ſing praiſes vnto god ſing praiſes ſing praiſes vnto king god king earth ſing praiſes vnderſtanding magnifie thee god king praiſe thy name euer euer euerie daie giue thanks vnto thee praiſe thy name euer euer mouth ſhall ſpeake praiſes lord let fleſh giue thanks holie name euer euer bleſſed lord god iſrael euer bleſſed name maieſtie world without end amen glorie father c c time anie particular generall earthquake praie oh eternall mightie moſt louing father haſt deſire death ſinner conuert liue vnto nothing ſo pleaſant repentant contrite ſorowfull hart penitent perſon thou art kind father falleſt moſt louinglie vpon necke loſt ſonne kiſſeſt imbraceſt feaſteſt returneth puddle pleaſures ſwill ſwine diſdaineſt repentant praier thy poore ſinfull ſeruants whenſoeuer true faith returne call vpon thee haue moſt comfortable example dauid manaſſes magdalen peter theefe vpon gibbet moſt hartilie humblie beſeech thy fatherlie goodneſſe looke downe throne thy mercieſeate vpon v moſt miſerable ſinfull ſlaues satan fearfull trembling hart doo quake ſhake ſtrange terrible token thy wrath indignation appearing moſt euidentlie vnto v ſhaking moouing earth thy footeſtoole whereby vtterlie deſtitute grace warned thy cōmingdowne amongſt v viſit ſinnes moſt terrible maner farre ſeeing thou treadeſt ſo hard vpon thy footeſtoole earth moſt ſhamefullie haue polluted defiled moſt wicked ſinfull rebellious liues notwithſtanding thy continuall
