crieng calling vpon v thy ſeruants prophet preacher whome haue learned thy haue followed haue heard much done little yea nothing like moſt peruerſe vnthankfull child haue made mocke thy word derided thy miniſters accounted thy threatenings trifle thy warning weight moment wherefore haue iuſtlie deſerued taſte moſt deeplie bitter cup thine anger bengeance war famine peſtilence yea eternall death thou ſhouldeſt temper rigour thy iuſtice mildneſſe thy mercie ſuch thy fatherlie affection towards v thou ſheweſt thy ſelfe ſlowe anger long ſuffering much patience mercie yea thou art thouſand time readie forget forgiue aſke require forgiueneſſe therefore though woorthie leaſt mite thy mercie yet gratious lord looke vpon v ſinnes vpon thine owne ſelfe thy ſonne ieſus chriſt fountaine grace treaſure mercie ſalue ſickneſſe iewell ioie onlie hauen ſuccour ſafetie come thee truſt find haue loſt gaine hath got ſcale iacob climbe vp thee thou angel thy mercie cōmeſt downe v preſent vnto thee ſelues death dooings bloudie wound deteſtable deſeruings whoſe merit ſo great thy mercie cannot little ranſom ſo rich beggerlie beaſtlie ſinnes nothing thy ſight great pleaſure ſatiſfaction thou takeſt paine paſſion turne late earthquake lord benefite thine elect thou didſt thou ſhookeſt priſon looſedſt lock fetter chaines thy ſeruants paule silas broughtſt priſon conuertedſt keeper ſo gratious lord ſtrike hart tyrant terrour thy woorke may knowe men thou art samſon mocking ſpiting thee thy word canſt ſhake pillers palace throwe vpon furious philiſtines head turne thy wrath oh lord thy child call vpon thy name conuerſion confuſion thine enimies deſpiſe abhorre thy name deface thy glory thou haſt knocked long doores open let thee burſt open therefore braſen gate ſtonie hart thou art able ſtones raiſe vp child abraham finallie ſo touch hart finger thy grace maie deeply muſe vpon ſinfull liues amend call thy mercie forgiue pardon chriſt lord liueth thee holie ghoſt three perſons one eternall god whome dominion glorie praiſe thanksgiuing euer euer amen elſe praie thus almightie god moſt mercifull father willeſt death ſinner rather hee ſhould returne liue thy ſeruants moſt humblie confeſſe haue moſt greeuouſlie offended againſt thy diuine maieſtie prouoked thy heauie wrath againſt v haue beleeued folowed thy goſpell preached vnto v beene thankfull thy manie verie great benefit beſtowed vpon v yea warned danger haue beene careleſſe ſerue thee oh lord father mercie god conſolation thy wrath remembreſt mercie acknowledge late terrible earthquake ſuddenly ſhooke v houſes dwelling place thou didſt warne v thy iuſtice great vnthankfulneſſe diſobedience haue deſerued moſt iuſt iudgement lord thy ſeruants vile earth miſerable ſinners yet trembling quaking remembrance terrible looke thy wrathfull diſpleaſure neuer forgotten moſt humblie craue pardon ſinnes grace conuert vnto thee time conuert v lord ſhall conuerted mollifie hard hart grant v contrite ſpirit turne vnto thee vnfeinedlie faſting weeping praier enter iudgement thy ſeruants ſpare thy people lord ſpare let thine heritage brought confuſion haue mercie vpon v thy ſonne ieſus chriſts ſake giue v grace hencefoorth amend liues ſerue thee holines righteouſneſſe acknowledging thy iuſtice remembring alwaies fearefull ſigne thy furie memorable earthquake thou ſenteſt ye ſixt aprill yeare one thouſand fiue hundred foureſcore ſhall praiſe thee thy mercie glorifie thy holie name euer ieſus chriſt sauiour amen ſight blaſing ſtarre meteor prodigious ſignes god iudgment heauens praie preuent euils foreſhewed thereby ſaie almightie lord god whoſe workemanſhip whole world heauen earth beautie bleſſings ſame preſence whoſe power thing doo quake tremble whoſe indignation threatneth vengeance vnto ſinners vnſufferable whoſe promiſes mercie vnmeaſurable bicauſe thou art euen moſt high lord ouer earth full patience forbearance pitie repentance ouer wickedneſſe ſinfull people declaring ſharpneſſe thy iudgements amendment deliuerance puniſhment thou lord haſt promiſed according thy bottomleſſe bountie goodneſſe penitent ſpirit iuſt righteous abraham iſaac iacob haue offended againſt thy maieſtie thoſe ouerwhelmed tempeſtuous tide tranſgreſſions lord haue offended father haue committed ſinne thy ſight haue defiled ſelues filthie puddle iniquitie therefore beholding verie heauens ſuch dreadfull token thy wrathfull indignation hanging ouer head monſtrous prodigious life bow thee knee hart beſeeching thee gratious vnto v open thine eares praiers haue ſinned lord haue ſinned acknowledge miſdeeds humblie beſeeching thee forgiue v offence forgiue v deliuer v ouer deſtruction iniquity neither laie thou vp ſtore vengeance againſt daie iudgement reſerue v whip wo wretchedneſſe mercie pardon miſdeeds let fierie flame thy furie wrath waxe hot againſt v burne conſume v iniquity amen time warre almightie god king king gouernor thing whoſe power creature able reſiſt belongeth iuſtlie puniſh ſinners mercifull vnto truelie repent ſaue deliuer v humblie beſeech thee hand enimies abate pride aſſwage malice confound deuiſes armed thy defence may preſerued euermore peril glorifie thee art onlie giuer victorie merit thine onlie ſonne ieſus chriſt lord amen time rebellion inteſtine warre moſt mightie mercifull lord god art king glorie lord hoſts gouernour creature onlie giuer victory alone art able ſtrengthen weake againſt mightie vanquiſh infinite multitude thine enimies countenance thy ſeruants calling vpon thy name truſting thee defend good lord thy ſeruants gouernour vnder thee moſt gratious ſouereigne ladie queene elizabeth hir faithfull ſubiects people committed hir charge eſpeciallie time lord haue regard thoſe hir truſtie louing obedient ſubiects ſent north part realme ouer ſeas aid ſuch perſecuted profeſſion thy holie name withſtand crueltie force power certaine falſe vnfaithfull ſubiects yea rather curſed rebel wicked traitours thoſe common enimies well truth thine eternall word owne naturall prince countrie manifeſtlie againſt crowne realme england thou haſt thy diuine prouidence aſſigned theſe day gouernement thy ſeruant ſouereigne ladie moſt gratious queene great comfort v hir louing ſubiects faithfull common thy moſt glorious name praiſed therefore lord god hoſts thine angel therevnto appointed dooſt miniſter warre peace diddeſt giue vnto dauid courage ſtrength little one vnarmed vnexpert feates warre ſling ſet vpon ouerthrowe great huge giant goliah cauſe iuſt forced enter warre battell moſt humblie beſeech thee moſt gratious god ſo turne hart theſe rebel thine enimies deſire peace chriſtian bloud ſhed ſpilt elſe grant lord ſmall effuſion bloud little hurt damage thy ſeruants doo ieopard liues defence thy holie goſpell queene realme againſt aduerſaries thereof may thy glorie obteine victorie warres ended rebel ſoone put flight vanquiſhed may one hart mind knit togither godlie concord vnitie laud praiſe thee art god moſt mercifull father thy holie make ſoft tender ſtonie hart thoſe ſaie exalt themſelues againſt thy truth ſeeke either trouble quietneſſe realme england oppreſſe crowne ſame conuert knowledge thy ſonne onelie sauiour world ieſus chriſt may iointlie glorifie thy mercy lighten beſeech thee ignorant hart embrace truth thy word elſe abate crueltie moſt mightie lord chriſtian region others confeſſe thy holie goſpell may obteine thine aid ſtrength ſuertie enimies without ſhedding chriſtian innocent bloud whereby feare crueltie may comforted finallie chriſtian realmes eſpeciallie realme england may thy defence protection continue truth goſpell enioie perfect peace quietneſſe ſecuritie theſe thy mercy iointlie together one conſent hart voice may thankfullie render vnto thee laud praiſe knit one godlie concord vnitie among ſelues may continuallie magnifie thy glorious name furthermore much thy good pleaſure appoint v number ſubiects moſt humblie beſeech thee heauenlie father giue v faithfull obedient hart vnto dread ſouereigne ladie queenes moſt excellent maieſtie high power godlie ruler authoritie vnder hir noble grace may found v diſobedience vnfaithfulnes treaſon falſehood diſſimulation inſurrection commotion conſpiracie anie kind rebellion deede word thought faithfulneſſe obedience quietneſſe ſubiection humilitie whatſoeuer elſe becommeth faithfull ſubiects vnder ſo good ſo gratious prince liuing heere lowlineſſe mind may laſt daie thy fauour lifted vp euerlaſting glorie thou moſt mercifull father thy ſonne holie ghoſt liueſt reigneſt one verie true perfect god euer euer amen thankesgiuing ſuppreſsion rebellion inſurrection heauenlie moſt mercifull father defender thoſe put truſt thee ſure fortreſſe flie thee ſuccour thy moſt iuſt iudgements diſobedience rebellion againſt thy holie word holie profeſſion whereby haue giuen occaſion thy holie name hath beene blaſphemed among ignorant haſt late yeeres ſore abaſhed whole realme people england terrour danger rebellion thereby awake v dead ſleepe careleſſe ſecuritie haſt yet miſeries following ſame rebellion moſt ſharpelie puniſhed part countriemen chriſtian brother haue moſt neerelie fealt ſame moſt dreadfullie haſt ſcourged ſome ſeditious perſons terrible execution iuſtlie inflicted diſobedience thee thy ſeruant souereigne example v warning correction amendment thy ſeruants thine accuſtomed goodneſſe turning alwaies wickedneſſe euill men profit feare thee thy iudgements remembring thy mercie haſt thine aſſiſtance giuen victorie thy ſeruant queene hir nobilitie faithfull subiects ſo little rather effuſion chriſtian bloud alſo might iuſtlie haue enſued exceeding comfort ſorrowfull chriſtian hart thy fatherlie pitie mercifull goodneſſe onelie euen thine owne name ſake without anie deſert wherefore render vnto thee moſt humble hartie thanks theſe thy great mercy ſhewed vnto v deſerued ſharper puniſhment moſt humblie beſeeching thee grant vnto v confeſſe thy holie name profeſſe true perfect religion thy holie goſpell thy heauenlie grace ſhew ſelues liuing according profeſſion trulie knowing thee thy bleſſed word may obedientlie walke thy holie commandements warned thy fatherlie correction doo prouoke thy iuſt wrath againſt v may enioie continuance thy great mercy towards v thy right hand ſo inuaſions rebellion danger continuallie ſauing defending church realme queene people england poſterities enſuing confeſſing thy holie name profeſſing thy holie goſpell leading holie life may perpetuallie praiſe magnifie thee thy onlie ſonne ieſus chriſt ſauiour holie ghoſt whome laud praiſe glorie empire euer euer amen time extreame trouble reaſon tyrannie ſtrange forraigne gouernours etternall euerlaſting god father lord ieſus chriſt thou ſheweſt mercie keepeſt couenant loue thee reuerence keepe thy commandment euen thou powreſt foorth thy hot diſpleaſure iuſt iudgements vpon obſtinate inobedient heere proſtrate ſelues throne thy maieſtie hart confeſſing iuſtlie thou dooeſt puniſh v tyrannie ſtrangers iuſtlie thou maiſt bring vpon v againe bondage yoke thy mercie ſeaſon thou haſt remoued king prince people blindneſſe haue refuſed word thine eternall veritie ſo dooing haue refuſed league thy mercie offered vnto v againe ſuch aboundance none excuſed reaſon ignorance yet neuertheleſſe iudgement men impietie ouerfloweth whole face realme great multitude delight themſelues ignorance idolatrie ſuch ala appeere reuerence embrace thy word doo expreſſe fruit repentance becommeth people whome thou haſt ſhewed thy ſelfe ſo mercifull fauourable theſe thy iuſt iudgements lord whereby thou puniſheſt ſinne ſinne man owne iniquitie ſo end ſinne except thou preuent v thy vndeſerued grace conuert v therefore lord ſhall conuerted suffer vnthankefulneſſe procure thy moſt iuſt iudgments ſtrangers againe haue empire aboue v neither yet light thy goſpell bee taken v howſoeuer great multitude altogether rebellious alſo v remaine perpetuall imperfection yet glorie thine owne name glorie thine onlie begotten ſonne ieſus chriſt whoſe truth goſpell thou thy meere mercie haſt manifeſted among v pleaſe thee take v thy protection defence world may know thy mercie thou haſt begun worke ſaluation publiſhing preaching thy goſpell among v ſo ſame mercie thou wilt continue maugre head malicious enimies grant v mercifull father chriſt ieſus thy ſonnes ſake thanksgiuing deliuerance tyrannie ſtrange enimies praier continuance peace betwixt realmes lord ſeeing enioie comfort bodie ſpirit reaſon quietneſſe thy mercie granted vnto v moſt deſperate trouble appered vtterlie haue beene ouerwhelmed praiſe glorifie thy mercie goodneſſe pitiouſlie lookedſt vpon v ſelues vtterlie confounded ſeeing lord receiue benefit thy hand thankefull ſame nothing elſe ſeale againſt v daie iudgement wee moſt humblie beſeech thee grant vnto v hart ſo mindfull calamitie paſt may continuallie feare prouoke thy iuſtice puniſh v like worſſe plague ſeeing owne power altogether vnable haue freed ſelues tyrannie ſtrangers bondage thraldome pretended againſt v thine eſpeciall goodneſſe didſt moue hart neighbour whome deſerued ſo much fauour take vpon common burthen v deliuerance onlie ſpend liues manie alſo hazard ſtate tranquillitie realme commonwealth grant vnto v lord ſuch reuerence may remember thy benefit receiued default neuer enter hoſtilitie againſt thoſe realmes nation suffer v neuer lord fall ingratitude deteſtable vnthankefulneſſe ſhould ſeeke deſtruction death thoſe whome thou haſt made inſtruments deliuer v tyrannie mercileſſe ſtrangers diſſipate thou counſelles ſuch deceiptfullie trauell ſtir vp hart inhabitant either realme againſt let malicious practiſes owne confuſion grant thy mercie loue concord tranquillitie may continue encreaſe among inhabitant realmes eſpeciallie iſle england euen till comming lord ieſus chriſt whoſe glorious goſpell thou thy mercie dooeſt call v vnitie peace chriſtian concord full perfection whereof ſhall poſſeſſe fulneſſe thy kingdome offence ſhall remooued iniquitie ſhall ſuppreſſed thy choſen child fullie endued perfect glorie lord ieſus chriſt reigneth whome thee father holie ghoſt honour praiſe glorie euer amen time inuaſion turke infidel make warre anie part christendome praie earneſtlie followeth omnipotent eternall god father lord ieſus chriſt maker preſeruer mainteiner heauen earth together thy coeternall ſonne holie ghoſt haue ſinned lord father haue done amiſſe dealt wickedlie therfore confeſſe thy righteous iudgements iuſtlie puniſhed haue trulie deſerued barbarous nation cruell turk making inuaſion chriſtendome ſhould ſpoile v good ouerthrowe schooles church commonweales make pitifull hauocke promiſcuous mixt confuſed multitude ſillie weake people ſheepe prepared ſhambles carrie miſerable men ſweet boſoms deere freends far barbarous nation ſlauerie greeuous death god thou haſt repelled v yea thou makeſt v ſhame nation ſinnes goeſt foorth war army thou makeſt v turne back vpon enimies ſo hate v ſpoile good thou letteſt v bee eaten like ſheepe haſt ſcattered v among heathen thou ſelleſt thy people naught takeſt monie therefore heathen come thine inheritance thy holie temple haue defiled haue deſtroied townes houſes brought heape ſtones dead body thy ſeruants haue giuen meate fowles aire fleſh thy saincts vnto beaſts land bloud haue ſhed like water euerie ſide man burie become open ſhame enimies verie ſcorne deriſion vnto round v lord theſe miſchieuous warres middeſt fatall mortall puniſhments threaten horrible mutation worldlie empire flie vnto thee ſaieng helpe v god ſaluation glorie thy name deliuer v mercifull vnto ſinnes lord deale v according ſinnes neither reward v iniquity haue mercie vpon v ſoone come great miſerie looke vpon aduerſitie miſerie forgiue v ſinnes conſider enimies manie beare tyrannicall hate againſt v thou aforetime didſt remit offence thy people diddeſt couer ſinnes didſt turne awaie thine heauie indignation turne v humblie beſeech thee god sauiour remooue awaie thy diſpleaſure v alſo true repentance wee may pleaſe thee thy ſonne chriſts ſake wilt thou diſpleaſed v euer wilt thou ſtretch thy wrath one generation another oh let ſorowfull ſighing priſoners come thee according greatneſſe thy power preſerue thou thoſe appointed die powre thine indignation rather vpon heathen haue knowne thee vpon kingdom haue called vpon thy name nation may knowe thou takeſt vengeance bloud thy ſeruants ſhed conſider mortall threatenings enimies exerciſe crueltie vpon v ſaie triumphantlie god keepe neck greeuous yoke turkiſh bondage repreſſe furiouſneſſe tyrant labour ſpoile make hauocke thy church aboliſh true doctrine praiers pure religion may bring paganiſme build vp idolatrie errours blaſphemous ceremony defend church politike gouernance schooles uniuerſities city dwelling place suffer good ſtudies learning religion lawes ouerthrowne theſe townes reduced ſtables ſauage mahomet turkiſh tyrant bloudie tyrant hate thee v extremelie arme right arme gratious queene hir noble alſo chriſtian emperours king potentate may fight lawes liues libertie teach hand warre finger fight increaſe inuincible courage mind inflamed zeale thy religion may valiantlie withſtand turk mortall enimies thy deere sonne church guide thou hand ſuch doo fight cauſe thy religion grant happie ſucceſſe ouer enimies king preſerued great armie giant ſhall ſaued multitude hoſt warlike ſtrength victorie proceedeth heauens thy rebuke god chariot horſes fall downe thou ſhalt take awaie courage prince art terrible vnto king earth thou helpe trouble vaine helpe man thee mightie iehoua ſhall doo great act thou wilt tread enimies vnder thy foot come naught lord ieſus chriſt amen thanksgiuing vnto god chriſtians victorie turk mercifull father lord god hoſts onelie protector defender thine heritage againſt whome might power counſell preuaile thy great mercie without merit deſeruing haſt time protected defended v cruell hand enimies mightilie deliuered v euen mouth roring lion yeeld vnto thee father theſe thy great goodneſſes mercy moſt humble hartie thanks eſpeciallie father praiſe thy holie name preſent thou haſt ſaued deliuered thy people great aſſaults danger ſame profeſſed mightie enimie chriſtian religion turke alſo haſt giuen vnto people fought thy battels battelled vnder thy banner truſted onlie thy helpe ſo great notable victorie lord god doo laud magnifie thy holie name euer chriſt captaine redeemer sauiour beſeeching thee thy mercifull goodneſſe thou wouldeſt ſheeld v vnder thy mightie protection euer hauing fruition godlie peace thy mercie may reſt theſe day haue liue lead peaceable quiet life pietie honeſtie chriſt lord whome thee holie ghoſt honour glorie praiſe euer euer amen god whoſe nature propertie euer haue mercie forgiue receiue humble petition though tied bound chaine ſinnes yet let pitifulneſſe thy great mercie looſe v honour ieſus chriſtes ſake onlie mediator aduocate amen end letanie praiers vſed firſt ſecond leſſons goſpell piſtle sermon homilie firſt ſecond leſſon praie bleſſed lord haſt cauſed holie scripture old new teſtaments written red learning grant v may ſuch ſort heare reade marke learne inwardlie digeſt patience comfort thy holie word may embrace euer hold faſt bleſſed hope euerlaſting life thou haſt giuen v sauiour ieſus chriſt amen firſt ſecond leſſon praie gratious god moſt mercifull father haſt vouchſafed v rich pretious iewell thy holie word aſſiſt v thy ſpirit may written hart euerlaſting comfort reforme v renew v according thine owne image build v vp edifie v perfect building thy chriſt ſanctifieng increaſing v heauenlie vertues grant heauenlie father ieſu chriſts ſake amen thus thanks vnto thee celeſtiall father chriſt redeemer thou haſt ſo cleerelie thy patriarch prophet apoſtls reuealed vnto v theſe ſo ſecret myſteries ſaluation chriſt whoſe ſake alſo beſeech thee giue v verie feare faith thee conſtantlie beleeuing thy truth following thou commandeſt v thy word may meanes hinder thy glorie courſe thy word lewd conuerſation obedience helpe amplifie increaſe thy kingdome perpetuall praiſe thy name ieſus chriſt lord amen reading epiſtle goſpell praie almightie god moſt mercifull father thy holie ſpirit thy ſeruants apoſtles euangeliſts haſt left vnto v ſtorie doctrine deedes sauiour chriſt thereby deede ſo might beleeue thy sonne sauiour world put truſt thee ſo beleeuing might attaine euerlaſting life grant v beſeech thee ſame moſt holie ſpirit open hart lighten mind reading hearing ſame faith thee may continuallie ſtrengthened till attaine end thereof euen ſaluation ſoules ieſus chriſt lord sauiour amen reading epiſtle goſpell giue thee thanks moſt mercifull father hath pleaſed thee great mercie towards v cauſe holie writing tradition apoſtles euangeliſts come time place eares thou haſt vouchſafed alſo open reueale thy holie vnto approue thy ſonne ſo manifeſtlie world confirme vnto v truth thy goſpell mouth ſo manie faithfull witneſſes might haue full aſſurance thy mercifull promiſes helpe v good father beſeech thee thy grace may doo deede doo vnderſtand leaſt heerein thy iuſtice greeuouſlie condemned puniſhed neglect doo thy thy grace thou haſt reuealed graunt v fruit thy care towards v ſtrength faith hauing read heard ſo notable thing holie ſtorie act writing holie apoſtles recorded left vnto v ſo true moſt faithfull witneſſes appointed ordeined therevnto thee may effectuall working thy holie ſpirit receiue acknowledge thine onlie ſonne onlie ſauiour ſaluation ſoules glorious praiſe thy name ſo lead one witneſſe another may according thy holie word go faith faith till atteine euerlaſting life thou haſt prepared v thy ſonne whome thee father holie ghoſt honor glorie praiſe euer amen sermon homilie read ſome theſe ſentences scripture exhorting attentiue hearing word deuteronomie 18 lord ſaid moſes raiſe vp prophet among breethren like vnto thee put word mouth ſhall ſpeake vnto ſhall command vnto ſhall yee harken whoſoeuer harken vnto word ſhall ſpeake name require pſalme 119 great peace haue loue thy lawe offended prouerbs 8 bleſſed man woman heareth watching dailie gate giuing attendance poſts doores findeth findeth life ſhall obteine fauour lord ſinneth againſt hurteth owne ſoule hate loue death prouerbs 28 turneth awaie eare hearing lawe euen praiers ſhall abhominable vviſdome 3 ſo deſpiſeth wiſdome diſcipline miſerable hope vaine labour fooliſh work vnprofitable wiues vndiſcreet child wicked ofſpring accurſed eccleſiasticus 5 humble heare word god thou maiſt vnderſtand make true anſwere wiſdome ſwift heare good thing followe word peace righteouſneſſe luke 11 queene south ſhall riſe iudgement men woman generation ſhall condemne ſhe came vttermoſt part earth heare wiſdome salomon behold ſaith chriſt himſelfe greater salomon heere ſpeaking vnto iohn 8 god heareth god word yee therefore heare becauſe ye god reuelation 2 let hath eare heare ſpirit ſaith church congregation c praier heedfull hearing god word much moſt mercifull god faith without impoſſible pleaſe thee anie thing doo commeth hearing hearing word god ſo much ſhe turneth awaie eare frō hearing lawe euen praier ſhall abhominable turned ſinne yea bicauſe alſo farre bleſſed thing heare keepe thy word haue honour haue borne nurſed thine owne ſonne grant v grace therefore moſt humblie beſeech thee zeale loue doo one thing ſo acceptable ſeruice thee moſt needfull v done euen attentiue deſirous mind heare thy holie word preached ſo farre exceed queene saba thoſe haue ſought wiſdome vttermoſt part earth wiſdome thou offereſt v exceedeth ſo much redilie practiſe heard thy prophet thy ſonne aboue prophet wiſe martha making choiſe thy grace better part may made wiſe vnto ſaluation neuer taken v remaine v till put v poſſeſſion happie life bleſſed hope looke grant v ſo carefull ouer dutie thou haſt commanded wee eſpeciallie regarding chiefeſt thee moſt needfull ſelues may therby declare ſelues deed god bicauſe heare god word true ſheepe thy fold bicauſe harken diligentlie thy voice followe thee suſanna ioanna marie magdalen godlie men woman ſo meanes finallie faile thy promiſes obteine endleſſe comfort glorie thy name bleſſing gift eternall life among faithfull beleeuers kingdome heauen ieſus chriſt lord amen another verie chriſtian praier preacher auditorie preſent oh lord beautifull feete bring glad tidings goſpell peace ſaluation good thing surelie without preaching ſhould periſh bleſſed praiſed thou therefore father thou haſt giuen v thy goſpell life foode doctrine peace time bleſſed praiſed thou therefore chriſt bicauſe thou giueſt reneweſt often light thy goſpell maitaineſt miniſters thy word preſerueſt cheriſheſt defendeſt thy catholike church againſt diuell thine enimies yea bleſſed ſaie praiſed alſo thou therefore holie ſpirit bicauſe thou powred vpon apoſtles dooeſt alſo kindle thy light hart ruleſt inſtructeſt admoniſheſt helpeſt v gouerneſt guideſt •• labour proſperous end ſanctifieſt v eternall life much chiefe authoritie ſpeaking indeed thee lord alone mortall man hath dead hart humblie beſeech thee bleſſe thy preacher heere preſent thy diuine grace may doo worke euangeliſt make thy goſpell knowne vnto v giue vnto ſpirit feare godlineſſe fortitude counſell zeale knowledge diſcretion wiſedome vnderſtanding conſtancie let hath receiued thy gift ſo like good faithfull diſpoſer thy manifold grace trulie miniſter ſame vnto v lord let come vnto v abundant knowledge abilitie diuine myſteries bleſſings goſpell chriſt communicate impart vnto v ſpeake grant may ſpeake thee thy helpe grace allowed thee ſo vtter word god hath receiued thee thou althings maiſt glorified put vpon hart breaſtplate perfect iudgement urim knowledge thumim holines righteouſnes life puritie doctrine let thy word hart burning fire ſhut vp bone yea let bellie wine hath vent like new bottle burſt full good matter thy ſpirit within may compell ſpeake mind effectuallie yea doo thou lord ſaie ſecretlie ſpeake worke let thy ſecret power vertue put vnto action labour exerciſe faith may accompliſh thou requireſt done conuerſion ſaluation thy people preſent giue earneſtpenie thy ſpirit hart open doore vtterance vnto may make manifeſt ſauour thy life knowledg vnto v lord thou haſt ſaid open thy mouth wide fill open thou therefore lip mouth may ſhew forth thy praiſe ſhew v waie wherein may walke ſtraight thee let mouth ſaie filled thy praiſe may preach thine vndefiled lawe conuerting ſoules giue wiſdome ſimple light blind let vtterance giuen vnto may open mouth boldlie publiſh ſecrets goſpell whereof ambaſſadour therein may ſpeake boldlie ought ſpeake ſparing anie man hauing regard pleaſe anie maner perſon touch thou god mouth thy preacher hot glowing cole thy ſpirit whereby firſt clenſed may feruentlie purelie preach thy goſpell vnto brother diſcharge dutie firſt mooued zeale thy glorie touched carefull affection towards thy people eſaie giue vnto thy preacher audacitie eliah iohn baptiſt like true miniſter god may ſtoutlie boldlie without anie reſpect perſons deſire pleaſe men feareth god face men reproue people ſinnes let thou haſt giuen commendement crie alowd ſpare let lift vp voice like trumpet diligence diſcretion ſhew thy people tranſgreſſions reprooue vice vnfeinedlie bicauſe lord vaine ſhall caſt net thy word except thou bleſſe draught labour yeeld profit vnleſſe thou proſper doo thou therefore luckilie ſet looſe thou tongue ſpeake put thou hart ſaie bleſſe thy word may may able thoroughlie inſtruct v thy may catch ſoules thy ſecret diuine power drawe vnto hart mind eares hearer ſo ſhall conuert win manie vnto thy chriſt thou thereby highlie glorified let thy ſpirit ſpeake thy word tongue vtter nothing raſhlie vndiſcreetlie motion thy good ſpirit ſpeaking ſincerelie holilie thee thy ſight giue ſuch beare thy word miniſters ſpirituall life ſuch care zeale diligence may indeuour faithfullie painfullie fulfill office vttermoſt finallie let defile euangelicall function anie meanes leaſt ſuſpicion glorie lucre neither let mouth ſpeake wickedneſſe tongue ſet foorth deceit dooth preach thy lawes take thy couenant mouth ſo grant himſelfe alſo may hate reformed anie time caſt thy holie word behind backe bicauſe thou lord ſo mercifullie offereſt vnto v thy ſaluation deſire thee furthermore behalfe congregation preſent alſo part may owne accord willinglie receiue ſame ſaluation goſpell ſo gratiouſlie offered v thy preacher part doo publiſh thy glorious name ſo greene graſſe may receiue heauenlie dew thy doctrine barren earth hart may thereby moiſtened liuelie water thy grace holie ſpirit fructifie ſame grant may receiue theſe holie thing high myſteries moſt pretious pearles dog ſwine tread contemptuouſlie vnder feete wicked atheiſts vngodlie contemners thy goſpell damnation thy child thoſe god ſheepe fold meekneſſe obedience chriſtian feare reuerence grant may heare receiue fulfill thy glorie ſaluation furthermore thou mercie openeſt mouth ſpeake vnto v ſo giue v grace open hart eares receiue wholeſome inſtructions fatherlie admonition proceed thereout giue v grace ſaie applie hart inſtruction eares word knowledge let v ſtill deſirous thy heauenlie kingdome let holie bread thy goſpell foode heauenlie dainty onlie ſweet vnto v ſauorie mouth may depart well refreſhed full fraught largeſſe plentie thy word euangelike feaſt make thou v true conuerts increaſe growe faith faith vertue vertue let v neuer loath heauenlie philoſophie let v learned taught thee made meet thy preacher receiue thy doctrine health preacher heere preſent vndoubtedlie thy mouth meſſenger thou haſt ſent therfore let v dare either barbarouſly miſvſe ſelues towards word deed thought ſcornefullie diſdaine taught feare thy maieſtie reuerence towards let v attentiue ghoſtlie greedineſſe marke word well followe whatſoeuer ſhall godlie vttered finallie touch thou ſo hart beſeech thee god beleeue thy word repent ſpeed preaching thy goſpell may take place v practiſe work faith ſhew foorth fruit worthie ſame ſo thy preacher togither v leading right vertuous godlie life according rule preſcribed thy word may brought end vnto thee chiefe ſhepheard ſoules wee may iointlie partaker eternall good thing moſt excellent felicitie thorough ieſus chriſt lord amen another great darkneſſe ſoules lord thou ſhineſt vnto v lightſome lampe thy grace nothing ſo effectuallie preaching thy word great harueſt thou thy ſelfe haſt ſaid workemen moſt part men ignorant wrapped miſerable blindneſſe teach thy word trulie ought beſeech thee therefore thou wilt ſend foorth workemen thy harueſt ſend teacher lord taught thee inſtructed thy ſpirit godlie wiſdome vnderſtanding preaching ſeeke themſelues thee becauſe godlie ſo doo becauſe wiſe vnderſtand giue preacher thy word heere preſent treaſures thy wiſedome may powre vpon v ſaluation v open windowes hart may receiue moſt holie wholſome light good ſeede falleth vpon v choaked thornes withered awaie drought deuoured fowles aire may growe vp good ground fruitefullie great increaſe thy glorie ſaluation amen another praier vſed anie hearer god word giue thee moſt hartie thanks eternall god father lord ieſu chriſt hath pleaſed thee thine vnſpeakable mercie goodneſſe age continuallie ſend world men woonderfull gift knowledge thy renuers ſpreaders foorth thy truth like thanks aſcribe vnto thy ſacred maieſtie allowing v ſhepheards preacher theſe day gathering together thy church mankinde building bodie chriſt humblie beſeech thee gratious god continue alwaie among v thy pure word thy miniſters gather vnto thy ſelfe euerlaſting congregation ſo inſtruct mine hart thy ſpirit truth vnfeinedlie may aſſent thy wholeſome word proue liuelie member thy bodie incorporated ſocietie world doth ſincerelie confeſſe thee euermore extoll thy holie name keepe thoſe preacher thou dooeſt wilt giue certaine knowledge thy bleſſed may time time open vnto v thine intent concerning repairing mankind ſaluation redemption ſoules thy free mercy alſo teach v liue new obedience abſtaine carnall deſires fight againſt ſoule inſpire miniſters preacher thy word thine holie ſpirit may vtter thy purelie haue receiued thy hand reteining forme whoalſome word ſounding onlie doctrine vttered thy ſonne thy boſome otherwiſe departing order faith rule thy word greatlie obſcure light thy doctrine obtrude vpon v vanitie owne inuentions wherefore let ſpeake thy word deceiptfullie ſincerelie euen thee thy ſight grant alſo tranſforming thy miniſterie policie lord ouer thine elect neither contend ſuperioritie primacie church onlie ſeeke glorie thy name ſaluation themſelues v giue libertie ſpeech boldlie without feare blame rebuke falſe doctrine blaſphemous ſuperſtition abuſes church open vnto doore vtterance may ſpeake myſteries chriſt manifeſt ought doo ſo ſhall dooings bee profitable vnto godlie aſſiſt alſo thine eſpeciall grace diſgrace doctrine impuritie life let conuerſation anſwer vnto doctrine teach preach eſpeciallie paſtor pariſh ſhepheard ſoule heere preſent whoſe mouth learne thy bleſſed hartilie praie thou wilt keepe religion ſincere pure enorme offence outward conuerſation endue long healthfull life thy good pleaſure manie good daie yeare may continue preaching gladſome voice thy gratious goſpell among v without contention ſtrife ſonne god art lord flocke worke thou effectuallie thy preacher ſpeake thou within v hart bleſſed thine eternall father confirme thy doctrine mind thine holie ſpirit grant may trulie knowe diſcerne ſame howling woolues inchanted ſongs ſeducing hireling grant may knowe thee euen thou knoweſt thine heauenlie father walke religiouſlie righteouſlie thy ſight ſhewing ſelues holie ſeede praiſeth thy name euermore come holie ſpirit open mine hart eares may conceiue profit thy whoaleſome doctrine ſweet comfort reuealed thy holie word preaching goſpell lord acknowledge teares ſluggiſhneſſe careleſnes ſeeking thy truth bewaile wretched coldneſſe hardneſſe hart beſeeching thee endue vnfeigned longing ardent deſire holie sermon grant life may worſhip foot preacher peace reuerence true diſpenſers thy myſteries thy faithfull miniſters double honor none otherwiſe obeie godlie ſermons would voice ſhould ſound heauens let blemiſhes imperfection ſome particular men vnreuerentlie conceiue thy whole miniſterie worke alſo within deſpiſing thy word deliuered vnto v neuer ſeeke ſtrange reuelations violent rauiſhings beſides contrarie thy word bearing alwaies mind order thou haſt appointed may conſtantlie embrace thy word manifeſted thy church finallie impart ſuch grace vpon v may imitate followe good work holie men caſting old man putting new created god righteouſneſſe true holineſſe amen praier god would feede defend church vſed communion heauenlie heardman nurſſe thing liuing thy meere goodneſſe ſatiſfieſt creature haue life ſuffer thy church pine awaie famiſhed lacke food thy bleſſed word feed v continuallie thy goodneſſe suffer thou lord giueſt ſuſtenance fleſh thy faithfull ſeruants depriued perfect doctrine moſt pure ſound sacrament indeede food eternall life feed v continuallie angel food thy holie word chriſt ieſus whereby hart may bee made righteous ſtrong himward let v like child iſrael loath heauenlie manna thou ſo mercifullie aboundantlie powreſt downe vpon v neither let v luſt againe fleſhpots aegypt leaſt thy wrath kindled againſt v alſo thou cauſe onelie ceaſe fall heauen vpon v alſo thou ſmite v moſt greeuous plague thou diddeſt iſraelites rather newborne babe remembring written man ſhall liue bread onlie euerie word proceedeth mouth god let v hartilie deſire ſincere milke thy word let ſoules delight fatneſſe let v come earelie late water buie eate ſatiſfie hunger thirſt let v harken diligentlie vnto thee eate good labour continuallie without wearineſſe meate periſheth lord let v neuer ſee daie wherein thou ſhalt prouoked ſend famine land againe famine ſaie bread thirſt water hearing thy word god far bee famine v good lord neither let v anie deſerue caſt owne city townes houſes wander ſtrange land sea sea north south eaſt weſt running fro like hungerſtarued wretch ſeeke food thy word ſometimes haue done lord yet find leaſt meanes doo onelie periſh bodie alſo ſoule lacke thy word verie food thereof let thy word god ſtill neere v euen mouthes hart word truth ſaie preached taught receiued feed thou v whenſoeuer famine either bodie ſpirit vexeth v father giue v daie daily bread may walke ſtrength thereof daie night vntill come holie hill horeb behold lord according thy commandement doo open mouth wide fill thou full thy heauenlie dainty thou haſt promiſed lord euermore giue v bread life heauen may ſtedfaſtlie beleeue thee behold lord come vnto thee though famiſhed let v therfore go awaie vnfed hungred let v ſent awaie faſting mind ala hunger thirſt greatlie toy gaud world haue nothing ſet afore becauſe wee poore beggerlie wretch thou lord art rich good thing moſt plentifull giuer dainty heauenlie ſatietie therefore beſeech thee giue v ſomewhat eate giue meate ſaie vnto wearie wandering ſouls yet ſuch luſt ſuch conuenient refreſhed thee art liuing heauenlie bread wherewith well fed ſtrength come v againe may aſcend vnto high thing neuer heereafter hunger thirſt anie vanity amen another praier vſed sermon communion thou vſeſt moſt mightie god preſerue thoſe thy child thou haſt louinglie adopted leſſe care diligence ſheepe ſame alwaies fed led thee moſt louing ſhepherd toward owne health perfect commoditie ſo long haue thee maiſter gouernour ſhall deſtitute neither meate drinke thy moſt wholeſome doctrine sacrament whereby manifeſt pine awaie ſo long liue miſerable wretched life hunger thirſt true perfect goodneſſe happeneth cauſe wee haue forſaken thee followed ſtrange guide wherof none come great peril miſerable trouble mind fall vpon v wherefore humblie beſeech thee moſt faithfull louing ſhepheard call v backe errours right perfect waie correct vice wandering ſtraieng flocke rod ſheephooke thy righteouſneſſe ſo may feed length orderlie purelie chaſtlie moſt wholſome delicates thy ſacred word bleſſed sacrament meanes whole head hart power mind may made fat well liking alwaies ſo vnderpropped thy louing mercy may finallie enioie thy houſe ſouereigne delight deinties euerlaſting life ieſus chriſt lord amen another praier ſaid sermon court almightie god moſt mercifull father haſt thine infinite wiſedome hidden honour ſhame life death thou mighteſt make fooliſh wiſdome world hee glorieth ſhould glorie lord giue v grace ſtumble ſome baſe eſtate ſmall ſhew outwardlie appeared thy ſonne rather denieng owne wiſedome ſeeke ſaluation thou haſt hidden laid vp v ſimple miniſterie thy goſpell may haue ſuch place amongſt v may reforme kingdom court priuate houſes perſons may ioie preſent light lampe foot followe whither goeth giuing reſt dealer till haue ſatiſfied hungrie ſoules withall aſſuring ſelues ſhall want thing needfull life ſhall nouriſhed thee haue thine aſſiſtance helpe deliuer v trouble finallie enioieng thy preſence anie trouble ſhall come neere v anie ſhall ſatiſfied haue perfect ioie ſight thee moſt louing god father ieſus chriſt thee holie ghoſt praiſe glorie euermore amen another almightie god moſt mercifull father haſt annointed thy ſonne thy holie ſpirit ſent preach goſpell priſon bondage ſinne death might ſet libertie haue wounded hart healed faith ſweete doctrine grant v loue bondage rather libertie death rather life may ſo receiue word may attaine euerlaſting freedome life much lord thou declareſt contempt thy word thou dooeſt oftentimes withdrawe preacher euen thoſe ſeemed eſpeciallie haue beene ſent grant v ſo receiue teacher thy truth may continued amongſt v euerlaſting comfort thee ſonne holie ghoſt honour glorie euer amen another praier againſt hardneſſe hart contempt word god much thy ſacred doctrine moſt mightie god eſpeciallie taught ſacred church wherby thou thy ſelfe art manifeſtlie knowne ſingularlie preached highlie magnified alſo thereby ſtill called heauen heauenlie thing behooueth v manie profeſſe thy ſchoole greatlie reioice thy faithfull diſciples hart deſire giue diligent eare vnto thee alone thy moſt wholſome inſtructions thou haſt oftener thou diddeſt vnto iſraelites thy ſacred scripture alſo miniſters thy bleſſed word proteſted vnto v wiſe giue eare vnto people acknowledge trulie thy god word ſaie onelie mind verelie perfect moſt pure worſhipping ala haue turned hart thy holie word ſo wretchedlie deſpiſed doctrine thy ſacred lawe goſpell haue alwaies hitherto beene ſlander vnto ſame verie hartilie ſorie truſting death bloudſhedding thy ſonne ieſus chriſt sauiour doo great feruencie moſt earneſt praiers lamentablie call vpō thee pardon ſinfull crime ſeeing acknowledge thee onlie god earneſtlie deſire thy gratious goodneſſe grant v requeſt may hencefoorth euer giue eare onelie vnto thy diuine maieſtie honour thee alone neither make anie thine equall prefer anie thing thee suffer ſinfull hart nature diſpoſed vnto euill hardened thy fatherlie friendlie admonition make ſame ſoft hartilie praie thee inſpiration thy good grace holie ſpirit neither ſuffer v thou thine infinite goodneſſe merit ſake haſt choſen thy bleſſed people ſheepe thy paſture ſtriue ſtruggle againſt thy bleſſed commandements like vnto ſtiffenecked iewes wouldeſt oftentimes put therto traill thy mightie power grant thou moſt deere excellent father ſpeakeſt alwaie peaceable matter thoſe thing ſingular commoditie haue heretofore beene maruellous rebellious ſtubborne burdenous troubleſome vnto thee may become thy tractable conformed obedient child euer hereafter haue ſo great regard thy bleſſed word verie attentiue mind may giue good eare thoſe thing thou ſpeakeſt willeſt v doo dooing ſhall onlie ſaued adorned glorie alſo euerie thing ſhall repleniſhed goodneſſe truth righteouſneſſe peace faith ſhall abound ſame ſhall plentiouſlie iuſtified ieſus chriſt lord amen ſedition priuie conſpiracie falſe doctrine hereſie hardneſſe hart contempt thy word commandement good lord deliuer v may pleaſe thee giue thy people increaſe grace heare meekelie thy word receiue pure affection bring foorth fruit ſpirit beſeech thee heare v good lord may pleaſe thee bring waie truth ſuch haue erred deceiued ſtrengthen ſuch doo ſtand comfort helpe weakeharted raiſe vp fall finallie beate downe satan vnder feete beſeech thee heare v good lord amen verie neceſſarie praier againſt hypocrite falſe teacher deriders goſpell whoſoeuer almighty god make true account ſincere goodlineſſe pure religion exceeding ſorowfull ſee ſacred church ſcattered wholeſome doctrine derided praiſes thy diuine name contempt ſuch thing appertaine deuout woorſhipping thee turned vnto heatheniſh gewgawes voluptuous pleaſures intent therfore theſe thing may wiſe happen vnto v ſee far powre foorth dailie thee great ſubmiſſion theſe dolfull complaint thou wouldeſt firſt thine exceeding great goodneſſe louing mercie blot heinous ſinnes offence maner infinite exceeding greeuous committed onelie weakeneſſe ignorance alſo done oftentimes maliciouſlie ſet purpoſe fauourable ſaie god vnto greeuous ſinnes turne awaie v ſuch ſort moſt fierce wile ſubtil laiengs await antichriſt thy ſacred church depriued bleſſed ioie ſpirituall gladneſſe lord beſeech thee ſhew ſome experiment proofe thy ſelfe declare thy name thy power amongſt thoſe thy ſpitefull enimies bring downe antichriſts kingdome vngodlie ſects ſchiſmaticall faction certes ouerlong hath oppreſſed v yea verie daie ſtill letteth hindereth holdeth vnder foote verie manie elſe ſpeedilie would haue run kingdome libertie beleeued goſpell pull therfore downe lord ſtumbling block euill example peruerſe doctrine neuer ſuffer recouer againe lord thou ſeeſt right well perceiueſt cruell malicious vngodlie antichriſtians would inuade church ſo puft vp pride inflamed furie ſcorning well diuine lawes humane like ſtatelineſſe equall contempt dooing nothing courteſie faithfulneſſe practiſing miſchiefe naughtineſſe endeuouring ſo much lieth thy bleſſed word may flouriſh true religion might vtterlie extinguiſhed perfect inuocating calling vpon thy glorious name might quite rooted bring thing naught forged tale men tradition politike deuiſes diueliſh deceipts verie much outrage thy beloued iſrael ſith ſhe hath thy great mercie enioied ſo long peace bleſſed tranquillitie let hir ioined vnto thee hir welbeloued ſo ſhe may continuallie laie ſure hold vpon thy worthie praiſes suffer mouth hir good wholeſome inſtructors cloſed vp put ſilence permit thy due honour obliuion yet let hymnes ſongs wherwith thou art highlie praiſed celebrated vſurped ſuch haue ſame deriſion ſcorne finallie humblie beſeech thee excellent father wrath indignation ſo euer due vnto v reaſon heinous ſinnes haue wickedlie committed thou wouldeſt yet glorie thy famous name turne frō thy ſanctified church thy deere ſpouſe powre ſame rather vpon enimielike rage moſt malicious affection imagine nothing elſe quite marre vtterlie laie waſte thy bleſſed heritage deede leſſe aduerſaries thy bleſſed name peace quietneſſe ieſus chriſt lord amen praier vnbeleeuers men may embrace goſpell vnto thee doo crie lord father maker men art rich vnto call vpon thee commandeſt light ſhine darkenes thou wilt men ſhould ſaued come knowledge truth therfore thy great loue thou diddeſt call v participation lot saint light nature child wrath death alien ſtrangers teſtaments promiſe hauing none hope without god world fellowe citizen saint houſhold god built vpon foundation apoſtles prophet ieſus chriſt beeing head corner ſtone ſuſteineth whole building word power heare v thy ſeruants making ſupplication ſuch yet haue hard ſound thy goſpell neither knowe thy name ſitting darkeneſſe ſhadowe death haue mind darkened alienated life god ignorance caried awaie vnto dumbe idol fained god euen led run worſhip god giue grace thy word may knowne among preached euerie land ſound go end world thou alſo maiſt found ſought thee famous among ſuch neuer aſked thee send foorth thy word may healed walke vanity mind god father lord ieſu chriſt king glorie giue ſpirit wiſedome reuelation confeſſing thee inlighten mind may knowe hope wherevnto thou haſt called v pretious glorie thine inheritance saint excellent greatneſſe power toward v beleeue according working mightie power thou haſt wrought raiſed thee dead placed thy right hand heauenlie place aboue principality power open hart vnbeleeuers hearing thy word may acknowledge thee onlie true god ieſus chriſt whome thou haſt ſent may worſhip thee father ſonne ſonne thee father holie ghoſt euen thou haſt reuealed thy ſelfe take vaile hart iewes leaſt blinded reading old teſtament ſtumble ſtone rocke offence incredulitie hardneſſe hart thy sonne chriſt crucified preached vnto ſtumbling blocke thy goſpell ſauour death vnto death conuerted true faith knowledge thee father ſonne face vncouered may behold thy glorie knowing writing prophet meſſias thou haſt appointed sauiour world likewiſe gather thou gentile whome goſpell word croſſe meere fooliſhneſſe thy congregation may embrace thy miniſterie caſting fleſhlie wiſedome leade cogitation captiue obedience goſpell moreouer praier ſupplication onlie thoſe aboue mentioned alſo ſuch either although reſiſt thy truth pure religion openlie obſtinatelie profeſſe religion yet mingled manie ſuperſtitions abuſes worſhipping calling vpon saint departed life addicted outward ceremony rudiment world burdening conſciences man obſeruations tradition father truſting owne righteouſneſſe rather work deedes fleſh refuſe make little accompt thy righteouſneſſe true iuſtification go eſtabliſh owne righteouſneſſe chriſt end lawe righteouſneſſe manie beleeue another foundation man laie laid thy ſonne meſſias waie truth life end lawe perfect obedience fulfilling lawe innocent bitter death hee hath reſtored vnto v ſaluation perfect righteouſneſſe euerie one beleeueth might periſh haue euerlaſting life god ſight blind bring home againe ignorance either intangled doubtfull labyrinth groſſe errours countenance polluted religion lightened thy ſpirit may returne right waie ſuch impudent face ſtiffe neckes doo obſtinatelie affected ignorance withſtand thine holie ſpirit whoſe ſenſes god world hath blinded light thy glorious goſpell ſhine ouer repreſſe bridle malice ſlaughter perſecutions neither trouble deſtroie thy church amen sermon reade ſome theſe ſentences scripture exhorting diligent obſeruing following god word beard deuteronomie 28 verſe 1 thou ſhalt obeie diligentlie voice lord thy god walke ordinance obſerue keepe doo commandements command thee daie theſe bleſsings ſhall come thee ouertake thee bleſſed ſhalt thou citie bleſſed field c thou wilt obeie voice lord thy god keepe doo commandements ordinance command thee daie theſe curſes ſhall come vpon thee ouertake thee curſſed ſhalt thou citie curſſed field c whole chapter eccleſiasticus 35 ſo keepeth lawe bringeth offrings inough holdeth faſt commandements offereth offering ſaluation matthew 7 ſoeuer heareth ſaieth chriſt theſe word doth ſame liken wiſe man hath builded houſe rocke c whoſoeuer heareth theſe word doth ſhall likened vnto fooliſh man hath builded houſe vpon ſands c luke 11 bleſſed heare word god keepe luke 12 ſeruant knoweth maiſters doth ſhall beaten manie ſtripes roman 2 hearer lawe righteous god dooers lawe ſhall iuſtified iames 1 wherefore yee dooers word hearer onelie deceiuing owne ſelues anie heare word doo like vnto man beholdeth naturall face glaſſe hath conſidered himſelfe goeth awaie forgetteth immediatlie manner one ſo looketh perfect lawe libertie continueth therein beeing forgetfull hearer dooer worke ſhall bee bleſſed deed iohn 15 yee cleane word haue ſpoken vnto abide c vine yee branch abideth ſame bringeth foorth much fruit without ye doo nothing yee abide word abide aske yee ſhall done vnto reuelation 2 ouercommeth keepeth word vnto end giue power ouer nation reuelation 3 remember therefore thou haſt heard receiued hold faſt repent hold ſaie thou haſt man take thy crowne watch giue thanks praie vnto god sermon ſaie immortall praiſe thanks giuen vnto thee almightie god moſt mercifull father haſt giuen v ſo pretious gift thy holie word vouchſafed v heare ſo glad tidings thy ſacred goſpell hand thy miniſter preſentlie thy mercy hath vttered vnto v ſeeing thou haſt delt ſo gratiouſlie v free publiſhing thy goſpell amongſt v foure twentie yeeres ſeemeth thou haſt euen lifted v vp heauen city wherein sauiour taught moſt vpon earth haſt manner throwne downe hell left terrible fearfull example thy iudgements againſt thoſe walke woorthie grace offered vnto grant v ſo profit chaſtiſement correction thy grace thou haſt reuealed thy vnto v otherwiſe could neuer haue knowne ſo ſtrengthen v lord neuer refuſe thy goſpell vnbeleefe ſeeke perſons preacher anie cauſes pretence infidelitie hauing thy word alwaies hart thy praiſes tongue may walke woorthie thy ſo great grace beſtowed vpon v haue conuerſation heauen wee may taken vp thither vnto thee alwaies glorifie thee thy sonne holie ghoſt amen thankesgiuing knowledge god word giue thee thankes father lord heauen earth becauſe thou haſt hid myſterie thy word goſpell ſaluation thy sonne wiſe men vnderſtanding world haſt reuealed ſame babe baſe degree certeinlie ſuch thy good pleaſure thou haſt giuen v thing thy sonne none knoweth thou father neither dooth anie knowe thee except thy sonne thy sonne ſhall reueale thee worſhip thee praiſe thee glorifie thee giue thee thanks hid wiſedome thou didſt determine world glorie neuer knowne prince world anie time ſonnes men reuealed ſpirit communion myſterie hid age opened thy saint thou wouldſt haue made knowne rich glorious myſterie thine owne working thy free mercie made heires partaker thy promiſe chriſt ieſu goſpell bringeth v tidings full aſſurance euerlaſting rich thine infinite goodneſſe mercie bleſſed god euen father lord ieſus chriſt hath bleſſed v ſpirituall bleſſings heauenlie thing chriſt hath choſen v foundation world ſhould holie without blame loue hath predeſtinated v adopted ieſus chriſt vnto himſelfe according good pleaſure whereby loueth v beloued haue redemption bloud euen forgiueneſſe ſinnes according rich grace wherein hath abounded towards v wiſdome vnderſtanding hath opened vnto v myſterie according good pleaſure hath purpoſed himſelfe euen vntill diſpenſation fulneſſe time might gather one thing heauen earth euen chriſt alſo choſen wee predeſtinated according purpoſe maketh althings counſell owne might praiſe glorie hoping haue beleeued chriſt heard word truth euen goſpell ſaluation grace thou didſt extend toward v work righteouſneſſe done according thy mercie thou ſauedſt v didſt call v holie calling according work according thine owne purpoſe grace giuen v chriſt time made manifeſt appearing sauiour ieſus chriſt hath aboliſhed death brought life immortalitie vnto light goſpell thee therefore art power eſtabliſh hart according reuelation myſterie kept ſecret ſince world began opened publiſhed among nation scripture prophet commandement euerlaſting god obedience faith thee ſaie god onelie wiſe praiſe ieſus chriſt euer amen beſeech thee according operation working thy mightie power may continue conſtant true faith wholeſome doctrine time forſaking wiſedome opened goſpell may followe iudgement worldlie reaſon fleſhlie vnderſtanding thou haſt beeſotted altogither confounded ſearching thy hidden myſteries thy ſpirituall wiſedome dooth farre exceed wiſedome vnderſtanding creature wherevnto fleſh attaine neither bloud reueale yet naturall man although indued great ſharpeneſſe wit worldlie vnderſtanding perceiue ſame grant beſeech thee may thy ſimple ſheepe littleones receiuing thee word truth without contradiction diſputation article faith bring fleſhly wiſedome made void proper vnderſtanding may bring mind godlie captiuitie let thy sonne deſcending aboue brought eternall wiſedome goſpell thy boſome made ſacrifice behalfe exalted thy right hand beſtoweth gift let beſeech thee ſhine hart likewiſe cauſe thine holie ſpirit inſtill v diuine light breath vpon v new flame thine heauenlie knowledge till departing eternall life may behold thee onlie true god face face liueſt reigneſt perpetuall glorie amen another thankesgiuing sermon render vnto thee heauenlie father moſt hartie thanks ſpirituall heauenlie nouriſhment thy bleſſed word wherewith ſoules onelie well refreſhed preſent alſo faith ſtrengthened loue kindled conſcience quieted wee moſt humblie beſeech thee giue v grace onelie hearer thy word dooers alſo ſame onelie loue alſo liue thy goſpell onlie fauour alſo followe thy godlie doctrine onelie profeſſe alſo practiſe thy bleſſed commandements whatſoeuer outwardlie heare inwardlie beleeue may ſhew foorth ſame conuerſation liuing vnto honour thy holie name comfort chriſtian brother health ſoules amen another god wee haue heard eares father preacher haue declared vnto v noble work thou haſt done old time v grant therefore beſeech thee thou heauenlie huſbandman ſeed thy word ſowne amongſt v may take ſuch deepe root hart neither burning heate perſecution cauſe wither neither thornie care life doo choke ſeed ſowne good ground may bring foorth thirtie ſixtie hundred fold thy heauenlie wiſedome hath appointed glorie thy holie name amen another praier thankesgiuing sermon giue thee moſt humble thankes lord ieſu chriſt thou haſt vouchſafed euen abundantlie refreſh feed v food thy word beſeech thee vnderſtanding knowledge thy word may wholſome comfortable effectuall v heauenlie ſeed ſowne doo die periſh v without fruit keepe hart lord inuiron compaſſe incloſure hedge thy grace thy holie angel preſerue watch ouer ſame infernall fowle bird satan pull thy ſacred word hart prepare breaſt make apt hart vnto thee good lord may firmelie keepe thy word may alwaie ſticke new freſh memory giue v alſo ſtrength poſſibilitie power life may anſwere thy doctrine heard giue increaſe alſo thy word heauenlie huſbandman v may augment growe thy holie ſpeech heauenlie eloquence may onlie bring v knowledge thy alſo may execute accompliſh fullfill thou commandeſt willeſt ſo perſeuering end may laſt aſpire thy celeſtiall kingdome amen another gratious god moſt mercifull father haſt vouchſafed v rich pretious iewell thy holie word aſſiſt v thy ſpirit may written hart euerlaſting comfort reforme v renew v according thine owne image build v vp edifie v perfect building thy chriſt ſanctifieng increaſing v heauenlie vertues grant heauenlie father ieſus chriſts ſake amen another praier accompliſhing god reuealed lawe truelie accounted right happie amongſt mortall men moſt good mercifull god haue thy ſacred lawe alwaie ſet eies mind make patterne begin life rule proceed haue begun ſo ſhall happen go aſtraie fault may amended thereby alſo leade vertuous life according vnto iuſtice theſe ſhall liue blameleſſe dooings ſhall examined vpright iudgement ſhall aſhamed greatlie auaile diligentlie practiſed tender age hartilie acknowledge earneſtlie confeſſe moſt deere father man policie altogether vnprofitable none accompt made thereof vnleſſe thou preſent thy bleſſed ſpirit dooeſt direct mind otherwiſe gaine may haue hearing meditating thy holie lawe cold verie hurtfull knowledge wherefore earneſt requeſt thou wouldeſt onlie miniſter ſtrength vnto v thy grace accompliſhing theſe thing thou commandeſt thy diuine lawe alſo bring vnto good effect ſo may haue felicitie owne deuiſes take greater delight continuall practiſe due execution thereof anie fleſhlie worldlie pleaſures ieſus chriſt lord amen another praier ſtrength ſpeedilie accompliſh god diuine lawe one ſide doo conſider weaknes ſtrength moſt mightie god contrariwiſe abſoluteneſſe perfectneſſe thy bleſſed lawe euidentlie perceiue obteining thereof thy moſt puiſſant helpe ſtand v verie great ſteed firſt therefore teach v true way thy holie commandements moreouer illuminate ſuch ſort mind vnderſtanding may able incline great feruencie vnto thoſe thing thou haſt taught commanded furthermore needefull thee graunt v power abilitie performe whatſoeuer haue learned thee otherwiſe ſhall profit v little nothing haue knowledge vnleſſe ſome part obedience either performed leaſtwiſe begun v lewd inclination ſinfull hart doth greatlie hinder finallie ſenſes corrupt affection woonderfull huge aduerſaries heerevnto succour thou v therfore humblie beſeech thee thy good grace aboundant fauour forgiuing whatſoeuer haue committed doo dailie moſt ſinfull manner againſt thy ſacred lawe neither let imputed vnto v eternall deſtruction meane ſeaſon good god quicken lift v ſo vp thy vnſpeakable louing mercie ſee offred vnto v benigne promiſes thy holie ſcriptures thou wouldeſt permit v ſwarue thy ſacred lawe thou haſt vouchſafed ſet v doo much feruencie deſire vnſeparablie annexed vnto thee grant may execute exceeding feruent deſire charge left vnto v ſo may maruellous ſpeedilie beſtir ſteps foot towards fulfilling thy bleſſed lawe cauſe thou v excellent father humblie beſeech thee cut caſt aſide delay contrarie expectation vngodlie alwaies caſt let entrap v may obedient thy ſacred precept ſo thoſe honour loue thee purelie may accompanie v like earth eueriewhere repleniſhed thy ineſtimable goodnes ſo number thy true faithfull ſuppliants may dailie greatlie augmented ieſus chriſt lord amen praier vſed anie excommunicate perſon notorious ſinner dooing open penance church true conuerſion repentance c eternall euerliuing god father lord ieſus chriſt thou mouth thy holie prophet apoſtles haſt plainelie pronounced thou deſireſt death ſinner rather may conuert liue alſo haſt ſent thine onelie ſonne ſuffer cruell death croſſe iuſt ſuch find themſelues oppreſſed burthen ſinne aduocation may haue acceſſe throne thy grace aſſured crie ſhall find fauour mercie unto thee moſt mercifull god doo miſerable wretch crie whome filthie life lewd conuerſation proud contempt thee thy holy lawe thou griefe dolour manie good chriſtian hart dooeſt iuſtlie ſcourge puniſh cenſures thy church haſt woorthilie cut ſecluded reiected excommunication thy myſticall body making ſpectacle god angel men unto thee ſaie lord maiſter power calleſt offender vnto thee waie iudgement affliction knoweſt hardneſſe hart haue power ſelues returne riſe vp doo come name thy sonne lord sauiour ieſus chriſt acknowledge thee congregation heinous ſinnes wherewith haue ſhamefullie polluted ſelfe offended thee thy church heere proſtrate feete thy maieſtie craue mercie pardon thee aſke forgiueneſſe world eſpeciallie congregation whome confeſſe haue offended moſt humblie beſeeching thee father mercy looke vpon thine eies pitie euen thou lookedſt ſometime vpon ſinfull woman taken adulterie vpon marie magdalen banket proſtrating hir ſelfe thy foot bitterlie bewaile hir wickedneſſe likewiſe fauour thou didſt publicane ſtanding far temple without lifting vp eies vnto heauen ſhame ſtriking breſt onelie ſaid lord mercifull vnto ſinner firſt god thou wilt pierce hardened hart moue power thy holie ſpirit ſuch ſort may come true knowledge ſinnes feele ſoule conſcience terrour thy iudgement vpon offender eſpeciallie lord haue offended thy maieſtie great number thy chriſtian congregation deteſtable fact greeuous ſinne ſo beeing armed thy grace endure mortification fleſh like sauiour ieſus ſuffered fleſh may ſubiect ſelfe iuſt ordinance thy church refuſe openlie heere acknowledge confeſſe fault chriſtian patience true humiliation giuing thee glorie thy name face thee congregation preſent may eiewitneſſes ſame becauſe lord externall confeſſion outward acknowledgement ſinnes without inward contrition dolour hart ſoule auaileth nothing thy preſence art ſearcher hart ſifter reines moſt humblie beſeech thee thou wilt ſo touch hart conſcience effectuallie worke perfect remorſe deteſtation former offence without anie hypocriſie true compunction ſoule ſincere confeſſion mouth vtterlie loathing condemning mine owne impietie damning lawe pronounceth vniuſt damnable may attaine ſome ſenſe feeling thy mercie thou haſt aboundantlie ſhewed vnto mankind chriſt ieſu lord conuert lord ſhall conuerted becauſe thou art god conuerted doo penance heale lord ſhall healed ſaue thou ſhall ſaued thou art praiſe confeſſe ſhame confuſion face due iuſtlie ſuffer daie thee honor glorie redemption thus iudging puniſhing dooeſt little little giue place amend ſpace repent haſt ſuddenlie vnwares taken awaie face earth ouerwhelmed thy iuſtice wicked deedes dooing deſerued thou iuſtlie mighteſt thy lenitie patience longſuffering mercie thou louer ſoule moſt humblie thanke thee beſeeching thee ſo mollifie hart may repent eſteeme greatlie ſo great rich ineſtimable treaſures thy goodneſſe moreouer good lord ieſus chriſt grant beſeech thee among feares terrours conſcience may take hold thee liuelie faith haſt redeemed curſſe lawe art made wiſedome righteouſneſſe ſanctification redemption may fight conſcience yeeld ſelfe ſlaue ſtill sathan deſpaire thy mercie vpholden voice thy goſpell may flee vnto thee mediator iuſtified faith may haue peace god ſo comming vnto thee hearing thy word repentance angel heauen may continuallie haue occaſion reioice auoiding fearefull vengeance moſt aſſuredlie ſhall fall vpon inobedient may reſtored right thy lawe receiued againe boſome thy church member thy myſticall body hart walke holie obedience thee thy holie word praiſe thy name comfort thy church confuſion sathan amen thankesgiuing praier vnto god reconciled offender excommunicate perſon restored church vſed open penance done sermon otherwiſe heauenlie father fountaine mercie conſolation confeſſe ſelfe chiefeſt ſinners wretch moſt vnworthie bee counted amongſt thy child member thy church thou haue reſpect corruption nature horror manifold miſdeeds ſeeing hath pleaſed thy fatherlie goodneſſe onlie freelie elect chooſe thy deere ſonne lord ieſus chriſt death redeeme goſpell call holie ſpirit thine illuminate alſo thou haſt commanded thy holie word ſacred goſpell preached onlie world end penitent may haue aſſurance remiſſion ſinnes great ſmall old new onlie time euen oft ſorowfull hart broken ſpirits bitter teares ſhall bewaile ſame call thy grace mercie conſideration thy fatherlie adoption ineffable clemencie ſhewed vpon mee vnwoorthie wretch highlie praiſe magnifie thy fatherlie mercie teſtimonie whereof onelie feele ſelfe others alſo ſee ſame euidentlie conuerſion confeſſion forepaſſed fault penance dooing aſſured haue ſo much ſhamed ſelfe godlie congregation haue thereby confounded ouercome mine enimie satan time bondage whoſe venem deceiuable entiſements heretofore haue beene verie rebellious wholeſome admonition church vile ſinnes rebellion contempt confeſſe haue beene woorthilie excommunicate puniſhed cenſures ſame lord ſeeing ſpirit lord ieſus chriſt hath ſo farre preuailed power therof ſet freedome thy mercie returned againe ſocietie thy saint myſticall bodie thy church beſeech thee obedience lord ieſus chriſt ſo accept ſorowfull conuert allow mine vnfeined repentance confeſſion former inobedience fault neuer laid charge haue mercie vpon god haue mercie vpon abſolue thy poore creature onelie ſentence excommunication alſo ſinnes committed cenſures church laid againſt ſame lord giuen according hartie vnfeined repentance thee congregation hartilie forgiue world anie thing hath offended againſt lord pronounce thou ſinnes cleanſed ſhall cleanſed abſolue thou chaine mine iniquity wherewith faſt tied bound ſhall abſolued looſe thou ſins earth ſhall looſed heauen thy great goodneſſe mercie acquited ſent awaie vncondemned thee ſinfull woman taken adulterie hir accuſers receiued againe ſocietie ieſus chriſt boſome church participation bleſſed sacrament finallie fruition thy benefit may perpetuall aſſiſtance thy holie ſpirit onelie diſpleaſed ſinnes bridle hencefoorth corrupt affection till satan cleane troden vnder foot power redeemer chriſt alſo ſo conducted courſe life hereafter neuer fall like ſinnes impietie contempt god godlineſſe anie continuallie may ſubiect voice church miniſters ſame proceed dailie maner good work chriſtian obedience praiſe thy holie name edifieng thy church ieſus chriſt lord onelie sauiour thee holie ghoſt giuen honour glorie praiſe thankesgiuing onelie miſerable ſinner vnwoorthie wretch alſo men angel creature heauen earth time foorth euermore amen luke 15 verſes 6 7 reioice ſaith chriſt haue found ſheepe loſt yea ſaie vnto ioie heauen preſence angel god ouer one ſinner repenteth ouer ninetie nine iuſt perſons neede repentance praier vſed conuerſion anie notorious ſinner doth open penance church pitifull god omnipotent lord mercifull father good thou beareſt vnto v ieſus chriſt thy deere ſonne wilt death deſtruction ſinner rather inſpiration moouing thy holie ſpirit conuert liue alſo dooſt witneſſe vertue ſtrength thy word ſuch cauſeth mountaines ſhake rock tremble flouds drie vp behold thy child people proſtrate thee moſt humblie beſeech thee ieſus chriſts ſake pitifullie looke vpon ſinners eſpeciallie vpon ſiſter preſent baptiſed thy name hath profeſſed hir ſelfe ſubiect religion vnto diſcipline thy church though satan ala hath ſo blinded hir wilfullie ſhee hath contemned one lord thou alone knoweſt ſo maiſt thou alone change mollifie hart impenitent ſinners thou ſaie voice prophet nathan awakedſt dauid deadlie ſecuritie without anie prophet didſt beate downe pride manaſſes priſon filled ieruſalem kind impietie thou turnedſt hart peter onelie looke thy deere ſonne lord ieſus chriſt fearfullie horrible imprecation hee thriſe denied openlie forſworne thee thou openedſt eies blind excommunicate man cauſedſt beleeue thy ſaiengs forgaueſt woman taken adulterie ſentſt hir awaie vncondemned thee hir accuſers thou ſaie lord whoſe mercy without meaſure endure euer thee doo praie ſiſter heere preſentlie puniſhed dooing open penance hir offence earneſtlie deſiring thee father mercy firſt ſo pierce moue hir heart feare thy ſeuere iudgements ſuffereſt child thine go vncorrected world end may eſcape vnpuniſhed world come ſo open hir eies ſhe may begin ſee vnderſtand fearefull terrible thing fall thy hand prouoke thy wrath indignation againſt hir let pleaſe thy maieſtie vertue thy holie ſpirit ſo mollifie hir hard hart ſaie ſhe may length feele greeuouſlie ſhe hath offended againſt thee church giue hir thy grace acknowledge accuſe damne well v whome ſhe hath offended thy preſence hir contempt ſinne ſo notorious damnable leaſt hir obſtinacie wilfull rebellion thy church congregation prouoked compelled greefe hart cut hir quite thy myſticall bodie whome lord vnfeinedlie deſire receiue within church liuelie member thy deere ſonne lord ieſus chriſt heare v mercifull father call backe againe deere ſiſter eternall deſtruction whereinto sathan would leade hir thy preſence euen hir rebellion tranſgreſſions doo mourne may receiue hir againe gladnes ioie ſo render praiſe honour vnto thee thy holie congregation grant ſelues lord vnworthie whome thou ſhouldeſt heare becauſe ceaſe offend thee continuall tranſgreſſing thy holie precept looke vpon v mercifull father corrupt nature looke downe thy deere ſonne whome thou thy meere mercie haſt appointed head high biſhop aduocate mediator onlie propitiator merit death humblie beſeech thee mercifullie behold v ſuffer moſt innocent bloud thy deere ſonne ſhead v penitent ſiſter prophaned tyrannie ſleight sathan vertue ſame let ſiſter brought vnfeined repentance conuerſion ſo ſhe may eſcape fearfull indignation ſhe appeareth haue fallen grant ſaie lord vnto ſiſter repentance hart ſincere confeſſion mouth praiſe thy name comfort thy church confuſion sathan vnto v grant lord albeit cannot liue altogether cleane ſinne void offence yet fall like horrible crime impietie contempt diſhonour thy holie name ſlander offence brother ſiſters infamie thy holie religion goſpell profeſſe let thy godlie power lord ſo perpetuallie aſſiſt ſtrengthen weakeneſſe conduct v courſe whole life neither craft sathan tyrannie ſinne drawe v vtterlie obedience required true chriſtians contrarilie beeing ſubiect voice thy church miniſters ſame vnder thee holineſſe innocencie life may declare wicked generation difference betweene child light child darkeneſſe men ſeeing good work may praiſe thee daie viſitation aſke thee heauenlie father boldneſſe head mediator ieſus chriſt praieng furthermore hath taught v father c another praier ſaid beholder anie offender church elſewhere almightie god moſt mercifull father whoſe iudgements vnſearchable whoſe way paſt finding teach v iudge wiſelie ſiſter afflicted thy hand condemning rather profiting example may leade v repentance bringing foorth ſuch fruit thou requireſt thoſe planted thy church leaſt continuing fruitleſſe prouoke thee laſt cutting v downe becauſe thou haſt giuen v ſauiour able heale infirmity deliuer v lord bond sathan ſet libertie may foreſee ſtraight doore enter leauing wide gate leadeth deſtruction may ſaued thoſe appointed therevnto ieſus chriſt whome thee holie ghoſt honor praiſe glorie euermore amen thanksgiuing conuerſion excommunicate perſon publike offender penance thanke mercie goodneſſe god ieſus chriſt lord conuerſion patient penance ſiſter whereby ſhe hath ſo much endured reproch infamie hir owne ſinnes deede ſhe hath confounded ouercome satan hir deadlie foe went make hir continuall ſlaue whoſe ſubtile ſleights euill ſuggeſtions ſhe hath heretofore beene diſobedient thy holie lawes wholſome admonition thy church lord ſeeing ſpirit lord ieſus chriſt hath ſo farre preuailed hir ſhe returned ſocietie let pleaſe thee obedience ſame lord ieſus chriſt ſo accept hir hir former diſobedience ſinnes neuer laid hir charge ſhe may increaſe goodneſſe till satan finallie troden vnder hir feete power lord ieſus chriſt thee holie spirit honor glorie euer amen publike adminiſtration holie ſacrament baptiſme better call mind owne vow promiſe made long ſince vnto god praie priuatelie ſelfe ſaie moſt bleſſed foregoer guide chriſtian people ieſu chriſt ſubmitting humbling thy ſelfe vouchſafedſt baptiſed iohn riuer iordan waſt onlie baptiſed water alſo blood holie ghoſt vouchſafe euen ſo incline bow diſpoſe outwarde life inward mind affect deſires fulfilling righteouſneſſe ſo mortified dead old adam thy holie witneſſe baptiſme working operation holie ghoſt may alwaie haue holy couenant remembrance eies couenaunt vow promiſe ſaie haue taken vpon v baptiſme intent faithfull champion ſtriuing againſt world fleſh diuell may vanquiſh ouercome might noifull hurtfull vnto v amen giue thanks regeneration ſanctification afterward praier vpon whitſundaie praie thus ſpirituall waſhing awaie thy ſinnes haue mercie god according thy great tenderneſſe hart wickedneſſe borne ſinnes mother conceiued ſo nature ſin confeſſion truth knowe well right acceptable vnto thee wheras moſt part others thou haſt either hid ſame made vnknowne purge ſprinkle mee bloud ieſus chriſt thine vnſpotted lambe thou waſh ſhall white ſnowe waſh thoroughlie therfore mine errours clenſe onlie ſinnes paſſed alſo whole life come ſo ſhall receiue theſe glad tidings hart ſins forgiuen baptiſme ſpirit fire thine illumination baptiſe might efficacie baptiſme receiued childhood grant ſame ſpirit might alwaie conduct v let ſpirituall waſhing baptiſme continue v vntill infection vice haue nature old adam perfectlie taken awaie death fleſh ieſus chriſt lord amen praie benefit holie sacrament may applied vnto ſoules health bleſſed trinitie eternall god one eſſence giue grace euerie combate eſpeciallie point death mindfull thy couenant made v chriſtening thy moſt comfortable promiſe anexed beleeueth baptiſed ſhall bee ſaued may neuer doubt either thy mercifull goodwill towards v free remiſſion ſinnes often remembring ſigne couenant may dailie confirmed faith hope perpetuall happineſſe applie thy benefit certainlie thou haſt promiſed faithfullie wilt performe vnto ſelues thy promiſes made ſuch beleeue truſt thee vaine purpoſe likewiſe vphold ſoules sacrament thy supper ſtrengthened ſeale new teſtament may certaine confirmed touching reconciliation euerlaſting righteouſneſſe alwaies beare fixed mind teſtament man prooued death teſtator ſmall accounted much ſhould laſt teſtament holie sacrament sauiour chriſt remaine pure continuall force remembrance praie may rightlie trulie receiue bleſſed sacrament moſt mercifull god louing father thy ſon ieſus chriſt haſt abrogated ſuperfluous ceremony lawe haſt deliuered v bondage thereof giuing vnto v ſure certaine ſeals ſacraments thy grace free redemption moſt pretious bloud thy deere sonne ieſus chriſt grant lord beſeech thee may euermore vſe according thy ſonne sauiours inſtitution hath left pledge great loue towards mankind continuall remembrance moſt pretious death ſuffered vpon wood croſſe redemption fountaine water hath regenerated v moſt pretious bloud hath purged v make v therefore receiue theſe holie myſteries without corruption vſe without alteration continue without ſuperſtition honour glorie thy moſt holie name ieſu chriſt lord thee holie ghoſt honour glorie euer amen publike baptiſme praie giue thanks ſecretlie yourſelfe time ſerue ſaieng yeeld thee moſt hartie thanks heauenlie father hath pleaſed thee regenerate v fountaine water faith bloud thy ſonne ieſus chriſt purge v originall ſinne receiued old eue able oh lord giue thee ſufficient praiſes expreſſe thy louing kindneſſe great mercy towards mankinde haſt onlie redeemed yoke lawe bondage hell deſtruction diuell alſo like mercifull louing father euen firſt entrance world waſhedſt v iniquitie haſt giuen v sacrament baptiſme euen memoriall election thy sonne ieſus chriſt lord whereby beeing made thine adopted child may ſanctification thy ſpirit inherit euerlaſting kingdome ſame ieſus chriſt lord amen praie fruit baptiſme thus moſt heauenlie eternall father thy humble ſeruants entirelie deſire thy fatherlie goodneſſe thou haſt begun v newe birth waſhed v fountaine regeneration whereby made member thy bodie elected number felowſhip thy church congregation ſo thou wouldeſt powre vpon v grace thy ſpirit direct liues according beginning holineſſe pureneſſe may mortifie luſts fleſh reſiſt aſſaults sathan auoide alurements wicked world remembring alwaies baptiſme doth repreſent vnto v vocation quenching thoſe ſparks concupiſcence drawe old adam quickning v thoſe good fruit chriſt sauiour continuallie preſerue v holie ſpirit euer euer amen praie continuance true inſtitution sacrament thus moſt mightie moſt mercifull god whoſe power heauens earth thing therein created haſt placed euerie thing moſt excellent order haſt framed man thine owne ſimilitude image raiſing hell heauen wo ioie damnation ſaluation haſt giuen thy ſonne ieſu chriſt moſt ſure bond thy promiſe made beginning mankind redemption world ſending thine onlie begotten sonne ieſu chriſt performe ſame made one onelie oblation ſacrifice ſinnes whole world ordaine inſtitute two moſt holie sacrament continue remembrance ſame make v euer mindfull beſeech thee theſe thine ineſtimable treaſures continue oh lord thy fauour towards v let tyrant preuaile againſt thy church let thy mightie power ſhewed ſacred rite may cōtinue thy church enimies may ouerthrowne turke would vtterlie deſtroie thoſe moſt holie sacrament thou haſt ordeined ſaluation anabaptiſts like heretikes alter thy moſt holie inſtitution atheiſts bred great corruption conuert beſeech thee lord eſtabliſh v truth thy holie ſpirit thy mightie power euer wee may continue right inſtitution thy sacrament thy sonne sauiour chriſt hath left moſt perfect vnto v endleſſe ioie conſolation ſoules whome therefore thee holie ghoſt honour glorie praiſe world without end amen prouerbes 9 verſe 1 wiſedome hath built hir houſe hewen hir ſeauen pillers ſhe hath killed hir victual drawne hir wine prepared hir table ſhe hath ſent foorth hir virgin crieth vpon high place citie ſaieng ſo ſimple let come hither deſtitute wiſedome ſhe ſaith come eate meate drinke wine haue drawne canti 5 come ſaith chriſt vnto ſpouſe church garden ſiſter ſpouſe gathered mirrh ſpice ate honiecombe honie dranke wine milke eate ô freends drinke make ye merrie ô welbeloued reuelation 19 happie bleſſed called vnto lambes ſupper christian praiers ſaid ye receiue holie communion first effectuall meditation right chriſtian beleefe holie sacrament lord ſupper woorthie fruitefull receiuing ſame comfort ſaluation diligentlie read receiue ſoule let v carefullie conſider firſt whether bee come namelie celeſtiall table heauenlie banket greate feaſt coſtlie repaſt ſumptuous ſupper moſt puiſſant glorious mightie magnificent king kinges lord lordes ieſus chriſt thy moſt mercifull maker righteous redeemer ſouereigne ſauiour deere ſpouſe neceſſitie forced therevnto iuſt commandement alſo allured inuited mercifull promiſes secondlie ſoule let v rightlie knowe diligentlie marke thing heere preſentlie ſet v holie table prouided v bleſſed banket taſte namelie deintie diſhes refection meate muſt verie deede ſeeke onelie ſacred ſupper vaine ceremony bare ſigne vntrue figure thing abſent earthlie bodie carnall meate anie fleſhlie ſubſtance ſacred scripture ſaith holie men doo rightlie tearme call bread cup lord heauenlie refection ſweet deinties ſauiour nouriſhment ſoules inuiſible meate ſpirituall foode ghoſtlie ſubſtance heere moſt mercifullie offered exhibited vnto v faithfull ſoules ſoueraigne preſeruatiue againſt death conſeruatorie euerlaſting life comfortable medicine ſoule ſalue immortalitie pledge eternall health defence faith hope reſurrection memorie chriſt annuntiation death finallie communion bodie bloud lord ieſus maruellous incorporation holie ghoſt verie bond perfection chriſt faith wrought ſoules faithfull whereby onlie ſoules doo liue eternall life alſo ſurelie truſt win body reſurrection immortalitie alſo may onlie heare ſee taſte knowe mercie god creator ſealed ſanctification chriſt redeemer towards v confirmed remiſſion ſinnes holie ghoſt comforter regenerator fullie ſatiſfied eſtabliſhed alſo moſt ſenſiblie effectuallie comfort deed feele wrought v tranquillitie conſcience
