increaſe faith ſtrengthening hope long ſpreading abroad brotherlie loue kindneſſe manie ſundrie maruellous grace benefit god moſt profitable vnto v thing well conſidered weighed ſoule feruent affection earneſt zeale ought inflame hart kindle mind greedilie couet deſire participation theſe moſt holie myſteries yea often long hunger healthſome bread continuallie thirſt diuine heauenlie bleſſed food thirdlie laſtlie ſoule let v aduiſedlie call mind well vnderſtand cauſe wherefore wee come vnto holie table lord indeed onlie end ſhould godlie gheſts idle gazers hungrie eater ſteruing looker feede ſelues hire others feed v ſo may liue owne meate periſh hunger deuoure come togither ſaie ſoule congregation aſſembled preſentlie celebrate ſacrifice priuatelie one kind dead make myſterie ſacrifice communion make priuate eating two part haue one yet applie dead ſo looſe fruit aliue ſoule god forbid ſhould come celebrate holie myſterie anie ſuch ſort anie ſuch vſe purpoſe declare ſelues vnwoorthie lord yea accurſed committing ſuch ſpirituall blaſphemie robberie knowe come hither publikely openly lord boord miniſter doo himſelfe little death vouchſafed owne perſon moſt wiſelie kindlie louinglie inuent prouide inſtitute ordeine doo eſtabliſh command moſt neceſſarie waie meane better take ſome place v fruſtrate end purpoſe yea doo holie apoſtles alſo afterward togither godlie father primitiue church vſed practiſed authoriſed confirmed according deliuered giuen firſt author thereof onelie ſaie euen openlie publikelie celebrate lord moſt happie commemoration remembrance holie table heauenlie memorie moſt maruellous worke deere bought benefit redemption ſaluation wrought chriſt ieſus endleſſe conſolation profit commoditie eternall ſaluation reuerence named moſt pretious death painfull croſſe bloudie paſſion wite thou well ſoule like moſes aaron phinees long ſince ſomtimes eate manna wilderneſſe ſpirituallie vnderſtanding thoſe viſible thing euen ſo like maner ſpirituallie vnderſtanding theſe holie myſteries ſpirit quickeneth giueth life fleſh profiteth v nothing ſaith sauiour muſt alſo ſpirituallie hunger ſpirituallie taſte ſpirituallie eate fleſh chriſt ſpirituallie drinke bloud indeed theſe holie myſteries faith onlie aſſured conſtant beleefe bleſſed bodie chriſt crucified pretious bloud ſhed vpon croſſe ſaluation ſo receiue lord ſupper euen token badge cognizance faith ſaluation chriſts merit declaring therby euermore death paſſion thanksgiuing vntill come neither muſt ſo much dreame anie groſſe carnall eating fleſhlie feeding thinke come preſent feed ſenſes bellie corruption baſelie abiect bind ſelues element creature ſo declare ſelues drowned deed dirtie lake blindneſſe ignorance onlie truth nouriſh feed inward man immortalitie life euerlaſting namelie outward man nouriſhed letting bodilie meat ſtomach helthſome ſound digeſted ſo inward man may ſpirituallie fed ſatiſfied receiuing meate thereof ſoule hart ſound whole faith therfore ſhall need preſent time dooing theſe thing whet teeth ſoule cyprian ſaith ſincere faith breake diuide holie bread ſurelie without faith indeed onelie inſtrument moſt neceſſarie right vſe theſe holie myſteries impoſſible pleaſe god heerein neither vnbeleeuers faithleſſe folke feed vpon lord pretious bodie enioie eating drinking ſo high diuine nouriſhment ſpirituall food yea haue anie eating ſpirituallie faith onelie plaine idolatrie behoueth v therfore ſoule diligentlie ponder weigh conſider theſe thing laſt may onelie vnfeinedlie thoroughlie trie prooue examine ſelues owne conſciences liues alſo humblie acknowledging fault vnto god hartilie repenting former ſinfull life aſking mercie god father chriſts ſake gladlie forgiuing offender effectuallie carefullie withall plucke vp euen verie root heatheniſh infidelitie diſtruſt god mercifull promiſes end may thereby verie deed ſhew ſelues liuelie plant fruitfull oliue liuing branch true vine woorthie member chriſts myſticall bodie euen ſuch haue life abiding vnion incorporation finallie ſoule muſt like chattering iaies ſo much regard conſider theſe earthlie element terrene creature ſee corporall eie ſtill remaine ſo eſpeciallie deed haue reſpect heauenlie grace benefit faith beholdeth neither muſt anie meanes cleaue theſe inferiour baſe thing lie beneath viſiblie diſcerned leauing altogether wee muſt rather reſemble plaie part egles flie mount vp thither dead bodie lieth giuing credit word chriſt ſaith word ſpeake ſpirit life againe remembering god willeth ſuch true worſhippers worſhip ſpirit truth muſt ſo behold bread wine naturall eies may neuertheleſſe eſpeciallie lift vp eies mind heauen looke vp faith vpon holie bodie bloud lord sauiour ieſus chriſt god man ſitting right hand god father equall glorie power maieſtie alwaies ſeeking ſunne righteouſneſſe euermore ſhineth continuallie holding faſt ſtill cleauing faith onlie rocke whence may ſucke deed ſweetnes euerlaſting ſaluatin ſhall ſoule repenting hartilie former fowle life perfect loue charitie men maruelling reuerence feare theſe ſacred thing touching theſe holie fearfull myſteries mind receiuing hand hart taking fullie father thy poore child moſt vnwoorthie bidden gheſt thy prepared ſacrifice celeſtiall feaſt due examination former life humble contrite hart ſorowfull repentant ſpirit forgiuing charitable mind heere proſtrate knee thy throne mercie moſt lowelie hart humblie beſeech thy maieſtie euen thy deere onelie ſonne ieſus chriſts ſake thou haſt euer alreadie giuen oblation offering ſinnes haue mercie pitie compaſſion vpon moſt vile wretched miſerable ſinner forgiue mine innumerable horrible offence old new committed againſt heauen earth againſt thee new praie thee ſanctifie throughlie god make hartilie deſire feare trembling pleaſe thee thing doo woorthie communicant godlie gheſt fit partaker heere daie thy heauenlie food great ſumptuous supper lord god giuing vnto thine accuſtomed goodneſſe right knowledge vnderſtanding thy word thing ſelfe theſe holie myſteries meane manifold fruit benefites thereof alſo cauſing working thy mercie grace bring true conſtant faith roote welſpring newneſſe life well praiſing thee louing neighbour purging mine owne conſcience earneſt repentance continuall contrition dead work filthineſſe ſinne ſo neither ignorance thing gratious god may cauſe contemne vnfaithfulneſſe make void fruit ſinne iniquitie procure thy heauie plague grant may faith knowledge amendment life faith heere ſo vnited thy ſonne chriſt head moſt deerelie beloued ſpouſe theſe holie heauenlie myſteries comfort bodie ſoule afterward may haue full fruition deede mine euerlaſting ioie ſaluation eternall life ſame ieſus chriſt lord bleſſed euer amen another godlie praier ieſu chriſt holy eternall god miſerable woman wretched ſinner acknowledge confeſſe woorthie leaſt thy mercy moſt vnwoorthie receiue thee vnder roofe ſoule participating thy moſt bleſſed bodie bloud horrible infinite ſinnes wherewith defiled wo lord woman polluted lip dwell among people haue vncleane lip therefore verie entrailes hart troubled bone doo ſhake becauſe finde ſoule moſt vnworthie gheſt ſo heauenlie ſupper yet againe mine hart woonderfullie lightned call mind thou deere ſonne almightie god cameſt world call righteous ſinners vnto repentance whole need phyſician ſick beſides knowe right well conſtantlie doo beleeue notwithſtanding filthineſſe thou canſt make mee woorthie alone canſt make cleane conceiued vncleane ſeed righteous men ſinners thou forgiueſt ſinnes thy woonted grace thine holie ſpirit powred vpon v thy power mercie beſeech thee graunt ſuch grace vnto ſinner may woorthilie approch heauenlie ſacrament leaſt otherwiſe mine vnwoorthineſſe made giltie thy bodie bloud ſo ſtead life receiue iudgement condemnation giue grace therefore afore preſume come vnto participation thereof may examine ſelfe calling ſinnes mind ſearching way vnfeigned hartie repentance returning vnto thee lord leaſt otherwiſe concealing ſinnes iudas traitor eate bread lord againſt lord abuſing thy gentleneſſe heape vengeance vnto ſelfe againſt daie vengeance make therefore ſaie confeſſe ſinnes hartie ſobs ſo thou faithfull iuſt god wilt abandon mine offence cleanſe ſinnes wilt diſdaine accept fauour doo refraine acknowledge wickedneſſe moreouer powre true liuelie faith neuer miſtruſt thy word annexed sacrament promiſeth vnto mankind remiſſion ſinnes eate drinke mouth onelie purpoſe faith muſt come therevnto apprehend word promiſes annexed ground principle ſacrament ſo whoſoeuer giueth credit theſe word giuen ſhead remiſſion ſinnes ſame man hath promiſed namelie eternall life ſaluation remiſſion ſinnes likewiſe righteouſnes life ſaluation doubteth theſe word without doubt vnworthie receiuer commeth vnprepared doubting man neither eateth fleſh ſpirituallie yet drinketh bloud though carnallie eies ſeemeth conſume sacrament bodie bloud teeth mouth damnation rather bicauſe thy ſupper poiſon euill man taketh good thing naughtilie finallie grant alſo receiuing thy sacrament new teſtament may put according former conuerſation old man corrupt according luſts error renewed ſpirit mind putting new man god ſhapen righteouſneſſe holineſſe truth albeit nature ſuch liue without ſpots wickedneſſe yet ſo bleſſe may neuer offend willinglie altogether depending vpon thy goodneſſe whoſe manner pardon true penitent ſinners may boldlie approch thine holie ſupper eſpeciallie ſeeing haue libertie enter holie place thy bloud new liuing waie thou haſt prepared v vaile thy fleſh ſeeing haue high prieſt ouer houſe god make v drawe nigh true hart aſſurance faith ſprinkled mind euill conſcience waſhed bodie pure water cauſe v hold faſt profeſſion hope without wauering faithfull promiſed let v conſider one another prouoke vnto loue good work forſaking aſſemblie faithfull maner ſome exhorting one another ſo much ſee daie approching amen another moſt chriſtian deuout praier ſaid receiuing holie communion chriſt lord sauior thy greeuous agonie heapes trouble thorough wrath thine almightie father lighting vpon thee commandedſt thy diſciples peter iohn prepare paſſouer together might eate ſame thou longedſt ſaluation didſt eate lambe figure thy ſelfe expreſſedſt image banket thy people iſraelits vnder conduction thy ſeruant moſes depart aegypt celebrate hauing finiſhed ſupper old couenant thou beganneſt new couenant teſtifieng thy preſence benefit church mooue thou hart thankfulneſſe like deſire may deſire come vnto thy table ſeeke nouriſhment eternall life suffer v loath thine heauenlie banket prophane curious men doo contend thee contemne order thou haſt appointed amend abuſes prophanings thine holie table horriblie deformed filthineſſe puniſhed place manifold plague diſeaſes thy wiſedome thou healeſt diſeaſes infirmity viſible ſignes sacrament thou confirmeſt faith thou art effectuall beleeuers according thy promiſe bleſſe bread wine thou haſt willed beleeue receiue thee true faith puritie mind thou declareſt thy supper trulie thou tookedſt fleſh vpon thee ſakes euen ingraffe v thine owne fleſh bring v eternall life eternall life begunne world whereby ſoule renewed vnto eternall happineſſe moreouer bleſſed meate doth witneſſe teſtifie body repleniſhed ſenſe thy liuing fleſh ſhall riſe againe perpetuall glorie increaſe nouriſh profitable taking thee light within v worke thy sacrament taken digeſted thou maiſt come v thee aſſiſt v thy gheſts ſweet houſholder woorthilie may feed vpon thy meate trie ſoule earneſt vnfeined conuerſion let v plaie hypocrite prophanelie dallie thee thy holie sacrament cauſe v rightlie diſcerne thy bodie bloud common meate let v neuer eate bodie lord againſt lord grant true vnfeined faith may enter thy ſacred couenant may alwaies abide thee thou v likewiſe thine holie ſpirit bond loue publike common banket ioine v thine member thy church giue grace feed bread may one bodie knit vnto thee art head working thing let diuell time diſturbe pleaſant concord betweene thee v betweene head member bodie let v gather alſo ſame ſumme doctrine preached church let raiſe v vp vnto thankfulneſſe thy benefit increaſe deſire continuall praier whereby craue thing ſtand need continue cuſtome euen till thou returneſt gloriouſlie cloud iudgement maintaine ſome place preaching godlie ceremony bring time barbarous ignorance furthermore dooing herof miniſterie profeſſion againſt sathan inſtruments confirme mind thy ſpirit ſound pure vnderſtanding let v oppreſſed idolatrous darkneſſe approouing horrible abuſes carrieng laieng vp offring halowed bread without vſe ſo much one ſillable theſe thing ſeene thy firſt inſtitution wherefore repreſſe diuell blaſphemouſlie dealing thine ordinance firſt conſume world vtterlie fire wrapped againe ſuch horrible darkneſſe idolatrie ſuperſtition mitigate puniſhments ſickneſſe infection warre miſeries prophaning supper whole world doth endure let thine angel ſpare ſuch griefe hart bewaile theſe abuſes feed v fill v thy gheſts thy liuelie preſence dwell thou v worke v sharpen remembrance thy benefit within v finallie reſurrection graue giue v place thy ſeat ſhall find new taſte kingdome thy father another praier ſaid receiuing bleſſed communion kneele god boord lord although woorthie receiue thee houſe ſoule mine innumerable offence ſins done againſt thy great goodneſſe yet truſting good lord thy great pitie infinite mercie come receiue thy bleſſed bodie ſicke creature thee art health life vncleane thee art well mercie blind ignorance thee art light euerlaſting needie thy grace poore vertue thee art king heauen earth naked good work thee art author grace come wretch thee lord maker deſolate comfortleſſe thee helpe ſuccour beſides thee conſolation come ſinner thee art mediatour meane betwixt god man come caitife thee moſt mercifull sauiour come ſinfull thee granter remiſſion pardon dead ſinne thee art reſtorer life euill thee art goodneſſe hardharted releeued infuſion thy ſuperabundant grace deſiring thee meekelie heale mine infirmity ſickneſſe waſh awaie ſinne filthineſſe lighten blindneſſe reduce right waie thereof comfort deſolate goodneſſe haue mercie wretchedneſſe pardon ſinfulnes giue light grace thus burdened ſinne may receiue thee food angel king glorie lord lord ſuch chaſtitie bodie ſuch pureneſſe mind cleanneſſe ſoule ſuch contrition hart abundance weeping teares ſuch ſpirituall ioie gladneſſe ſuch dread reuerence ſuch faith hope charitie ſuch obedience humilitie ſuch loue deuotion faithfulneſſe thankfulneſſe beſeeming ſuch lord receiued ſoule moſt expedient diſpleaſed good lord ſinner vncleane hart polluted mind come hither daie receiue thy pretious bodie ſacramentall bread wine remember mercifull lord thou refuſedſt ſinfull marie magdalen penitent kiſſing thy bleſſed foot likewiſe deſpiſe put awaie vnwoorthie receiuing thy bodie bleſſed sacrament ſinnes wickedneſſe grant thou cōpunction hart plentie weeping tear waſh awaie ſinnes wickedneſſe ſo pure hart cleane conſcience may daie receiue sacrament ſoules helth may obtaine poſſeſſe thereby euerlaſting life holie saint heauens glorie preſent life holie ſpirit repleniſhed neuer admit louer beſides thee grant bleſſed ieſu ſo receiue sacrament bread wine may woorthie bee accounted member thy myſticall bodie heere earth though yet worthie numbered among ſimpleſt loweſt thy ſeruants rather reiect outcaſt ſinfulneſſe yet good lord thine infinite power thou maiſt make able equall like meaneſt thine elect ſeruants come thou father fatherleſſe come thou comforter comfortleſſe come cleanſe ſoule contagiouſneſſe ſinne conuenient according anie vncleannes thou ſpouſe virginall chaſtitie ſhouldeſt come dwell come therefore ſanctifie ſoule make cleane thy gratious preſence heapes ſoile remnant ſinne found anie leaſt cranie corner thy ſpirituall houſe temple bodie ſoule meane offend celeſtiall eies thy diuine maieſtie ſo ſhall thy holie hall cleanſed ſoule ring reſound thy perpetuall praiſes thy glorie come ſaie god apparell naked ſoule rich ornament thy vertue grace white raines thy righteouſneſſe innocencie may delight thee therein abide thou diſdainedſt touch ſore leaper thy holie hand ſo good lord vouchſafe annoint ſimple ſoule ointment remiſſion pardon life ſtedfaſt hope firme faith perfect charitie may ſo increaſe vertue daie daie may atteine glorious fruition thy godhead kingdome heauen may ſee thee face face praiſe thee thine elect choſen saint world without end amen another verie deuout praier receiuing holie communion moſt ſweet louing lord ieſu chriſt deuoutlie hartilie deſire receiue daie thou knoweſt mine infirmity neceſſities ſuffer manie euils vice lie wherewith often greeued tempted troubled vnquieted defiled unto thee doo come remedie vnto thee doo earneſtlie praie comfort helpe ſpeake vnto thee knoweſt thing vnto euen verie ſecret thought manifeſt onlie canſt perfectlie comfort helpe thou knoweſt good thing lacke thing poore beggerlie vertues behold ſtand thee requiring grace mercie feed cheriſh thy hungrie begger kindle coldneſſe fire thy loue lighten blindneſſe bright cleereneſſe thy preſence turne earthlie thing bitterneſſe vnto heauie greeuous hard painfull contrarie thing patience lift vp hart vnto thee heauen ſuffer wander go aſtraie thee vpon earth thou onlie time foorth euermore dooeſt waxe ſweet vnto becauſe thou onelie art meate drinke loue ioie ſweetneſſe oh would god thou wouldeſt vouchſafe altogether enflame burne euen conſume thy preſence change thy ſelfe may made one ſpirit grace inward vnitie ſoftning thy feruent loue suffer depart hungred thirſtie worke mercifullie thou haſt often heeretofore maruellouſlie wrought thy saincts maruell ſhould altogether ſet fire inflamed thee ſhould faile ſelfe changed sith thou art fire euer burning neuer failing loue purifieng hart lightening vnderſtanding behold therefore wretched ſinner preſuming mine owne merit truſting onlie thy mercie goodneſſe bold come trembling feare vnto thy table moſt ſweete deinties moſt holie lord ieſu chriſt haue hart bodie defiled marred polluted manie fault offence mind tongue chaſtlie warilie kept therefore holie deitie dredfull maieſtie wretched caitife great perplexitie mind taken vnwares betwene many troublſome ſtraights doo run againe thee fountaine mercie unto thee doo haſten healed cured vnder thy protection doo flie whome endure iudge earneſtlie deſire haue sauiour thee lord doo open ſhew woundes vnto thee doo vncouer detect ſhamefaſtneſſe knowe ſinnes great ſore afraid hope repoſe truſt thy great mercy infinite ſurpaſſing number turne thine eies thy mercie towards lord ieſu chriſt heauenlie king euerlaſting god man crucified man heare truſting thee haue mercie vpon full miſerie ſinne thou art flowing fountaine vndrainable welſpring mercie pitie beſeech thee bottome hart thou wilt forgiue ſinnes life ſo purge awaie ruſt filth thereof life come may imputed vnto god vnſpeakable pitie whoſe power infinite without whome poſſiblie reſiſt ſinne comfort helpe ſo greatlie neuer heereafter anie commit anie mortall deadlie ſinne hencefoorth may ouercome temptation diuell may direct whole life thought word work altogether vnto thee thou maiſt end life ſo preſerue keepe sathan vrge terrours feares ſo bring deſperation flowing fountaine charitie make mind free creature might drawe thy loue fauour thy loue may profit go forward preuaile verelie end life may worthilie receiue thee ſo ſoule powred ſacke bodie doo thou mercie bring vnto euerlaſting palace thy heauenlie father ſee behold cleere renowmed glaſſe holie trinitie remember thy creature lord whome thou haſt redeemed thy pretious bloud wo euer haue offended thee purpoſe thy grace amend life take therefore mercifull father ſinnes iniquity caſt ſoule filthie fowle matter venemous contagion infection ſinne thine ancient accuſtomed mercy powre thy heauenlie medicine preſeruatiue thy loue wound may refreſh reſtore former puritie cleanneſſe purified bodie mind may deſerue made fit thorough chriſts merit woorthilie taſt theſe moſt holie myſteries come daie lord miniſter vnto ſicke languiſhing ſoule ſome heauenlie cordiall comfort becauſe iuſt ſinner becauſe whole ſicke haue neede phyſician verie true charitie euerlaſting felicitie onlie hope ſoule haue mercie vpon blot miſdeeds thee doth hart expect deſire fulfill luſt longing thou haſt put euen thou wouldeſt thine chriſt forſake vnmeete ſtranger let thy right hand alwaie preuent defend euill come lord whome wretch haue ſore offended forgiue forget mine offence thou haſt ſhead thine owne moſt pretious hart bloud come ſweet lord giue meate eternall health come vnſpotted ſacrifice deliuer euerlaſting death come thou phyſician weake diſeaſed come thou food hungrie come lord viſit houſe dedicated conſecrated thy name behold come thee whome hart couet deſire towards whome earneſt conſideration mind aſpire ſtudie attaine whome mine entrailes hartilie loue embrace whoſe bleſſed bodie bloud theſe holie myſteries earneſtlie deſire receiue thou maiſt alwaies abide neuer forſake depart moſt ſweet father another almightie god moſt mercifull father moſt louinglie calleſt v participation good thing chriſt ieſu giue v alſo grace woorthilie eſteeme honour thou vouchſafeſt v bidding v marriage feaſt thy sonne ſo may eſteeme nothing compariſon ſeeing choſen though manie called giue v alſo lord liuelie faith working loue ſeemelie garment ſo great ſolemnitie entred thy fauour thy houſe diſhoneſt ſo honourable companie thou haſt called vnto wicked conuerſation vnwoorthie caſt againe behauiour may doo honour vnto may alwaies remaine thee enioie happineſſe thou haſt prepared v thy sonne full fruition whereof becauſe thou haſt deferred riſing vp againe dead ſtrengthen v lord bleſſed hope reſurrection according thy promiſe thou maiſt make v like thine angel heauen glorious eſtate ieſus chriſt lord thee holie ghoſt honour praiſe euer amen another sonne god lord sauiour chriſt delighteſt thoſe bankets whereby men approch companie thy celeſtiall welfare beſeech thee conuert v lord ſhall conuerted graunt marie magdalen caſting ſelues thy feete may earneſtlie teares bewaile offence againe lifting vp hand vnto thee may laie hold thee embrace thee ſhe kiſſe thou v thine holie kiſſe thy ſpirit powred v ſtirre vp v new life may annoint thee true confeſſing thy goodneſſe delight thee ſweet ſauour true inuocation new obedience grant alſo life may worſhip thy foot bring tidings peace foraſmuch laſt age world meſſengers peace vitterlie weepe aſſiſt v may touched miſeries thy church ſtudie power mitigate ſo made member companie vnto whome thou haſt forgiuen much againe entirelie doth loue thee againe called vale teares may come thy heauenlie banket ſhall without teares without grudging without greefe ſinne offence houſe thy father manie ample dwelling place amen another praier ſaid little receiue bread god art rich mercie good thing moſt plentifull giuer bountifull beſtower deinties celeſtiall ſatietie heauenlie repaſt giue meate ſoule wearie faint ſuch luſteth ſuch conuenient lo poore wretch come vnto thee art rich ſinner vnto thee art mercifull let returne home contemned deſpiſed nothing begin hungred let leaue faſting come vnto thee though famiſhed let go awaie vnfed although eate ſigh ſorowe yet good lord beſeech thee giue mee ſomewhat eate behold godlie heroicall matrone canaan matth 15 verſe 21 come vnto thee ſaie lord helpe according thy promiſe feele burthen thy diſpleaſure euen miſeries vncleanneſſe ſuffer ſight mine owne vnwoorthineſſe withdrawe thee make ſweetlie reuerentlie reaſon thee thy holie ſpirit enforced good woman doo theſe like word vnwoorthie giltie vncleane dog outcaſt thy houſe court haue barked againſt glorious maieſtie thee thine eternall father defiled filth idolatrie fowleneſſe life ſpots diſobedience againſt thee haue mercie vpon ſonne god appearedſt fleſh becameſt worme waſh v ſinnes vncleane beaſts haue mercie vpon lord haue mercie vpon behold vnto thee euen little whelpe nigh famiſhed lacke meate drinke wearied ſeeking releefe almoſt dead fall downe thy glorious table ſweet ypocraſſe pretious nectar immortalitie taſted father prophet confeſſors virgin moſt excellent light thy church ſit alreadie thine heauenlie table feede vpon meate eternall glorie ſuffer eate crums thou art bread life repell hunger ſatiſfie deſire thy preſence fill thy comfort ſpirituall deinties make faith ſtrong beleeue thy word promiſes made holie thou art holie may holilie taſte ſee ſweet thou art life inchoation life come perfectlie pleaſantlie perpetuallie enioie thy heauenlie table father giue v daie dailie bread may walke ſtrength thereof daie night vntill come thy holie hill horeb ſweet lord let feed vpon thee life enter ſoule ſweet loue louing ſweetneſſe let bellie eate thee ſoule refreſhed thee heauenlie bridegrome thou art bread fountaine life yea thing indeede whereby righteous liue loue thee thee doo couet loue woorſhip whome ſhall dwell reigne bleſſed upon thee doo call ſoule thou prepareſt receiue thee deſire thou breatheſt come therefore purger ſinnes thou art curer wound ſtrength feeble comforter ſorowfull worſhip honour liue onelie health dead come ſaie bleſſed trinitie enter ſoule come beſeech thee haue mercie vpon make meete thee thou maiſt poſſeſſe thou haſt made redeemed ſanctified preſerued may haue thee ſeale vpon hart giue thy ſelfe god god reſtore thy ſelfe vnto nothing elſe ſuffice thy ſeruant mercifullie graunt vnto according multitude thy great mercy baſeneſſe may pleaſe thy maieſtie vileneſſe thine almightie power ſweet chriſt charitie god dulcet honie ſnowie milke foode angel make growe thee may eate thee ſauorie taſte make ouercome enimie ſaluation thou maiſt vouchſafe giue according thy promiſe eate tree life middeſt paradiſe god manna hid may one daie called vnto lambes ſupper eate bread thy table kingdome god among bleſſed one deere god praie thee let mind thus kindeled loue thee flie euen till come beautie thy celeſtiall houſe throne thy glorie let fed dining table heauenlie citizen place full feeding plentifull running ſtreames pleaſant paſtures behold lord ſtand doore knocke beſeech thee bowel thy mercie wherewith thou daieſpring high haſt viſited v open hand thy pitie wretch knocketh vouchſafe mercifullie bid enter thee may reſt thee dwell thee ſup thee thou may refreſhed full thee art liuing ſweet whitebread heauenlie repaſt wherewith fed ſtrength come perfectlie vnto againe may aſcend vnto high thing neuer hencefoorth hunger thirſt anie ſo greatlie vanity ye receiue bread lift vp hart eies vnto god heauen ſaie father hartilie thanke thee haſt giuen thine onlie begotten ſon take vpon naturall bodie bodie offered thee vpon altar croſſe health welth ſaluation ſinners whoſe ſake father beſeech thee haue mercie vpon remembrance whoſe moſt bitter death painfull paſſion poſſible thanks thy benefit brieflie compriſed therein trembling feare receiue holie bread feed therby ſoule chriſts bleſſed bodie giuen onelie faith mine euerlaſting comfort ſaluation thine eternall glorie amen thus heauenlie father bleſſed god render vnto thee moſt hartie thanks thy benefit thou haſt ſhewed vnto moſt wretched ſinner eſpeciallie moſt ſweet ſmelling ſacrifice thine onlie begotten ſonne offered vnto thee altar croſſe giuing moſt pure vndefiled bodie vnto death redemption mankind remēbrance wherof according thy welbeloued ſonnes ordinance receiue holie bread moſt intirelie beſeeching thee may partaker merit thy deere ſonnes bodie breaking alſo lead life woorthie ſo great benefit vnto glorie thy name amen ſee wine behold corporall eies christ ſaith wine lift vp ſoule vnto chriſt heauen whoſe bloud alwaie freſh liuelie father ſprinkle quicken thee praie ſaieng lord ieſu chriſt sonne liuing god vpon croſſe thy hand ſpred abroad redemption mankind diddeſt drinke moſt bitter cup thy paſſion beſeech thee vouchſafe drawe mouth ſoule thirſteth thee vnto high flouds flowing ſtreames thine eternall abundance ſatietie yea drawe wholie vnto thy ſelfe art liuing well intent may according capacitie drinke wherevpon doo liue god life thou didſt ſaie thy holie bleſſed mouth anie man thirſt let come vnto drinke well life grant vnto thirſtie ſoule alwaie drinke thee according thy holie true promiſe water life may flowe bellie well life repleniſh fill mind full riuer thy pleaſures make hart drunken thy loue maner drunken wine forget thing ſaue cup ſo may forget vaine earthlie thing continuallie haue nothing elſe remembrance thee onelie thy bitter death thy painfull paſſion pretious bloudſhedding come praie thee hart make drunken abundance thy plentifulneſſe ſo may forget temporall thing make ſaie throughlie drunken thy cup may forget euen ſelfe vtterlie renounce mine owne vngodlineſſe ſinne chriſt art euerlaſting ſuffiſance ſhalt giuen hungrie thirſtie refreſh v continuallie moſt exquiſite well furniſhed banket thy bleſſed sacrament make v drinke plentiouſlie holie cup thy bleſſed ſpirit grace let inſpiration thy moſt ſweet ſpirit ſucceed like ſprings water let perpetuall food wanting weakeneſſe wherewith feed repleniſh v let taſte pleaſant riuers holie ghoſt may refreſhed ſoule may cooled ſweet liquor thereof ſo burne hencefoorth iniquitie luſt ſinne make quaffe hartilie cup thankesgiuing yea let bowel filled pleaſant wine thy loue refreſh continuallie moſt ſweet riuers thy heauenlie conſolation thou art life whereby liue hope ſticke vnto glorie deſire giue vnderſtanding cheere vp loue lift thou vp ſoule drawe mouth ſpirit thirſteth thee vp water ſtreames aboue uouchſafe ſweet ieſu midſt monings ſore complaint deepe ſighs hart take vp ſad ſorowfull mind top high mountain euen bed ſweet ſpices putting place paſture riuers ſweet water thou prepareſt table diuerſelie furniſhed thy friend againſt come refreſh mine appalled ſpirits cheere vp heauie hart make merie deinties length well refreſhed may forget manifold miſeries vanity life reſt thee art true peace euerlaſting paſſing vnderſtanding lord god art ſanctifier saint beſeech thee conſecrate make meete thy dwelling continue thou euer vouchſafe beſprinkle bloud thy onlie begotten ſonne one ſouereigne thing bodie ſoule may reuiued maruellous comfortable ioie lord theſe thy great benefit wherewith thou wilt releeue want thy thirſtie child grant beſeech thee may drinke thy cup glad mind willing hart pure conſcience clenſed ſpirit bring paſſe thy mercie drinke ſhall drinke may health ſaluation finallie grant good god may thy moſt rich ſpirit eternall deinties enioie princelie palace heauen quaffing verie abundantlie wellſpring life thee may excellent benefit thy glorious paſſion death reſurrection light behold brightneſſe perpetuall felicitie ſee thee face face mind may fed full ſatiate meate drinke life without end like hart thirſteth water ſprings ſo thirſteth ſoule thee lord god king amen receiue wine cup praie thanke thee deere father thou didſt ſpare thine onelie moſt deerlie beloued ſonne ieſus chriſt ſhed euen moſt pretious bloud vpon altar croſſe waſh awaie ſinnes remembrance whereof trembling dread drinke cup humblie beſeeching thee father crucifieng bleſſed bodie ſhedding pretious bloud may meritorious ſaluation amen elſe thus bleſſed mercifull father thy loue towards ſinfull creature ſo exceeding great vnſpeakable giue vnto thee moſt humble thanks namelie ſhedding moſt pretious blood thy deere ſonne ieſu chriſt vertue whereof thy wrath ſtirred vp againſt wretched ſinner pacified ranſome paid lawe fulfilled mine enimies ourcome put flight remembrance ſo noble victorie ſo great benefit come vnto thy table mercifull father drinke cup deſiring thee outward man comforted drinking wine ſo likewiſe inward man may comforted made ſtrong true faith pretious blood thy moſt deere ſonne lord heauenlie father giue thy holie ſpirit may ſo rule gouerne hart neuer vnthankfull forgetfull thine exceeding kindneſſe traine life according thy bleſſed whatſoeuer doo ſpeake thinke may vnto glorie thy bleſſed name health ſoule ieſus chriſt lord amen haue receiued holie communion giue god thanks ſaie thanke thee good lord thine infinite goodneſſe thou daie haſt fed thy bleſſed bodie bloud sacrament deſiring thee meeklie sacrament haue receiued may purgation clenſing ſins fortitude ſpiritual ſtrength againſt frailtie ſure defence againſt worldlie trouble aduerſities purchaſing grace pardon medicine life continuall remembrance thy bleſſed paſſion ſo waie may conduct ſtumble may vphold fallen may raiſe ſo good continuance thy euerlaſting glorie may bring ſo order tallage taſte hart neuer ſeeke ſweetneſſe thee neuer ſeeke louer thee none comfort beſide thee ſo care none delight thee anie honour thine giue mee ſuch perfect loue towards thee wherewith may come great merit heauen though ſpent life day remembrance thy bleſſed paſſion gratiouſlie deliuer tribulation bodie ſoule captiuitie anguiſh peril grant onlie vnto alſo vnto thine elect choſen chriſtian people heere elſewhere thy holie name ſake amen another thanksgiuing communion thanke thee chriſt lambe god offering thy ſelfe vpon altar croſſe thy father offering ſacrifice ſweet ſauour god ſinnes reconcile v vnto certaintie whereof confirmation faith thou haſt inſtituted behalfe holie sacrament ſupper oft receiue ſame may celebrate thy memorie thankesgiuing remember merit fruit thy paſſion beſeech thee thy bitter death ſtirre vp mind often receiuing thine ordinance inſtitution may conſider bitter death thou didſt ſuffer behalfe great loue draue thee take ſo cruell ſhamefull death ſaue v withall continuallie yeeld bound hartie thanks vnto thee ſame like ſort anſwer power vnſpeakable good good life carefull obſeruation thy commandements may either frailtie fleſh anie fault preuented ſinne runne vnto thee repentance conſideration new eternall couenant touching remiſſion ſinnes made v erected vpholden vnto liuelie puiſſant hope ſweet ieſu grant faſt linked vnto thee holy myſterie may receiue power ſtrength thee beleeuing thy promiſes wholie addicted therevnto without anie doubting ſo conſcience feare trouble may haue perfect conſolation suffer ſeparated member thy bodie church whereof thou art head fulfilling graunt abiding thy word kingdome may without fault foundation without ſinne againſt conſcience walke worthie sacrament forſaking vtterlie renouncing diuell idolatrie vice carnall deſires fight againſt ſoule cannot partaker lord table diuels make alſo remember sacrament bound doo good vnto others manie graines corne doo make one loafe manie grape make one wine ſo manie yet one loafe one bodie aſmuch participate one bread drinke one cup ioine v therefore togither sauiour world common banket band loue may faſtened vnto thee head thou didſt die v ſo againe may feare ſuffer giue liues glorie thy name neuer ſeparated thee neither life death make v alſo hartilie loue one another like true liuelie member thy bodie neede require may giue liues brother suffer concord mind broken receiueth myſterie vnitie keepeth bond peace doth receiue myſterie himſelfe teſtimonie againſt himſelfe giue grace therefore leauing aſide wrath fierceneſſe maliciouſneſſe enuie may forgiue one another euen thou forgiueſt v beare one another better auoiding ſtrife diſſention ſectes pernicious hereſies keepe thine ordinance right vſe thy sacrament amongſt v euermore good worke diuine ceremonie may alwaies note badge publike profeſſion whereby knowne pagan token loue confeſſion thankefulneſſe remoue awaie abuſes prophanations holie ſacred ſupper together horrible idolatrous adoration inuented sathan member ſhamefull deforming thy godlie goodlie inſtitution maintaine humblie beſeech thee true vnpolluted vſe thereof till thy pleaſure returne cloud iudgement great power glorie neuer remembrance laſt reſurrection death appoint v place thine heauenly table may taſte new wine kingdome thy father abiding thine elect angel bleſſed saincts euermore amen meditation truſt chriſtian ſoule ought haue paſsion lord ieſu thanksgiuing vnto god manifold benefit thereof might deſpaire verelie becauſe manifold ſinnes negligence without number thy word god made fleſh dwelt amongſt v neither dare deſpaire becauſe ſeeing enimies reconciled death thy sonne obedient vnto thee death yea euen ſhamefull death croſſe hath taken awaie handwriting ſinnes nailing ſame croſſe hath crucified ſinne death much reconciled ſaued hope certitude ſureneſſe truſt pretious bloud ſhead v ſaluation doo take hartening meanes ſitteth right hand god ſueth v looke backe careleſſe eie truſting whome alreadie riſen againe receiued alreadie mounted vp heauen doo ſit among angel haue deſire come vnto thee hauing mine owne righteouſneſſe haue ſame thy sonne lord ieſu chriſt moſt mercifull god moſt gentle louer mankind giue thee thanks ieſus chriſt thy sonne lord didſt mightilie make v loſt ſinnes moſt maruellouſlie didſt deliuer recouer v againe thy goodneſſe ſaie doo giue thanks manifold praiſes doo ſhew foorth thee hart mind vnſpeakable loue wherewith thou haſt vouchſafed thy maruellous goodneſſe loue v wretch vnworthie beloued didſt ſend ſame thine onelie begotten sonne thy boſome vnto commonweale ſaue v ſinners time child perdition damnation render vnto thee poſſible thanks holie incarnation natiuitie bleſſed virgin marie mother vpon vouchſafe take fleſh v ſaluation intent like verie god god ſo might verie man man giue thee condigne thanks paſſion croſſe death reſurrection aſcenſion heauen ſeate maieſtie thy right hand giue thee thanks ſaie moſt ſacred ſhedding foorth pretious bloud wherewith redeemed alſo moſt holie quickening ſacrifice bleſſed bodie bloud daie dailie thy church feed drinke wherewith alſo waſhed cleanſed ſanctified made partaker onelie high diuinitie finallie giue thee thanks maruellous vnſpeakable charitie loue wherewith thou didſt loue v vnwoorthie perſons didſt ſaue v thine onelie beloued ſonne ſo thou didſt loue world thou gaueſt thine onlie begotten ſonne intent none trulie beleeue ſhuld periſh haue euerlaſting life thing verilie euerlaſting life knowe thee alſo ieſus chriſt thou haſt ſent verie god vpright faith work woorthie ſuch faith wherefore hart mouth doo confeſſe praiſe bleſſe thee god father vnbegotten thee god ſonne onlie begotten alſo thee holie ghoſt comforter thee bleſſed trinitie glorie praiſe thanks togither power dominion might world world euer amen meditation vſed receiuing holie communion ſtirre v vp conſideration knowledge ſo great benefit giue god thanks therefore gratefull goodneſſe bleſſe lord ſoule mine entrailes laud moſt holie name forget ſoule infinite mercy continuall benefit receiued moſt liberall hand amongſt well maiſt thou reckon hath daie giuen thee ſo infinite maieſtie ſhould vouchſafe viſite thee enter thy homelie habitation ſurpaſſing clemencie wholie giue himſelfe thee moſt maruellous sacrament thou incomprehenſible god leſſe pitifull puiſſant ſhall ſaie ſeeing depth thy bottomleſſe mercy hath vouchſafed impart ſelfe depth mine vnſpekable miſeries thanks yeeld thee ſo great kindneſſe loue wot right well member muſcles bodie turned tongue yet could condignelie thanke thee leaſt thy benefit much leſſe able ſhall one tongue laud thanke thee preſent gift ſo great ineſtimable value elizabeth mother forerunner saint iohn baptiſt viſited moſt ſacred virgin marie thy mother ſhe perceiued thy preſence illuminated holie ghoſt ſo aſtoniſhed thereat ſhe cried alowd ſaid whence haue mother lord dooth come much iuſtlie aſtoniſhed crie whence haue onlie ſonne moſt bleſſed virgin euen lord himſelfe lord angel heauen earth creature world hath viſited entred honoured foſtered filled moſt woorthie sacrament whence haue lord ſo high ſo puiſſant ſo woorthie worſhip hath vouchſafed come vnto mee moſt wretched worme moſt heinous ſinner ſinners haue ſo manie time offended lewdneſſe abhominations haue ſo oft baniſhed expelled woorthilie holie prophet iob dauid woonder thy diuine clemencie time ſaid man thou ſo magnifieſt ſonne man thus thou viſiteſt much greater reaſon haue moſt wretched caitifs ſaie ſame theſe day man thou haſt thus extolled man make thy ſelfe man giue thy ſelfe foode man wherewith may euerie daie viſited refreſhed albeit men may maruell thy diuine clemencie vſed towards man much yet may maruell men baſeſt vnwoorthieſt dauid king saule would haue choſen ſonne lawe reputed himſelfe vnwoorthie ſaid life father linage ſhould ſonne lawe king much cauſe haue ſaie ſame ſeeing king king hath admitted mee ſo high dignitie father offſpring veſſell corruption ſacke doong filth ingendred moſt vile ſtinking matter touching fleſh ere long ſhall yeeld food woormes concerning ſoule ſoiled ſinne fraught ignorance forgetfulneſſe manie mo defect wicked inclination life vanitie puffe wind ſmoke ſhadowe quicklie vaniſheth confuſion diſorder continuall exerciſe ſinne tranſgreſſions thy commandements hath life mine exerciſes mine inclination beene ſuch alſo father adam offſpring ancient familie ſith deſcend generallie borne thus blemiſhed thus bent like child traitour adiudged ſuffer death wherefore moſt puiſſant prince dreadfull king aboue king thou knowing life haue ſuch much woorſe either knowe imagine haſt vouchſafed receiue ſonne lawe thine owne child yoonger one right tenderlie beloued ſuch father accuſtomed moſt cheriſh thou haſt cheriſhed fed angel bread wherein found ſauour diuine delight luke reporteth one thoſe gheſts table thee prince phariſies houſe ſhould ſaie bleſſed thoſe ſhall eate bread life kingdome heauen much happie knowe gather fruit life rate bread wherein ſelfeſame god ſpirituallie faith conteined therewith receiue pledge eate euerlaſting kingdome happie eke thoſe ſhall diſpoſe themſelues repaire moſt gratious banket wherein found ſweet taſts ſauours rich renowme thing happilie deſired yea man may long offered deſire delight pleaſures ſincereſt choiſeſt ſweeteſt wiſh wealth behold treaſure inricheth heauen earth ſtate ſouereigntie ſought behold higheſt dignity poſſiblie atchieued sith meanes moſt venerable ſacrament ſoule vnited god reſteth aſſociated reuerenced quire angel aſſiſt wherefore ye blind beguiled child adam pleaſure profit doo prowle doo eſaie ſaith ſpend monie vpon bread imploie trauell may ſatiate content looſe ſuch ſatietie ſuch ſweetneſſe ſuch treaſure conteined gift doo thou ſo ſoule doo thou ſo thou henceforth anie blind ſee thou ſeeke anie carnall contentations hauing meanes partaker meere ſpirituall celeſtiall delight take taſte pleaſure food death whereof thou earſt didſt feed hauing bread life giuen granted vnto thee regard pomp moſt vaine vanity world ſeeing thou maieſt enioie sacrament true happineſſe good thing world cannot poſſiblie atteined imbrace keepe treaſure ſufficeth make thee trulie happie poſſeſſe good exceedeth good content quiet thy ſelfe repoſe may abundantlie ſatiate thy deſire ingratefull thy benefactor yeeld hartie thanks well benefit heretofore beginning beſtowed vpon thee howbeit gratious mercifull lord yeeld thee woorthie thanks debt owe thee ſo great mine abilitie diſcharge ſame ſo ſmall hart might power thanke thine infinite liberalitie hauing created thine owne likeneſſe ſimilitude hauing conſeruation created likewiſe ſo great varietie creature much doo laud bleſſe thee thy pretious death bloudſhed thou haſt redeemed ye lord doo bowel power body ſoule thanke thee bleſſe thee adore thee hauing left v auenlie moſt woorthie sacrament giuing miſerable wretch grace eftſoons receiue eftſoones may thereby made partaker fruit thy redemption bicauſe theſe thanks praiſes ſlender weake vnwoorthie ſuch gift haue receiued beſeech thy ſweet ſonne ieſus chriſt ſupplie want vouchſafe ſound perpetuall peales praiſes euerlaſtinglie adore thee mee reuerence thee offer continuall ſacrifice thanksgiuing yet doo finite correſpondent value benefit haue daie receiued infinite thoſe moſt holie gratefull thanks thou lord ieſu gaueſt thy father minding grant v ſo ineſtunable gift euen thoſe ſame infinite doo offer thee together verelie beleeue cauſe didſt thou yeeld ſo incomparable gift ſhould deſtitute condigne grace thanks doo humblie beſeech thee thy moſt bonntifull clemencie ſeeing hath pleaſed thee ſatiate honour thy moſt worthie preſence venerable redoubted sacrament thou wilt alſo vouchſafe grant thy grace alwaies gratefull anſwere woorthilie moſt happie viſitation hath alwaies beene thy woont sauiour redeemer thy goodnes thou haſt vouchſafed enter haſt thou departed thy bleſſings moſt abundantlie heaping grace vpon grace mercie vpon mercie thou enteredſt matthew publican houſe publican thou madeſt thy diſciple apoſtle thou enteredſt zacheus houſe changed old cuſtome health giuen houſhold thou enteredſt sunon peter houſe draueſt awaie ague wiues mother leauing hir whole comforted eft ſoones didſt thou enter martha good marie magdalen houſe tongue tell ſpirituall rich thou gaueſt houſe ineffable grace thou endowedſt thoſe two ſiſters with▪ finallie figure sacrament wit arke old teſtament becauſe entred obed edoms houſe cauſe thy bleſſings powred vpon paieng plentifullie harborough houſe offered thee wherefore moſt ſweet welcome gheſt ſeeing thy goodneſſe thou haſt vouchſafed daie enter poore cottage ſend downe withall thy holie bleſſings thereon meanes whereof may woorthilie anſwer vnto thine incomparable mercie cleanſe fine houſe lord filth thou ſeeſt repaire doo ſome coſt leaſt decaie fall ruine driue darkeneſſe gliſtering beames thy light adorne decke vp vertues grace holie ghoſt thus cleanſed repaired adorned illuminated may pleaſe thee dwell therein neuer depart tarrie ſtill lord comforter night draweth nigh without thee ſhall remaine darkeneſſe ſo ſore endangered therefore ſaie tarrie thou ſtill depart lodging thou haſt affirmed eternall truth thy whole delight dwell child men thou ſtandeſt knocking doore ready euter ſup ſuch ſhall open let thee behold haue giuen thee free entrance thou thy goodneſſe haſt admitted ſweet ſupper thy moſt ſacred bodie abandon therfore ſouereigne lord ne depart thou drawe thee knit tie faſt thee yea drawe quite ſelfe ſith much better thee thee liue die thee remaine firme conſtant decaie come naught renew therefore ſanctifier loue tranſforme thee grant ſo liue thee onlie liue thee onlie loue thee onlie delight thee thou mine onlie ioie mine onlie comfort mine onlie foode wherewith ſoule may ſuch ſort refreſhed meat ſeeme loathſome vnſauorie onlie haue choſen onlie ſhall ſuffice alone liue contented ſatiſfied happie vntill deſired daie come ſhall feed thee another forme enioie thee continuallie companie elect bleſſed saincts celeſtiall court father holie ghoſt thou liueſt reigneſt euerlaſtinglie amen another fruitfull meditation chriſtian ſoule exhorting thankefulneſſe newneſſe life holie conuerſation deepe conſideration great benefit chriſt receiued sacrament read receiuing holie communion church time ſerue home eſpeciallie eaſter daie thou maiſt doubt ſoule ſo great wealth felicitie wrought thee theſe holie myſteries chriſt whereof thou haſt beene partaker glorious death reſurrection let v little refreſh ſelues contemplation thereof chaw cud calling often remembrance ſo taking great delite ſweet taſte thereof may leſſe feele perceiue bitterneſſe miſerable life go therefore ſoule call mind ſaie wee therefore thou haſt receiued thine owne poſſeſſion euerlaſting veritie euen lord sauiour ieſus chriſt confirme thy conſcience truth matter thou haſt receiued true faith repentance hart thou haſt receiued purpoſe amendment life thou haſt receiued euerlaſting gage pledge thy ſaluation thou haſt receiued bodie broken blood ſhed remiſſion thy ſinnes thou haſt receiued bodie haue within thee father sonne holie ghoſt dwell thee indue thee grace ſtrengthen thee againſt thine enimies helpe thy weakneſſe poſſeſſe thee peace gladneſſe make thee thankfull thy redeemer carefull lead godlie conuerſation comfort thee preſence weale wo thou haſt receiued bodie ſaie indue thee euerlaſting righteouſneſſe aſſure thee perpetuall bliſſe life eternall chriſt true faith art thou ſoule quickened againe death ſin life grace hope tranſlated corporall euerlaſting death euerlaſting life glorie heauen hencefoorth thy conuerſation indeed ſhould thy hart deſire alwaie fixed ſet doubt therfore ſoule truth matter great high ſo euer theſe myſteries thing becommeth thy god doo little deed impoſſible ſo euer ſeeme thee praie god hartilie thou maiſt haue faith perceiue theſe great myſteries faith thou maiſt certeinlie knowe beleeue nothing impoſſible god onelie bring thou faith ſaie chriſts holie word sacrament thou ſhalt well feele perceiue benefit chriſt conteined therein thy comfort let thy repentance ſhew thy faith alſo let thy purpoſe amendement obedience thy hart god lawe hereafter declare thy true beleefe endeuour thy ſelfe ſoule ſaie paule hencefoorth conuerſation heauen whence looke sauiour euen lord ieſus chriſt ſhall change vile body may made faſhioned like glorious bodie ſhall doo ſame power whereby roſe againe death wherby ſhall able ſubdue thing vnto himſelfe elſe ſhall auaile thee ſoule bee eſcaped deliuered filthineſſe world knowledge thy lord sauiour ieſus chriſt thou intangled againe therewith thereby ouercome againe certeinlie beene better neuer haue knowne waie righteouſneſſe knowne receiued turne backward againe holie moſt righteous commandements god giuen vnto thee ſo ſhall prouerbe verified thee ſaid dog returned vomit againe ſow waſhed hir wallowing mire againe oh ſhame thee ſoule thus ſo cleerelie freelie waſhed thy ſinnes returne filthineſſe thereof againe great follie thus indued righteouſneſſe looſe againe yea wilfull madneſſe looſe inheritance thou art ſet vile tranſitorie pleaſures ſinne finallie vnnaturall vnkindneſſe ſhould thy sauiour chriſt meere mercie come thee dwell within thee thy gheſt driue thee baniſh violentlie thee ſtead whome grace vertue receiue vngratious ſpirit diuell founder vnrighteouſneſſe naughtineſſe miſchiefe oh ſoule canſt thou find thy hart ſaie ſhew ſuch extreame vnkindnes chriſt ieſus hath ſo gentlie called thee mercie offered giuen himſelfe vnto thee entred thee yea dareſt thou ſo bold renounce preſence father sonne holie ghoſt one god whole maieſtie together power wiſedome goodneſſe feareſt thou danger perill ſo traiterous defiance departure ſoule aduiſe thy ſelfe well thou dooeſt conſider dignitie thou art ſet thou art therfore cleanſed waſhed ſanctified renewed thou ſhouldeſt hencefoorth ſinne ſerue god true holineſſe righteouſneſſe day thy life end thou maiſt reigne euerlaſting life thou refuſe ſo great grace whereto thou art called thing dooeſt thou heape vp thy damnation ſo prouoke god caſt heauie diſpleaſure vpon thee iuſt plague reuenge thy mockage holie sacrament ſo great abuſing verie warie well aduiſed therefore ſaie ſoule hencefoorth thou dooeſt behaue thy ſelfe let follie looſe thing grace hath ſo pretiouſlie offered purchaſed let wilfulneſſe blindneſſe put ſo great light ſhewed vnto thee applie thy ſelfe liue chriſt chriſt may ſtill liue thee whoſe fauour aſſiſtance thou haue haſt thou euerlaſting life alreadie within thee nothing hurt thee whatſoeuer hitherto done amiſſe committed chriſt thou ſeeſt hath offered thee pardon cleerelie receiued thee fauour againe full ſuretie whereof thou haſt preſentlie inhabiting dwelling within thee onlie take good hart vnto thee ſhew thy ſelfe thankefull thy life determine thy ſelfe refuſe auoid deteſt abhorre ſuch thing thy conuerſation ſhould offend eies mercie endeuour thy ſelfe ſaie ſoule waie riſe vp againe waie thou haſt fallen pit ſinke ſin thy tong thou haſt offended thereby riſe againe glorifie god therewithall accuſtome laud praiſe name god thou haſt therewith diſhonoured thou haſt hurt good name thy neighbour otherwiſe hindered ſo intend reſtore againe without reſtitution god accepteth thy confeſſion yet thy repentance ynough forſake euill except thou ſet thy courage doo good occaſion ſoeuer therfore thou haſt offended ſaie turne occaſion vnto honouring god profiting thy neighbour true ſoule ſin ſtrong affection vnrulie yea hard ſubdue reſiſt thy nature ſo corrupt leauened ſowre bitterneſſe poiſon thou receiuedſt thé inheritance thine old father adam yet neuertheleſſe good cheere chriſt thy sauiour hath ouercome world enimies thee sin ſhall haue power ouer thee thou art vnder grace though thy power weake yet chriſt riſen againe ſtrengthen thee battell holie ſpirit ſhall helpe thine infirmity full truſt therefore confidence ſoule take good hart vnto thee ſaie good courage lord put vpon thee holie armour god thou maiſt ſtand faſt againſt enimies would againe aſſault ſubdue thee bring thee againe thraldome ſlauerie bondage remember ſoule thou art brought thy vaine conuerſation thy freedome purchaſed neither gold ſiluer deere price moſt pretious hart bloud innocent immaculate lambe ieſus chriſt euen leaſt ſoule begin take hand name feare god purge old leauen ſinne wickedneſſe corrupteth ſowreth ſweetneſſe thy life maieſtie god thou maiſt new freſh dough void ſowre leauen wickedneſſe ſo ſhalt thou ſhew thy ſelfe ſweet bread god may haue delight thee ſo ſhalt thou declare thy ſelfe worthie hoſt ſuch gheſt chriſtes gift grace haue effect thee thou haſt right beleefe knowledge holie myſteries receiued thee finallie ſo ſhalt thou applieng thy faith vertue holie sacrament thy life conuerſation conforming faſhioning thy ſelfe example ſignification meant thereby moſt certaine ſure liue life happilie world come dwell chriſt whome thou haſt receiued euerlaſting glorie god mercy ſake deere pretious merit onelie sonne lord sauiour ieſus chriſts ſake grant vnto v amen praier great manifold thy benefit moſt good mercifull god towards mankind people euerie place ought greatlie laud woorthilie praiſe highlie extoll magnifie thy bleſſed name thing pleaſant men thou dooeſt eaſilie heare time call vpon thee ſuch thing ſtand need good thing ought reioice thou yeeldeſt thy ſelfe appeaſed fauourable iniquity bee right happie bleſſed whome thou diddeſt vouchſafe annexe vnto thy ſelfe thy ſacred congregation feeding hungrie ſtomachs ſpirituall good thing heauenlie deinties refreſhing v continuallie moſt exquiſite well furniſhed banket thy bleſſed sacrament making v eate aboundantlie thy heauenlie manna food angel drinke plentiouſlie full cup thy holie ſpirit diuine grace endleſſe comfort conſolation thee oh lord thou dealeſt fauourablie euen creature alſo thine elect ſake thou ſtabliſheſt mountaines ſtilleſt raging ſea appeaſeſt madneſſe people dooeſt refreſh lighten great ioie vttermoſt part earth brightneſſe heauenlie fire thou ſendeſt ſeaſonable weather timelie ſhowers whereby onlie commeth fertilitie feelds woonderfullie garniſhed kinde fruites whereby men beaſts haue aboundantlie wherewith feed grant thou therefore thus much alſo vnto v art author ſo manie good thing may alwaie mindfull thereof render moſt condigne thanks vnto thee alteration old leauen made vertue bleſſed sacrament haue receiued may like eagle time time renew youth godlines life vſe health comfort thoſe thing thou ſo louinglie beſtoweſt vpon v thorough ieſus chriſt lord amen ſolemnization matrimonie praie thus almightie god moſt mercifull father haſt ordeined marriage kept without blame breach end ſuffering anie ſhould put aſunder thoſe whome thou haſt ioined together sanctifie thoſe called eſtate life keepe according thy holie inſtitution ordinance furthermore thou requireſt ſhould loue thee aboue thing eſteeming thy fauour either rich honour world life ſelfe ſo beſeech thee lord teach v vſe theſe tranſitorie thing abuſe ſetting hart vpon delighting meete may ſo loue huſbands child houſe land owne liues whatſoeuer thou giueſt v comfort heere time may keepe ſtill higheſt degree loue thee ſpirituall huſband ſo queſtion ſhall betweene thee anie thing elſe may make loſſe thing abide perfectlie loue towards thee end whome father holie ghoſt laud praiſe euer euer amen ſolemnization matrimonie fift lampe buriall anie meditate praie followeth lord ieſu chriſt sonne god art giuer eternall life hartilie thanke thee becauſe thou art inwardlie touched mercie towards v oppreſſed temporall euerlaſting miſeries thou haſt taſted death thy fleſh thou haſt touched graue earth wherby ſanctified made light godlie ſo keepe etternall death according thy commandement ſtand bringers miniſters death euen ſinne satan thou pluckeſt faithfull iawes death bringeſt new life comfort thy goſpell teacheſt ſpeake ſound foorth thy glorie cōmendeſt life mother church length death euils ſubdued thou wilt bring thy kingdome wee humblie beſeech thee take mercie vpon thy church theſe miſerable day ſhe widowe deſtitute worldlie helpe dependeth onlie vpon thy mercifull aid protection speake vnto hir cheerfull voice ſaie weepe powre vpon thine true light faith comfort lift v vp mids death confidence thy preſence hope eternall life driue awaie gard death teach v ſet foorth thy truth length let v placed ſweet mother saint true countrie happie citie ieruſalem ſhall euermore enioie bleſſed ſight thee thy heauenlie congregation amen another deuout praier burial lord thou art god euer ſhort life alwaies ſome v die ſome come world thee thouſand yeeres bee one daie yea leaſt minute houre life paſſeth awaie dooth dreame euen graſſe field greene daie drie morowe thou diſpleaſed loſt thou chaſten ſhrinke feare thorough ſinnes dead vnto thee certes lord thou haue reſpect ſinnes ſhall continue shew v manie day life may diſpend wiſelie praiſe thy name leaſt falſelie truſting vpon long life might come vnto death oh good god fraile corrupt worke indeed euen verie duſt aſhes length day flower field man deliuer himſelfe death man ſaue owne ſoule graue thou onelie lord muſt doo namelie ſuch beleeue thee god haue mercie vpon take mee awaie vnprouided middeſt day let go graue full age let remember mine end ſhall depart life depriued euerlaſting life let beare alwaies mine eies ſhortneſſe life vanitie thing naught well men themſelues thing affaire staie feete lord time ſlip ſome cruell zeale enuie might haue vngodlie moſt part paſſe liues quietlie die quietlie beſeech thee let thy choſen perſons diſcouraged offended thy godlie prouidence ordering worldlie thing ſhrinke thee reaſon thereof rather let v remember danger verie deed theſe vngodlie vnhappie concluſion terme cloſe finiſh happie courſe againe contrarie part pleaſantneſſe conſcience comfort quietneſſe ſhall followe vnquietneſſe finallie good god daie buriall friend ſhrinke doo thou forſake father mother huſband child forſake vouchſafe thou lord take vp defend roring lion wait praie lead mee ſafelie vnknown countrie bring happilie ſtreets heauenlie zion wherein habitation reioice thee ſet mee amongſt thine angel face thine owne maieſtie patriarch prophet apoſtles martyr confeſſors uirgins yea deere parent faithfull friend full meaſure happineſſe paſſing excellent glorie ſuperabundant ioie thanksgiuing praiſe may magnifie thee god among thy choſen holie one euer euer amen sée another praier ladie aburgauennies praiers another meditation death god thing doo wee daily preſent life heape ſinne vpon ſinne hourd treſpas vpon treſpas daie woorſe alwaies yeſterdaie increaſing day ſo ſins therefore thine indignation good lord againſt v ſhall let go priſon bodie ſo taken thy bleſſed companie ſhall moſt ſafetie immortalitie ſaluation ſhall come vnto v ſickneſſe need paine kind euill ſoule bodie whatſoeuer good wiſh ſhall haue whatſoeuer loath ſhall farre v oh deere father faith behold theſe thing accordinglie oh hart perſuaded thereof affection inflamed deſire ſhould liue longing moſt loath oh helpe v grant ignorant thing come time death thee certaine may ſo liue finiſh iournie may readie depart departing may make moſt thy glorie comfort ieſus chriſt lord amen another ſweet meditation longing ſoule god saint auguſtine kingdome world eternall wherein ioie ſurmounting ioies peace god paſſeth vnderſtanding wherein alſo ſoules holie folke doo reſt reigne thee lord euerlaſting ioie mirth gladneſſe ſhall enter thee may ſee god dwelleth thee ſhall go thither behold great ſight hold backe wo ſoiourning prolonged wo long ſhall ſaid vnto wait wait againe purpoſe waiting lord god doo wait watch sauiour lord ieſus chriſt come repaire baſe body vnto likeneſſe glorious bodie wait watch like wiſe virgin loines girt lamp burning lord bridegroome ſhould come bridehouſe fetch v wedding come lord ieſus tarie come lord ieſu chriſt come viſit v peace come lead v priſoners priſon may reioice thee perfect hart come sauiour thou art longed nation people come ſhew thy countenance vnto v ſhall ſafe come light redeemer god ſpouſe take ſoule priſon may giue praiſe vnto thy name long ſhall toſſed waues mortalitie crieng vnto thee lord thou heareſt lord heare crie vnto thee huge ſea bring hauen endleſſe bliſſe happie god conueied ſea haue obteined arriue thee ſafeſt harborough hauens happie indeed eſcaped alreadie ſea ſhore baniſhment home owne countrie priſon palace enioieng wiſhed reſt bleſſed alreadie haue gained garland endleſſe glorie ſought manie tribulation ioie happie mirth euer bleſſed indeed treble fouretimes bleſſed alreadie quite rid miſeries haue atteined kingdome beautifulneſſe euerlaſting bliſſefulneſſe aſſured vnappearable glorie ioie endleſſe mirth ſorowleſſe health griefeleſſe waie without labour light without darkneſſe life without death happie therefore ſaie thoſe alreadie haue eſcaped ſhipwracke preſent miſerable life obteined grace come ſo great ioies heauen ala yet ſtill waues ſea longing thee lord hauen ſea ieruſalem heauenlie countrie quiet countrie looke towards thee ken thee farre wee hale thee ſea ſigh vnto thee vale miſerie labour teares may anie meanes attaine vnto thee chriſt god onlie hope mankind refuge ſtrength whoſe brightneſſe inlighteneth eies farre beames ſeaſtarre dooth miſtie darkneſſe ſtormie ſea guide v vnto thee hauen lord gouerne ſhip thy right hand helme thy croſſe wee periſh waues tempeſt water drowne v deepe ſwalowe v vp hooke thy croſſe plucke v backe vaſt ſea vnto thee onlie comfort ſee waiting v farre morningſtarre daieſunne righteouſneſſe maner weeping eies vpon ſhore heauenlie countrie behold thou haſt ranſomed doo crie vnto thee yea euen yet thy baniſhed exile thou haſt redeemed thy pretious bloud doo crie vnto thee heare v god sauiour hope end earth ſea farre conuerſant troubleſome ſea thou ſtanding vpon ſhore lookeſt peril oh ſaue v thy name ſake periſh lord grant v ſo keepe courſe betweene scylla charybdis hold ſo thee may eſcape danger come ſafe land without loſſe ſhip fraight amen another meditation happineſſe good ſoule hence departing burial happie ſoule departing earthly bodie goeth directlie heauen ſecure quiet feareth neither enimie death enioieth continuallie thy preſence god vnceſſantlie beholdeth moſt glorious lord whome ſhe hath ſerued loued length full ioifullie gloriouſlie ſhe hath attained vnto glorie ſo great bleſſedneſſe neither time ſhall diminiſh anie wicked perſon take awaie daughter zion haue ſeene hir counted hir bleſſed euen queenes concubine haue praiſed hir ſaieng ſhe commeth vp deſert abounding pleaſure leaning vpon hir welbeloued ſhe looketh foorth morning faire moone pure sunne terrible armie banner cheerefullie goeth ſhe haſtneth runneth amazed ſhee heareth hir beloued ſaieng vnto hir wiſe ariſe loue faire one come awaie behold winter paſt raine changed gone awaie flouds appeere earth time ſinging bird come voice turtle heard land figtree hath brought foorth hir yong fig vine ſmall grape haue caſt ſauour ariſe loue faire one come awaie doue art hole rocke ſecret place ſtaires ſhew thy ſight let heare thy voice thy voice ſweet thy ſight comelie come awaie choſen faire one doue mine vnſpotted one ſpouſe come awaie put thee bedchamber becauſe haue longed thy beautie come awaie thou maiſt triumph preſence mine angel whoſe companie haue promiſed thee manie peril labour come awaie enter thy maiſters ioie man ſhall take thee amen another may vſed saincts daie oh happie thy saincts chriſt haue paſſed ouer ſea mortalitie attained vnto hauen perpetuall quietneſſe ſecuritie peace reſt alwaie ioifull merrie wherfore thy tender loue beſeech thee chriſt art without care thy ſelfe carefull v needeſt care incorruptible glorie haue thou conſideration manifold miſeries god haſt choſen people thy ſelfe endued glorie making immortall thine immortalitie ioifull thy bleſſed ſight beſeech thee thou alwaies mindfull v helpe v yet ſalt ſeas life toſſed ſurges v thou goodlie gate art raiſed maruellous highneſſe helpe v vile pauement lieng much beneath thee giue v thine hand raiſe vp ſuch lie vpon ground waxing ſtrong weakeneſſe may made couragious battell make thou interceſſion v continuallie vnceſſantlie praie v wretch moſt negligent ſinners thy praiers may conioined holie companie ſaincts otherwiſe ſhall neuer ſaued ala verie fraile weakelings courage creature giuen ſeruice bellie fleſh hauing v almoſt ſparkle vertue yet placed vnder thy confeſſion chriſt borne wood croſſe great wide ſea thing creeping innumerable ſmall beaſts great wherein moſt cruell dragon alwaie prepared deuour v wherein dangerous rock scylla charybdis ſuch like innumerable thing whereby heedleſſe wauering faith make ſhipwracke wherefore chriſt praie v good chriſt praie thou ſaie v thy good praiers merit may deſerue ſhip merchandiſe ſaued attaine vnto port perpetuall ſaluation quietneſſe peace ſecuritie neuer ſhall haue end amen ſeruice common praier ended praie thus ieſu chriſt verie true aaron onlie high biſhop ſoule thine name art gone vp moſt holie place beareſt name lord vpon thy ſhoulders continuall remembrance forſomuch offering ſacrifice cannot ſo perfect frailtie ſome fault imperfection ſhall found therein thy ſight vouchſafe beſeech thee holieſt holy moſt perfect high prieſt mercie beare iniquity publike praiers common ſacrifice thy people one accord thy grace haue heere time made offered vnto god father thy name pardon pardon dulneſſe coldneſſe deuotion let oblation alwaies vpon thy forehead cauſe theſe burnt offering preſented accepted ſweet ſauour reſt lord god thy onelie mediation pacified ſinnes pardoned gratiouſlie reconciled ſanctified may woorthie often haue acceſſe thy mercieſeate woorſhip thee thy holie temple thy ſeruants go peace glorifie thee holie obedience thy word doo vnto poore much elſe thus almightie god haſt giuen v grace time one accord make common ſupplications vnto thee dooeſt promiſe two three gathered togither thy name thou wilt grant requeſt fulfill lord deſires petition thy ſeruants may moſt expedient granting v world knowledge thy truth world come life euerlaſting amen people ariſe depart church ſaie thus thy ſelfe riſe vp lord ariſe let thine enimies ſcattered yea let hate thee prophane thine honour flee thee gather saincts togither continuallie let neuer depart thy church ſoone church dore ſaie bleſſed bee glorie lord place going homeward church meditate praie followeth chriſt whoſe home heauen whoſe houſe place ioies eternall thanke thee thy great mercy ſhewed towards eſpeciallie vouchſafing mee yet time repent liue godlie grant alſo beſeech thee trulie humbled thee daie may good life declare haue come church vaine penitent publicane may returne home houſe vnder thy protection imbettered iuſtified god man holie obedience glorifie thee home abroade life death amen another behold lord praie thee poore ſeelie woorme creeping walking bodilie earth time life pilgrimage paſſage home make mindfull mine euerlaſting home deſirous returne houſe liuing hauing mine affection inflamed thy holie ſpirit may vtterlie contemne earthlie thing couet euermore preſent thee conuerſatoin may heauen whither grant mee length come long home thy child partaker thy glorie reioice thy child bicauſe euerlaſting home great glorie thereof knowe lord mine earthlie houſe tabernacle bodie deſtroied haue building thee euen habitation made hand eternall heauen ſigh deſiring clothed houſe heauen mortalitie might ſwalowed vp life bicauſe knowe long home bodie abſent thee therefore rather abſent bodie preſent thee lord neuertheleſſe whether home home good comfort alwaies good cheere thee beſeeching thee mercie grant grace endeuour ſelfe ſo walke faith thy feare inward appearance ſhall appeare iudgementſeate chriſt euerie one receiue work bodie according hath done whether good bad may found accepted vnto thee amen enter houſe praie thy fauour grace god guide enter materiall houſe home beſeeching thy mercie ſo bleſſe preſerue comming going euer thy peace god paſſeth vnderſtanding may euermore therin neuer turne back deformedlie ſcattered abroad thee vntill thou bring home painfull pilgrimage whereas firſt fruit ſpirit come home praie lord bleſſe v make houſes church thy ſaints linked one confeſſion religion thee made one mind houſe may deuout galilean praiſe thee thy benefit euer lord faſhion conforme thy holie ſpirit houſe peregrination herein enioieng benefit perfect peace moſt ſeemelie quietneſſe comlie order may make thy myſteries ſongs vntill ſhall pleaſe thee lead vpward vnto peace thy child euen thy holie houſe manſion place thou haſt placed v ſhall deſire nothing elſe tarrie remaine euer whileſt clad bodie doo go aſtraie ſtrangers vnto thee neither haue anie abiding place euer muſt ſeeke one come thou bring v cameſt thence redeeme v ieſus chriſt righteous father holie ghoſt poſſible praiſe endleſſe glorie euer amen praiers meate sundaie almightie god moſt mercifull father haſt taught v outward thing defile man thoſe proceede hart grant v ſo eſteeme cleane thou pronounceſt cleane praier thankesgiuing vſe thy creature made benefit may ſanctified vnto v part ſo abhorre polluſion ſinne onelie thou declareſt common vncleane wee may auoid thy grace murder adultries theft falſewitneſſebearing vnlawfull deſires concupiſcence whatſoeuer thou haſt forbidden touching dutie towards men ſeruice obedience vnto thee thus ſanctified thy grace may alwaies haue free acceſſe vnto thy ſanctuarie life receiued heauenlie ieruſalem canaanite vncleane perſon ſhall enter life come ieſus chriſt lord thee holie ghoſt honour glorie praiſe euer amen another sonne god thy miraculous multiplieng fiſhes loaues bread didſt feed fiue thouſand thy people wilderneſſe inwardlie ſpirituall comfort outwardlie corporall food thereby ſhewing thy ſelfe deed creator ſuſteiner thing beſeech thee onelie giueſt v breath life knoweſt need alone canſt giue reaſon maner thou wilt feed v corporall thing thou dooeſt ſtartes without anie nouriſhment giue vnto thy church thy wiſedome ſuch thing neceſſarie ſuſtentation life wherein ioies life eternall come doo begin albeit ſomtime lacke diuers thing although thine aduerſarie throweth ſtones v bread yet thy power ſtrengthen v faint liue bread alone owne induſtrie armed thy word promiſe ſpirituall food ſword ſoule may receiue comfort thereby protected thee woonderfull ſort liue glorifie thee world come amen another praier meat vſed daie haue receiued holie communion thanke thee eternall houſholder banket paradiſe troubled diuell man thou haſt againe thine infinite goodneſſe thy ſonne prepared ſumptuous ſupper great feaſt much thy people among tower thy daily iunkets placed togither moſt part world deſpiſe thy holie table ſuffer themſelues caried vnto bankets satan vaine pleaſures world thou haſt vouchſafed call v moſt vnwoorthie wretch lame blind beggerlie laſt age world number thine elect may filled yea thou compelleſt ſome lieng high way hedge reaſon trouble decaie kingdom preaching thy word come participation thy banket humblie beſeech thee bring v thine heauenlie table appoint v place therein euermore grant thy ſonne bread liuelie wine may drawe nouriſhment iuice drineſſe nature may watered length taſte thy ſupper table euerlaſting life drinke new wine thy ſonne enioieng viſible ſight bleſſed ſocietie thine elect amen begin eate immediatelie bleſſe ſaie lord god art ſanctifier thy saint euerlaſting ſuffiſance ſhalt giuen hungrie bleſſe thou heauen theſe thy good creature great benefit thou haſt created releeue want thy hungrie child receiued thanksgiuing thy celeſtiall benediction may healthfull medicine remedie humane nature grant inuocation thy holie name ſoberlie taking temperatelie thankfullie taſting hereof may therewithall receiue helth bodie ſafegard ſoule ieſus chriſt lord amen elſe praie thus ſober vſing meate drinke grant moſt mercifull god ſo long wander wretched world may ſo take meate drinke infirmitie fleſh neuer corrupted fine fare wherein fleſh delighteth neither yet anie fooliſh ſuperſtition drawne awaie anie time temperance ſobrietie let v alwaies remember ſo vſe abundance abound thing moſt plentifullie may giue ſelues moderate abſtinence continuallie alſo may patientlie beare pouertie hunger commeth wee may ſo vſe libertie meates drink alwaies glorie thy name lord may eies ſuch frugalitie may appeare life may continuallie ſeeke ſatietie fulneſſe whereby ſhall ſatiate euer moſt abundantlie glorie thy countenance ſhall appeere vnto v heauens ieſus chriſt lord amen take ſalt meditate little ſelfe ſaie euerie man ſhall ſalted fire euerie ſacrifice ſhall ſeaſoned ſalt salt good ſalt vnſauourie wherewith ſhall ſeaſoned god giue v grace haue ſalt ſelues haue peace one another let communication ſo well ſauoured powdered ſalt ſaie ſeaſoned godlie wiſedome knowing ſpeake talke may tend glorie thy name edifieng owne ſoules ieſus chriſt lord amen meale time let one child ſeruants beſt reade caution following ſome chapter portion scripture diſtinctlie reuerentlie boord may giue diligent eare therevnto caution remembrance ſaid child meate time remember theſe meates drinkes heere ſet giuen god vſe abuſe ſurfeting dronkenneſſe remember giuen profit body hurt ſoules remember giuen alone vnto others alſo need ſame liberalitie almes releefe eating drinking remember doo feed woormes pamper carcaſſe ouercharge ſoule yee ſurfet taking much midſt mirth abundance remember poore priſoners ſicke affliction ioſeph perſecuted member though yee caſe finallie remember food ſoules chriſts bodie broken bloud ſhead deſire meate ſaie laſteth euer labour harken diligentlie word ſhall read vnto firſt let v praie praier ſaid child ſeruant meale time reading chapter bible lord haſt prouided theſe earthlie creature feeding mortall body direct v carefullie ſeeke delight taſt thy moſt holie word may immortall ſeed begotten thy child thereby nouriſhed fed vntill become perfect men thy sonne chriſt ieſus elſe thus bleſſed lord haſt onlie created thing man ſuſtenance alſo haſt cauſed holie scripture written learning grant v ſo conuerſant among theſe thy gift purelie holilie becauſe thou art ſo may ſuch ſort alſo reade thy word heare marke learne inwardlie digeſt heauenlie food ſoules well refreſhed vertuouſlie tranſformed bodie ſoule may holilie walke ſtrength thereof glorifie thee ieſus chriſt lord amen chapter read ſaie thus bleſſed heare word god keepe grant therefore beſeech thee lord may onlie reader hearer thy word dooers follower alſo ſame beeing fed nouriſhed thy hand ſoule bodie may heere bee apt readie doo good work thou haſt prepared v walke life come receiued thine eternall kingdome glorie ieſus chriſt lord amen another thanksgiuing receiuing bodilie ſustenance reading ſome part god holie word ſpirituall food lord god onlie giuer good gift thy great mercy haſt made v partaker heauenlie gift thy holie word feed mind thine earthlie creature neceſſarie ſuſtenance weake body grant beſeech thee thy grace theſe thy gift may made perfect vnto v giue ſtrength vnto meate may healthfull nouriſhment breed v anie carnall deſire vaine life enable body good work time preſent pilgrimage ſo thy good creature may good releefe ſo long thou wilt ſo much thou knoweſt expedient v thy ſeruants finiſh day thou haſt numbred edifieng thy saincts glorifieng thy holie name becauſe lord knowe nothing ſelues ignorant hart full darkeneſſe therefore beſeech thee thy word thine eternall wiſdome haue read wherein haue conference may mind burning lampe ſhining light thine onlie truth hart ſoules fruitefull ſeed new birth ſo thine owne image may happilie againe reſtaured v may bee made thee holie righteous people inward working thy gratious ſpirit dailie ſtrengthening hart earneſt loue thy truth carefull obedience thy commandements ieſus chriſt onlie mediator ſacrifice owne bodie hath purchaſed vnto v thy fauour hath giuen v boldneſſe call vpon thee vnto whome father thee holie ghoſt bee honour glorie world without end amen another praier meate lord daie sanctified thy name eternall father thy sonne ieſus chriſt lord dooeſt euermore protect prouide thy church ſpirituall corporall bleſſings beſtowing moſt liberallie vpon v good thing aſked according thy lift vp thine eies chriſt behold thy miſerable people depend altogither vpon thy prouiſion acknowledge ſelues fed defended miraculouſlie thee aſſiſt v alſo may withdrawe eies conſultations fleſh bloud looke vpon thee lord whoſe bleſſing eate ſtore ſelues albeit worldlie help faile yet bee thou firie wall ſtill v feed defend thy saincts feelds comfort vntill thou begin ioifull paſſouer euerlaſting sabboth bring v wilderneſſe ſea penurie court ioie wealth ſatietie euerlaſting welfare meane make v thankfull benefit enioie let v gather vp remnant fragment caſt thy ſumptuous rich banket vnto v preſerue baſkets bleſſe ſtore euen art ſchooles learning thy doctrine may ſpread abroade world make v onlie honour thee theſe thy corporall benefit much giuing thy ſelfe vnto v art bread life thou king defending v life againſt power sathan feed v thy heauenlie bread may nouriſh v eternall life happineſſe amen another praier meate daie haue receiued holie communion seeing thy free grace mercie almightie god thou haſt made v partaker daie thy rich ſpirituall corporall thing chriſt ieſu ſelues vnwoorthie haue gathered crumb vnder thy table make v mindfull ſo great mercy continuallie thankefull thee ſo manifold benefit walke woorthie honour dignitie thou haſt done vnto v may receiue full accompliſhment thy loue towards v life come ſame lord sauiour ieſus chriſt thee holie ghoſt honour glorie world without end amen another thanksgiuing vnto god food read meditated vpon meate thanke thee king glorie lord heauen earth becauſe thou haſt youth preſent houre maruellouſlie nouriſhed v giuing v meate drinke cloathing thing perteining ſuſtentation preſent life naked bare came mother womb wee brought nothing world whatſoeuer haue thou gaueſt ſame yea afore borne mother wombe didſt thou ordeine thing neceſſarie life ſufferedſt v enioie thing aboundantlie alwaie thou haſt care v father vſeth child neither art thou ignorant ſtand need continuallie thy bleſſings dailie deſtitute new releefe thou giueſt thy woonted vnſpeakable goodneſſe acknowledge whatſoeuer haue poſſeſſe thy gift confeſſe thee fountaine good thing perceiue thy fatherlie goodneſſe ſpread onlie ouer mankind alſo ouer liuing creature thou giueſt meate fleſh thou giueſt fodder cattell feedeſt yoong rauens call vpon thee corporall good diſtributed among men chance without thy prouidence neither atteined onlie induſtrie power man thou giueſt gather thou openeſt thy hand liuing creature filled thy bleſſing without thee endeuours vaine thou bleſſe labour doo eate wind receiue profit great thy mercie lord diſdaineſt prouide ſinfull fleſh lord god great thy woonderous work thou haſt done v ſo much thought comprehend muchleſſe word expreſſe would report vtter found could recite notwithſtanding thine infinite benefit comprehended mortall man yet ſurceaſe ſet foorth thy praiſe hide thy goodneſſe ſonnes men declare ſpeake thy truth one generation another bleſſed art thou god euer euer either aboue heauens earth beneath thine thing come thee thine hand receiue whatſoeuer poſſeſſe theſe thing thy meere mercie without merit woorthineſſe therefore magnifie lord doth mightie thing corner earth dooth nouriſh
