hir enimies thy right hand find ſuch hate thee enuie hir proſperitie put burning fornace time thy diſpleaſure lord anger ſhall conſume fire ſhall deuour fruit ſhalt thou deſtroy earth ſeed ſonnes men bicauſe intended euill againſt thee imagined miſchiefe againſt innocent could bring paſſe therefore wilt thou turne flight bend thy bowe againſt face triumph lord thy vertue ſing thy glorie commend thy power saue queene mercifull god deſpite hir enimies either ſecretlie openlie go bring hir life graue hir glorie duſt lord ſhield souereigne exalt thine annointed let thine hand aſſiſt thine arme ſtrengthen hir neuer let hir foe preuaile againſt hir child wickedneſſe bring hir deſtruction baniſh hir court hir priuie enimies preſerue hir euermore diſſembling friend mercie iudgement queene elizabeth ſong vnto thee lord let hir ſing thy magnificall mercy worke hir roiall hart endeuour fullie inſtructed perfect waie thy roiall lawes ſo much thou haſt made hir queene ouer relme thy grace open hir hart inſtruct hir lead hir vp downe midſt hir people perfectneſſe hart let hir neuer ſet hir eies anie diueliſh thing cauſe hir deteſt worke backſliding god let take hold hir driue far awaie hir men froward hart let hir acquainted euill perſons ſo priuilie ſlandereth neighbor let hir deſtroie ſo hath alſo proud looke hautie ſtomach cauſe hir loath settle hir eies vpon ſuch land faithfull may dwell hir ſo leadeth godlie life men good conſcience let ſuch hir ſeruants let deceitfull perſon haue anie place hir houſe telleth lie reuenger bloud cauſe hir ſpeedilie caſt hir ſight finallie grant hir power lord hoſts dailie ſuppreſſe vngodlie land ſhe may root citie god wicked dooers queene elizabeth hath done lawfull right wherefore lord leaue hir ſuch doo offer hir wrong thine owne goodneſſe ſake take hir thine handmaid vnto thy protection let proud oppreſſe hir wrong deale thine handmaid according thy louing kindneſſe teach hir thy ſtatutes thy ſeruant grant hir vnderſtanding ſhe may knowe thy teſtimonies thy teſtimonies conteine woonderous thing therefore cauſe hir hart zealous keeping firſt entrance thy word illuminate giuing vnderſtanding euen vnto ſimple worke hir hart ſo feruent deſire thy word affection thereto ſhe may like one panteth openeth mouth breath looke thou vpon hir lord mercifull vnto hir thou vſeſt doo vnto loue thy name direct hir ſteps thy word ſo let wickedneſſe haue dominion ouer hir redeeme hir fraudulent dealing men cauſe hir keepe thy commandements make light thy countenance ſhine vpon queene elizabeth thine handmaiden teach hir thy ſtatutes heare praiers god giue good eare vnto mine interceſſions behold end earth call vnto thee deere souereigne ladie queene elizabeth whenſoeuer hir hart heauines oh ſet hir vp vpon rocke higher ſhe hitherto thou haſt beene hir defence ſtrong tower hir againſt face enimie let hir dwell beſeech thee thy tabernacle euer let hir truſt vnder couering thy wing thou lord heardſt hir deſires haſt giuen hir heritage ouer thoſe feare thy name grant vnto queene long life hir yeeres may endure manie generation let hir dwell lord euer appoint thy louing mercie truth may preſerue hir ſo cauſe hir alwaies ſing praiſe vnto thy name ſhe may daie daie performe hir vowes keepe thy heaſts finallie giue thy iudgment lord vnto hir grace thy righteouſneſſe vnto hir counſell may iudge people iuſtice poore equitie let mountaines bring peace little hils righteouſnes vnto people let iudge afflicted among people ſaue ſonnes poore make deſtroie backeſlider perſiſt afflict miſerable ſuch truſt thy mercie protection ſo ſhall quietneſſe peace abound among v like hillock earth cauſe hir enimies feare hir ſo long ſunne moone ſhineth one generation another water hir thy grace heauen thou didſt gedeons fleece wool dew thou refreſheſt drop raine new cut graſſe vpon earth hir day let righteous flouriſh great abundance peace ſo long moone firmament defend dominion thou haſt giuen hir within ſeas floud vnto end earth cauſe hir foe kneele downe hir hir enimies licke duſt hir feete giue hir long proſperous reigne indue hir abundance rich wealth heape glorie honour vpon hir head let hir partaker alwaies praiers iuſt dailie bleſſed lord euen god iſrael onelie worketh woonderous thing bleſſe gratious queene elizabeth bleſſed name maieſtie euer yea let earth filled glorious praiſe amen ſhe ſhall magnifie thee lord hir king ſhe ſhall praiſe thy name euer euerie daie let hir giue thanks vnto thee lord praiſe thy name euer euer grant moſt mercifull father thy deere ſonne sauiour ieſus chriſts ſake amen amen another praier queenes moſt excellent maiestie wonderfull moſt excellent almightie god depth thy iudgements thou king king lord lord thou thy pleaſure dooſt take awaie tranſpoſe roote plant confound eſtabliſh kingdom thou thy ſingular goodneſſe haſt deliuered gratious souereigne queene elizabeth thy choſen handmaid ſhe almoſt death dore yea thou haſt deliuered hir priſon ſetled hir hir father throne thee therefore doo render thanks thee doo ſing laud praiſe thy name doo honour daie night thou haſt reſtored againe libertie countrie ſinceritie doctrine peace tranquillitie thy church thine thine lord benefit meanes labour ſeruice hirs burthen heauie ala woman ſhoulders yet eaſie tollerable thy helping hand aſſiſt hir therefore moſt mercifull father neither reſpect hir offence deſerts hir parent manifold ſinnes v hir people thinke vpon thy woonted compaſſion alwaies hand thy poore afflicted preſerue hir kingdome mainteine religion defend thy cauſe queene elizabeth v thy ſheepe hir people ſcatter thine enimies thirſt war let aſhamed confounded woorſhip idol let v praie vnto forraigne nation people knowe thee neither call vpon thy name strengthen confirme lord good worke thou haſt begun inſpire gratious queene thy ſeruant v thy poore flocke thy holie ſpirit vncorrupt life may ioine puritie religion may yeeld bring foorth wild baſtard fruit mild ſweet grape fruit beſeeming liuelie faith true repentance meet conuenient thy goſpell intent may enioie immortall treaſure liuing dieng thee may finallie poſſeſſe inheritance thy heauenlie kingdome ieſus chriſt lord thine kingdome power glorie euer amen forme bleſſing praier moſt gratious queene elizabeth christ deere ſpouſe scripture come downe lord come thouſands thy saincts appeare gratiouſlie vnto thy church saincts come viſit people congregation iacob wherſoeuer aſſembled whome thou ſo tenderlie loueſt humbled thy foot yeeld thee thanks thy bleſſings benefit receiued come downe ſaie god iacob bleſſe iſrael yea come bleſſe thy choſen deere beloued ſeruant elizabeth queene whome thou haſt ſet vp mightie prince mother ouer thy people citie zion made chiefe gouernour among nation let elizabeth liue die neither let hir honour anie thing diminiſhed ſinnes offence heare lord voice hir humble dailie praiers let hir continue prince peace roiall ruler ouer thy people hir hand ſhall good ynough hir thou helpe hir ſtill thou haſt done againſt hir enimies right light thine holie handmaid whome thou didſt prooue great temptation triall thou didſt ioſeph thou didſt annoint hir queene whome hitherto thou haſt preſerued pure vndefiled virgin promote thy glorie thou didſt dauid hir manifold affliction hath eſteemed ſeruing thee hir god ſauing hir ſelfe loued hir life ſo deere ſhe loued thy lawe yea preferred thine obedience ſacrifice thing world beſide let hir gratious queene elizabeth ſaie hath thus hir dutie plentifullie rewarded therefore thee hir god heauen perpetuall crowne glorie palme victorie euen ſhe hath taught iacob thy iudgements iſrael thy lawe ſhe hath put incenſe thy face burnt offering vpon thine altar euen ſhe god hath hezechias reſtored thy ſincere religion woorſhippeth thee aright euerie one godlie thee bleſſe therefore lord hir ſubſtance firſt fruit accept work hir hand smite loines riſe vp againſt hir hate hir riſe againe let beloued lord dwell euer ſafetie thee yea doo thou lord vouchſafe ſtil hir vale defence hir life long dwell hir heere church hir beloued ſpouſe head gouernour laie thy left hand vnder hir head let thy right hand embrace hir ſhe may find continuall comfort thy preſence fountaine garden well liuing water ariſe north come south blowe thy ſpouſe goodlie pleaſant garden incloſed fountaine ſealed vp thy ſelfe water ſprings lebanon may growe great ſweet ſpices ſmell therof may flowe thy noſtrels thou eate pleaſant fruit hir kiſſe hir kiſſes peace righteouſnes let hir two breaſts ſatiſfie thee like two yoong roe twin feeding vpon lillie set hir ſeale thine hart ſignet vpon thine arme let lampe hir loue verie vehement flame vnquenchable let hir ſure wall foundation wherevpon thou maiſt build golden palace let hir breaſts tower vnaſſaultable ſhe may meet thee hir ſpouſe dwell thine eies ſhe findeth perpetuall peace quietneſſe god whoſe ſight hir father walke thou god haſt fed hir hir life long vnto daie deliuered hir hither ſo manie euils death bleſſe hir ſtill euen bleſſing abraham iſaac iacob patriarch bleſſings thy mercy promiſed vnto hir father dauid hir let iſrael alſo bleſſed hir let thy grace ſo plentifullie manifeſtlie appeare people may thence take patterne bleſſing thee teach poſteritie bleſſe praiſe thee thy goodneſſe mercie towards hir ſhe v thy might thy ſtrength nobleneſſe dignitie excellencie power lioneſſe laid downe couched ſafelie ſpoile ſhall ſtir hir vp hir enimies doo feare hir doo thou ſtill charge daughter ieruſalem ſtir vp thy loue awake hir troubling hir quietnes peace vntill ſhe pleaſe hir fellowe virgin praiſe hir hir hand ſhall necke hir enimies hir father people doo bow downe vnto hir ſaieng good lucke haue thou thine honour ride becauſe word truth thou embraceſt meekeneſſe let brother euill reuengers bloud inſtruments violence crueltie bee hir court habitation let crueltie falſehood come hir ſoule ſecrets let hir ſoule come neither let hir glorie ioined ſtained aſſemblie damned crue wicked curſe curſe hir bleſſe bleſſe hir diuide iacob ſcatter iſrael ſhameleſlie rage dare cruellie attempt anie treachery treaſons againſt hir innocent roiall perſon yea let condignelie puniſhed whoſoeuer go trouble ſtate ouerthrowe hir kingdome let ſcepter depart hir hand hir kingdome diminiſhed let thy moſt wiſe lawegiuer meeke moſes continue amongſt v honour iudge thy people gather vnto thee long reſt peace euen vntill silo sauiour ieſus giuer proſperitie come crowne hir euerlaſting kingdome ſaluation let hir ſee reſt peace good thou haſt made hir ouercome hir enimies laſt bleſſe hir lord great increaſe maner good profitable pleaſant thing hir bread let fat ſhe may giue pleaſant gift woorthie ſuch queene let hir hind ſent vnto v thee pretious preſent giuing goodlie word hir people let elizabeth daughter increaſe like flouriſhing fruitfull palme tree water ſide whoſe ſmall branch virgin may run ſpread themſelues fruitfullie alſo ſhew verie greene vpon wals thy houſe archer hir enimies haue greeuouſlie prouoked hir ſhot againſt hir venemous dart haue hated hir hir hinderance griefe great manie haue beene hir affliction perſecutions hir bowe abode faſt ſtrong hand hir armes ſtrengthened hand mightie god iacob hir deliuerance euen ſtone iſrael ſhe appointed mother iſrael euen god hir father hath helped hir almightie hath bleſſed hir heauenlie bleſſings aboue bleſſings deepe lieth beneath bleſſings breſts wombe time come bleſſings god ſhewed vnto hir father ſhall take effect ſtronger hir bleſſings hir elder unto vttermoſt end hils world ſhall bleſſings vpon head elizabeth top head hir ſeparate hir birth conſecrated wombe dignitie honour far aboue hir felowe virgin made annointed lord beare rule haue dominion ouer men euen morning light ſunne riſeth gloriouſlie without cloud faire morning ſo ſhe iuſt ruling feare god let hir houſe growe thee god may continue perfect point ſure euerlaſting according thy couenant promiſe made hir father dauid graſſe earth bright raine groweth quicklie fadeth ſooner hir beautie glorie let like firſt borne bullocke hir ſtrength unicorne horne hir power let hir ſmite people togither euen ten thouſands ephraim ten thouſands manaſſes bleſſe hir hir going comming proſper hir home abroad hir affaire land ſea make hir glad ioifull willing call thy people vnto holie hill zion thy church offer togither offering righteouſneſſe ſhe may ſucke abundance ſea treaſures hid earth bleſſe hir lord ſhe may dwell lion catcheth praie arme head moſt victorious ouer hir enimies hate hir deſpiſe thee bleſſe hir thy grace ſhe may looke well hir ſelfe beginning ſhe portion thee lawegiuer hid reſerued v thy people ſhe may come head people execute righteouſneſſe lord iudgements iſrael lion whelpe let hir leape baſan make hir ſtrong inough defend hir ſelfe balaks curſe againſt treaſons zimri achitophel ſatiſfie hir thy fauour fill hir thy bleſſings let hir poſſeſſe eaſt weſt ſouth north part earth bleſſe hir people make hir acceptable vnto hir brother ſiſters dip hir foot oile hir ſhoes let iron braſſe hir glorie health wealth ſtrength continue long ſunne like thee god iſrael though thou ſit vpon heauens rideſt vpon vpon horſe yet art thou hir helper sauiour whoſe glorie cloud celeſtiall place eternall god ſtill hir refuge vnder armes euerlaſting god let hir liue euer hee ſhall caſt enimie hir face ſhall command hir deſtroie iſrael euen preſent may ſtill dwell alone ſafetie fountaine iacob plentifull iſſue land wheate wine heauens drop dew thy bleſſing plentifullie vpon hir hir countrie happie bleſſed art thou iſrael haſt ſuch queene like vnto thee people ſaued lord ſhield thy helpe ſword thy glorie therefore thine enimies haue loſt ſtrength thee ward ſubiected thee thou ſhalt tread vpon high place bleſſe hir ſtill lord giue power vnto thy queene ſhe may ſtrong keepe foot thy saint within wals thy church cauſe wicked euer keepe ſilence darknes amen amen praier ſaid mentallie alowd true harted english men woman queenes maieſtie ſhe rideth anie time god ſaue roiall maieſtie god god preſerue noble grace good lucke haue honor faireſt among woman ride queene according great worſhip high renowme wherewith king king hath innobled bicauſe word truth meekeneſſe righteouſneſſe profeſſe ſo ſhall right hand teach terrible thing lord himſelfe keeper preſerue euill lord heauen earth defence right hand left lord preſerue going comming time foorth euermore ſo ſunne ſhall burne daie neither moone night king king haue pleaſure beautie make daughter ſpouſe virgin moſt glorious within moſt mightie iehoua eſtabliſh ſeate iudgement euen throne father dauid may become old mother iſrael peace proſperitie vnto loue honour horror conſcience confuſion face vnto thoſe hate indurable gift god grace people doo highlie praiſe zeale zion world doth honour therefore zion ſake alſo wiſh maner proſperitie yea bicauſe houſe lord haue reformed religion grace hath reſtored continuallie triumph mercie praie ſtill renowme moſt roiall name maieſtie fame may vniuerſallie ſpred ouer earth remembred one generation another goſpels ſake ſay maieſtie doth maintaine vnceſſantly praiſe god lowd voice crie ſay god ſaue moſt gratious queene elizabeth ieſu bleſſe highneſſe holie ghoſt heauen comfort conduct maieſtie wais bleſſe ſouereigne ladie bleſſed trinitie heape glorie honour vpon elizabeth queene glorious deitie bleſſe hir ſacred maieſtie ſaie god frō time foorth euermore king heauen receiue queene receiue imbrace thy moſt glorious virgin deere daughter accompanied hir felowe virgin prince daughter honourable woman thy tuition protection ioie gladneſſe ſaie let hir liuelie image thy princelie maieſtie brought ſafe vnhurt home againe vnto hir iuorie palace laſt enter king court hir father houſe ſhe may enioie perpetuall crowne euerlaſting kingdome reioice thee hir god hir ſpouſe hir sauiour euer euer ſo ſhall ſhe hir people giue thanks vnto thee lord world without end amen compendious forme praier whole eſtate christes church neceſſarie vſed estate time conuenient eſpeciallie euerie sabboth holidaie euening mother daughter familie pſalme preparing hart praier mother come let v ſearch trie way turne againe vnto lord daughter let v ſeeke lord found let v call vpon neere moth let v lift vp hart hand vnto god heauens haue ſinned haue rebelled therefore ſpare v daugh euen crowne head caſt downe wo therefore vnto v haue ſinned moth iniquity ſealed vp bagge hath ſet miſdeeds ſecret ſinnes light countenance daugh weighed balance found lacke weight altogether lighter vanitie moth though hath choſen v heritage yet vnto lion forreſt dailie crie againſt therefore hath hated v daugh lord abſent himſelfe euer ſhew fauour moth mercie cleane gon euer doth promiſe faile euermore daugh hath god forgotten mercifull hath ſhut vp tender mercie diſpleaſure moth uerelie fruit infirmity yet right hand lord amend daugh therefore leaue complaint vpon ſelues ſpeake bitterneſſe ſoules moth wil ſaie vnto god condemne v neither caſt thou worke thy hand daugh rather turne thou v vnto thee ſhall turned renew day old thou haſt baniſhed v long inough haſt beene ſore diſpleaſed v moth poore needie god make haſte vnto v thou art helper redeemer god make tarieng daugh let oppreſſed returne aſhamed let poore needie praiſe thy name moth nowe doo ſow teares may heereafter reape gladneſſe daugh bleſſed man whome thou chaſtiſeſt lord teacheſt thy lawe moth thou maiſt giue reſt day euill whileſt pit digged wicked daugh bleſſed man whome thou correcteſt therefore refuſe thy chaſtiſement moth though thou make wound yet thou giueſt plaiſter though thou ſmite yet thy hand make whole againe daugh therefore lord open thou lip mouth ſhall ſhew foorth thy praiſe moth bow downe thine eare lord conſider complaint hearken vnto v thy truth righteouſneſſe ſake daugh amen praier heard obtaine fauour mother seeing hath pleaſed thee moſt mercifull father ſo fauourablie conſider weakeneſſe vnwoorthineſſe mankinde whereas wee could ſelues neither lift vp eies vnto thee becauſe weakeneſſe neither yet hope anie good thing thy hand becauſe vnwoorthineſſe euen extreme miſerie haſt giuen vnto v thy welbeloued sonne ieſus chriſt whome onelie made able lift vp hart vnto thee alſo may aſſure ſelues merit paſſion thy fauour mercie ſo euer ſhall aſke agreeable thy good pleaſure doo firſt bottome hart yeeld vnto thee thanks honour glorie thine ineſtimable goodneſſe beſtowed v thine vnwoorthie ſeruants ſo doo likewiſe beeing aſſured thy mercie promiſed chriſt dailie preſent ſelues thee intent faithfull praiers may dailie receiue fruit thy mercifull goodneſſe releeue continuall neceſſities withall heere lord ſtrange countrie enimies euerie ſide waie ſo euer turne v ſee nothing either continuall conflict elſe vtter deſtruction thou therefore holie father haſt giuen v thine onlie sonne ieſus chriſt intent name might call vpon thee vouchſafe likewiſe heare v time ſoeuer call vnto thee name ſith hath pleaſed thee exerciſe v continuall tribulation triall may obtaine ſuch patience ſtrength may continuallie ſtand ſtronglie maintenance thy cauſe thy honor glorie let deſerts ſo much prouoke thy diſpleaſure againſt v therefore thou ceaſe glorifie thy holie name v rather thy goodneſſe forgiue thou ſinnes hinderance thy honor glorie haue committed giue v grace hartilie repent v miſdeeds ſuch ſort may hencefoorth ſeeke thy face walke thee newneſſe life ſeeking thy honor glorie aboue thing hath hitherto hindered v ſhame ſo may al meanes furthered euen v likewiſe vnſpeakable comfort v ieſus chriſt lord daughter amen church vniuerſallie mother becauſe fallen theſe dangerous day wherein goodneſſe decaieth ſin aboundeth humblie beſeech thee mercifullie behold perillous eſtate age generall confuſion whole world multiplie thy grace bleſſings thy church much thy mercy world neuer defiled anie corruption either world fleſh diuell neither yet periſh eternallie world daughter amen ciuil magiſtrates mother mercifull therfore father vnto ſtates member thereof vnto king prince ciuil magiſtrates namelie thy ſeruant elizabeth queene gouernour may euerie one ſeuerall charge mainteine ſcepters truth righteouſneſſe may beate downe ſinne aduance vertue may humblie ſubmit themſelues power vnto thy good pleaſure thing ſeeke continuallie furtherance thy goſpell doo ſhall moſt thy honor glorie daugh amen biſhops ſpirituall paſtors mother vnto biſhops preacher ſpirituall paſtors thou haſt appointed watchman vnto thy flocke ſo may endeuour themſelues buſineſſe ſet apart faithfullie execute charge gathering together thy wandering flocke feeding bread life confirming doctrine godlie conuerſation defending rauening woulfes theeues diligent fruitfull watching ouer daie night finallie carefull auoiding thing may giue occaſion forget neglect charge becauſe cannot verie ill flocke whenſoeuer ſhepheard ſleepeth daugh amen inferior ſubiects mother vnto v inferior ſubiects may willinglie gladlie loue honor ſerue obeie ſuperior power thee thee may ioifullie receiue thy goſpell plentiouſlie bring foorth fruit thereof thing chieflie applie ſelues maintenance thy true worſhip ſetting foorth thine honor glorie daughter amen ignorant mother vnto ignorant alſo eies may opened would pleaſe thee ſhew thy countenance vnto may knowe thee thy church condemne errours becauſe eies cloſed vp darknes zeale ſimplicitie without knowledge ſo may haue ſtead godlie zeale grounded perfect knowledge ſo thy goſpell may fructifie alſo glorie thy holie name daugh amen malicious perſecutors mother euen vnto malicious perſecutors alſo may either length receiue thy grace ſo often ſo mercifullie profered vnto ſo acknowledge malice returne vnto thee thy great honor glorie thou ſhalt praiſed euen mouth thine enimies elſe haue vtterlie giuen ouer themſelues vnto continuall hatred thee thy word vtterly reiected kind diſcipline thou take awaie among v thy great honor glorie alſo thy little flocke deliuered tyrannie oppreſſion ſhall ioifullie ſing vnto thee thy continuall goodneſſe woonderfull deliuerance daughter amen thoſe afflicted chriſts ſake mother vnto v troubled perſecuted cruellie handeled thy name ſake although pleaſe thee make ſharpe triall faith enimies may either aſhamed confounded thereat yet thou leaue v ſo much deſtitute thy grace able ſtand vttermoſt proofe thereof conſider lord greatneſſe infirmity although ſins haue deſerued thy wrath yet let equitie cauſe thine troubled purchaſe vnto v thy fauour mercie giue v therefore grace continue end willinglie ioifullie beare whatſoeuer croſſe ſhall pleaſe thee laie vpon v alwaies readie defend ſet foorth thine honour glorie whatſoeuer triall muſt need drinke cup triall yet giue leaue vnto thy choſen drinke flowre reſerue bottome dreg thereof proud obſtinate enimies thy goſpell according thy mercy promiſed ieſus chriſt lord daughter amen eſtates generall mother finallie thou mercifull vnto v houſhold faith eſtate calling ſoeuer remembring end thou haſt created v dangerous thing walke ſo farre vnworthie vocation cōmonlie doo may hartilie repent v licentious diſſolute wicked life euer crie vnto thee pardon ſame grant heauenlie father denieng vnfruitfull receiuing thy word laid charge vtter confuſion length may onlie receiue ſpeedilie learne bring foorth fruit ſame applieng liues exact rule thereof walking thee holineſſe righteouſneſſe continuall thanks praiſe thy mercy ſhewed vnto v euer ſeeking thine honor glorie dooings may end ſhort wearie peregrination taken vp vnto thee euerlaſting reſt quietneſſe prepared beleeuers merit ieſus chriſt lord daughter amen increaſe true preacher complaining lacke herein mother heauenlie father according wee taught thy ſonne humblie beſeech thee mercifullie bow downe thine eies behold great plentifull thy harueſt euen readie cut downe thruſt thou foorth good faithfull laborer reape gather thy barn though thy harueſt great yet labourer verie behold lord miſerable eſtate theſe day thy ſeelie ſheepe wander vp without ſhepheard euerie one almoſt goeth priuaite imagination accounting part dutie charge mooued therat take pitie great miſerie better ſort ſee lament lord thoſe buſilie ſeeke redreſſe thereof owne priuate cōmodities ſet apart surelie thy ſheepe euen thy ſheepe heauenlie ſhepheard perilous caſe gone aſtray euerie one owne way euen owne deſtruction barren mountaines almoſt vtterlie famiſhed lacke food themſelues able returne fold theſe thing euen thou haſt giuen charge moſt part either ſleepe ſweetlie awake content way occupie themſelues lord wilt thou alſo alwaies ſleepe neuer ariſe vp reuenged theſe ſo manifeſt iniuries wilt thou neuer diſplace theſe careleſſe hireling raiſe vp place ſuch ſhall vigilant paſtors ouer charge although ſinnes deſerue redreſſe neither yet giue v anie hope find mercie matter yet thy name ſake thine honour glorie father ceaſe dailie preſent ſelues thee euen preſent humblie beſeeching thee name thy ſonne ieſus chriſt raiſe vp among v like thou haſt begun manie good ſhepheards ſuch let anie paine diſcomfiture ſeeke thy wandering ſheepe defend v bloudthirſtie iawes rauening woolues good guide ſuch ſhew v waie themſelues lead vnto v yea carie home poore faint vpon back good faithfull diſtributers thy word myſteries ſuch giue v food due ſeaſon breaking vnto v liuing bread giuing v drinke water life whereas manie v almoſt periſhed famine therefore becom lothſome ill liking thy ſight may therby thy helpe recouered lothſomneſſe ill liking reſtored againe former plight beautie may ſtrong growe grace godlineſſe altogither ſafetie thy fold one hart voice declare thy mercie goodneſſe woonderous work ſanctifie thy holie name euer grant thou heauenlie father lord harueſt ſakes thy name ſake merit ieſus chriſt onlie guide chiefe ſhepheard liueth reigneth thee holie ghoſt euer daughter amen vniuerſities schooles mother bleſſe thou therefore lord dew thy ſpirit uniuerſities schooles ſith hath pleaſed thee thine appointed meanes ſhould haue preacher teacher may inſtructed godly knowledge learning made fit walke woorthilie vocation time ſoeuer ſhall pleaſe thee call forth grant beſech thee ought light nurſſes vnto country euen ſo may giue vnto godlie perfect life nouriſh vp good ſound doctrine thy glorie comfort diſcharge duty bicauſe day charitie waxeth cold number couetous worldling much increaſed ſeeke rather keepe backe liuings plucke awaie rather beſtowe anie thing maintenance ſtudie bleſſe thou therfore thing ſufficient ſeruice thee increaſe good learning lacke thereof hinderance building thy houſe ſetting foorth thine honour glorie remooue among v moſt mercifull father whatſoeuer occaſion let hinderance vnto thoſe couet knowledge ſanctifieng thy holie name ieſus chriſt lord daughter amen good eſtate realme mother becauſe alſo thou haſt commanded v call vpon thee daie troble promiſing thou wilt heare praiers therefore humblie beſeech thee fauourable vnto realme viſit offence ſo ſharpelie neither giue v drinke ſo bitter cup vnto iudgement ſeemeth thou haſt prepared v lord wee may abide force thy iudgments denie haue moſt woorthilie deſerued whatſoeuer puniſhment thou haſt euer hertofore powred forth vpon anie nation ſith thy name called among v ſith make account anie helpe onlie thee ſith acknowledge offence humblie deſire pardon ſame ieſus chriſt let thy iuſt iudgements laie hold vpon v expedient v thy honour glorie taſte thy mercie thou haſt hitherto dealt exceeding mercifullie v thou haſt planted among v goodlie vineyard beſt plant thou haſt walled round watered plentifullie dew thy bleſſing ſo much thou couldeſt haue done v thou haſt done neither haſt thou dealt ſo nation ala wretched ſinners contrarie deſerts thy louing kindneſſe haue brought foorth wild grape thou hateſt ſteed good ſweet grape thou lookeſt wee haue taken thy word mouthes haue hated reformed thereby yea haue vtterlie deſpiſed thy holie word preacher thereof deriſion ſo haue made open readie waie vnto damnable work blaſphemie idolatrie murther adulterie pride couetouſneſſe diſobedience ſenſualitie vnmercifulneſſe oppreſſions ſlanders vnthankfulneſſe whatſoeuer elſe corrupt nature caſting aſide grace diſcipline woont bring foorth whileſt theſe thing thou heldeſt thy peace winkedſt thereat therefore fooliſhlie imagine thou art like vnto v delighted ſinne thus haue work prouoked thy diuine maieſtie greeuous diſpleaſure againſt v holie god ſeeing thy long ſufferance thou haſt ſo mercifullie ſtriken hard hart ſecret conſideration miſerable eſtate beſeech thee ieſus chriſts ſake giue v likewiſe repentant hart ſorowfull former miſdeeds thereby may alſo attaine promiſes thou haſt annexed therevnto namelie thou breake downe wall thy vineyard thou ſuffer eaten vp troden downe thou laie waſte ſo brier thorn growe vp therein thou command cloud raine vpon neither thou turne roote rottenneſſe neither yet thou make bud riſe vp like duſt bicauſe haue caſt thy lawe lord god hoſts contemned thy word holie one iſrael make v byword vnto neighbour ſcorne vnto thoſe dwell v rather grant beſeech thee hencefoorth may hartilie repent walke thee newneſſe life thy honor glorie example neighbour conuerſion confuſion enimies euerlaſting comfort ieſus chriſt lord daughter amen praier repentance mother although infirmity doo euidentlie appeare diuers way ſhew foorth themſelues vnto v almightie moſt mercifull god yet nothing cannot perceiue behold owne wickedneſſe ſuch ſort indeed tongs confeſſe becauſe thou thy ſelfe haſt ſaid altogither vnrighteous one v doth good imagine miſchiefe although driuen thine eternall truth outwardlie confeſſe ſame yet haue ſuch inward feeling thereof ought haue becauſe altogither cloſed vp owne ſtubberneſſe ſelfeloue wherfore commeth paſſe neither repent v ſhould amend neither yet hartilie acknowledge certainlie knowe within v holie god long ſhall cleane without vnderſtanding long ſhall fleſh haue dominion ouer thy good ſpirit v long ſhall cloud vnſenſibleneſſe darken blemiſh inward ſight uerelie ſinnes haue deſerued onlie thou hide thy face awaie v time thou ſhouldeſt vtterlie caſt v thy fauour grace eternall damnation ſith thou art wont deale mercifullie euen ſonnes men vnto v alſo haſt giuen good likelihood thereof thou haſt ſtriken hart ſome feeling owne wretchedneſſe putteth v good comfort hope thou haſt done end intent thou maiſt beſtowe larger grace v alſo therefore ſomewhat emboldened although duſt aſhes humblie deſire thee name thy ſonne ieſus chriſt euen length thou wilt vouchſafe giue vnto v grace hartie repentance wee knowe ſo likewiſe may acknowledge vnto thee vnrighteouſneſſe hencefoorth labour buſilie without anie delaie amend thoſe thing wherein haue hitherto offended thee knowe lord onelie time mercie ſo much obtaine mortall life remaineth nothing v looked fearefull rigorous ſentence iudgement grant therefore beſeech thee mercifull god ſith moſt damnable eſtate reaſon continuall diſobedience meanes recouer ſelues thy mercifull gift repentance may euen obtaine thy hand onlie thy grace annexed therevnto ſuch moſt needfull v accompliſhing thy ſetting foorth thy honour glorie ieſus chriſt lord ſauiour ſitteth thy right hand euen euer make interceſſion v daughter amen authoritie diſcipline eſtabliſhed church mother becauſe crookedneſſe diſobedience haue taken ſo deepe roote eſtates adaies manie dare boldlie refuſe eccleſiaſticall cenſure great hinderance courſe goſpell grant therefore beſeech thee like thou haſt dealt nation euen ſo may pleaſe thee length extend thy like mercie vnto realme alſo others ſame neceſſitie authoritie eccleſiaſticall cenſure diſcipline ſinnes thou haſt hitherto kept backe v may placed church due puniſhment ſinfull life contempt thy word ſuch ſort may extend indifferentlie vnto eſtates high lowe well terror ill comfort good alſo ſpeedie perfect reformation ſuch thing yet diſordered thy church ſame ieſus chriſt lord whoſe name theſe thing elſe expedient v lift vp hart vnto thee ſaieng hath taught v mother daughter altogether father c mother thy hand lord doo commend ſelues wholie bodie ſoule vouchſafe receiue v lord god mercie daughter amen mother thee god haue truſted let v neuer confounded daughter amen mother deliuer v beſeech thee power darkeneſſe world fleſh diuell daughter amen mother lord let done vnto v doo put truſt thee daughter amen mother beleeue lord lord helpe make perfect vnbeleefe daughter amen concluſion thing elſe expedient v mother theſe mercifull father thy grace ſuch moſt agreeable thy ſetting foorth thy honor glorie aſſurance ſaluation grant thou vnto v beſeech thee name thy ſonne ieſus chriſt may vtterlie caſt ſinfull affection hencefoorth leade liues holineſſe righteouſneſſe innocencie yeelding vnto thee continuall thanks thy benefit mercy beſeech thee ſend downe hart thy holie ſpirit prepare inſtruct guide v thought word work fulfilling thy good pleaſure whome father sonne holie ghoſt three perſons one god eternall infinite maieſtie praiſe thanks glorie time place thing aboue thing euen ſo v euer daughter amen mother bleſſed lord daughter thanks god ¶ deſirous commend church vnto bleſſings god dailie praiers ought doo neceſſarie buſines well impart ſo much time forme theſe praiers require good conſideration god former benefit towards v manifold infirmity church may doo theſe word mother lord heare praier daughter let crie come vnto thee mother thee heauenlie father thanks honour glorie becauſe hath pleaſed thee merit ieſus chriſt deale ſo mercifullie v looke high heauen compariſon earth ſo great hath thy mercie beene towards v time thing much beyond fooliſh hart could wiſh deſire doo yeeld vnto thee poſſible thanks bottome hart euen ſo doo humblie beſeech thee thy fatherlie goodneſſe ſupplie infirmity wherewith dailie offend thee bleſſe thou therefore mercifull vnto thy church vniuerſallie member thereof namelie vnto prince ciuil magiſtrates gouernment thy name may alwaies ſanctified thy glorious kingdome faithfullie prepared unto biſhops ſpirituall paſtors may diligentlie execute charge committed vnto unto ſubiects inferior may thee thee obeie ſerue loue honor ſuperior power unto ignorant ſuch yet brought knowledge thy truth eies may opened vtter aboliſhing whatſoeuer faith unto malicious perſecutors alſo either hart may turned elſe thou take awaie among v unto perſecuted afflicted may end conflict victorie whether death deliuerance unto thy harueſt periſh lacke reaper unto uniuerſities schooles may attaine ripeneſſe good godlie knowledge vſe ſame furtherance thy kingdome unto realme may hartilie repent v ſinnes thou maiſt alſo repent thee puniſhment thou haſt prepared v euer continue thy goodneſſe towards v thou haſt begonne giuing vnto v among thine benefit ſuch authoritie eccleſiaſticall ſword amendment thing reformation eſtates may moſt propagation thy truth true religion finallie vnto v houſhold faith thing ſet apart may onelie ſeeke thee thy kingdome euer ſing praiſes vnto thy holie name theſe lord grace agreeable thy holie expedient v grant vnto thy ſeruants name ieſus chriſt lord holie ghoſt thanks honour glorie euer daughter amen chriſtian praiers diuine meditation generallie vſed time ſo eſpeciallie properlie vpon holie feaſts saint day throughout yeere fall order commonlie kept church england ireland firſt vpon principall feaſt day lord sauiour ieſus christ ſaie aduent sundaie memorial chriſt firſt comming fleſh chriſtmas daie memorial chriſt natiuitie birth new yéeres daie memorial chriſt circumciſion twelfe daie memorial chriſt apparition aſhwenſday 1 day lent memorial chriſt faſting firſt sundaie lent memorial chriſt temptation maundie thurſdaie memorial chriſt laſt supper good fridaie memorial chriſt paſſion eaſter daie memorial chriſt reſurrection aſcenſion daie memorial chriſt aſcenſion whitſundaie memorial chriſt sending holie ghoſt trinitie sundaie memorial chriſt bleſſed trinitie euerie sundaie holieday workingday memorial chriſt laſt comming iudgment 1 aduent sundaie comming christ flesh preface good cheere feare fearfull hart behold god commeth owne ſelfe take vengeance enimies deliuer hoſanna ſonne dauid daughter zion glad daughter ieruſalem reioice lo king commeth vnto thee euen righteous thy sauiour lowlie meeke ſimple riding vpon fole aſſe bringing recompenſe bleſſed commeth name lord zion hath god appeared perfect beautie hoſanna higheſt remember lord according thy fauor thou beareſt vnto thy people viſit thy ſaluation hoſanna shew thy way lord teach mee thy path hoſanna higheſt hoſanna praier time hand church calleth mind benefit ſonne god taking vpon fraile nature appeared world came viſit v great humilitie laſt daie reſurrection mankind come againe glorious maieſtie iudge quicke dead ſhew himſelfe puniſh enimies euerlaſting paine adorne church choſen people eternall glorie wherefore sonne god lord sauiour chriſt daie roiall pompe didſt enter holie citie ieruſalem publike teſtimonie thine appearing remooue impediment praie thee may hinder thy comming make plaine moſt eaſie waie thy ſelfe vnto v gather v beſeech thee companie prepared receiue thee king king ſet foorth thy glorie ſpirituall ſongs onelie daie world alſo continuallie beare palmes victorie thee ſpred garment waie ioie thy comming aſſiſt v greatlie ſeparated damned crue diuels wicked perſons wee may ſound ſet foorth thy truth perfect confeſſion righteouſneſſe day time life bee thou king world hereafter world come repleniſhing v againſt wicked enterpriſes thine enimies making v though babe littleones extoll magnifie thy name euer keepe v thy weake child depending vpon thee running vnto thy lap euen infant vnto parent make v followe thy word thy ſpirit doo ſound within v powre thy wiſedome v miſerable men woman pride power thine enimies may confounded grant gratefull mind may publiſh abroad thy glorious victorie according calling abilitie cheriſh thy miniſters venter life liuing maintenance thy truth moreouer bleſſe v thou bleſſed ſeed abraham vertue thy preſence number v among thy choſen haue name thee finallie giue v grace time mortall life ſo caſt awaie v work darknes put vpon v armour light laſt daie thy ſecond comming cloud may riſe thee life immortall ſo adorned glorie thou haſt receiued thine eternall father may perpetuallie praiſe extoll thy maieſtie heere world euermore world world come amen hoſanna thee ſonne god higheſt hoſanna 2 chriſtmas daie natiuitie birth christ sauiour preface child borne vnto v ſonne giuen vnto v glorie god high unto v borne daie citie dauid sauiour chriſt lord halleluiah lord ſent word vnto iacob ſame come iſrael euerlaſting prince peace halleluiah mercie truth met togither righteouſneſſe peace haue kiſſed truth ſhall flouriſh earth righteouſneſſe hath looked downe heauen vpon v ſpeake peace vnto people gladneſſe saint halleluiah fruit thy bodie ſet vpon thy throne zion ſhall make horne dauid flouriſh halleluiah sunne commeth foorth tabernacle heauens bridegroome chamber reioiceth giant run courſe halleluiah ſhall giue angel charge ouer thee keepe thee thy way ſhall beare thee hand thou hurt thy foot againſt ſtone halleluiah thou art fairer child men full grace thy lip bicauſe god hath bleſſed thee euer yea god euen thine owne god hath annointed thee oile gladneſſe aboue thy fellowes halleluiah therefore daie thy power ſhall people offer freewill offering holie worſhip bicauſe dew thy birth wombe morning halleluiah glorie vnto god high earth peace good towards men halleluiah halleluiah halleluiah praier ioifull time wherein saincts heauen earth doo magnifie praiſe almightie god incarnation onlie begotten sonne sauiour ieſus chriſt daie borne pure uirgin marie alſo holie angel lord celebrate moſt heauenlie ſong doubt bleſſed companie elect departed world enioieng comfortable ſight god repleniſhed eternall wiſedome light righteouſneſſe yeeld moſt humble thanks vnto sonne god sauiour redeemer incomprehenſible goodneſſe declared vnto mankind order redemption infinite benefit ſaluation taking fraile nature miſerable fleſh ſubiect vnto calamity deſtruction vpon carieng ſame v therewith vnto eternall life therefore liuing vaile wretchedneſſe lift vp head vnto thee notable silo art fruit uirgin ſeparate ſelues deteſtable damned crue vnpure ſpirits men powring blaſphemous outcry againſt thy truth glorie hart praie thee regenerate make v thy child adoption grace dailie renew v thy holie ſpirit glorifie thee ſelues nothing fleſh corruption borne fleſh become thy child except begotten borne againe new birth holie ghoſt therfore beſeech thee renew v ſay dailie thy mightie power aboue borne ſpirit hart hand deed deuiſes whatſoeuer v may ſpirituall thou art ioine v ſocietie thine holie angel ſing glorie thee high make v member congregation knit vnto thee indiſſoluble bond euerlaſting peace gratefull mind record celebrate thy benefit thanke thee ſauing mankind eternall damnation making attonement betweene thy father v thine incarnation ſo expedient according order iuſtice puniſhment guiltleſſe man ſhould quit mankind guiltie ſufficient ſatiſfaction might made required would mediatour ſhould god god ſaie abide intollerable burthen god diſpleaſure vanquiſh death reſtore vnto man life ſaluation enter moſt holie place eternall prieſt god vnderſtand ſecret counſell father priuie vnto cogitation hart heare grones men king flocke defending ſame againſt power ſathan member finallie god place church raiſed death eternall kingdome moſt glorious father foraſmuch nature man able bring theſe thing paſſe thanke thee ſauiour word expreſſe image interpretor father vouchſafing take office mediatour betweene god v begin v moſt humblie beſeech thee ſo great benefit weake fowle filthie thou waſt brought miſerable world borne weake infant pinching time yeare ſwadled wretched band endued rag miſerable nature laid manger among brutiſh kind notwithſtanding verie wiſedome thine eternall father let thy wiſdome appeare v miſerable men womē wofull darkeneſſe among blacke cloud doting age amongſt theſe trouble deſtructions commonweales kindle v ſparks wiſedome ſhall perfect life come ioine v felowſhip thy saincts grant hart ioifullie may aſcribe glorie fame honor vnto thee true god art wiſe righteous almightie pure liberall mercifull according rule deſcribed thy commandements didſt ſend thy sonne bring v glorie whereof depriued reſtore v againe firſt integritie loſt ſinne sonne god confirme thou ſeale theſe thing hart thy holie ſpirit powred vpō v may worke within v vnfeigned righteouſneſſe ſame thy ſpirit ſhining nature thou tookeſt vpon thee may committed thee vpholden quickened brought thee vnto eternall life league made betweene god v may eternallie confirmed loued beloued eternall father may loue v loue wherewith loueth thee ſubſtantiall image himſelfe suppreſſe diuell breake woonderfull profitable peace ſuffer v hanging thy necke running thine armes ſeeking thy fauour plucked thy hand keepe v beſeech thy lap louing ſhepheard cheriſheth beareth tender lamb foraſmuch firſt tidings thy natiuitie brought angel lord vnto ſhepheards grant ſhepheards ſoules miniſters teacher may faithfullie teſtifie thy benefit vnto mankind publiſh abroad ſee knowe ſpreading foorth thy fame glorifieng god peace hath eternallie concluded v finallie may bring thy ſheepe thy ſtall congregation faithfull open v thy ſwadling clout thy word life may crie within v thereby may feele ſenſe thy moſt ſweet promiſes thine eternall father hath vttered thee bleſſed put truſt furthermore petition thou wilt bleſſe v countrie commonweales increaſe among v dailie ye number faithfull proſper courſe goſpell ſuffer light thereof malice sathan extinguiſhed likewiſe vphold thoſe kingdom miniſter releefe vnto thy church repell border thy ſeruants rabblement turk infidel threaten decaie thy church deſtruction kingdom bleſſe labour hand keepe v contagious diſeaſes laſt make v veſſels mercie profitable inſtruments thy church commonweale amen glorie god high thus almightie god moſt mercifull father according propheſies ſpoken long haſt giuen v thine sonne conceiued holie ghoſt borne bleſſed virgin thy nature might holie true emanuel sauior sanctifier thoſe truſt touch hart thy holie ſpirit conſidering ſo great loue thine abaſe thy sonne take vpon forme ſeruant make v ſonnes heires thee ſoules may magnifie thee lord sauiour bleſſe thee lord god iſrael thus viſiting redeeming thy people grant v alſo fruit thy mercie holineſſe vncleanneſſe may done awaie corrupt nature ſanctified holie birth natiuitie putting truſt may deliuered ſins enimies attaine fruit infinite loue goodneſſe euen ſerue holineſſe righteouſneſſe day life ſame thy deere ſonne lord ieſus chriſt thee holie ghoſt praiſe honour glorie euer euer amen glorie god high another meditation maruellous incarnation word christ whoſe meanes pleaſed god helpe mankind fallen behold almightie god viewer ſearcher mine hart like hart beleeue counted righteouſneſſe vnto ſo mouth doo confeſſe thee ſaluation ſort maner thou didſt vouchſafe end world ſuccour aid mankind thou deed onelie god father art read anie time anie place ſent thy sonne apoſtle ſaith time fulfilled god ſent sonne ſaith ſent doth ſufficientlie declare ſent came world thy sonne god gentle kind louer mankind take vpon ſeed abraham angel ſo taking man nature angel vouchſafe humble himſelfe borne verie perfect man bleſſed marie pure virgin ſo made like vnto v thing ſinne onlie excepted verie lambe without ſpot tooke awaie ſinnes world appeare ſhew himſelfe ſimilitude fleſh ſubiect ſinne might condemne ſinne ſinne wee might made righteouſneſſe chiefe euangeliſts doth ſaie world world made thither trulie ſent humanitie alwaies alwaie hath beene diuinitie ſending embaſſage beleeue hart confeſſe mouth conſent worke whole trinitie beleeue alſo manhood nature infancie trobled creeping ſcrallings wrapt cloth maner child vexed youth labour trouble beleeue ſaie godhead ſent take vpon mine humanitie nature intent sonne god made man might cure mine infirmitie redeeme ſinnes ſinfull man therefore doo bleſſe thy name euerlaſtinglie glorifie ſame mine hart almightie mercifull lord vnſpeakable maruellous coniunction godhead manhood together vnitie perſon ſort one ſhould god man one ſame god man man god neuertheleſſe although thy maruellous word made fleſh yet neither nature changed ſubſtance myſterie trinitie fourth perſon added ſubſtance word god man vnited knit togither confuſed mixt thing taken v ſhould turned god neuer time fleſh manhood ſhould ſame beene euer without anie beginning godhead oh maruellous myſterie oh vnſpeakeable fellowſhip oh maruellous meekneſſe heauenlie mercifulneſſe euer woorthie marueling euer loued vile ſeruants behold made ſonnes god yea heires god togither chriſt whence came goodneſſe brought v ſtate require thee moſt mercifull father thine ineſtimable pitie goodneſſe charitie make v woorthie theſe manie great promiſes ſame thy ſonne lord ieſu chriſt send foorth thy ſtrength god eſtabliſh thing thou haſt wrought v make perfect thou haſt begun may able come vnto fulneſſe perfectneſſe thy pitie make v holie ghoſt vnderſtand thy ſonne deſire due honour alwaie worſhip great myſterie thy pitie chriſt bleſſed natiuitie ſo manifeſt fleſh thou haſt giuen v thine onelie begotten sonne meane take nature vpon daie borne pure virgin ſo wee regenerate made thy child adoption grace may dailie renewed thy holie ſpirit glorifie thee birth ſame thy deere sonne ſouereigne lord ſweet sauiour ieſus thee holie ghoſt immortall praiſe thanksgiuing euer amen meditation concerning true knowledge christes incarnation knowledge truth firſt knowe thy ſelfe endeuour thou oughteſt amend ought amended ſecondlie knowe loue thy maker creator whole happines chriſtian man woman see vnſpeakable gratious goodneſſe entire loue god towards v hath created v nothing giuen v haue ala foraſmuch haue loued gift giuer creature creator therefore fallen diuels ſnare become bondſlaues neuertheles god moued compaſſion ſent moſt deere onlie sonne redeeme v ſlaues holie ſpirit make v ſonnes daughter againe hath giuen sonne ſaie euen beſt beloued child price ranſome holie ghoſt aſſurance loue ſhort reſerueth himſelfe whole v heritage adoption ſo almightie god according exceeding gratiouſneſſe mercie hath verie loue good mankind beſtowed onlie benefit alſo himſelfe vpon recouer againe ſo much himſelfe intent man might bee borne god god ſaie firſt borne ſo hardharted bee ſoftened tender loue god thus preuenting wretched man ſo great hartie vnſpeakable good vouchſafed become man man ſake yea anie find hart hate man woman whoſe nature likeneſſe ſhe ſo plainelie ſeeth manhood god doubtles ſhe hateth hencefoorth man woman hateth god ſo looſeth hir labour whatſoeuer taken vnder pretence chriſtianitie god ſaid became man man ſake might redeemer well creator man might ranſomed owne good one man woman might loue another hartilie god ſaie appeared ſhape man end bodie ſoule might made bleſſed renewing eie mind godhead eie bodie manhood ſo whether man went might find food laid vp ſtore humane nature moſt iniurious therefore man woman god diuinitie ſo hating brother ſiſters owne fleſh contemne chriſt offend humanitie thanksgiuing ilift vp hart vnto thee god verie meet right bounden dutie ſhould time place giue thanks vnto thee lord holie father almightie euerlaſting god becauſe thou didſt giue ieſus chriſt thine onlie sonne borne daie mankind operation holie ghoſt made verie man ſubſtance bleſſed uirgin marie mother without ſpot ſinne make v cleane ſinne therefore angel archangel holie companie saincts uirgins heauen laud magnifie thy glorious name euermore praiſing thee ſaieng holie holie holie lord god hoſtes heauen earth full thy glorie glorie thee lord moſt high amen 3 newyeares daie christ circumciſion flesh preface circumciſe foreſkin hart ſtiffenecked deuter 18 ye circumciſed lord ſaie cut awaie foreſkin hart euill affection ye inhabitant iuda ieruſalem iere 4 circumciſion hart conſiſteth ſpirit letter true circumciſion whoſe praiſe men god rom 4 yea circumciſion worſhip god ſpirit reioice chriſt ieſus haue confidence fleſh philip 3 circumciſion verelie auaileth thou keepe lawe thou breaker ordinance lawe thy circumciſion made vncircumciſion c rom 2 oh way made ſo direct might keepe thy ſtatutes ſo ſhall confounded order ſteps thy word ſo ſhall wickedneſſe haue dominion ouer keepe thy ceremony forſake vtterlie halleluiah praier lord ieſus chriſt sonne liuing god thanke thee foraſmuch thy decree concerning redemption mankind beginning thou haſt beene preſent thy church outwardlie ſpeaking vnto hir thy miniſters inwardlie kindling thy light righteouſneſſe hart faithfull thou haſt ratified thy promiſes outward ſignes ceremony whereby euerie man may applie benefit vnto himſelfe thy burnt offering ſacrifices teſtifie thee afterwards ſhould ſlaine flame fire heauen ſet fire offering witneſſe thy preſence manie ſhould behold thy benefit true faith thou wouldeſt quicken ſacrifice thine holie ſpirit inflameth true knowledge good motion within godlie life giuen thy meere mercie firſt parent knowe full well ſaid woman ſhall bring foorth becauſe mediator called ſeed woman withall promiſed ſubduer sathan knew ſhould god man ſame promiſe repeated vnto abraham father faithfull foraſmuch reſtraint made vnto certaine nation thou didſt adde new rite circumciſion whereby onelie poſteritie abraham diſcerned nation alſo teſtimonie admoniſhing ſeed come chriſt ſhould take weake fleſh vpon beare nature bring iewes gentils vnto eternall felicitie wherefore yeeld thee humble thanks foraſmuch hitherto thou haſt continued ſound thy perſon office notwithſtanding great raging thine enimies appearing length fleſh giuing thy ſelfe vnto v newyeares gift ineſtimable price made vnder lawe curſſe ſaue v wretch curſſe lawe reſtore v vnto innocencie loſt ſinne cauſe thy bleſſed vpon daie circumciſed fleſh firſt ſhead thy pretious bloud v vncircumciſed hart lip ſhew thou cameſt deede verie ſeed abraham waſt ſubiect lawe curſſe condemnation v corrupt nature thy holineſſe might ſanctified haue thee obedience anſwere ſame withall beſeech thee therefore grant v true circumciſion ſpirit hart member mortified worldlie carnall luſts may thing obeie thy bleſſed heere ſtaie ſelues put truſt thee thus haſt humbled thy ſelfe ſo lowe v may exalted thee hart praie thee ioine v holie companie wait thy redemption came doo reioice come performed ſacred hoſt angel giue glorie renowme vnto thee bringing thy peace paſſeth vnderſtanding vpon earth declaring ſo great kindneſſe good towards v giue thy ſelfe thereby euerlaſting ioie bliſſe newyeares gift worthie memoriall ineſtimable value owne euer euer speake hencefoorth hart thy louelie voice lighten lampe mind thy heauenlie knowledge confirme v thy bleſſed sacrament certaine token thine vndoubted regeneration quickning v oh take awaie curſſe wrath god damnation work fleſh diuell grant beſeech thee thy grace may dailie mortifie concupiſcence pleaſures thing world wealth rich glorie libertie fauour men meates drink apparell eaſe yea life ſelfe horror impatiencie greeuous thing may weakened accuſtome ſelfe denie eaſie pleaſant thing life euer become obedient readie chriſtian patience doo thy good thing hartilie willinglie ſerue thee doo whatſoeuer may pleaſe thee make ſaie effectuall power thy grace holie ſpirit working moſt miſerable wretch hate abhor flie ſubdue adulterie whoredome vncleanneſſe vnnaturall luſts euill concupiſcence inordinate deſires wantonnes tendernes delicatenes idlenes dronkennes gluttonie ſlothfulnes diſtruſt deſpaire ignorance weakenes wilfulnes idolatrie ſuperſtition hypocriſie hereſie error ſects variance ſtrife wrath enuie ſlanders lieng ſwearing curſſing vaineglorie pride couetouſnes theft deceit flatterie whatſoeuer elſe lord fighteth rebelleth againſt thy holie ſpirit ſtrengthen ſo thy might may onlie drawe theſe mine earthlie member horrible vice rehearſed vnder foot alſo fight continuallie againſt ſubdue ſo may turne beſt meet matter whereon may exerciſe faith powre foorth hartie praier giue thee moſt hartie thanks victorie finallie worke thy bleſſing fruit ſpirit righteouſnes peace loue ioie holie ghoſt longſuffering gentlenes goodnes faithfulnes meekenes temperance ſtrength patience ſuch like grant v remiſſion ſinnes righteouſnes life reſtore mind thy lawe begin ſuch new conformitie new yeare life conuerſation may perfect life come thou ſauiour thy power merit mind may perceiue thy father peace v thy death find thee dwelling within v eternall life happineſſe amen halleluiah 4 epiphanie twelfe daie apparition christ three king offering chriſt preface get thee vp beetimes bright daughter ieruſalem thy light commeth glorie lord riſen vpon thee lift vp thine eies looke round thee behold gentile ſhall come thy light king brightneſſe ſpringeth foorth vpon thee multitude camel dromedary bring rich gentile ſhall couer thee saba mada epha ſhall come bringing gold incenſe ſhewing foorth praiſe lord theſe gather themſelues come thee thy ſonnes ſhall come vnto thee farre thy daughter ſhall gather themſelues thee euerie ſide frō eaſt weſt iſles alſo ſhall wait ſpeciallie ſhips tharſis may bring thy ſonnes daughter farre ſiluer gold vnto name lord thy god vnto holie one iſrael hath glorified thee stranger ſhall build vp thy wals king ſhall doo thee ſeruice yea king prince hoſt gentils ſhall ſee ariſe worſhip thee haue made thee light gentile thou maiſt health vnto end world thou ſhalt ſuck milke gentils king breſts ſhall feed thee king ſaie ſhall thy nurſing father queenes ſhall thy nurſing mother thoſe ſhall come kneeling vnto thee haue vexed thee deſpiſe thee ſhall fall thy foot thee face flat vpon earth licke vp duſt thy foot yea euerie people kingdome ſerueth thee ſhall periſh deſtroied vtter deſtruction thou ſhalt knowe lord sauiour redeemer euen mightie one iacob whoſoeuer putteth truſt ſhall confounded dwell wildernes ſaie ſhall kneele king ſonne enimies ſhall licke duſt king tharſis iſles ſhall giue preſents king arabia saba ſhall bring gift king ſhall fall downe nation ſhall doo ſeruice ſhall liue vnto ſhall giuen gold arabia praier ſhall made euer vnto dailie ſhall praiſed lord declared ſaluation righteouſneſſe hath openlie ſhewed ſight heathen world ſhall worſhip thee god ſing thee praiſe thy name moſt high lord king earth may glad thereof yea multitude iſles may reioice bee glad thereof bring therefore vnto lord ye mightie bring preſents gift vnto lord ye kindred nation world come ſaie court praiſe ſpeake good name aſcribe vnto lord onelie ſtrength power kingdome glorie worſhip god ſaie ye god king iudges ruler earth worſhip holie worſhip giue honor due vnto name make praiſes glorious liues conuerſation hath exalted himſelfe exalted farre aboue god praiſe glorie aboue heauen earth halleluiah praier oeternall god father lord ieſus chriſt woonderfull maner reuealedſt thy ſelfe baptiſme chriſt ſtanding water iordan ſuch time thou diddeſt teſtifie thy ſonne holie ghoſt appeared likeneſſe dooue gouerne v thine holie ſpirit true faith may obeie thee kindle mind true knowledge thy benefit bring paſſe approching vnto thee praiers may diſcerne thee true god aboue feined god mind turne ſelues banke water companie thoſe godlie auditor beholder noble appearing made speake vnto v thy ſonne holie ghoſt turne v vnto true obedience thou broughteſt godlie auditor vnto ſight chriſt taking fleſh vpon became mediatour thou eternall father ſpakeſt cloud holie ghoſt appeared likenes dooue ſo bring paſſe life may depend vpon benefit thy ſoone coupled nature vnto make eternall couenant v cauſe heauens like maner opened vnto v may heare thy voice thy ſpirit reſt vpon v worke v beginning eternall life vntill thy viſible preſence ſhall hold thy diuinivntill heauens darklie cloud face face beeing made like thy ſonne thoſe chriſtian magician philoſophers perſia ſome remnant ſchoole daniel conduct leading ſtarre came farre ſee thee gaue notable teſtimonie birth chriſt ieſus sauiour ſo mainteine euermore thine owne glorie ſake ſome congregation may ſet foorth celebrate thy benefit grant luckie ſtarre light faith may riſe vnto v ſeeketh thee bethlem manger thy word reuealed miniſterie wander right waie neither ſeeke fained byway humane opinion ſeruice suffer lampe thy light extinguiſhed either darkenes hypocrite idolater rage tyrant wage mortall battell againſt thee grant endued new light thee true sunne righteouſneſſe may reioice whole hart acknowledge thee bee captaine wilt gouerne thy people truth equitie let light thy grace ſaie lighten darkenes conſcience mercifull ieſu true bright loadeſtar world thy ioifull apparition giue vnto v full knowledge thy ſelfe owne ſelues within may ſee thee inwardlie find thee may continuallie offer vnto thy holie maieſtie mirrh ſincere faith inward contrition frankincenſe deuout praier inuocation gold loue righteouſnes patience trouble ſo aſcribing vnto thee honour king ſeruice due vnto god may ſhew true liberalitie godlie vnto thee thy poore church beare ſufficient teſtimonie world thy kingdome diuinitie prieſthood humanitie croſſe death buriall take hold manifold benefit thereof outwardlie alſo may place office calling helpe mainteine thy miniſterie vttermoſt power grant thou thou hadſt reuealed manifeſted thy ſelfe vnto three wiſe men leading ſtarre cauſedſt returne another waie owne countrie ſo wee waie darkenes offence haue retired gone backe ſupernall countrie bleſſednes thou bright daieſtar world beeing guide may returne vnto ſame waie truth grace knowing thee faith depart life wee may bee brought kingdome thy diuinitie ſhall ſhine without miſts myſteries haue fruition thy glorious godhead woorſhip thee praiſe thee euer euer amen halleluiah 5 aſhwedneſdaie firſt daie lent chriſt fasting fortie day preface let bridegroome come forth chamber bride hir cloſet let ſinners weepe lord ſaie turne thou v good lord ſo ſhall turned fauorable lord fauorable thy people ſpare v rent hart garment turne thee faſting weeping praieng thou art mercifull god full compaſſion long ſuffering great pitie thou ſpareſt deſerue puniſhment thy wrath thinkeſt vpon mercie oh ſpare thy people good lord ſpare let thine heritage brought confuſion heare v lord thy mercie great multitude thy mercy looke vpon v haue mercie vpon v god haue mercie vpon v miſerable ſinners ¶ heere ſaie ſeuen penitentiall pſalmes following praiers contrition repentance thinke good praier lord god ieſus chriſt onlie redeemer tookeſt vpon thee ſinfull fleſh liuedſt therein life moſt holie righteouſnes example didſt power thy godhead diuine nature moſt reuerentlie obeie thing thine heauenlie father ſubduing fleſh great triumph glorie maieſtie power diuell world fleſh onlie thee ſpirit ſanctification might myraculouſlie appeere beare ſwaie fulneſſe ſight fleſh courſe life euer remaine power glorie verie god verie god kingdome god father beſeech thee moſt humblie lord ieſu hateſt nothing thou haſt made dooeſt forgiue ſinnes penitent haue compaſſion vpon v weakeneſſe infirmitie thou haſt ſafetie taken upon thee fleſh ſakes didſt faſt fortie day fortie night haſt diuerſlie thine owne perſon felt man fraile ſtate mortall nature inclinable without thy diuine power fall obedience thy heauenlie ſuggeſtions ſathan old enimie allurement thing earthlie vaine tranſitorie beſeech thee god grant vnto v thine holie ſpirit ſtrength thereof v proceeding thee may weakeneſſe haue power enimie may reſiſted world defied fleſh vanquiſhed ſpirit quickened whereby may moſt gladlie obeie thy godlie turne vnto thee heart vnfeigned repentance hartie contrition earneſt confeſſion alſo true faſting competent feeding faithfull praieng charitable dealing chaſt looking reuerent beholding godlie hearing fruitefull ſpeaking holie thinking free flattering void detraction ſlander lieng falſe accuſation blaſphemie outfacing idle talke filthie communication tread ſteadilie thing ſteps true holines thee thou haſt moſt gratiouſlie lead v taught v waie ſimplicitie outwardlie inwardlie bodie ſoule part member faſt lent euer may prophane earthlie hypocritiſh ſuperſtitious carnall view world holie heauenlie ſpirituall thee giue v grace ſaie ſo much abſteine meates ill manner fleſh filthie cogitation thou god wilt worſhipped ſpirit truth ſo ſpirituall faſt pleaſeth thee suffer v gratious god abuſe thy good creature immoderatelie hurt body ſoules temperatlie better ſerue thee ſoberlie take food ſo carefullie abſteine ſinne otherwiſe abſteine meate refraine pride couetouſnes concupiſcence lewdnes ſuch like vice ſhall hurt body hypocriticall abſtinence caſt awaie ſoules exceeding impietie aſſiſt v thy ſecret grace therefore beſeech thee vſe ſuch abſtinence fleſh ſubdued ſpirit may euer obeie thy godlie motion righteouſnes true holines reioicing peace conſcience obteining thee god mercie perfect remiſſion forgiuenes aboundance thy grace may ſhew foorth fruitfullie thy glorie day liues life ended reigne thee euer thy glorious kingdome holy folke doo reſt thy bleſſed natiuitie holie circumciſion faſting temptation croſſe death paſſion thou haſt alone ſo deerelie purchaſed v perpetuall praiſe thine eternall name amen haue ſinned haue ſinned haue mercie vpon 6 firſt sundaie lent christ temptation wilderneſſe moſt glorious conqueſt ouer sathan preface ſonne thou wilt come ſeruice god ſtand faſt righteouſneſſe feare prepare thy ſoule temptation tempted remember alwaie lord thy god lead thee fortie yeares wildernes humble thee prooue thee knowe thine hart whether thou wouldeſt keepe commandements humbled thee ſuffered thee hunger fed thee manna neither thou thy father knew make thee knowe man doth liue bread onlie euerie word proceedeth mouth lord doth man liue daie therefore heare voice harden hart prouocation daie temptation wilderneſſe father tempted prooued ſawe work fortie yeares long greeued generation ſaid people doo erre hart haue knowne way vnto whome ſware wrath ſhould enter reſt examine lord prooue trie reines hart thy louing kindnes euer mine eies walke thy truth haue ſinned haue mercie vpon praier cauſe thine appeering fleſh sonne god lord sauiour chriſt deſtroie work ſathan firſt parent diuell hatred thee thine eternall father encountred viſible forme ſoaked mind certaine ſuſpicions doubtings thy pricked deſire excellent nature themſelues creature moſt excellent tickled ſpurre pride ambition ſo ſubtiltie caried headlong himſelfe withdrawne thee bottomles pit eternall deſtruction thou incenſed againſt infinite vnſpeakable good thou beareſt mankind tookeſt v miſerable wretch inſatiable iawes mortall enimie thy fleſh length dreaded aſſaile thee captaine thou putteſt ſhamefull flight draueſt thee thine ſo anie time thy ſmall aſſiſtance may repell preuaile againſt fierce aſſalts temptation unto thee almightie god victorious captaine godlie groanes doo crie requiring thy mercifull hand made number thy celeſtiall ſouldiers parteners thy glorious victorie enioiers thy happines arme v thy heauenlie armour knowledge thy word ſpirituall conſolations whereby may bee able repell firie dart foule feend againſt thy church age hath enimie thine ſet himſelfe brought theſe engins ouerthrowe vſed againſt thine owne perſon ſuch time thou wenteſt thy baptiſme preaching knowing thy proſperitie would decaie yet god acknowledge thee meſſias troubled thee beeing wildernes without worldlie power aid wealth rich horrible cogitation vexe thy ſoule troubled thy hart greefe vnſpeakable time thy church lieth wilderneſſe poorelie miſerablie doth ſhe lie oppreſſed wrongfull iniuries mightie trouble laugheth thereat derideth saincts ſtanding vnder croſſe bid ſtones made bread contemneth miſerie caſteth teeth glorie wealth kingdome aſſiſt v theſe temptation may laie hold armour proofe behold noble anſwere thine man liueth bread onlie knowledge thee euerliuing father holie ghoſt true almightie god giuing v bread life ſo ordeining corporall thing fed ſuſteined life eternall father knoweſt need alone canſt giue reaſon manner thou wilt feed v thou dooeſt ſtarres without corporall thing giue vnto church thy wiſedome ſuch thing neceſſarie ſuſtentation life wherein ioies life eternall come doth begin albeit ſometimes lacke diuers thing although thine aduerſarie throweth ſtones v bread yet thy power ſtrengthen v faint thou art maker wee thy workemanſhip thy hand whole frame world liue bread alone owne induſtrie neither art thou tied fatall chaine ſecond cauſes thy decree thy doo breath thee liue moue haue beeing thy commandement take life thou biddeſt leaue world wherefore ſo pleaſe thee ſhall liue doo bird aire haue protection child mother wombe knoweth liueth albeit lieng great darkenes couered ſecret part receiueth nouriſhment maruellous manner mother length courſe nature commeth ſafe ſound world ſo notwithſtanding liuing palpable darkenes life wrapped miſeries world among packe thine enimies yet armed thy word promiſe doo receiue comfort thereby protected thee woonderfull ſort length truſt deliuered bodie ſinne come better life neuer ſhall haue end made liue alwaies world miſerie thou haſt prepared glorious life thy ſeruants ſweetnes whereof beginneth world thy word life eternall father thy sonne word ſpeaking v inwardlie outwardlie outwardlie miniſters vttereth thy boſome thy commandements inwardlie ſpeaketh ſoules raiſing vp godlie cogitation manner pleaſing thee ſo double life reſerued v wit corporall ſpirituall bread owne merit thy reuealed thy sonne furthermore forſomuch ſathan vſeth another kind weapon deſtruction godlie thy church enioieth quietnes peace ſtirring excellent good wit teacher armed publike authoritie vnto curioſitie ambition whereby enuie hatred vaine contention mooued famous men caſt themſelues pinacle temple hereſies doo ariſe humblie beſeech thee reſpect alſo becauſe hurtfull former ſubtiltie ſathan repreſſe thine enimie corrupteth thy word vſeth ſame confirmation damnable opinion quench flame ambition pride curioſitie leade v temptation neither ſuffer v tempt thee contend thee pride ſetting owne wiſedome ſubtiltie againſt thee ouerthrowe firſt parent suffer v forſake thy word neither permit fowle lieng ſpirit falſifie ſame v make v conſtantlie reſt vpon thy promiſe ſacred ſure anchor ſetting againſt motion curioſitie pride laſt remoue v horrible torment idolatrie world daie wrapped idle ſeruice yea vnwittinglie whole world full idol great diſhonor thy name fained god erected ſuperſtitious inuocations confirmed idolater ſwimme wealth rule roſt thy glorie defaced thy maieſtie blaſphemed diuell rageth reigneth giueth kingdomes diſpoſeth good world word true lieth ſhamefullie thou thou alone altereſt empire confirmeſt thy pleaſure order obſerued thou cauſeſt miſorder raiſed diuell ſhall puniſhed thee paine eternall wherefore haue mercie v god haue mercie v deliuer v thicke mud idolatrie make v lift vp eies vnto thee ſonne glorie abhorring feined ſeruice ceremony contrarie thy word wee may acknowledge ſerue ſanctifie thee true god father sonne holie ghoſt thy sonne dooeſt deliuer v power sathan make v heires thine euerlaſting kingdome alone knoweſt hart grones creature onlie wilt called vpon name thy sonne heare v onelie ſake wherefore vnto thee god iehoua doo ſpeake thee onelie thine aſſiſtance ſerue neuer giue thy glorie another take vp impudent theefe satan would ſteale awaie thine honour baniſh far thy church gard body ſoules gard thine holie angel may pitch tent v encounter sathan beſetteth v ſides deliuer v hand miſeries life laſt paſſing world carie ſoules vnto ſocietie thy saint life eternall amen haue ſinned haue ſinned haue mercie vpon diuel manifold temptation wanted tempter thou wert cauſe wanting wanted time place thou wert cauſe wanted tempter preſent wanted neither place time thou holdeſt backe ſhould conſent tempter came full darkneſſe thou didſt harden might deſpiſe tempter came armed ſtronglie intent ſhould ouercome thou didſt reſtraine ſtrengthen tempter came tranſformed angel light intent ſhould deceiue thou diddeſt rebuke intent ſhould knowe thou diddeſt inlighten great red dragon old ſerpent called diuell sathan hath ſeuen head ten horn thou haſt created take pleaſure huge broad ſea wherein creepe liuing wight innumerable beaſts great ſmall ſaie diuers ſorts fiend practiſe nothing elſe daie night go ſeeking may deuoure except thou reſcue old dragon bred paradiſe pleaſure draweth downe third part ſtarres heauen taile caſts ground venem poiſoneth water earth manie men drinke may die triumpheth vpon gold mire opinion iordan ſhall runne mouth made ſuch mould feareth man ſhall ſaue v chap ſhall plucke v mouth ſauing thou lord haſt broken head great dragon helpe v lord ſpread thy wing ouer v lord may flie vnder face dragon purſueth v fence thou v horne thy ſheeld continuall endeuour onelie deſire deuoure ſoules thou haſt created therefore crie vnto thee god deliuer v dailie aduerſarie whether ſleepe wake whether eate drinke whether wee dooing anie thing elſe preſſeth vpon v kind meanes aſſaulting v daie night traines policy ſhooting venemous arrowes v ſometime openlie ſomtime priuilie ſlea ſoules yet moſt lewdlie ouerſeene lord whereas ſee dragon continuallie readines deuoure v open mouth neuertheleſſe doo ſleepe riot owne ſlothfulneſſe though danger deſireth nothing elſe deſtroie v enimie intent kill v watcheth continuallie neuer ſleepeth yet wake ſleepe ſaue ſelues behold hath pitched infinite ſnares foot filled way ſundrie trap catch ſoules eſcape hath laid ſnares v rich hath laid ſnares pouerty hath laid ſnares meate drinke pleaſures ſleepe waking hath ſet ſnares v word work life lord deliuer v net fowler hard word may giue praiſe thee ſaieng bleſſed lord hath giuen v vp torne teeth ſoule deliuered ſparowe net fowler net broken eſcaped againſt temptation sathan praie thus lord ieſu chriſt onlie ſtaie fence mortall ſtate onlie hope onlie ſaluation glorie triumph fleſh thou hadſt cauſe taken vpon thee didſt ſuffer thy ſelfe tempted sathan onlie alone men diddeſt vtterlie ouercome vanquiſh ſinne death world diuell kingdome hell whatſoeuer thou haſt ſo ouercommed behalfe thou haſt ouercommed neither hath thy haue anie thy ſeruants keepe battell fight anie foreſaid euils purpoſe reward v crowne glorie intent thou mighteſt likewiſe ouercome ſathan thy member thou haſt afore done thine owne perſon giue thou beſeech thee vnto v thy ſouldiers lion moſt victorious tribe iuda ſtrength againſt roring lion continuallie wandereth fro ſeeking whome may deuour thou ſame serpent true giuer health life nailed high vpon tree giue vnto thy little ſeelie one wilineſſe againſt deceiptfull awaitings moſt ſubtil ſerpent thou lambe white ſnowe vanquiſher ſathans tyrannie giue v thy little ſheepe ſtrength vertue thy ſpirit owne ſelues weake feeble thee ſtrong valiant wee may withſtand ouercome aſſaults diuell ſo ghoſtlie enimie may glorie ouer v conquerours thee may giue thanks thy mercie neuer leaueſt deſtitute put truſt thee liueſt reigneſt god euermore world without end amen 7 thurſedaie next eaſter commonlie called maundie thurſedaie chriſt laſt feaſt inſtitution sacrament supper great humilitie waſhing diſciples foot afterward preface saith wiſedome haue killed victual drawne wine prepared table come vnto ye poore ſpirit emptie hungred come ye fat rich alſo vpon earth go aſtraie faint thirſt come ſaie freends eate meate woorthilie worſhip drinke wine purelie glorifie make ye merrie table holilie praiſe welbeloued ſatiſfie mouth good thing fill hungrie ſoule ſpirituall deinties yea fleſh meate deed bloud drinke deed haue prouided people eateth euen ſhall liue happie bleſſed therefore called lamb ſupper ſhall eate manna euen angel food kingdome heauen lord bid vnto feaſt grant may ſup thee thou lord waſh foot onlie hand head alſo altogither vncleane thou waſh ſhall remaine filthie ſtill waſh therefore throughlie wickednes cleanſe ſecret fault purge preſumptuous ſinnes haue ſinned haue offended oh forgiue haue mercie praier bleſſed sauiour deere redeemer ieſu chriſt holie myſterie thy laſt supper thine apoſtles didſt deliuer thy bleſſed bodie bloud vnder forme bread wine ordeinedſt thy bodie broken thy bloud ſhead v ſo ſhould thankefullie celebrate keepe ſolemne memorie thy death till thou come grant v beſeech thee euer ſtedfaſtlie beleeue kindlie acknowledge thine infinite almightie power thine incomprehenſible loue towards v may alwaie worthilie receiue ſame bleſſed sacrament according thy holie ordinance thereby may obtaine increaſe goodnes vnitie ſpirit thee head thee thy ſpirit companie trulie thine thy ſpirituall myſticall bodie ſpirituall chriſtian brother ſiſters suffer v alſo beſeech thee fall anie ſlothfull careleſſe negligence whereby ſhould vnkindlie forget ſo ineſtimable benefit rather occaſions mind woorthilie prepared ſo holie action thankefullie renew memorie thy ſo infinite loue towards v receiue grace thereby offered vnto v ioining v continuallie neerer vnto thee till ioined without anie ſeparation vnto thee thee finallie thine owne bleſſed perſon thou haſt giuen example perfect loue whereby humbleneſſe meekeneſſe ſhould ſerue one another thou lord maiſter v didſt vouchſafe thy laſt supper waſh foot thy diſciples ſeruants grant v louing meeke ſpirit thine whereby may far diſdaine deſpiſing brother readie good thing dutifull ſeruiceable vnto thee thee thou haſt left v commandement may loue one another thou haſt loued v thereby knowne thy diſciples eſpeciallie chriſt may faithfull loue toward thee ſakes waſt content vnfaithfullie vnfriendlie betraied liued familiarlie thee thou mighteſt thereby aſſure v thine euerlaſting loue mercie thee therfore father holie ghoſt praiſe honour glorie euer amen haue ſinned haue ſinned haue mercie 8 good fridaie christ paſsion shamefull ſuffering ſinnes leuiti 23 27 c daie reconciliation make attonement lord god therefore ſhall holie conuocation vnto ſhall humble ſelues daie faſting praier offer ſacrifice made fire vnto lord whatſoeuer ſoule thus humbleth himſelfe daie euen ſhall cut deſtroied among people let lawe ordinance generation dwelling euer ſaith lord preface chriſt end world eternall ſpirit offered himſelfe lamb without ſpot god ſuffered ſinnes iuſt vniuſt died killed vpon altar croſſe perteining fleſh quickned ſpirit put awaie ſinne ſacrifice himſelfe wo ala euer
