equinoctiall ſpring time ſithence 1582 yeeres thy sonne angel gabriel ſignified marie virgin working holie ghoſt coupled humane nature himſelfe woonderfull vnſpeakable maner ſame daie 1549 yeeres ſithence thy sonne redeemer mankind weake bloudie fleſh hoong vpon croſſe true silo ſunne going betweene orion pleiades leeſeth light left life intollerable ſorowe torment old ſaieng hath beene time yeere lord sauiour chriſt returne cloud vanquiſh enimies exalt church choſen moſt gratiouſlie vnto new eternall kingdome sonne god ſtir v vp vnto conſideration thoſe ſo excellent myſteries worke thou ſo hart thy grace haue knowne thy holie incarnation meſſage angel ſo thy croſſe paſſion may brought vnto glorie thy reſurrection protection watch thine angel holie family chaſte virgin matron remained ſafe vnſpotted among infinite danger thy ſpirit truth ſealed could ſubdued errours phariſies saduces preſerue likewiſe laſt age world ſome holie aſſemblies ſuffer whole world thy cōming againe become blaſphemers ſhall wiſedome eternall life thou wilt open cauſes thou wouldeſt maner reſtore mankind god word could couple fleſh himſelfe aſſiſt v life may learne element true faith ioined holie ſpirit thy bodie thou tookeſt ſanctified bodie ſacred virgin thou carieſt liueſt ſame fleſh ſo make v branch tree life fruitfull vine repleniſh v like light life glorie thou sauiour thy merit vertue thine eternall father hath placed thee throne dauid thou maiſt head church working giuer good thing bleſſings promiſed dauid thou reigneſt life thy miniſterie gathering thy ſelfe eternall church repreſſing thine enimies thy mightie power thou ſitteſt exalted light incomprehenſible glorie right hand thy father making alwaies interceſſion v vntill thou bring thy church vnto thy ſelfe glorie generail reſurrection ſhine viſiblie euer sonne god bone thy bone fleſh thy fleſh thou broughteſt thy fleſh heauen neither ſame borne ſubſtance thy father truelie thou tookeſt thy fleſh ſeed abraham ſanctified wombe holie bleſſed virgin marie nature word couple himſelfe eternall couenant adorneth ſame ſurpaſſing glorie thou ſhe wedſt time thine humiliation therefore truth bleſſed marie beare god euen perſon two nature ſaie word fleſh vnited togither without anie confuſion euen ſoule bodie coupled v men wherefore come vnto thee mediator god man reſpecting thy promiſe liuelie faith beſeech thee haue mercie vpon v waſh v thy bloud make v member thy bodie nature man anie time hath hated owne fleſh make v ſticke vnto thee ſame ſpirit drawe thee iuice may ſtrengthen v eternall life amen 10 saint mark daie thou haſt made prince land therefore ſhall remember thy name lord one generation another eternall omnipotent euerliuing god father lord ieſus chriſt togither sonne holie ghoſt haſt onelie created whole frame world thing therein conteined alſo appointed thy sonne word mediator v men ſaluation beſeech thee moſt humblie bottome hart thou art good huſbandman ingraffe v thy sonne true vine make v branch bodie purge v horrible corruption nature giue v grace continue vine deliuered ſinne may bring foorth abundance fruit thy honour glorie chriſt thou art vine branch thy grace owne goodneſſe gratiouſlie behold v beſeech thee euermore may cleaue thee ala without thee doo good abide thou v may abide thee giue v thy vertue let thy light ſhine hart extinguiſhing fowle darkneſſe filthie fleſh quicken v bringing fruit may pleaſe thee profit thy church ſo ſhall eſcape vnquenchable fire depart thee caſt ſure obtaine whatſoeuer ſhall aſke thy mercifull hand true faith feare thy father glorified willingneſſe alſo gift obeie furthermore thou haſt inſtructed thy holie church heauenlie doctrine thine euangeliſt marke giue v grace likewiſe like child caried awaie euerie blaſt vaine doctrine firmelie eſtabliſhed truth thy holie goſpell thou holie ghoſt come thou inceſſantlie hart firſt inſtruct mind thine heauenlie eternall inſtructed confirme v feare thy maieſtie time depart path thy commandements continuance race commandements god ſpeciall argument loue god vnfeinedlie ſee ſecondlie may find ioie comfort trouble croſſes perſecutions whatſoeuer life may alwaies abide gouernement neither vnto ceremony tradition man haſt reprooued alſo phariſaicall error age hath ſhamefullie obſcured light thy goſpell ceremony preferred work morall lawe continue light among v grant may woorſhip thee work precept men obſeruation thy commandements woorſhipping thee ſpirit truth worke worke within v obedience anſwering thy lawes table retaining faith good conſcience may ſit thee vnrighteouſneſſe forgiuen whoſe ſinne couered bleſſed man vnto lord imputeth ſinne whoſe ſpirit guile held tongue bone conſumed awaie dailie complaining thy hand heauie vpon daie night moiſture like drought ſummer knowledge ſinne vnto thee mine vnrighteouſneſſe haue hid ſaid confeſſe ſinnes vnto lord ſo thou forgaueſt wickedneſſe ſinne ſhall euerie one godlie make praier vnto thee time thou maieſt found great waterfluds ſhall come nigh thou art place hide thou ſhalt preſerue trouble thou ſhalt compaſſe ſons deliuerance informe thee teach thee waie wherein thou ſhalt go guide thee mine eie ye like horſſe mule haue vnderſtanding whoſe mouthes muſt holden bit bridle leaſt fall vpon thee great plague remaine vngodlie ſo putteth truſt lord mercie embraceth euerie ſide glad ye righteous reioice lord ioifull yee true hart 3 domine ne infurore pſal 38 put rebuke lord thine anger neither chaſten thy heauie diſpleaſure thine arrowes ſticke faſt thy hand preſſeth ſore health fleſh becauſe thy diſpleaſure neither anie reſt bone reaſon ſinne wickedneſſes gone ouer head like ſore burthen heauie beare wound ſtinke corrupt fooliſhneſſe brought ſo great trouble miſerie go moorning daie long loines filled ſore diſeaſe whole part bodie feeble ſore ſmitten haue roared verie diſquietneſſe hart lord thou knoweſt deſire groaning hid thee hart panteth ſtrength hath failed ſight mine eies gone louers neighbour ſtand looking vpon trouble kinſmen ſtood far alſo ſought life laid ſnares went doo euill talked wickedneſſe imagined deceipt daie long like deafe man heard one dumbe dooth open mouth became euen man heareth whoſe mouth reproofes thee lord haue put truſt thou ſhalt anſwere lord god haue required euen mine enimies ſhould triumph ouer foote ſlipt reioiced greatlie ouer trulie ſet plague heauineſſe euer ſight confeſſe wickedneſſe ſorie ſinne mine enimies liue mightie hate wrongfullie manie number alſo reward euill good againſt becauſe followe thing good forſake lord god thou far haſte thee helpe lord god ſaluation 4 miſerere mei deus pſal 51 haue mercie vpon god thy great goodneſſe according vnto multitude thy mercy doo awaie mine offence waſh throughlie wickedneſſe cleanſe ſinne knowledge fault ſinne euer againſt thee onlie haue ſinned done euill thy ſight thou mighteſt iuſtified thy ſaiengs cleare thou art iudged behold ſhapen wickedneſſe ſinne hath mother conceiued lo thou requireſt truth inward part ſhalt make vnderſtand wiſedome ſecretlie thou ſhalt purge hyſope ſhall bee cleane thou ſhalt waſh ſhall whiter ſnowe thou ſhalt make heare ioie gladneſſe bone thou haſt broken may reioice turne thy face ſinnes put miſdeeds make cleane hart god renew right ſpirit within caſt awaie thy preſence take thy holie ſpirit giue comfort thy helpe againe ſtabliſh thy free ſpirit ſhall teach thy way vnto wicked ſinners ſhall conuerted vnto thee deliuer bloudgiltineſſe god thou art god health tongue ſhall ſing thy righteouſneſſe thou ſhalt open lip lord mouth ſhall ſhew thy praiſe thou deſireſt ſacrifice elſe would giue thee thou delighteſt burnt offering ſacrifice god troubled ſpirit broken contrite hart god ſhalt thou deſpiſe fauourable gratious sion build thou walles hieruſalem ſhalt thou pleaſed ſacrifice righteouſneſſe burnt offering oblation ſhall offer yong bullock vpon thine altar 5 domine exaudi pſal 102 heare praier lord let crieng come vnto thee hide thy face time trouble incline thine eares vnto call heare right ſoone day conſumed awaie like ſmoke bone burnt vp firebrand hart ſmitten downe withered like graſſe ſo forget eate bread voice groaning bone ſcarſe cleaue fleſh become like pellicane wilderneſſe like owle deſert haue watched euen sparowe ſitteth alone vpon houſe top mine enimies reuile daie long mad vpō ſworne togither againſt haue eaten aſhes bread mingled drinke weeping becauſe thine indignation wrath thou haſt taken vp caſt downe day gone like ſhadowe withered like graſſe thou lord ſhalt endure euer thy remembrance throughout generation thou ſhalt ariſe haue mercie vpon sion time thou haue mercie vpon hir yea time come thy ſeruants thinke vpon hir ſtones pitieth ſee hir duſt heathen ſhall feare thy name lord king earth thy maieſtie lord ſhall build vp sion glorie ſhall appeare turneth vnto praier poore deſtitute deſpiſeth deſire ſhall written thoſe come people ſhall borne ſhall praiſe lord hath looked downe sanctuarie heauen lord behold earth might heare mourning ſuch bee captiuitie deliuer child appointed vnto death may declare name lord sion woorſhip hieruſalem people gathered togither kingdomes alſo ſerue lord brought downe ſtrength iournie ſhortened day ſaid god take awaie midſt mine age thy yeares endure thoroughout generation thou lord beginning haſt laid foundation earth heauens worke thy hand ſhall periſh thou ſhalt endure ſhall waxe old doth garment veſture ſhalt thou change ſhall changed thou art ſame thy yeares ſhall faile child thy ſeruants ſhall continue ſeed ſhall ſtand faſt thy ſight 6 de profundis pſal 130 deepe haue called vnto thee lord lord heare voice oh let thine eares conſider well voice complaint thou lord wilt extreame marke done amiſſe oh lord may abide mercie thee therefore ſhalt thou feared looked lord ſoule doth wait word truſt ſoule flieth vnto thee lord morning watch ſaie morning watch iſraell truſt lord lord mercie plentious redemption ſhall redeeme iſraell ſinnes 7 domine exaudi pſal 143 heare praier lord conſider deſire hearken vnto thy truth righteouſneſſe ſake enter iudgement thy ſeruant thy ſight ſhall man liuing iuſtified enimie hath perſecuted ſoule hath ſmitten life downe ground hath laid darkeneſſe men haue beene long dead therefore ſpirit vexed within heart within deſolate yet doo remember time paſt muſe vpon thy work yea exerciſe ſelfe work thy hand ſtretch foorth hand vnto thee ſoule gaſpeth vnto thee thirſtie land heare lord ſoone ſpirit wareth faint hide thy face leaſt like vnto go downe pit let heare thy louing kindnes betimes morning thee truſt ſhew thou waie ſhould walke lift vp ſoule vnto thee deliuer lord mine enimies flee vnto thee hide teach doo thing pleaſeth thee thou art god let thy louing ſpirit leade foorth land righteouſneſſe quicken lord thy name ſake thy righteouſneſſe ſake bring ſoule trouble thy goodneſſe ſlaie mine enimies deſtroie vexe ſoule thy ſeruant glorie father sonne holie ghoſt beginning euer ſhall world without end amen heerevnto may adde occaſion time ſerue theſe ſelect notable pſalmes dauid large pſalter ſaie 5 7 13 17 22 25 31 35 42 43 55 56 57 69 71 77 86 88 pſalmes praiers compiled holie scripture verie neceſſarie vſed afflicted ſoule obteining remiſſion ſinnes mitigation miſeries lord lord god almightie great dreadfull thy word haſt made heauen earth ſea thing conteined nothing able reſiſt thy power thy mercie ouer thy work thing vnder thy dominion rule man beaſt liuing creature thou art mercifull whome thou wilt haſt compaſſion whome pleaſeth thee thy counſell ſhall ſtand euer whatſoeuer thou wilt ſhall done power dominion glorie thine art aboue thing thing v thou art father mercy god grace peace comfort wilt death ſinner delighteſt damnation ſoules lord god art rich mercie thine eſpeciall loue towards v euen thine enimies didſt ſend world thine onelie begotten sonne ieſus chriſt whoſoeuer beleeueth dulie ſhall periſh haue euerlaſting life haue mercie vpon haue mercie vpon according thy great mercie according multitude thy mercy put awaie mine offence god moſt holie waſh wickedneſſe make cleane mine vncleanneſſe acknowledge lord heinous ſinnes accuſe ſelfe mine vnrighteous deed confeſſe againſt ſelfe wickedneſſe mine hart hath beene euer vnfaithfull rebelling againſt thy precept haue beene vntrue froward child thee haue prouoked thee vanity holie father haue offended thy diuine maieſtie woorthie called thy child bicauſe prouoked thee anger multitude ſinnes haue exerciſed ſelfe thy righteous lawes haue turned backe thy way done euill thee haue done wickedlie vniuſtlie behaued ſelfe leauing thy commandements murmuring againſt thy correction haue turned ſelfe awaie kept promiſe made vnto thee haue walked euill waie mine owne thought fantaſies chooſing thing thou wouldeſt lord god almightie haue feared thee ſhewed due reuerence vnto thee haue beene diſobedient ſtubborne vnto thee common harlot without ſhame euen ſo without ſhame ſinnes behold ſpeake vnto thee yet ſinne haue left good gone backe thee haue put truſt hope thee maker haue ſought helpe ſafegard otherwiſe haue ploughed wickedneſſe reaped iniquitie eaten fruit lie bicauſe haue truſted mine owne waie haue caſt thy lawes behind backe regarding thy commandements leauing mine owne lewd cuſtoms haue giuen hart returne thy path would knowe thee haue fallen mine iniquitie neuer vnto daie turned trulie vnto thee hart woman breakech hir fidelitie promiſe vnto hir huſband euen ſo lord god haue broken promiſe vnto thee haue liued abhominablie haue remorſe repentance euill deed haue run ſinne ſinne following lewd deſires hart thou knoweſt thing lord haue prouoked thee diſpleaſure lewd inuentions none ſinnes hid thee hated thy diſcipline correction regarded thy word ſaiengs haue done penance malice haue increaſed much vanitie mine hart hath beene void truth hand haue wrought vnrighteouſneſſe tongue hath ſpoken ſinfullie haue laboured imagination mine hart find lie deceit truth hath beene way haue accuſtomed tongue ſpeake trifle vanity fulfilling fleſhlie deſires thought purpoſes inuentions haue beene contrarie thy whereby haue offended eies thy maieſtie thou haſt ſeene theſe thing lord haſt holden thy peace yet euill thy ſight diſpleaſed thee thine anger thou haſt caſt awaie art diuided manie day thou haſt giuen vp deſires hart doo thing ſeeming wo haue gone thee great miſerie haue led life ſinne wo haue forſaken thee doo deuiſes thy mind accompliſh thought haue proceeded thy ſpirit haue heaped vp ſinne vpon ſinne mine infamie reproch dailie mine eies ſhame dare ſhew face lord god forgetteſt thou mee keepeſt thou awaie ſo long thy mercie heare cauſe gratiouſlie although thou haſt beene diſpleaſed great thou art mercifull angrie alwaies beſeech thee caſt awaie contrite penitent perſon wretch abiect humblie calleth vpon thy name turne againe little toward lord god forgiue miſchieuous deed order according ſinnes puniſh wickedneſſe deſerueth shew foorth thy power againſt poore wretch perſecute hir ſo ſore without ſtrength turne thy face awaie praiers according thy promiſe take againe vnto thy fauour thine righteous father thine onlie deere sonne hath redeemed pretious bloud ſoule abhorreth mine old conuerſation thee art iudge men aſke mercie doo ſubmit ſelfe vnto thy mightie hand thine anger thou ſheweſt mercie time tribulation thou dooeſt forgiue ſinnes acknowledge ſinner beſeeching thee lord god almightie thy goodneſſe doo mee according thy great mercie confounded aſhamed lift vp mine eies vnto thee ſinnes aſcended vp vnto thy ſight againſt thee father againſt thee haue ſinned done euill thee thou ſeeſt mine iniquitie great trulie haue beene offender againſt thee euen cradle ſince ſucked mother breſts haue ceaſed doo euill behold begotten iniquitie mother brought world defiled ſinne corne euill ſeed ſowne mine hart much wickedneſſe hath ſproong thereof vnto daie thou knoweſt lord ſhake ſinnes offence carie ſtill infamie youth behold lord ſold vnder ſinne fleſh find good good would doo euill hate doo thought imagination mine hart haue beene ſet doo euill euer ſince yoong doo die ſinnes lord god ſeeing thy ſinner die returne ſin liue thou art good mercifull according thy great mercie ſaueſt vnwoorthie albeit man able beare puniſhment thou dooſt threaten againſt ſinners yet mercie thou haſt promiſed great vnſearchable thou haſt ſhewed mercie thouſand time heretofore make ſame glorious euen yet ſtill old father neceſſities cried vnto thee thou diddeſt deliuer put truſt thee confounded wit end wiſt doo onelie refuge lift vp eies thee thou didſt ſaue thy name ſake ſhew thy might ſtrength manie time prouoked thee iniquity ſtirred vp thy goodneſſe diſpleaſure yet thou ſaweſt tribulation lowlie ſubmiſſion vnto thee thou diddeſt remember thy promiſe hadſt pitie compaſſion vpon according multitude thy mercy haue mercie vpon lord god omnipotent haue mercie vpon miſerable wretched creature make whole beſeech thee thou haſt ſtriken ſinne iniquitie ſoule troubled greatlie long lord wilt thou looke towards long wilt thou reiect praier thus crieng vnto thee wilt thou heare time long wilt thou turne awaie thy face thine old mercy lord thou haſt ſtabliſhed thy truth wilt thou lord god ceaſe ſhew mercie wilt thou withdrawe thy goodneſſe diſpleaſure haſt thou caſt awaie euer thou wilt neuer hereafter pleaſed thine hand weakened may helpe thine eares ſtopped refuſe heare long ſhall mind troubled painfull heauie thought long ſhall ſorowe torment mine hart long ſhall mine enimie haue vpper hand looke towards lord god heare praier giue light mine eies haue ſlept long death ſinnes haue preuailed againſt turne againe lord turne againe deliuer ſoule ſaue thy great mercie ſake lo accepted time day health grace death ſhall remember thee hell ſhall laud praiſe thee liueth liueth ſhall praiſe thee ſhall make thy mercie knowne lord rebuke thine anger puniſh thy great diſpleaſure caſt thy dart laie thy heauie hand vpon haue borne thine anger long cup thy high diſpleaſure haue droonke verie deepe health fleſh feare thy diſpleaſure haue peace reſt behold ſinnes mine iniquity gone ouer mine head like heauie burden dailie preſſe downe wound ſoule doo feſter ſtinke euen mine owne follie wretch caſt awaie thy fauour preſence go moorning daie long ſoule full filthineſſe part mee whole ſound wherfore mine enimies doo perſecute greatnes paine maketh rore crie heart fainteth trembleth within ſtrength gone awaie lord thou knoweſt deſire thou ſeeſt neceſſitie forgiue ſinnes lord god almightie thine owne ſake put thy ſight hainous offence according thy goodneſſe thou haſt promiſed forgiueneſſe ſinnes doo pennance haue mercie lord glorie honour thy name longer diſpleaſed thou ſhalt ſurelie knowne iuſt true thy word ſhalt ouercome thou art iudged thy great grace ſhall knowne thou takeſt mercie haue whereof may glorie thy ſight dweller earth ſhall learne knowe thy goodneſſe thou ſhalt confer giue thy benefit v thy great name ſake euill way wicked deed uerelie lord god except thou ſhew vnto v thy manifold mercy world ſhall haue life dwell therein thou helpe v thy goodneſſe may haue offended raiſed vp ſinnes haue mercie good father haue mercie thy glorious name longer angrie take ſinner vnto thy mercie name thy holie sonne ieſu whome thou haſt ſent obteiner mercie ſinnes faith bloud behold holie father behold thy child whome thou haſt choſen behold thy welbeloued sonne whome thy ſoule delighteth vpon whome thou haſt put thy holie ſpirit ſent preach goſpell poore heale ſinnes ſorowfull contrite comfort mourne preach pardon priſoners ſight blind behold thy little one borne v behold thy sonne giuen v whome thou haſt ſpared giuen death v ſweet offering ſacrifice thee uerelie tooke vpon bodie infirmity bare paine made weake ſinnes wounded offence correction peace laid vpon ye ſtrokes ſuffered wound healed went aſtraie like ſheepe euerie one followeth owne waie thou lord putteſt iniquitie ſtriking offence thy people gaue bodie beaten cheekes ſtricken turned awaie face ſcorned loue mercie hath redeemed loſt bloud ſhead croſſe hath pacified thing heauen earth gaue himſelfe death made praiers offender looke mercifull father conſider thus ſuffer remember beſeech thee whome hath ſuffered innocent whome thou gaueſt death v euen ſinners ſhall iuſtified bloud much rather ſaued wrath yet enimies reconciled thee death thy sonne ſhall reconciled much rather ſaued life behold pure immaculate lambe taketh awaie ſinnes world whoſe pretious bloud redeemed iniquity looke vpon moſt meeke innocent like lambe led death moſt cruellie intreated opened mouth behold thine onlie sonne whome although thou begatteſt thine almightie power ſubſtance nature yet thou wouldeſt ſhould partaker mine infirmitie god nature thought rauine equall god made himſelfe lowe taking vpon ſhape ſeruant comming ſimilitude ſinfull fleſh condemned ſinne fleſh ſubmitting himſelfe vnto thee father euen death croſſe put handwriting againſt v conteined lawe written taking waie faſtned croſſe ſpoiled poteſtates power made ſhew openlie triumphed ouer owne perſon turne eies thy maieſtie lord god looke vpon worke thine ineffable goodneſſe behold thine owne ſweet sonne bodie drawne ſtretched foorth croſſe looke vpon part bodie crowne head vnto ſole foote paine ſhall found like vnto paine behold louing father bleſſed head thy deere sonne crowned ſharpe thornes bloud running downe vpon godlie viſage behold tender bodie ſcourged naked breſt ſtricken beaten bloudie ſide thruſt heart panteth ſinewes bee ſtretched foorth godlie eies dazell leeſe ſight princelie face wanne pale pleaſant tongue inflamed paine inward part waxe drie ſtarke armes blew wanne ſtiffe bone plucked one another beautifull leg feeble weake ſtreames bloud iſſuing bodie ranne downe apace vpon foot looke father vpon humilitie gentleneſſe thy deere sonne pitie infirmitie thy weake handieworke behold glorious father bodie thy deere sonne rent torne remember beſeech thee ſmall ſubſtance looke vpon paine god man releaſe miſerie man whome thou haſt made behold greeuous ſuffering redeemer forgiue ſinne hir redeemed keepe euill way teach thy holie ſpirit chooſe waie truth beſeech thee thou king holineſſe moſt holie redeemer chriſt thou bring againe right waie may vnited made one ſpirit abhorred vnited fleſh make go perfectlie thy path hate wicked way waſh hart malice clenſe ſecret ſinnes clenſe holie father bloud new teſtament thy welbeloued sonne hath loued v waſhed v bloud ſinnes hath redeemed v iniquitie purifie heart ſanctification thy ſpirit ſprinkling bloud thy sonne filthineſſe ſinne euill conſcience god almightie mercifull vnto ſinner thy glorious name ſake remember ſinnes longer thou art god gratious mercifull patientlie dooeſt ſuffer v wouldeſt man ſhould periſh yt men ſhould returne penance make lord god returne mine euill way wicked thought remember ſinnes abhominations youth according thy mercie mindfull mee thy goodneſſe ſake lord looke vpon grienous countenance man dare ſpeake enter iudgement thy ſeruant thou accuſe ſhall neuer quit thou lord marke ſinnes iniquitie ſhall fall thee certaine ſure thy ſight man liuing ſhall iuſtified ſeeing thou haſt found iniquitie euen thine angel much rather man abhomination filthineſſe dwelleth earthlie houſe bodie drinketh iniquitie water cleane filthineſſe corrupted trulie one though haue liued one daie earth though moneths may eaſilie numbered truth mortall man hath done wickedlie anie righteous earth doth good ſinneth yet becauſe mercie thy hand lord although thou dreadfull hope thee whome ſoule truſteth ſoule looketh thee becauſe mercie plentifull redemption thee knowe aſſuredlie thou wilt caſt awaie euer although thou caſt awaie ſinnes awhile yet thou wilt haue mercie vpon againe according multitude thy mercy thou lord art full pitie mercie wilt turne thy face awaie v returne thee thou art god full ſweetneſſe veritie patience diſpoſeſt thing mercie fountaines thy goodneſſe euer full flowe ouer thy grace neuer decaieth thy way mercie truth ſeeke thy couenant teſtimonies gentle louing father child ſo gentle louing art thou lord feare thee aboundance thy mercie thou dooeſt pardon infirmity thou knoweſt thine owne handieworke thou remembreſt thou ſeeſt fleſh ſtrength thou haſt forgotten world full vnrighteouſneſſe wickedneſſe wholie ſet bent euill yea neuertheleſſe thou art mercifull full grace like mercifull lord forbeareſt puniſh ſinners repent themſelues returne ſinnes haue mercie vpon lord god ſauiour glorie thy name deliuer forgiue ſinnes thy name ſake righteous father looke ſtraitelie vpon multitude ſinnes looke face ieſus thy holie sonne without ſinne bare ſinnes bodie tree croſſe turne awaie thy face ſinnes put mine iniquity make cleane hart mee god renew mee right ſpirit caſt awaie thy preſence take thine holie ſpirit giue againe comfort thy helpe ſtabliſh thy mightie ſpirit mollifie mine hart lord god may returne thy path haue wandered ouer long waie errour turne thee ſhall turned thou art maker claie worke thine hand turne thy face awaie go thy ſeruant thine anger mine helper forſake deſpiſe lord art god health amen another pſalme remiſſion ſinnes moſt mightie god angel men whoſe iudgements vnſearchable whoſe wiſedome profound deepe neare praiers thy ſeruants caſt awaie humble ſuits thy poore creature handie worke long ſhall liue ſpeake vnto thee hold peace ſo long breth bodie doo turne ſoule vnto thee ſet mine eies directlie vpon thee let thine anger turned awaie beſeech thee grant may find grace fauour thy ſight according greatneſſe thy mercie forgiue ſinnes plucke awaie mine heinous offence heale ſoule hath offended thee make free guilt tranſgreſſion acknowledge mine iniquitie ſorie ſinnes haue forſaken thy waie knowing thy commandements haue done thing contrarie haue broken couenant made thee haue deſpiſed keepe thy lawe uerelie haue ſinned againſt thee lord god blemiſh ſinne abideth ſtill euen vnto daie haue forſaken thee god maker gone awaie thee sauiour haue rebelled againſt thee like oxe winceth ſtriueth hee ſhould yoked haue hardened hart againſt thee haue lifted vp necke proudlie ſinne haue truſted lie deceit would knowledge thee haue followed lewdneſſe mine hart pride arrogancie haue beguiled fooliſh boldneſſe mine hart hath brought deſolate way mine owne counſels aduiſes haue brought theſe thing ſuch malice rebellion poſſeſſeth hart men ſoule put quietneſſe reſt thinke anie good thing yoke ſinnes waxed verie heauie lifted vp faſtened necke thou haſt ſpoken would heare thou haſt called would anſwere beleeued thy word would abide thy counſell regarded thine holie word gaue mind thy ſaiengs thou haſt ſtriken would knowe cauſe thereof thou haſt corrected would take thy diſcipline conſider mine hart thou wouldeſt forget ſinne malice mouth lip glorified thee mine hart farre thee hid ſinne adam intent haue mine iniquitie vnknowne aſked counſell thy mouth would followe thy lawe haue ſinned thine eies therefore ſoule made vnſtable forſooke thee art fountaine continuall ſpringing water intent dig ſelfe muddie pit haue water theſe thing returned thee haue praied vnto thee might leaue wicked way see lord behold vile made beautie ſoule periſhed gone ſo much dare anie wiſe behold looke vpon thee cauſe ſhould forſake thee vainlie followe vaine thing lord haue mercie vpon heare praiers thou art god sauiour beſides thee turne awaie thy heauie diſpleaſure deſtroie ſinnes youth humblie beſeech thee lord forgiue forgiue thine exceeding mercie lord god hoſts thou determined ſaue let orreſiſt thou ſtretch thine hand ſhall turne thee awaie thou maiſt doo potter doth pot behold thine hand claie amend lord mercie thine anger leaſt thou vtterlie conſume make vnderſtand knowe hurtfull deadlie thing forſake thee lord god caſt awaie feare thee man heale mee cure plague man deliuer mee thou lord woundeſt makeſt whole ſtrikeſt healeſt againe deſtruction commeth ſelfe helpe ſaluation ſtandeth onelie thee none like vnto thee thou art mightie great name thy ſtrength turne thee lord ſhall turned take awaie mee ſinfull hart thy lawe may bring foorth fruit remember lord thy goodneſſe ſake great loue thou beareſt towards lord god behold thou haſt made heauen earth thy great might nothing hard thee thou art puiſſant mightie whoſe name lord hoſts great maruellous thy counſell ſoone thou haſt ſpoken word thing done ſoone thou haſt commanded thing thy word returneth thee void without effect thou lord god ſhe weſt mercie vnto thou canſt doo thou makeſt though thou ſaweſt ſinnes men bicauſe ſhould doo penance amend liues thou loueſt althings hateſt nothing thou haſt made nothing thou madeſt haſt ordeined anie hatred thou ſpareſt tendereſt men thing thine thou loueſt ſoules men thou dooſt miniſter mercie equitie iuſtice earth therefore theſe vertues thou greatlie delighteſt trulie lord thou art righteous gratious notwithſtanding haue offended thee tranſgreſſing thy couenant treſpaſſing againſt thee lord thou haſt ſeene mine abhominations looke cauſe conſider vile wretched ſee behold great confuſion time reconciliation heare daie ſaluation haue mercie mercifull vnto haue mercie haue none helpe thee whoſe nothing reſiſt whenſoeuer thou dooſt purpoſe ſaue heare wretch making ſupplication vnto thee make truſt thy name deliuer thy power haue regard heauen lord looke downe thine holie habitation throne thy glorie deſtroie bicauſe mine iniquitie remember ſorowe paine ſuffer ſtill angrie lord forget ſinnes remember longer let praier aſcend vp vnto thee ſaie vnto ſoule behold come thee thy helth thy ſaluation amen another pſalme remiſſion ſinnes god eternall iuſt holie keepeſt couenant mercie loue thee keepe thy commandements looke haue mercie vpon haue treſpaſſed againſt thee done euil thy ſight shew foorth vpon tender affection thy mercie thy ſeruant may haue hart praie vnto thee humblie make praier thy face truſting mine owne righteouſneſſe thy great mercy vncleane filthie righteouſneſſe like foule bloudie clowt unto thee lord iuſtice mercie pitie vnto confuſion ſhame mine iniquity certainlie euen beginning haue vſed ſelfe proudlie againſt thee dooing wickedlie ceaſing lord thou haſt redeemed yet haue ceaſed offend thee mine hart hath beene ſtraight thy ſight thou haſt taught inſtructed ſtabliſhed power haue beene euill affected towards thee like deceitfull bowe pride preſumption accuſe face ouerthrowne mine owne wickedneſſe doo ſeeke thee lord beſeech thee may find thee thou art ſeparated haue greedilie followed filthineſſe yet accuſe mine owne ſinfull way thee lord vntill thou haue mercie vpon receiue againe thy fauour god forbid euer ſhould depart thee againe diligentlie ſeeke thy promiſes neuer hold peace keepe ſilence vntill thou haue eſtabliſhed couenant thou haſt made ordeined time paſt ſaie like iuſtice iuſt man ſhall deliuer ſaue time ſoeuer ſhall offend ſo wickedneſſe wicked man ſhall hurt time ſoeuer ſhall returne wickedneſſe hope lord god tarie thy pleaſure thou art good truſt thee ſoule ſeeketh thee thou keepeſt thy truth euermore word iſſue foorth thy mouth ſhall void none effect deſtroie good lord ſinnes reſerue eternall puniſhment open thine eies behold greatneſſe paine mine affliction mine iniquitie great thy ſight ſinnes haue brought trouble deſtroie vtterlie leaue ſinnes thou art god mercie verie gratious execute puniſhment vpon thou haddeſt purpoſed doo according thy name although default ſinnes manie lord thou art god thy name hath beene put vpon leaue deepeneſſe trouble thou haſt chaſtiſed reformed manie haſt ſtrengthned wearie hand thy word haue ſet vp ſtaggered thou haſt made ſtreight crooked knee wherefore ſeeke thee lord god haſt wrought great thing vnſearchable innumerable thou haſt taken vp poore duſt haſt exalted abiects thou dooeſt deliuer poore miſerie ſtraite bottomleſſe pit tribulation wide mouth anguiſh affliction reſt quietneſſe thou art gratious mercifull thou ſheweſt mercie yet come world thou art verie mercifull diligentlie obſerue keepe thy lawes thou dooeſt patientlie ſuffer ſinners giuing time place wherby may changed malice heare poore wretch making ſupplication vnto thee thee thy name haue put truſt affiance take thy ſeruant vnto thee make good let diſappointed looke come againe lord god ſaue ſoule deſtroie whome thou haſt redeemed thy great might power looke vpon hardneſſe hart vpon ſinnes like thou haſt manie time ſhewed mercie ſo mercifull forgiue heare lord pacified regard praier doo according thy great name lord looke haue helpe ſaluation thee dailie meditation exerciſe thy mercy great thy goodneſſe ineſtimable heare fauourablie withhold thy mercy longer waie thy iudgements looke thee ſoule deſireth magnifie thy name haue thee memorie incline hart doo thy commandements direct way euermore thy ſight let neuer heereafter go awaie thy way leaue deepeneſſe trouble turne thine eies awaie teach lord doo thoſe thing pleaſant thy ſight make perpetuall league couenant thou wilt put thy feare heart neuer ſwarue thee life withdrawe thy goodneſſe euer keepe thy promiſe fidelitie good vnto beneuolence fauour thou art mercifull thy diſpleaſure continueth euer remember fauour kindneſſe viſit thy ſaluation knowe lord god thou art gratious mercifull patient great mercifulneſſe thou art good mercifull thou keepeſt couenant mercie thy ſeruants walke thee whole heart none god thou regardeſt careſt thou haſt beene euer verie mercifull deliuering ſoule deepe hell let thy goodneſſe lord euer wealth reſteth onlie thee time tribulation call vpon thee lord thou art nigh vnto call vpon thy holie name succour god looke merilie vpon ſhew light thy countenance thee ſoule truſteth hart reioiceth let praier come vnto thy throne bow downe thine eare vnto crie heare penitent lord thou haſt hitherto patientlie ſuffered intent ſhould repent amend life god haue opened vnto thee life ſaue mee thy name ſake truſt thee care worldlie thing one thing onlie need deſire may find grace fauour thy ſight wherefore beſeech thee lord take awaie paine ſorrowe leaſtwiſe mitigate aſſwage either comfort counſell meanes ſoeuer ſhall bee ſeene good thee another pſalme complaint penitent ſinner ſore troubled ouercome ſinne lord god mercifull patient much mercifulneſſe truth thine aboundant charitie according thy great mercie haſt taken v power darkeneſſe haſt ſaued v fountaine regeneration new birth renewing holie ghoſt whome thou haſt ſhed vpon v aboundantlie ieſu chriſt ſauiour haue found grace fauour thy ſight ſuffer ſpeake word vnto thee diſpleaſed dooeſt thou euer forget leaueſt middeſt trouble euils become thy zeale thy ſtrength multitude thy tender affection thy mercy lord may fallen riſe vp againe may hath gone awaie thee returne thee againe shall ſorrowe euer endure shall wound incurable neuer healed commeth paſſe turne ſtill awaie thee ſinne dailie increaſeth ſelfe returne much giuen man direct owne way neither make perfect owne proceeding thy hand life euerie liuing thing ſpirit alſo euerie man thou ſheweſt thy mercie whome thou wilt thou art gratious whome thou fauoureſt thou dooeſt kill thou dooeſt quicken thou leadeſt downe hell gate bringeſt vp againe thine eies behold way euerie man thou ſearcheſt hart men place ſo ſecret darke wherein ſinners may hide themſelues thee anie man may ſo lurke hide himſelfe caues thou ſhalt ſee dooeſt fulfill heauen earth euerie part haſt thou caſt awaie thy preſence takeſt thine enimie haſt thou laid vpon head heauie weight ſinnes ſeeing man able beare thy diſpleaſure meaneth thou ſheweſt thy power againſt wretch deſtroieſt thou ſinnes youth haue ſinned ſhall doo thee ſinnes increaſed ſhall doo doo iuſtlie ſhall giue thee ſhalt thou receiue hand wickedneſſe ſhall hurt ſelfe righteouſneſſe ſhall profit life man temptation vpon earth haue ſinned men haue may doo shall anie man found cleane without ſinne thee ſhall anie man without default deed may mortall man pure ſinne thy ſight may borne woman righteous remember lord beſeech thee thou haſt made earth thou ſhalt bring againe duſt death day paſſe vaniſh awaie like ſmoke waſte dailie tarieng life flieth awaie winde conſidereth good latelie borne world ſhortlie ſhall taken awaie hence death neuer continue ſtill one ſtate day life ſhort thou haſt appointed end ſhall paſſe naked bare came mother wombe naked bare ſhall returne againe trulie men liuing vanitie haue pitie lord miſerie deſpiſe work thy hand though ſinne yet vnder thee wee knowe thy power ſtrength ſinne ſure thou regardeſt v ceaſe thine indignation lord turne caſt ſinnes behinde thy backe take awaie thy plague thy puniſhment hath made feeble faint thou chaſtiſeſt man ſinnes thou cauſeſt conſume pine awaie whatſoeuer delectable periſheth like vnto cloth eaten mothes would god one defend vntill thine anger turned awaie thou wouldeſt ſet time thou wouldeſt remember cleane caſt awaie thy preſence ſhall neuer heereafter ſee thy face againe behold haue opened griefes ſoule day ſorrowes haue taken flouds tribulation compaſſe round ſtreames thy furie run ouer crie vnto thee lord god thou heareſt aſke mercie thou reiecteſt praiers thruſteſt thou downe poore wretch thy preſence forſakeſt thou ſo long time takeſt thou away mine iniquitie putteſt thou awaie wickedneſſe mine hart ariſe tarie longer lord ariſe reiect euer haue remembrance beſeech thee thoroughlie tremble ſhake feare yet hold tongue crie ſtill vnto thee moorning heauie hart turne awaie ſtroke thy vengeance bring mind trouble reſt long continuer pilgrime ſtranger mortall men man thou ſhouldſt angrie mankind thou ſhouldeſt ſo heauie lord vnto v wilt thou bring ſorowe vpon ſorowe pant paine find reſt ſorowe greeueth ſhould eate ſudden ſighs ouerwhelme mine hart bone broken heare mine enimies raile vpon ſaie daie daie thy god turneſt thou thy face awaie theſe thing lord haſt thou regard trouble earneſtlie make praiers dailie thy ſight heauineſſe mine hart doo ſhew vnto thee ſpirit carefull troubled within deſperation hath entered mine hart thy pleaſure lord god caſt awaie thine owne handie worke deliuer ſoule corruption life euerlaſting darkneſſe auaileth euer borne thou caſt ſtraight damnation ſeeing dead ſhall praiſe thee anie go downe hell haue ſinned ſhall doo thee haſt thou put contrarie thee wearie mine owne ſelfe ſearcheſt thou ſinnes ſo narrowlie man take thine hand would ſaie righteous without ſinne thou mighteſt woorthilie condemne fire prepared diuell angel confeſſe ſinner doo humble mine hart thy ſight surelie anie man would ſtand thee iudgment ſhall able anſwere one word thouſand thing wherewith thou mighteſt charge maketh feare deed knowing thou ſpareſt offendeth looke vpon thy power mightie ſtrong art thou ſhall call iudgement ſhall defend matter ſpeake thee lord call crie thee god make mine humble ſuite turne awaie thine anger may knowe thou art mercifull vnto ſinnes deſerue ſtrength may endure end trouble ſoule may patientlie abide ſtrength ſtonie ſtrength fleſh made braſſe helpe ſelfe ſtrength flieth awaie although thou hide theſe thing thine hart yet knowe thou wilt remember length thou art true iuſt lord god thou dooeſt condemne vniuſtlie rewardeſt man according deſerts come vpon bicauſe haue forgotten thee vſed ſelfe trulie thy teſtament mine hart hath turned backward haue followed deſires fleſh thou haſt ſurelie knowne thing knoweſt ſecrets hart laie againſt lord ſins youth haue remembrance mine old iniuries done againſt thee dailie ſorowe ouercommeth ſadneſſe poſſeſſeth mine hart looke peace haue looke time health greefe continueth ſtill time thine anger paſt let mercie come yet vnhappie wo ala euer ſinned mine hart therefore mourneth ſad mirth ioie baniſhed waſted miſerablie confounded bicauſe haue forſaken caſt awaie thy lawe death hath aſcended vp windowes pearcing inward part mine hart dailie one muſe ſecretlie ſelfe another lowd voice crie complaine meane time life draweth neere pit ſhall giue place reſt griefes trouble forſake men get awaie ſhall giue water mine head fountaine teares mine eies may bewaile ſinnes night daie looke may ſaue deliuer wrath come haue truſt neither life death feare thy iudgement lord paine prepared wicked ſinners feare ſinne maketh carefull burden conſcience oppreſſeth ſore god tenderlie loueſt mankind art moſt rightfull iudge ſpare beſeech thee ſhew ſome fauour time forgiue feare put awaie dread depart hence ſhall returne againe ſinnes doo vexe trouble ſore ſo great none greater ala fall ala miſerie ala griefe plague ſtroke certainlie ſinne cauſe ſo take ſuffer verie deuout effectuall praier vnto chriſt mercie grace hartilie ſaid often vſed eſpeciallie ye faſt prepare ſelfe receiue communion lord ieſu chriſt sonne liuing god vpon croſſe thine hand ſpred abroad redemption mankind didſt drinke moſt bitter cup thy paſſion beſeech thee thou wouldeſt vouchſafe giue helpe daie night euer lo poore wretch come vnto thee art rich ſinner vnto thee art mercifull let mee returne home contemned deſpiſed nothing begin hungred let leaue faſting come vnto thee though famiſhed let go awaie vnfed although eate ſigh ſorowe yet ſorowe giue ſomewhat eate firſt good ieſu acknowledge thy maieſtie mine vnrighteouſneſſe towards thee behold lord conceiued ſinne borne ſame thou diddeſt waſh ſanctified afterward defiled ſelfe bigger greeuous ſinnes borne ſinne neceſſitie bicauſe could borne none otherwiſe afterward rolled ſelfe willinglie ſinnes neuertheleſſe thou lord mindfull thy pitie diddeſt take houſe carnall father tent vngodlie haſt inſpired put mind followe thee generation ſeeke thy face walke right path puritie abide continue among lillie virginitie chaſtitie ſit downe togither thee ſupper moſt ſcarſitie leaſt exceſſe vnkind wretch forgetting ſo manie great benefit entered thy ſeruice haue committed manie vnlawfull thing offend woonderfull vngratiouſlie dooing manie foule ſinne ſhould right haue amended mine euil life left ſinnes heaped ſinnes vpon ſinnes theſe euils wherewith thou didſt create thine owne ſimilitude likeneſſe haue diſhonoured thee lord haue ſpotted defiled ſelfe namelie idolatrie ſuperſtition pride vaineglorie couetouſneſſe manie euils foule vice wherewith mine vnluckie ſoule vexed puniſhed torne deſtroied behold lord mine vnrighteouſneſſe gone ouer mine head like ſore burden ouer heauie beare except thou whoſe propertie euer haue mercie forgiue doo laie vnder mee right hand thy maieſtie ſhall conſtrained miſerablie ſinke deepe drownd giue heed lord god behold bicauſe thou art holie looke mine enimie aſſaulteth ſaieng god hath forſaken perſecute catch bicauſe man deliuer thou lord long turne againe deliuer ſoule oh ſaue thy mercy ſake haue mercie vpon thy daughter thou haſt brought foorth ſmall ſorowe paine bee ſo intentiue vnto mine euilneſſe thou forget thine owne goodneſſe father hee deliuer child yea father correct child chaſten rod pitie therefore father lord although ſinner yet chooſe bee thy daughter bicauſe thou haſt made yea made againe mard ſinne repaire amend euermore lord firſt mended chaſtiſed thy child thy gentle ſcourge deliuer thy sonne mother forget child ſhe bare hir womb ſurelie although ſhe ſometime forgetfull yet thou father haſt promiſed forget v behold crie thou dooeſt heare vexed ſorowe thou comforteſt ſhall ſaie ſhall doo moſt wretched caitife deſolate ſo great comfort caſt trō ſight thine eies wo vnto great goodneſſe great miſchiefe fallen whither purpoſed go whither come labour attaine vnto euils haue obteined ſought good thing behold haue found trouble anguiſh care behold moſt miſerable caſe euen ſtate death damnation ieſus ieſus departed ſurelie better haue nothing yea bee without ieſu better liue liue without life thou lord ieſu thine old mercy wilt thou abſent thy ſelfe euer wilt thou bee angrie towards wretch euermore pacified beſeech thee haue mercie vpon pacified ſaie turne thy face awaie intent thou mighteſt redeeme didſt turne awaie thy face rebuked thee ſcorued thee ſpitted vpon thee confeſſe acknowledge haue ſinned conſcience deſerueth damnation penance able doo ſufficient make amends mine iniquitie ſure certaine thy mercie exceedeth offence man doo oh doo ſeech thee moſt pitifull lord write heinous ſinnes againſt thou ſhouldeſt enter iudgement thy ſeruant according multitude thy mercy haue mercie vpon croſſe blot mine iniquity depart hence ſhall ſeene world elſe wo vnto wretch daie iudgement commeth bookes conſciences ſhall laid wide open ſhall ſaid lo looke vpon woman hir work wicked ſhe abhominable ſhall doo ſaie lord god heauens haue offended ſhall reueale ſhew foorth mine iniquitie earth haue polluted ſhall ariſe vp teſtifie manifold miſdeeds againſt behold ſhall able ala giue neuer word anſwere ſtand thy preſence trembling quaking vtterlie confounded holding downe head ſhame condemned alſo teſtimonie mine owne giltie conſcience vnto eternall damnation ala wretch ſhall ſaie crie vnto thee lord god conſumed fretted holding peace ſhould ſpeake greefe would ceaſe hold peace ſhall moſt bitterlie vexed within go therefore ſoule moorne lament widowe hir huſband ſhe hir virginitie howle wretch crie weeping becauſe thy ſpouſe chriſt hath forſaken thee caitiffe crie alowd eares thy god ſaie god almightie let thine anger fall vpon deale ſinnes neither reward mine iniquity becauſe thou laie ſo much charge due ſinnes ſo much cannot receiue ſurelie lord power able ſuffer beare wherefore lord haue mercie vpon leaſt deſpaire deſpairing take hart ſomewhat comforted although haue committed ſo much thou maiſt condemne woorthilie yet thou haſt loſt wherewith thou waſt woont ſaue ſinners neither dooeſt thou reioice deſtruction loſſe die yea intent dead men might liue thou thy ſelfe didſt die thy death kill death ſinne reuiued againe liue thy death beſeech thee let die thou liueſt send downe thy hand power high deliuer hand mine enimies reioice ouer ſaie let v deuoure euer good ieſu needed miſtruſt thy mercie thine enimies didſt redeeme v thy bloud reconciled v vnto god behold therefore hid vnder ſhadowe thy mercie doo come vnto throne thy glorie requiring doo runne crieng knocking vntill thou take pitie vpon thou didſt call v pardon forgiueneſſe laboured pardon ſoone ſhall obtaine forgiueneſſe wee aſke doo remember moſt bountifull ieſu thy iuſtice towards ſinner thinke vpon thy liberalitie gentleneſſe toward thy creature doo remember thine anger toward giltie remember thy pitie mercie toward wretch forget proudlie prouoke mooue thee vnto wrath looke vpon wretch calleth vpon thee ieſus sauiour therefore good ieſu thine owne ſake ariſe helpe ſaie vnto ſoule thy health thy ſafegard thus preſume much verie bold thy goodneſſe lord becauſe thou dooeſt teach v aſke ſeeke knocke wherfore admoniſhed thy word doo aſke ſeeke knocke thou lord commandeſt v aſke make mee able receiue thou giueſt counſell ſeeke grant may finde thou teacheſt v knocke open knocke confirme vnſtable wauering reſtore loſt raiſe dead vouchſafe direct gouerne thy fauour ſenſes thought dooings hencefoorth may ſerue thee may liue toward thee may commit ſelfe vnto thee knowe lord thou haſt made owe debt vnto thee euen mine owne ſelfe becauſe thou haſt redeemed mee waſt made man ſake owe vnto thee ſelfe lo haue neither giue haue vnto thee without thee doo thou take drawe vnto thee may thine following louing thee like thine condition creation liueſt reigneſt one god bleſſed trinitie world without end amen psalter avgvstine compoſed euerie pſalme dauid verſe vſe mother lord god almightie king eternall glorie dooeſt acknowledge bleſſed man abhorreth waie ſinners doth meditate thy lawe daie night teach thou wretched ſinner faithfullie ſerue thee feare trembling heart ſeeing humilitie hart doo call vnto thee voice heare haue mercie vpon mee ſo harken vnto praier neither thou thy part rebuke thy wrath old enimie mankinde lieng wait part deuoure ſoule like lion teare peeces none helpe lord whoſe name excellent world turne thou mine enimie backe fall againe periſh thy preſence let intrap ſoule firie ſnares ſuffer brimſtone ſtormie tempeſts torment oppreſſion needie ſighings poore thou dooeſt ariſe behold heare lord god becauſe thou art counſell truſt poore make walke vprightlie worke righteouſneſſe thy fauourable kindneſſe may portion mine inheritance keepe apple thine eie hide vnder ſhadowe thy wing becauſe thou art ſtrength rocke refuge cleanſe frō ſecret fault keepe thy ſeruant preſumptuous ſinnes send helpe thy ſanctuarie giue mee mine hart deſire saue lion mouth lead path righteouſneſſe may aſcend thy mountaine ſtand thine holie place hauing innocent hand pure hart remember ſinnes youth rebellion gather ſoule ſinners neither giue vnto luſt mine aduerſaries ſo fauourablie harken thou vnto voice petition calling vpon glorie thine holie name thou doo heare haue mercie vpon ſo truſting thee let neuer confounded forgiue puniſhment ſinne let thy mercie lord vpon truſt thee deliuering feare ſaie vnto ſoule thy ſaluation becauſe truſt vnder ſhadowe thy wing giue mine hart deſire haſte thee helpe mee lord ſaluation lord let knowe mine end meaſure day let knowe long haue liue incline vnto heare crie bring lake miſerie mirie claie ſet foot vpon rocke order going deliuer time trouble may go thy glorious houſe thou art god ſtrength let ſteps go thy path may loue righteouſneſſe hate iniquitie thou mine hope ſtrength thou art great king ouer earth thou art god euer deliuer ſoule power hell hath receiued thee thou ſhalt appeare iudge v haue mercie vpon according multitude thy mercy take thine holie ſpirit moſt gratious god houre hide thy face ſinnes put awaie mine iniquity create cleane hart god renew right ſpirit within may appeare like greene oliue tree houſe god iacob reioice euerlaſtinglie glad iſrael saue god thy name thy power iudge mee hide thy ſelfe frō ſupplication mercifull vnto send thou heauen ſaue reproofe would ſwalowe vp breake teeth god mouth breake iawes yoong lion lord thou art defence mercifull god helpe thy right hand vnder couering thy wing let protected thou art render euerie man according work ſoule thirſteth thee hide conſpiracie wicked sith fleſh ſhall come vnto thee put backe thy mercie neither take thine holie ſpirit cauſe thy face ſhine vpon send good paſſage god ſaueſt v deepe ſwallowe vp pit ſhut hir mouth vpon thou mine helper deliuerer lord make tarieng sith thee lord doo truſt let neuer bee confounded thou ſhalt iudge people lo withdrawe themſelues thee ſhall periſh oh let oppreſſed returne aſhamed bicauſe thou art righteous iudge thou makeſt lowe thou exalteſt ſhall ſtand thy ſight thou art angrie thou art god dooeſt woonders thou nouriſhedſt thy people bread ye wilderneſſe didſt turne luſt ſo let thy grace refreſh hungrie ſoule make haſte let thy tender mercy preuent thou defender giue bread teares bitterneſſe troubled mind time tribulation grant withall honie rocke may taſte ſweetneſſe inward conſolation god iudgeſt betweene innocent ſinners alone art moſt high ouer ye earth haue mercie vpon giue grace glorie haſt ordeined lawe forgiue iniquitie mine hart couer ſinnes ſaue thou thy ſeruant truſteth thee god laieſt foundation thy church vpon holie mountaines incline thine eare vnto crie let thine hand therefore eſtabliſh turne vnto deſtruction deliuer ſnare hunter peſtilence plague deſtroieth noone daie planted thine houſe may flouriſh like palmetree growe like cedar libanon bringing fruit euen mine old age bicauſe holines becommeth thine houſe lord euer thou refuge god rocke mine hope thou lord art great god great king aboue god thou wilt iudge world righteouſneſſe thy people truth ſhall enioie light righteous ioie vpright hart let thy right hand thine holie arme preſerue mee thou ſitteſt vpon cherubims make mee come thy preſence ioifulneſſe may walke vprightneſſe mine hart midſt mine houſe let froward hart depart cauſe mine eies turned vnto faithfull may ſit walking perfect waie thy iudgement thou ſhalt cut worker wickedneſſe citie lord heare praier let crie come vnto thee hide thy face time trouble incline thine eares vnto pardon ſinnes redeeme ſoule deſtruction satiſfie longing good thing thou lookeſt vpon earth trembleth broughteſt foorth thy people ioie thy choſen gladneſſe make keepe iudgment worke righteouſneſſe time bring darkneſſe ſhadowe death prepared hart may ſing giue praiſe saue lord according thy mercie glorie saint aſſemblie congregation iuſt righteouſneſſe may endure euer mine horne exalted glorie thou raiſeſt needie duſt lifteſt vp poore doong making iudah thy ſanctification iſrael thy dominion may bleſſe thee lord hencefoorth euer ſhall walke lord land liuing breake thou bond confirme thy mercie towards call vpon thee trouble lord heare ſet large teach lord waie thy ſtatutes may liue keepe vnto end giue vnderſtanding ſearch thy lawe obſerue alſo mine whole hart haue gone aſtraie like loſt ſheepe ſeeke thy ſeruant deliuer ſoule preſerue going comming foot may ſtand court ieruſalem lift vp mine eies vnto thee dwelleſt heauens deliuer ſoule ſnare foulers leaſt put foorth mine hand vnto wickedneſſe fill mouth laughter tongue ioie repleniſh longing good thing thy beloued may find reſt bleſſe sion may ſee welth ieruſalem hauing eſcaped cord wickedneſſe let thine eares attend vnto voice praiers lord let mine hart hautie mine eies loftie giue grace thinke humblie vntill find place lord habitation mightie god iacob lord hath appointed bleſſing life euer lift vp mine hand thy ſanctuarie praiſe thee iudgeſt thy people art pacified towards thy ſeruants god god lord lord weeping worſhipping towards thine holie temple trie knowe marke conſider path leade thy waie euer deliuer lord euill man preſerue cruell man let praier directed thy ſight incenſe bring ſoule priſon may praiſe thy name heare praier lord thy righteouſneſſe enter iudgement thy ſeruant heare ſpeedilie lord leaſt ſpirit faile thou god art refuge deliuerer foraſmuch thou art great moſt woorthie praiſed thy greatneſſe incomprehenſible raiſe vp crooked looſe ſhackeled giue ſight blind thou dooeſt build vp ieruſalem thou haſt made barres thy gate ſtrong let coupled thy child within angel power kingdome heauen doo praiſe thee let triumphing gloriouſlie congregation saint ſounding cimbals lip praiſe magnifie thy name holie glorious reigneth euerlaſtinglie amen shuſhanna hir pſalter conteining verie deuout praiers remiſsion ſinnes auoiding kind ſinne leading godlie life almightie euerliuing god thou god al power whoſe eies thing naked bare lord thou great terrible god ſaie keepeſt couenant mercie loue thee doo thy commandements let thine eares bee open thou maiſt heare praiers thy ſeruant make thee time let aſcend vp thy preſence accepted thy ſight ieſus chriſts ſake haue mercie vpon thy poore creature worke thine hand haue ſinned done wickedlie haue offended thy maieſtie greeuouſlie haue gone backe departed thy precept iudgements haue followed thy ſeruants prophet ſpake vnto thy name haue daie daie prouoked thy iuſt wrath indignation againſt lord acknowledge confeſſe vnto thee manifold ſinnes wickedneſſe haue vnrighteouſlie moſt greeuouſlie committed againſt thee thought word deed youth vp vntill daie taught thy word grace hartilie ſorie doo vnfeinedlie repent purpoſing euermore aſſiſtance thy grace walke new life deſiring thee pretious bloudſhedding ieſus chriſt thy deere sonne lord haue mercie vpon forgiue thoſe mine offence according thy great mercie promiſe haſt ſaid time ſo euer ſinner dooth repent ſinne bottome hart put wickedneſſe remembrance lord remember therefore multitude miſdeeds beſeech thee according thy great mercy thinke vpon call remembrance chriſts ſake thy louing kindneſſe thy tender mercie hath euer beene old hide thy face caſt thy ſeruant thy diſpleaſure thy mercy ſake deliuer ſinnes make ſcorne vnto fooliſh turne awaie thy mercie let thy moſt louing kindneſſe truth alwaie preſerue helpe thy name ſake deliuer thy ſtrength heare praier lord conſider word mouth miſdeeds preuaile againſt bee thou mercifull vnto ſinnes let ſorowfull ſighing priſoner come thee lord comfort ſoule thy ſeruant vnto thee doo flie ſuccour satiſfie thy mercie ſoone ſo ſhall reioice glad thee day life looke extreamlie done amiſſe haue ſinned againſt heauen thee woorthie called thy child yet lord thy great goodneſſe powre downe ſome crums fall thy childrens table make one leaſt reward according deſeruings muſt need periſh vnto perteineth nothing open ſhame confuſion damnation thee mercie forgiueneſſe plentious redemption therefore come vnto thee lord thou louer ſoules hoping mine owne righteouſneſſe truſting onlie multitude thy great mercy thou haſt made laid foorth eies people offering ſaluation whole world haſt promiſed whoſoeuer ſhe whole generation man receiue grace repent turne vnfeignedlie ſinnes ſhall haue free remiſſion forgiueneſſe ieſus chriſt lord onelie aduocate mediator whome ſaluation lieth whome thou haſt ſaid deere sonne whome well pleaſed well pacified thy sonnes ſake whome bold come vnto thee appeareth thy ſight making continuall interceſſion v haue mercie vpon thou mightie god cleanſe ſinnes doo awaie mine iniquity oh let feele thy mercy towards doo confeſſe ſinnes vnto thee lord hide mine vnrighteouſneſſe doo acknowledge mine offence accuſe ſelfe thee miſdeeds helpe god ſauiour glorie thy name deliuer forgiue ſinnes thy rich mercy ſake remember offence youth lord thinke vpon thy great mercy couenant made vnto chriſt ieſus thy tender mercie ſake laie ſinnes charge forgiue paſt giue grace amend life decline ſinne incline vertue may walke vpright hart cleane conſcience ſingle eie thee daie night euermore put thy preſence oh thou god comfort incline thine eare vnto calling strengthen thy ſeruant power thy right hand helpe thine handmaiden comfort ſoule thy ſweet promiſes let thy mercy couer mine infirmity moſt mercifull father conſider mine infirmity ſaie manie great beare mine imperfection thy sonne ſauiour ieſus chriſtes ſake good experience infirmitie might mercifull vnto afflicted conſider enimie hath gotten open waie fleſh wherein confeſſe dwelleth nothing ſinne wretchedneſſe miſerie yea lord acknowledge borne ſinne conceiued wickedneſſe nature child wrath fleſh dwelleth good thing ſelfe able thinke good thought much leſſe doo thou thy lawe requireſt bee done haſt ſaid curſed continueth thing written lawe doo againe lawe ſpirituall carnall ſold vnder ſinne therefore lord god call vnto thee grace haſt ſaid aſke yee ſhall haue ſeeke yee ſhall finde knocke ſhall bee opened vnto preuent drawe goodneſſe none come vnto thee except drawne except borne aboue cannot ſee kingdome god aſſiſt therefore guide thy holie ſpirit time time drawe ſhall runne thee giue ſtrength ableneſſe chriſt lord accompliſh fulfill thy righteous ſtand againſt aſſaults diuell may haue place old man beare bodie may crucified dailie die luſts ſinne may vtterlie deſtroied may euermore renewed ſpirit mind life chriſt may alwaies appeare good lord thy great mercy ſake deliuer kind euill namelie ſpirit pride boaſting vaineglorie hypocriſie wantonneſſe haughtineſſe mind preſumption ſelfeloue make mee poore ſpirit humble meeke gentle lowe mine owne ſight lift vp ſelfe aboue brother ſiſters eſteeme ſelfe ſeruant handmaiden men woman doo good example chriſt came miniſtred vnto miniſter alſo hath ſaid bleſſed poore ſpirit againe thou reſiſteth proud giueſt grace humble take ſtonie vnbeleeuing blind doubtfull vnfaithfull vnthankefull hart giue hart fleſh loue incline thy carnall ſecure impenitent hart take awaie giue hart feare loue obeie thee write thy lawe hart graue mind may beleeue truſt liue thee euer take wicked ſpirit ſuſpicion enuie hatred variance ſtrife ſedition ſects euill gealouſie vaine ſurmiſes murmuring grudging backbiting ſlandering anie eſpeciallie ſuch authoritie miniſters thy holie word lord keepe wrath malice haſtineſſe reſpect perſons faith idolatrie ſuperſtition vanity lieng euill word debate contention murther theft falſewitneſſebearing flattering diſſimulation hypocriſie blaſphemie vaine ſwearing name god work creature lightneſſe idle word vnſtableneſſe hart oh lord deliuer thou hart ſurfeting dronkenneſſe gluttonie leacherie filthineſſe fleſh ſpirit vncleane thought vnlawfull deſires euill concupiſcence fornication adulterie luſts bodie take vtterlie alſo couetouſneſſe inordinate care rich deceipt guile dooing wrong anie calling office idleneſſe ſloth beaſtlie ſecuritie giue ouer vnto vnſhamefaſt obſtinate minde hold alwaies vnto thy nourture correction bow hart alwaies vnto thee may ſerue thee day life ſuch holineſſe righteouſnes acceptable thee giue thy grace oh lord may haue thee alwaies mine eies may alſo haue reſpect vnto thy iudgements whatſoeuer ſaie thinke doo may agreeable thy holie word minded vngodlie wicked men woman let haue pleaſure ſuch thing pleaſe grant whenſoeuer ouertaken anie kind ſinne wickedneſſe either thought word deede feele mine owne infirmitie weakeneſſe may immediatelie hartie repentance returne thee againe lie ſtill ſecuritie ſinne make able contented patience heare occaſions offence offered giuen recompenſe euill euill ſuffer good lord giue occaſions euill anie man doo make willing confeſſe fault amend giue grace neuer enuie anie good man loue woman becauſe doo either loue god people elſe beloued make reioice men gift enuie becauſe better mine rather giue thanks hart deſiring may increaſed increaſe faith lord ſauiour thee thy chriſt make ſtrong beleeue thy promiſes increaſe loue redeemer thee thy righteous people make perfect true vnfeined vertue godlineſſe increaſe ſure hope ſaluation iuſtifier without doubt wauering aduerſitie without pride preſumption proſperitie ſo may ſerue thee reuerence godlie feare day life increaſe ſtrength reſiſt ſinne get victorie maſterie ſtand againſt euill temptation aſſaults fleſh world diuell may haue place according thy promiſe neuer prooued tempted thou wilt giue ſtrength ouercome increaſe lord vertues agreeable godlie life come vnto thee god vnto well euerlaſting fountaine health ſaluation good lord giue grace therefore day pilgrimage walke good conſcience pure mind thee towards men dooing reader thy holie word talker onlie may appeare alſo life conuerſation regenerate hart ſpirit grace dailie giue inward taſte feeling thy fauour mercie towards chriſt ieſu lord may knowe thee god father ſelfe thy child euermore aſſiſt thy ſeruant againſt world vaine pompe pleaſures beautie thereof may vnto vile duſt filth ſlime may vſe though vſed may ſerue may take part thereof vnto neceſſitie thanksgiuing doo vſe thy creature voluptuouſlie may liue ſoberlie godlie preſent life thy glorie preſerue defend thy ſeruant falſe opinion deceiued caried awaie errour wicked may growe grace knowledge lord ſauiour ieſus chriſt lord giue wiſedome knowledge vnderſtanding perceiue thoſe falſe lieng flattering ſpirits doo deceiue hart innocent begile vnſtable ſoules giue alſo lord right reuerent pure iudgement vnderſtanding thy holie word auoide raſh iudgements peruerſe interpretation may neuer ſwarue true ſenſe meaning therof grant cheefeſt felicitie may ſame thy holie word hearing reading talking watching praier faſting mortifieng mine owne member lord plant true obedience thy lawe let care world choke thy word make lift vp hart oftentimes thee chance fall ſlip make thinke thee ſorie ſtedfaſt purpoſe amendment oh lord offer vp ſelfe whollie crooked corrupt nature ſo much work vnto thy mercie corrected reformed thine owne pleaſure let hand vngodlie caſt downe ſaue ſoule lord god whither bee proſperitie aduerſitie loſſe gaine ſickeneſſe health life death aid ſtrengthen ſuccour defend thy ſeruant aduerſities tribulation temptation ſuffer tempted aboue ſtrength increaſe ioie comfort thee thy holie ſpirit may reioice trouble affliction imbrace ſame conſolation comfort thinke ſelfe happie counted woorthie ſuffer anie trouble thy name ſake take mine hart thought earthlie comfort onlie ſet mine eies ioie croſſe chriſt may take comfort therein deſpiſe ſhame great reward laid vp heauen thoſe patience ſuffer aduerſitie continue welldooing vnto end oh lord take ſaie carefull hart worldlie thing let vile vnto thy ſake grant neither pouertie oppreſſe driue deſpaire falſhood neither wealth proſperitie lift vp forget thee ſelfe proſperitie may thankfull aduerſitie patient humble lord let merie without lightneſſe ſad without miſtruſt ſober without dulneſſe fearing thee without deſperation truſting thee without preſumption let merie ioie without thee let deſire nothing beſides thee good lord giue ioifulneſſe hart peace conſcience continuall gladneſſe conſolation thy word promiſes may euermore thankfull vnto thee praiſe thy name euer let thy kingdome come vnto righteouſneſſe peace ioie holie ghoſt long ſuffering gentleneſſe goodneſſe faithfulneſſe meekeneſſe temperance ſtrength patience ſuch like vertues preſcribed vnto thy holie word grant god tender louing mercifull hart towards brother long amitie perfect patience beare thing well thy prouidence ſhall ſee meet laie vpon thy fatherlie mercie god leaue ſelfe ſtand thou alwaies weake mine owne power doo anie thing good righteouſneſſe ſtrength lieth onelie thee therefore lord come vnto thee requiring mercie thy ſight aſſiſtance thy grace may bee ſtrengthened power inward man armed aſſaies thine holie complet armour breaſtplate righteouſneſſe ſheeld faith hope ſaluation helmet ſwoord ſpirit thy holie word may ſtand perfect thy bee found woorthie chriſt receiue crowne life thou haſt promiſed loue thee pureneſſe mind therefore lord giue ouer ſelfe thine holie hand deſiring thee chriſts ſake thus armed may remaine vnder protection ſtrong defence thy power thine holie angel may pitch tent round compaſſe alwaies beſeech thee lord giue vnto thy ſeruant ſtrength thine holie ſpirit ſubdue bodie ſinne whole luſts thereof may bee made obedient mind member doo thine holie thou ſhalt appeare reward euerie one according deed may reioice aſhamed thee thy comming moreouer lord beſeech thee thinke vpon thy people ſtraied fartheſt part earth entered couenant thee minded walke thy grant lord may growe togither loue knowledge thy word keepe vnitie ſpirit bond peace vtter confounding errour falſe opinion keepe v cleane hypocriſie ſuperſtition make v ſtrong trouble affliction heauenlie father grant vnto ſaie whereſoeuer diſperſed throughout vniuerſall world profeſſe thy holie word ſo liue may die ſinne lead godlie conuerſation walking innocentlie thee rule confirme hart thy ſpirit lord lighten mind guide v alwaies lightſome lampe thine holie goſpell gouerne preſerue thy church defend thoſe realmes city giue ſuccour harbour thy people make v diligent happie work vocation take thy cuſtodie euer ſoules body liues euer haue gratious fauourable oh lord men euen verie enimies according thy good purpoſe forgiue ſinnes conuert vnto thy truth thoſe thou haſt appointed ieſus chriſt ſaluation mercifull god brother ſiſters ſuffer anie kind perſecution affliction whether mind bodie eſpeciallie ſuch ſuffer thy name goſpell giue patience conſtancie ſtedfaſt hope till thou ſend full good deliuerance trouble gratious thoſe thou haſt coupled linked v loue friendſhip whoſe hart thou haſt mooued praie v wiſh v good ſuccour helpe v neceſſities grant v thy bleſſing holie ſpirit ſanctifie v vnitie faith dwell v euer finallie oh lord haue mercie vpon mine huſband child familie thou haſt giuen v make content thy gift increaſe thy feare hart may trulie loue thee one another v thee ſo may pure ſoule bodie may godlie liue togither according thine holie ordinance giue hart wiſedome vnderſtanding ſet thy feare alwaie mine eies ioſeph caſt ſurmiſes miſbehauiour marie ſpouſe obeied word thine holie angel ſo may beare mine imperfection bee obedient word deed thought thy oh lord giue v power thy ſpirit gouerne ſelues holilie rule bring vp theſe child familie godlie feare nurture information lord knowledge thy holie word may alwaies vnto example godlineſſe vertue praiſe thine holie name plant mine hart vertues neceſſarie requiſite chriſtian woman giue mee grace ſo vſe good gift haue receiued thy mercifull hand may moſt thy glorie praiſe conſolation ſaluation profit thy church behold lord although duſt earth aſhes yet haue taken vpon bold come make theſe petition requeſts vnto thee truſting mine owne woorthineſſe righteouſneſſe doo acknowledge prophet ſtained defiled onlie thy great mercie promiſe merit chriſts death bloudſhedding laie mine humble praiers thee requiring mercie pardon forgiueneſſe ſinnes alſo aſſiſtance thy grace doo thy day life obteine theſe petition therefore heare ſpeedilie good lord forgiue fauourablie lord tarie ouerlong thine owne ſake doo thy deere sonne ieſus chriſts ſake thy promiſes yea amen onelie redeemer mediator sauiour iuſtifier thee father holie ghoſt honour glorie praiſe euer amen another good godlie praier ſaid time euerie christian man woman almightie euerlaſting god father sonne holie ghoſt thou haſt made heauen earth thing conteined haue mercie vpon poore wretched ſinner dailie aſſaulted kind miſerie wretchedneſſe beſeech thee father loue thy sonne ieſus chriſt conſider weakeneſſe frailtie imperfection haue mercie vpon increaſe thy grace ſouereigne sauiour deere redeemer mine onelie iuſtifier come vnto thee lord according word sauiour chriſt hath ſaid come vnto ye labour laden eaſe refreſh oh moſt mercifull father eaſe great burden ſinne haue vnrighteouſlie committed againſt thee either thought word deed refreſh ſoule dailie thy mercy sprinkle ſweet hyſop thy mercie ſhall cleane waſh ſhall whiter ſnowe powre vpon ioie gladneſſe make bone reioice thou haſt ſmitten turne thy face ſinnes put miſdeeds make cleane heart god renew right ſpirit within caſt awaie thy preſence take thy holie ſpirit oh giue comfort thy helpe againe ſtabliſh thy free ſpirit ſhall teach thy way vnto wicked ſinners may conuerted vnto thee deliuer bloud guiltineſſe god thou art god health tongue may praiſe thy righteouſneſſe open lip lord ſhall mouth ſhew foorth thy praiſe conſider mine imperfection helpe thy mercy remember thine old woonted mercy faithfull promiſes made vnto forefather abraham iſaac iacob patriarch prophet apoſtles martyr thy saint sauiour chriſt ieſus compaſſed infirmitie weakeneſſe fleſh came vnto thee lord vnto well euerlaſting fountaine health ſaluation thou mercifullie ſuſteinedſt keepedſt deliueredſt temptation tribulation foot anie time ſlipt went waie committed ſinne againſt thee yet thy mercie alwaies readie ſo thou thine holie ſpirit diddeſt procure repentance ſo turned againe vnto thee conuerſion turning againe thou mercifullie acceptedſt hand bicauſe deſirous liue perfectlie thy ſight thou preſeruedſt ſo found faithfull thee lord thou art ſame thy yeeres endure euer beſeech thee father beare mine imperfection helpe likewiſe thy mercie anie time happen fall commit ſinne againſt thee thou ſaiedſt thine holie apoſtle paule let thy grace time ſufficient ſuch wiſe may immediatelie turne againe true repentance vnto thee conuerſion turning againe accept alwaies mine hand ieſus chriſts ſake ſo ſhall found perfect thee although ſpirit bee willing yet fleſh vntoward weake therefore doo leaue mine owne righteouſneſſe thee knowe confeſſe ſaie fleſh nothing plaine miſerie wretchedneſſe ſinne therefore doo come vnto thee beſeech thee chriſtes ſake extend thy mercifull hand towards doo awaie mine offence knowe lord grace goodneſſe commeth thee therefore art thou praiſed loued feared congregation among saincts thou art onlie giueſt victorie lord hoſts thou ſaieſt thy prophet neither hoſt men ſtrength thy ſpirit therefore beſeech thee giue onlie ſtrength knowledge thee alſo readie earneſt purpoſe ſubdue mine imperfection grace time liue thou thy holie word haſt preſcribed vnto moreouer beſeech thee make perfect thy ſight may render continuall thanks ieſus chriſt thee haue hitherto indeuored ſelfe according power thou haſt giuen liue thy praie thee forgiue ieſus ſake proteſt thee helpe ſpirit order life hence foorth according thy word walke perfectlie thee neuertheleſſe beſeech thee chriſtes ſake time beare imperfection ſhall may anie time found deliuer thy power mercie increaſe faith ſauiour increaſe faith iuſtifier increaſe faith redeemer increaſe faith hope charitie vertues conſonant agreeable godlie life come vnto thee well euerlaſting fountaine health ſaluation heauenlie father let men woman liue thy ſight ſeeke thy requiſite needfull bodie hath pleaſed thee preſerue thou haſt created ſith time creation vntill hath pleaſed thee defend daie night day time life hitherto hurt peril deliuered hour temptation tribulation well aſleepe forgetfull remembred called vpon thee hath pleaſed thee miniſter neceſſitie meate drinke cloathing inward reioicing quietneſſe mind health bodie ſuch like hath pleaſed thee giue man brother profeſſion b huſband vaile remedie conſolation comfort neceſſities grant grace lord trulie honor loue ſerue obeie thee knowe whatſoeuer doo good euill ſhall rewarded thee lighten v dailie thy grace may gouerne ſelues houſhold child thou haſt giuen v true faith feare knowledge thee ſo may acceptable ſacrifice vnto thee ieſus chriſt lord ſeeing hath pleaſed thee father lighten inward eies mind thy grace call great blindneſſe ignorance ſinne wherein men borne knowledge thee let paule ſaith pleaſe thee preſerue whome thou haſt called dailie oppreſſed ſinne deſire turne come vnto thee tongue nation ſoeuer whole world ſeeing hath pleaſed thee call grace knowledge thy word giuen ſeeke loue beleeue let thy direct way erre oh ſtaie foot thy holie hand preſerue thine arme elſe kill vice life may expreſſe faith thee mercifullie heare humble ſuite thy ſeruant grant thy peace day gratiouſlie pardon mine infirmity defend danger bodie good name moſt chieflie ſoule againſt corruption compaſſed euerie ſide vntill ſuch time hauing ended combate life muſt ſuſteine end may atteine thy heauenlie reſt prepared thine elect chriſt lord onlie ſauiour amen another praier mortification holineſſe lord god moſt gratious moſt mercifull doo acknowledge thee vnwoorthie appeare thy high maieſtie offer vp vnto thee ſacrifice praier full ſinne corruption naturallie glad euill vnprofitable good yea beeing ſo miſerable ſee miſerie feele bewaile ought doo multiplie mine iniquity prouoking thy iuſt iudgement againſt zeale cold loue feeble exerciſes religion faint take waie leadeth euill worſſe finallie would leade ſinne reward ſinne true deere father yet hart moued feare true yet doo ſorowe walke ioie muſt continue reape affliction therefore mercifull vnto bleſſe mercifull vnto chriſt ieſus waſh awaie mine iniquity mercifull vnto create new hart prepare praier thy holie ſeruice thou alone lord art hope mightie god ſaluation thou haſt giuen deſire ſerue thee teach may doo good worke thou haſt begun make perfect may loue goodneſſe yet followe vanitie good deſires thee may increaſed accompliſhed ſo ſhall praiſe thee magnifie thee euer honour thy honour glorie thy glorie lord vaine truſt prince trulie truſt lord bringeth plentifull ſaluation age age hath appeared thou lord god art mercifull thy court nothing truth holineſſe world full vanitie full pride full rebellion fleſh alſo world hath manie bait deſtruction fleſh doth delight ſworne togither betraie v sathan yea betraie ſelues therfore deere father croſſe chriſt mortifie v deed fleſh inheritance thou wouldeſt increaſe one end world another nation may worſhip thy footſtoole eſpeciallie lord praie profeſſe thy goſpell nation thou wouldeſt mercifull vnto turning hart thee gratious souereigne queene hir counſell thou wouldeſt powre thy grace vpon diſcharge dutie peace holie teacher thy church thou wouldeſt bleſſe labour peace full beautie church peace wealth commonwealth praie haue pitie vpon mercifullie heare deſpiſe praiers thou haſt created nothing thou haſt redeemed mee bondage ſinne death hell neither gold ſiluer thy moſt pretious bodie offered vpon croſſe thine owne bloud ſhed ranſome therefore caſt awaie whome thou thy great wiſedome haſt made deſpiſe whome thou haſt redeemed ſuch pretious treaſure let wickedneſſe deſtroie thy goodneſſe hath builded whileſt liue thy merit ieſu haſt giuen thy ſelfe acceptable ſacrifice father appeaſe wrath bring ſinners trulie repenting amending euill life fauour againe accept lord among number whome thou haſt chriſt elected purpoſe may conſtantlie cleane vnto thy word ſteps thought intent purpoſes action courſe life may directed made conformable thy commandements promiſes may euer haue thy word mine eies followe onlie moſt infallible rule life lightſome lampe foot order ſteps thy word may feare hart thy great wrath threatnings againſt ſinne quake tremble dreadfull example puniſhments therefore beginning thou haſt within limit charge ſerue thee trulie thoſe work thou requireſt ſeuerall calling order ſteps thy word knowledge thy word firme conſtant certaine immoueable vnchangeable mind wauer wander fro neither caried hither thither inconſtantlie euerie blaſt opinion order ſteps thy word race courſe life obſtacles let vaine ſtrife contention betweene fleſh bloud burſt bond vocation let conſtant healthfull happie proſperous end helpe therein may perſeuere right courſe win goale make inſtrument veſſell mercie caring miniſtring healthfull good thing ſelfe others may comforted thy promiſe ſaiedſt thy labour ſhall vaine lord thou dooeſt ſhall proſper ala ſinne dwelling ſticking corrupt nature doth much trouble hinder ſteps vntamed luſts vncomlie affection inordinate deſires euen like furious mad men doo ſolicit v vexe diſquiet torment v quite drawe driue carrie ſteps foorth true waie thy word ſheweth bypath ſtrange way moſt perillous dangerous pernicious leade deſtruction yea ala ſuch miſerie corrupt nature ſinne thing moſt horrible deteſtable doth ſmile vpon v become verie delightfull pleaſant vnto v moſt willinglie gladlie obeie readie followe flickering intiſements vaine allurement manner vice yea ſo great lamentable weakeneſſe imbecillitie nature thus corrupted quicklie eaſilie ſuffer ſelues continuallie remooued driuen backe diſtracted right waie leadeth thee order ſteps therefore thy word lord beſeech thee ſo rule direct gouerne helpe ſinne neither dwell haue dominion ouer action damnation let ſinne reigne mee ſaie action dauid forcing follow ſugred ſuggeſtions sathan delightſome vanity world brittle ſhort pleaſures fleſh compelling driuing deed action obeie cleane contrarie conſcience neither let ſinne reigne damnation saule regarding thy word furie wrath malice contempt thy commandements ouerwhelmed terror woonderfull great fury drowned eternall damnation helpe temptation may conſtantlie ſtand valiantlie reſiſt dread diſtreſſe lifted vp comforted heauenlie father declare thy readines hearing ſinners moſt mercifullie haſt ſaid crie anſwer whileſt yet thinking ſpeake heare vouchſafe beſeech thee ſame thy great mercy ſake fauourablie heare
