doth mooue v call vpon thee may aſke ſuch thing ſuch ſort thou requireſt thy honor glorie neighbor profit owne ſoules health ieſus chriſt lord amen thus concluſion whole praiers good god haſt commanded men call vpon thee trouble need neceſſitie haſt promiſed ſo heare deliuer ſhall praiſe thee haſt promiſed preſt readie hand ſuch feare thee call vpon thee faithfullie thou wilt fulfill deſires helpe haue called vpon thee mine owne woorthineſſe belongeth nothing wrath ſhame confuſion name woorthineſſe thy ſweet sonne ieſus chriſt mine onlie mediator aduocate vnto thee belongeth mercie forgiueneſſe oh deere god beſeech thee ſake forgiue ſinnes increaſe faith purge corruption helpe mine infirmitie confirme mine hope grant thoſe thing haue praied thing thou knoweſt moſt neceſſarie profitable expedient thy whole church although mine infirmitie dare blindneſſe aſke ſo ſame may redound thy glorie profit thy church reformation life mine aſſured ſaluation conſolation thy sonne ieſus chriſt mine onelie lord mediator sauiour whoſe name beſeech thee father art c evening praiers firſt sunne ſetting praie sunne righteouſneſſe euermore ariſing neuer going downe brightneſſe perpetuall charitie euer ſhining neuer darkened euening sunne hath run courſe going downe daie farre ſpent draweth towards night praie thee de part thou v neither let sunne thy grace ſet ceaſe giue light vnto ſoules thee may abide alwaies haue daie light moſt cleerelie mind knowe loue praiſe thee perpetuallie viſion light thou sunne glorie dooeſt euerlaſtinglie ſhine vpon thine elect making ſhine sunne thee sunne ſhall go daie moone lie hid night ſhall night neither light sunne moone thou lord god ſhalt euerlaſting light inlighten v vnſpeakable glorie euer amen lord let sunne go downe vpon wrath make v feare thee long sunne moone endureth meditation thinke brittle ſtate world glorie whereof like sunne moone verie vnconſtant variable vp downe goodneſſe god onelie permanent endureth euer thinke alſo gréefe v ſée sunne ſet bicauſe expect ariſing againe morning ought men without hope ſorie death bodie knowing morning light reſurrection ſhall eftſoones ariſe receiue ſoule againe ioie paine eternall vvhen candle lamp light praie thanks giuen thee lord daie night commeth haſt giuen v remedie darkneſſe artificiall light candle lampe whereby ſee diſcerne thoſe thing night body expedient v vſe eſpeciallie render immortall praiſe vnto thine holie maieſtie light thy doctrine thy sonne againſt horrour ſinne ignorance hath brought vnto v remedie againſt death eternall grant beſeech thee lord light maiſter truth moſt thicke obſcure cloud mind may ſo driuen awaie expelled lampe thy grace candle knowledge right vnderſtanding bodie corporallie ſoule ſpirituallie wee may euer ſee theſe light glorifie thee liues death thy word ô lord lampe feete light vnto path light thou candle make darkneſſe light lamp euer burning may ſtill watch thy comming amen meditation thinke without materiall light candle would horrour vncouth darkneſſe euen ſo without ſpirituall light god diuine word wiſedome light darkneſſe knowledge errour life death vtter confuſion thinke alſo candle put vnder buſhell ſet candleſticke giue light houſe ſo likewiſe ought let light faith ſhine bright men ſéeing good work may therefore glorifie god euening praiers sundaie ſaid kneeling bedſide make vnreadie ¶ may ſaie one confeſſions sabboth daie pag 384 387 render vnto thee euerlaſting praiſes moſt mercifull father thy gratious fauour loue towards v thou haſt vouchſafed preſerue v daie reſt life hitherto vnder ſhadowe thy moſt mercifull protection beſeeching thee alſo take v thy tuition preſent night euer tempted anie ſuggeſtion sathan thoroughlie armed holie ghoſt may haue power force reſiſt aſſaults ſure faith confidence bloud thy bleſſed sonne lord sauiour chriſt ieſus giue v grace repent v ſinnes vnfeinedlie craue remiſſion vnceſſantlie imbrace thy holie word commandements ſincerelie expreſſe liuing effectuallie whereby may walke vprightlie conuerſation ſure certaine hope reſurrection eternall life merit chriſt ieſus wiſe virgin may found waking watching comming ſhall come iudge world equitie reward euerie man according work bodie grant v grace moſt mercifull father behaue ſelues ſo vprightlie life may made partaker thy kingdome thine elect liue eternall ioie felicitie world without end amen another euening praier lord daie almightie eternall god father lord ieſu chriſt togither thy sonne holie ghoſt didſt create man thine owne likeneſſe breath breth life thy goodnes continueth thy pleaſure thou haſt made one bloud mankind aſſigned time length life world thou giueſt life people earth breth walker therein thou take awaie ſhall depart turned duſt bleſſe thee heauenlie father hart giue thee thanks onelie ſauing v daie danger alſo cradle defending ſoules body death wherefore magnifie lord ſoules ſpirits reioice god sauiour hath looked vpon baſeneſſe affliction ſeruants mightie hath done v great thing holie name wherefore praiſe lord euermore bicauſe mercie endureth generation generation ſuch feare ſhew foorth power euening go bed remember mercie ariſe ſoules night praiſe god beginning watch powre hart like water face lord saint ioifull glorie ſing lowd vpon bed wherefore alſo praiſe thee continuallie confeſſe thy name euermore thou art god delighteth hart maketh ſoules merie therefore night thinke vpon thy benefit ſpirits ſhall conſider thy woonderous work thou haſt commanded thy mercie celebrated daie time thy truth night ſeaſon lord god mercie gentleneſſe patience pitie truth ſhe weſt mercie vnto thouſands blotteſt offence lift vp ſoules vnto thee hart praie thee put thine eies horrible confuſion vncleanneſſe wickedneſſe mind repleniſhed loathſome darkneſſe ignorance full doubtings error hart turned thee god power ſtrength ſoules body defiled filthilie weakened lord thy great merice blot offence looke vpon trouble dolour hart forgiue ſinnes lo ſoules wounded holpen onelie mercie health fleſh bicauſe thine anger neither reſt bone bicauſe ſins iniquity haue gone ouer head heauie burden haue preſſed v wound putrified corrupt bicauſe fooliſhneſſe aſſwage thine anger turne thine indignation pardon fault remit puniſhment reſtore v light thy goodneſſe loſt lord heare lord forgiue harken god thine owne ſake thy name called vpon v god heauen earth euening tide doo call vnto thee remitting ſinnes daie eſpeciallie haue committed againſt thee breaking thy saboth prophaning holie daie vnholie deed ſpeech cogitation thou wouldeſt receiue v thy protection keepe v night diuell haue power ouer v thou watchfull ouer v eternall sauiour leaſt ſubtill tempter apprehend v thou art made v euerlaſting protector behold whether ſleepe wake whether liue die thine thou art creator redeemer stand therefore behalfe watch armie thy celeſtiall warriers thine angel filled perfect goodneſſe perpetuall integritie behold thy face alwaies heauens expell v houſes wicked ſpirits bee mortall enimies damage v caſe deliuer v perſecutors laie ſnares deſtruction turne away thy mercie truth v god aſſiſt v peaceablie may reſt ſleepe quiet laie v downe peace ſleepe thou lord alone makeſt v dwell ſafetie without danger hide v thy tabernacle lord ſitting thy ſecret place abiding vnder ſhadowe thy wing may ſaie vnto thee lord thou art keeper refuge god truſt thee feare danger although extreame darkneſſe yet wee feare though ſhould walke midſt ſhadowe death yet dread none euill thou art v thy rod thy ſtaffe doo comfort v let thy mercie god followe v day life may dwell thy houſe longneſſe day praiſing thee euermore sonne holie ghoſt one true god reigning world without end amen another large euening praier confeſsion lord god father euerlaſting full pitie acknowledge confeſſe woorthie lift vp eies heauen much leſſe preſent ſelues thy maieſtie confidence thou wilt heare praiers grant requeſts conſider owne deſeruings conſciences doo accuſe v ſinnes beare witneſſe againſt v knowe thou art vpright iudge dooeſt iuſtifie ſinners wicked men puniſheſt fault ſuch tranſgreſſe thy commandements yet moſt mercifull father ſince hath pleaſed thee command v call thee trouble aduerſities promiſing euen helpe v feele ſelues ſwallowed vp death deſperation vtterlie renounce worldlie confidence flie thy ſouereigne bountie onlie ſtaie refuge beſeeching thee call remembrance manifold ſinnes wickedneſſe whereby continuallie prouoke thy wrath indignation againſt v neither negligence vnkindneſſe haue neither woorthilie eſteemed liues ſufficientlie expreſſed ſweet comfort thy goſpell reuealed vnto v rather accept obedience death thy sonne offering vp bodie ſacrifice hath made ſufficient recompenſe ſinnes haue mercie therefore vpon v lord forgiue v offence teach v thy holie ſpirit may rightlie way earneſtlie repent ſame ſo much rather lord becauſe reprobate ſuch thou haſt forſaken praiſe thee call vpon thy name repenting hart ſorowfull mind conſcience oppreſſed hungering thirſting thy grace ſhall euer ſet forth thy praiſe glorie albeit woorms duſt yet thou art creator worke thy hand yea thou art father thy child thou art ſhepheard thy flocke thou art redeemer people thou haſt bought thou art god thine inheritance correct v therefore thine anger lord neither according deſerts puniſh v mercifullie chaſtiſe v fatherlie affection world may knowe time ſoeuer ſinner doth repent ſins bottome hart thou wilt put awaie wickedneſſe thy remembrance thou haſt promiſed thy holie prophet finallie humblie thanke thee mercifull father thy deerelie beloued sonne ieſus chriſt sauiour thy benefit beſtowed vpon v beginning world time election creation redemption ſanctification continuall preſeruation namelie thy mercie goodneſſe thou haſt preſerued v daie time life hitherto miſfortunes hurt danger bodilie ghoſtlie forſomuch hath pleaſed thee make night man reſt thou haſt ordeined daie trauell whither ſleepe wake liue die alwaies thine grant deere father may ſo take bodilie reſt night ſoules hart kindled light thy countenance may continuallie watch time lord ieſus chriſt ſhall appeare deliuerance mortall life meane ſeaſon take thou god care charge v periſh work darkeneſſe ouercome anie fantaſies dreames temptation may fullie ſet mind vpon thee loue thee feare thee reſt thee furthermore ſleepe exceſſiue ouermuch inſatiable deſires fleſh onlie ſufficient content weake nature enioieng ſweet ſleepe comfortable reſt bodie mind may healthfullie ioifullie riſe againe better diſpoſed liue godlie conuerſation perfect obedience thy word glorie thy holie name profit thy church ieſus chriſt lord whoſe name furthermore make humble petition vnto thee onlie ſelues others whome thou wouldeſt ſhould continuallie praie ſaieng holie word hath taught v father art heauen c lord increaſe faith ſtrengthen thy manifold ſweet promiſes grant v perfect continuance therein liues end whereof humblie make confeſſion ſaieng beleeue god c let thy mightie hand outſtretched arme lord ſtill defence thy mercie louing kindnes ieſu chriſt thy deere sonne ſaluation thy true holie word thy commandements thought word deede wherein iuſtlie deſerue euerlaſting damnation vtterlie throwne thy preſence yet lord ſee thy goodneſſe againe towards v ſuffering v thus periſh ſinnes haſt ſent thine owne deere sonne ieſus chriſt take vpon whatſoeuer due reconcile make v one thee againe therefore good lord doo come vnto thee beſeeching thee ſake feeling greeuouſneſſe ſins groaning vnder burthen may feele releaſe eaſe thy holie ſpirit aſſured ſtedfaſtlie beleeue chriſt hath borne burthen euen v grant lord aſſured heereof conſcience may thy holie ſpirit renewed inward man hate deteſt abhorre ſinne ſtudie liue acording thy bleſſed whole life doo onlie praie ſelues lord alſo whole church eſpeciallie ſuch perſecuted thy word grant vnto whither death life may glorifie thy name liues aduancement thy glorie benefit commonwealth eſtabliſhing perfect gouernement thy church according preſcriptrule thy bleſſed word rooting ſuperſtition idolatrie relikes antichriſt gouerning hir ſubiects peace tranquillitie defend hir lord conſpiracies treaſons rebellion ſo worke hart hir ſubiects knowing hir authoritie doth come thy heauenlie maieſtie may obedient hart humblie obeie hir thee thee preſerue whole counſell magiſtrates realme lightened thy holy ſpirit may defend truth ſuppreſſe wickedneſſe mainteine equitie behold paſtors preacher thy word bleſſe labour increaſe number place mercie peril danger ſoule bodie wherevnto fraile man ſubiect thou haſt ſent vnto v thing neceſſarie preſent life health food apparell ſuch like manie thy deere child doo want notwithſtanding dealeſt heerein fauourablie v thy louing kindneſſe giue thee hartie thanks deſiring thee thou haſt hitherto thus fauorablie mercie preſerued v thy protection euen preſentlie daie haſt brought v paſt danger thereof ſo beſeech thee good lord like fauour behold v night taking naturall reſt quietneſſe may thy protection ſo defended body reſting ſoules may occupied beholding thy fauour mercie towards thy child ſtill looking comming lord sauiour ieſu chriſt full redemption grant ſleepe immoderate according luſts fleſh much ſufficient refreſh weake nature thus refreſhed bodie mind may able doo ſeuerall office function vocation wherein thou haſt placed v grant wee laieng body downe reſt may thereby put mind long reſt death doo laie downe body bed ſo may thereby admoniſhed hereafter ſhall cleane towell wherewith thou waſt girt example teach v loue ſerue one another thee haue mercie miſerable ſinner top toe within without altogither polluted defiled ſinne thy ſight peter humblie beſeech thee vouchſafe waſh ſweet bath thy pretious bloud filth polluſions ſinnes may whiter ſnowe waſh thou ſaie foot onelie lord hand head yea verie hart ſoule conſcience alſo thou waſh ſhall haue part thee thou waſh ſhall cleane euerie whit part yea cleaner glaſſe waſh mee therfore cleane mine vncleanneſſe doo awaie ſinnes negligence ignorance yea ſo purge ſcowre mine affection thy grace mercie feete ſaie perfect loue thee true charitie neighbor may walke path thy peace direction thy ſpirit laſt come pure cleane vnto thee purifier confuſion ſhame mine enimies daie death ſhall moſt buſilie watch thanksgiuing may obtaine thy mercie forgiueneſſe manifold ſinnes feele ſelfe much bound vnto thee ſaluation finallie let thine handmaid ſeruant praie thee waſh foot ſeruants lord make ſaie number euermore deſire diſſolued chriſt sauiour amen new laid bed ſaie pſalme lord thou haſt ſearched knowne thou knoweſt downe lieng mine vpriſing thou vnderſtandeſt thought long thou art path bed ſpieſt way lo word tongue thou lord knoweſt altogither thou haſt faſhioned behind laid thine hand vpon knowledge woonderfull excellent attaine vnto whither ſhall go thy ſpirit whither ſhall go thy preſence clime vp heauen thou art godowne hell thou art alſo take wing morning remaine vttermoſt part ſea euen alſo ſhall thy hand lead thy right hand ſhall hold ſaie peraduenture darkenes ſhall couer ſhall night turned daie yea darkneſſe darkeneſſe thee night cleere daie darkeneſſe light thee alike reines thine thou haſt couered mother wombe giue thanks vnto thee fearefullie woonderfullie made maruellous thy work ſoule knoweth right well bone hid thee though made ſecretlie faſhioned beneath earth thine eies ſee ſubſtance yet vnperfect thy booke member written daie daie faſhioned yet none deere thy counſelles vnto god great ſumme tell number ſand wake vp preſent thee trie god ſeeke ground hart prooue examine thought looke well anie waie wickedneſſe leade waie euerlaſting let neuer imagine miſchiefe vpon bed doo vngodlie ſet themſelues good waie ſleepe haue done ſome harme make abhorre thing euill commune mine owne hart chamber ſtill saincts may ioifull glorie reioice bed praiſe thee daie night finallie grant may behold thy preſence righteouſneſſe awake vp thy likeneſſe bring paſſe may ſatiſfied glorifie thee eternallie amen praier daie ended men giue themſelues reſt night ſo life finiſhed ſhall reſt death nothing like life euerie daie nothing like death ſleepe nothing like graue bed lord keeper defender grant laieng downe reſt vnable keepe ſelfe may preſerued craft aſſaults wicked enimie grant furthermore haue tunne race life thou wouldeſt thy mercie call vnto thee may liue watch thee euermore gratious god giue take reſt thee bring paſſe thy goodneſſe may euen ſleepe mine eies ſleeping abſent thee may haue dreames drawe vnto thee ſo ſoule bodie may kept pure holie euer amen laie downe peace take reſt thou lord onlie makeſt dwell ſafetie pſal 4 9 another praier vſed husband wife ſo ſoone laid bed lord god protector defender diddeſt gratiouſlie preſerue keepe thy ſeruant holie tobie laie wife sara gard thine holie angel ſo sathan bound power ouer keepe v alſo king king lord lord night euermore ſubtill serpent meanes haue power vexe greeue v may ſlepe night remembrance thee whoſe tuition keeping commit v bodie ſoule haſt bought redeemed v pretious bloud immaculate lambe thy deere ſonne deere beloued sauiour ieſus chriſt holie ghoſt honour glorie amen meditation remember néerer end one day iournie morning alſo troubleſome daie paſt night come ther withall reſt quietneſſe pleaſant ſléepe maketh moſt excellent prince poore wretch alike time euen ſo tumult trouble temptation tempeſts life beléeue chriſt haue prepared v hauen reſt moſt pleaſant ioifull perpetuall vvhen put candle ſaie light vngodlie ſhall put light candle ſhall ſhine light ſhall darke dwelling candle ſhall put yea full often ſhall candle wicked put deſtruction ſhall ſuddenlie come vpon ſo ſhall horror full darknes lord let candle put light v turned darkneſſe lighten thou candle make thou darkneſſe light yea lighten thou darkneſſe beſeech thee lord ſleepe death thy great mercie defend v peril danger darke dredfull night lighten illuminate thou euerie darke corner habitation thy light candle go night loue thy sonne sauiour ieſus chriſt little ſaie god although extreame darkeneſſe yet feare though ſhould walke midſt ſhadowe death yet dread none euill thou art v thy rod thy ſtaffe doo comfort v therefore lie darkneſſe thou protector bring v thy light ſaue v vtter darkeneſſe weeping gnaſhing teeth may behold thee cleere light perpetuall morning ſhall darknes night need anie candle materiall light thou lord wilt inlighten v vnſpekable glorie vvhen feele ſleepe comming diſpoſe ſelfe reſt praie lord ieſu chriſt watchman keeper take thy care grant bodie ſleeping mind may watch thee made merie ſome ſight celeſtiall heauenlie life wherein thou art
